11521112112221112121.content:
A Clefairy? That's indeed what comes around the corner. A little, cute, pink Pokemon, looking at the three Pokemon before it with interest. Its eyes soon fall on you, and widen when they do. You look at the Clefairy nervously, wondering what it has planned, and wondering how it coul have scared Mightyena and Delcatty.

You get your answer to both questions when it wags a finger. It's about to use Metronome! A sudden shockwave of red energy bursts from the Clefairy. It's burning hot, and all three Pokemon, plus you, cry out as the heat wave rolls over you. Mightyena and Delcatty collapse, while Sylveon falls to its knees and its grip on you weakens. The fairy type refuses to let go of you, though, even though you feel like you're about to slip out of its weak grasp.

You look at your fallen Pokemon companions sadly, before you remember the Clefairy and look back at it. It is hovering towards you, and lands softly a foot away. Sylveon looks at it and growls weakly, but then it collapses onto its side, dropping you onto the ground. You grunt as you hit the ground, and push yourself up before looking angrily at the Clefairy. The pink Pokemon does not acknowledge your anger, though, and simply raises a hand. A pink aura surrounds you, and you levitate off the ground and towards the Clefairy's face. The pink, rotund Pokemon grins at you once you're within an inch or two of its gigantic face.

And then, to your surprise, the Clefairy leans forward, puckers its lips, and kisses you. The soft lips press into your entire body, and warmth flows through you. You stare in shock, and a bit of terror, as the Clefairy pulls away, blushing brightly and grinning some more. A Pokemon... A gigantic Pokemon... Just kissed you? What could that mean?

But as you try to think about it more, you realize you can't. Your mind turns hazy, and you start to feel confused. And as the Clefairy reaches up with a hand, its stubby fingers closing around you in a tight fist as the levitating aura fades, you realize it didn't kiss you out of affection... It was using Sweet Kiss to confuse you and incapacitate you.

You hope that doesn't bode ill for you, because now, you're in the fist of this giant Pokemon. And it can do whatever it wants to you...
11521112112221112121.title: A Clefairy

choices: Sylveon plucks you out of the water.
You travel under water a bit.
115211121122211122.content:
As the Pokémon continue along the river, Mightyena says something you cannot understand. Looking ahead you see a bridge, one that you know is not well travelled. The Pokémon seem to all say something to one another, while they walk forward. As they get to the walking track that connects to the bridge, Delcatty leaps out onto the walking track and looks around. It then calls out to both Mightyena and Sylveon who walk out onto the road.

Once on the other side of the bridge, Sylveon leaps off the path and back down to the riverbed, having no idea what your Pokémon is up too, you say nothing. You grip harder onto its ear. You can hear Delcatty say something, but like before you have no clue what it is saying.

As Sylveon stands at the water’s edge, it lowers its head back down and begins to lap up more water, leaving you hanging from its head. Your Pokémon‘s head bobs up and down, causing you to lose your grip of its ear and you fall into the water.
115211121122211122.title: You come to a bridge

choices: Sylveon told you in front of it.
Sylveon puts you on its head.
1152111211222111221.content:
All you know is that you have fallen from your Sylveon’s head and landed in a river, you start thrashing your arms and legs about trying to find something to get a hold of, but you only find water. What seemed like forever, under the water, something wrapped around your body and plucked you out of the river. Too your shock, you where face to face with Sylveon again, whom seemed happy to see you. As you breath heavily, you look back at Sylveon, and say as best you can, “Don’t drop me in the water again” it only responded with a nod.

The two of you, soon return to the others, Mightyena looks at you with a worried expression, while Delcatty shows little interest in what happened.
1152111211222111221.title: Sylveon plucks you out of the water.

11521112112221112211.content:
You found yourself being held high off the ground, by one of Sylveon’s ribbons, your Pokemon happily stared at you, you mother told you to never hold your Eevee away from you, while you never did that yourself, you where understanding why you shouldn’t, it was rather frightening to see the ground so far away.

Only a short time later, your Pokemon held you above its head, while looking up. You where a bit unsure, as to what it was planning, it followed by turning you upside down, while opening its mouth. Before you had a chance to order your Pokemon to stop, Sylveon had plunged you into its open mouth. Unlike with your experience with Mightyena, you could feel the Pokemon’s teeth pressing against your body, along with its smily flesh.
11521112112221112211.title: Sylveon held you in front of it.

choices: Tell it not to put you in its mouth again
Stay quiet and see what it does
115211121122211122111.content:
Already covered in Sylveon's drool, you squirm to get out of its mouth, but it's no use. The giant Pokemon isn't letting you out, and it's even biting down on you gently. You're terrified that it's about to bite you in half, even though the thought seems crazy considering how much this Sylveon must like you, since Eevees only become Sylveons if they love their trainers. Feeling the slimy tongue of the Pokemon run over your face, though, you're not sure if it will eat you or not.

Luckily, you feel the tongue start moving you, and the teeth move apart. You're pushed partially out of the Sylveon's mouth by its tongue, and you can tell that your legs and feet are now outside. You then feel something wrap around them, and you're slowly pulled from the Pokemon's mouth by its own ribbons. Your face is covered in drool, so you can't see well, but you can tell that your Pokemon has brought you in front of its face and is looking you over. Hanging upside down with the Sylveon's ribbons wrapped around your legs, you're glad that it decided to spare you, but you're still scared that it almost ate you...
115211121122211122111.title: Sylveon pulls you out.

choices: Tell Sylveon you hated it, and that you never want it to happen again
Tell Sylveon you don't mind, and that you actually liked it
1152111211222111221111.content:
You start to grow angry as you think more about what just happened. Sylveon could have killed you by putting you in its mouth, and even though it didn't eat you, it still terrified you. You glare at your Pokemon and start to scold it. To your surprise, Sylveon looks at you sadly, and brings up a second ribbon to wrap around your waist and flip you around so you're no longer dangling upside down by just your legs. You notice that Sylveon's grip on you is quite gentle, and it doesn't seem to be angry at you. It's taking your scolding without losing its temper. It seems to know what it did was wrong. But then why did it do it?

Sylveon glances over at Mightyena, who has been standing there and glaring at Sylveon ever since it almost ate you. You remember that Mightyena almost ate you earlier, but let you out of its mouth, and wonder if that may be related to why Sylveon is looking at Mightyena now. You start to piece things together, and a thought comes to mind. You wonder if Sylveon remembered what Mightyena did, and perhaps Sylveon wanted to do the same to you for some reason?

"Did you just want to see what it was like to have me in your mouth?" you ask Sylveon. To your surprise, the Pokemon nods, confirming that it did just want to have the experience of holding you in its mouth. That's an odd thing for it to want to do, but you consider that it's never been able to fit a human in its mouth before. Perhaps it really was just curious what it would feel like.

You're still unsure of whether or not you liked the experience yourself, though. Should you keep scolding Sylveon and make sure it doesn't threaten you again, or should you let it off the hook?
1152111211222111221111.title: Tell it not to put you in its mouth again

choices: Wonder why delcatty is staring you down, but ignore it.
delcatty pounces and grabs you by the shirt, angrily.
11521112112221112211112.content:
As you say that you really didn't mind, in fact you said you kinda liked it, Sylveon starts to lick you all over, purring-like seeing that you're alright. You warn Sylveon that it should still be a little nore mindful of these things.

With that, you notice delcatty giving you a dirty look as the eveelution puts you on his back. You:
11521112112221112211112.title: Tell Sylveon you don't mind, and that you a...

115211121122211122112.content:
You hope your Pokemon was only curious and would pull you out, while it may not be a meat eater, its mouth still smelt foul. But you where wrong, Sylveon removed its ribbon that held onto you, allowing you to hang out of its mouth for a moment, you soon felt its ribbon push on your legs and into its mouth, you had to fold your legs to fit inside its mouth, but it was not like you’d have a say in the matter. It somehow managed to close its mouth around you, you wanted to try and fight your way out, but you where unable to even move a muscle, on top of that, you could feel yourself being mouthed in its saliva. It was utterly cramped inside Sylveon’s mouth, but I guess you could call it luck, you had not been cut by its teeth. All you could think of was the cramped space and its foul smell.

All of a sudden, you could hear what sounded like Mightyena saying something, once it had stopped, you felt your Pokemon’s mouth move and your upper body plunge down what you knew was its throat, unlike with Mightyena, Sylveon’s throat was much more smaller, you could feel the tube stretch around your shoulders, while pulling firmly on your body, with a torrent of movement, Sylveon dragged you down into its throat.
115211121122211122112.title: Sylveon pushes you in deeper.

choices: ..To keep you in his belly for now
1152111211222111221122.content:
Glurrrp.. Glorrp.. Those were the noses you heard as your Sylveon swallowed you whole, leaving you to grow a bit frantic and squirm, hearing his soft moans as he traced your wiggling bulge with one of the ribbons, murring softly as you oozed down the slimy esophageal passage, soon squeezing through a tighter sphincter, splatting into Sylveon's lightly gurgling, but very hot and wet stomach, you'd groan at how much more intense the stench was in here, shaking your head as you looked around at the folds of slimy flesh, pulsing and rippling lightly.

Outside Sylveon let out a short burp and sighed, rubbing his belly with a ribbon, Mightyena watching, almost unable to believe what he saw, nosing Sylveon's gut and listening, hearing you faintly over the rumbling gurgles. the Fairy Eeveelution lightly blushed, and it sure seemed like he enjoyed your taste, as you sat inside your Pokemon's groaning gut, you'd feel the flesh start churning and kneading around you, groaning softly, you feared the worst, as in time Sylveon decides..
1152111211222111221122.title: Swallowed by a Fairy

11521112112221112211222.content: But will you survive or be digested?
11521112112221112211222.title: ..To keep you in his belly for now

choices: One of Sylveon’s ribbon coming at you.
You are coming up on a drinking Arcanine.
1152111211222111222.content: You fall into the clam river water, not aware of how fast the water current was moving, you find yourself being pulled under the water, you struggle to swim up to the surface, you struggle for what seemed like an hour, before you come back up to the surface of the river. With a deep breath, you float in the water. You are still being pulled down river, when you look around you see.
1152111211222111222.title: You travel under water a bit.

choices: Vaporeon carried you out of the water.
11521112112221112221.content:
As the river’s current held you under the water, you could see one of Sylveon’s ribbon as it flew pass you, a second one came into view, but it also seed to miss you. You couldn't move as the water rushed you downstream, when you didn’t see any others ribbon’s, you wondered if your Pokémon had just given up on you.

You were still able to hold your breath, this gave you a moment to look around, and to you the river almost seemed like the ocean. But you can’t hold your breath forever, it was not that you started to struggle, you were finding it harder to hold your breath. Your movements caused you to turn around under the water, to your shock you were almost face to face with a Vaporeon.

The Water Pokémon opened its mouth, before lunging at you…
11521112112221112221.title: One of Sylveon’s ribbon coming at you.

choices: It did it out of kindness
115211121122211122211.content:
You wake up, not having noticed you'd blacked out. The last thing you remember is that you saw a giant Vaporeon moving towards you with its mouth open before you went unconscious. You realize you're lying on your back, and get up to a sitting position, looking around. You're still a bit groggy from blacking out, but you recover quickly, and start to examine your surroundings.

You're lucky you don't have more serious amnesia, otherwise the sight around you would terrify you. Since you remember recent events, though, you're not surprised to see four giant Pokemon--Mightyena, Delcatty, Sylveon, and Vaporeon--standing over you. You look at them all and smile. You're safe. You didn't drown in the water, and from what you can guess, the Vaporeon actually helped you get back to shore.

Sylveon has noticed that you woke up, and gives a happy cry. You watch as one of its ribbons extends, reaching you and gently coiling around your torso a few times. Your arms are pinned, but you don't care. You're feeling tired, and don't want to raise them out of the giant Pokemon's grasp, especially since you know it's safe. The Sylveon brings you closer to its face, its baby blue eyes staring at you intently before it gives an affirmative little bark. Clearly, it seems to think you're unharmed.

The Sylveon then turns to the Vaporeon, and nods at it. The Vaporeon stares back for a moment, and you wonder what it is planning. It just brought you out of the water, but why? Did it do it out of kindness... Or does it want something in return?
115211121122211122211.title: Vaporeon carried you out of the water.

1152111211222111222111.content:
Finally, the Vaporeon nods back. You sigh in relief. Apparently, the water-type saved you out of e kindness of its heart, and doesn't want a reward.

But as you watch the Vaporeon turn and start to walk back to the river, a thought crosses your mind. You're still tiny, and you still want to figure out how to change back. For the time being, though, having as many Pokemon protectors as possible would benefit you, since they could protect your tiny form during this time of weakness for you. That Vaporeon might be a useful addition to your group, if it could be convinced to join.

Do you want to try to recruit the Vaporeon into your group?
1152111211222111222111.title: It did it out of kindness

115211121122211122212.content:
All you could do was watch, as the Vaporeon jaws came at you. Time seem to slow down, and your vision became dull, everything around you became dark, you were able to make out the teeth and tongue that were coming at you, but everything else became hard to see.

Where you blacking out, the answer was no, even being underwater you felt the Vaporeon’s tongue on your chest, then a sudden rush forward, as it flushed you deeper into its gullet. All of a sudden, your head was no longer under the water, still everything was pitch black. But you weren't out of the water, your head and shoulders had been thrust into its esophagus, it was then you felt waves of muscle ripping down your back and over your chest. But that wasn’t the strangest thing to happen, without warning a loud thud echoed through the tunnel, while throwing you about. A sudden surge forced you deeper into the Vaporeon’s throat, along with some river water. Another sudden thud seemed to throw things about a second time, it was now that you felt the waves of flesh with your legs and feet.

While the sudden movements had stopped, you were left with the constricting muscles that guided you deeper into the water Pokémon’s anatomy, you recalled before getting your Eevee, a family friend living nearby, had evolved their Eevee into a Vaporeon, the two of you were really good friends and just last week, the three of you played together for a day, and now your nothing but food for such a Pokémon.

Your head jammed into its sphincter, the closed muscle stretched around your body, depositing you into the water Pokémon’s stomach. As you lay in its moving chamber, the water level doesn’t pass much higher than your waistline. You breathed out and then back in again, the air had a strong acid taste, giving you a little bit of a chest pain. As the stomach sounds filled your ears, you could feel a tremble coming from the Vaporeon, it didn’t hit you until yet another thud, tossed you about inside the water Pokemon’s stomach, you hate to admit it, but it was almost like something was hitting the Vaporeon that just ate you, another powerful whack tossed you about, before you really felt the Pokémon’s trembling body and what felt like it limping away. Even being food for this Vaporeon, you felt sorry for it, you recall watching a Pokémon battle on the television and how after getting beaten up, how much a Vaporeon would shiver.

Your predator seem to stop limping and came to a stop, its stomach however kept moving as you lay on it. You felt like trying to fight your way out from its gut, but you knew that wasn't going to be possible. You were about to cry, when you felt the Vaporeon swallow something, you paused until whatever it had eaten dropped into its stomach with you. It was some kind of berry, you could tell since it lay between your legs.

The tremors seem to have come to a stop, when the stomach suddenly pushed your forward, forcing you into its stomach wall. Pushing your hands into the moving wall, you felt the stomach walls close in on you again, this time your head was plunged into what felt like its esophagus. Everything around you, pressed firmly into your body, pushing you back into the Vaporeon’s esophagus, just as before the smooth fleshy walls griped into your body; pulling you deeper into the wavy tunnel. To you it felt that this was talking longer then last time, with each press into your chest the air was forced from your lungs, and replaced with a foul tasting air, you still had an acidy taste, but nothing are strong as before.

You were beginning to believe, that this would you trapped here forever, until a loud gulp rang in your ears and your eyes where blinded by light.
115211121122211122212.title: Vaporeon swallowed you.

choices: Vaporeon took you back to the others.
1152111211222111222122.content:
You feel yourself side over Vaporeon’s slimy tongue, before dropping a small distance onto what felt like solid earth. Your vision still had not cleaned up, but you knew something large and blue stood over you.

Taking your time, things soon became clear and looking up you could see the same Vaporeon, only now it looked like the friend living nearby. You could tell by its expression, that it was worried about you, more than anything else. Standing up you said, while looking into its large black eyes, “You where saving me, not eating me” you said with a weak voice. Vaporeon nodded in response, as it lowered its head down and opening its mouth, this made you flinch, but as its soft and slimy tongue pressed into your body, as it gave you a friendly kiss, you relaxed knowing you were in save, well jaws.
1152111211222111222122.title: You landed on the ground.

11521112112221112221221.content:
Vaporeon pulled away from you, taking a step back, it sat down while keeping its dark eyes tried on you. For only a moment you felt uncomfortable, having a Pokemon this size towering over you,well one that had just snatch you up from no where.

The river you had fallen into wasn’t all that far from home, you had frequently passed it by. You’d seen this Vaporeon many time before, and had contact with it, you knew it had been a wild Pokemon, and ignoring the warnings from your mother, continued to interact with it. You would occasionally feed it, however for the most part, you would watch it from distance and sometimes when it felt like coming in close, it allowed you to pat it.

Taking your eyes off the Pokemon that just saved you from the torrent, you push yourself up off the ground, just as you were about to look up, you can feel a shadow looming over. Looking up you see that Vaporeon’s open mouth once again, coming towards you. Before you had a chance to react, the Vaporeon’s mattress like tongue slam into your front, you couldn’t be sure, if its tongue had gripped onto you or if its tongue had just stuck to its tongue. The Vaporeon whipped you back into its short muzzle, as its tongue settled back between its rows of teeth, its jaws slam shut around you.

As you laid on its fleshy tongue, saliva began to build up around you, but that was not all you could feel. You felt each step the Vaporeon took as you laid on its tongue. Since this time you were not surrounded by water, you could smell its breath while was somewhat strong, nothing to cause you to pass out, but still something you noticed. By now the Pokemon had taken a number of steps and had not eaten you again. Making you think, this time it didn’t intend to swallow you again. The only question was, were did it plan on taking you.
11521112112221112221221.title: Vaporeon took you home.

115211121122211122212211.content:
You had spent sometime inside this Vaporeon’s mouth. A few times already, it had built up a good amount of saliva, each time it would press your back onto the top of its mouth, and swallow its payload of drool. You wished this Vaporeon allowed you to sit on its head, as Sylveon had before you fell into the water. Plus it would have been nice to see where this Pokemon was talking you.

As you felt the saliva level raise up to your neck, you knew what would be coming next, and as you predicted, you felt its tongue rise, lifting you back to the top of its mouth, as the firm ridges passed into your back and your front sink into its soft tongue, the load ‘Glup!’ soon rang through your ears, as its latest build up of silva washed down its throat, a place you where happy not to follow it.

As its tongue rested back between the bottom of its jaws, you felt the Pokèmon’s head drop, before feeling and heading something hitting its head, a few more knocks, lit a light bulb in your brain, you knew what that sound was, it was the little door you’re parents had installed so that the Pokèmon could come and go as they please.
“I’m home!” you said aloud.
Shortly after saying that, it felt as if Vaporeon was lowering its head to the floor. You where proven right, as a blinding light shinning through its lips as it opens them. You find yourself back behind the front door of your home. It seemed as if this Vaporeon is rather slow and careful with you now, as it gently dropped you of from its mouth and onto the carpet.

Before you have time to thank it, Vaporeon tosses its head up calling out to who ever might be in the house, not hearing a response, you look up at the Vaporeon and said, “I think they are all out looking for me”
Looking back at you with its large eyes for a moment, before giving you a ‘This isn’t good’ expression. You didn’t know that this Pokèmon was aware of where you lived, but still you where glad it had taken you home, of all the places you might have ended up, this would have to be the better option.

You still felt a little unease being around this Pokèmon, it was a wild one after all and while you might have spent some time with it in the past, it wasn’t like the others you knew and loved. You took a moment to think, maybe if Vaporeon would follow your commands, you could at least have it help you until the others get home.
115211121122211122212211.title: Back to your home

choices: Take a walk around the house.
Have it, take you to the others.
1152111211222111222122112.content:
Taking a step back from Vaporeon, you kept your eyes on it, watching it carefully. You can see that it was focused on you, as you where with it.

Taking a deep breath, you said clearly, “Vaporeon, sit”

You had never given this Pokèmon a command in the past, so you didn’t know what to expect from it, as the moments passed, it didn’t even move a muscle. Until its tail began moving forward, as its back turned towards the wall, the small door soon slammed shut, when you turned back to the Vaporeon, it had already sat itself down, while its tail was the only thing still falling into place. Letting out a sigh of relief, you walk up to the Pokemon before patting it on one of its toes, not the place you wanted to pat it, but it was really the only place you could easily reach.

Looking up from Vaporeon’s paw, you can see that its rather clam, that made you feel safe with it in the house with you. You had been worried, it might have been nervous being inside a house.

The question is, what to do now.
1152111211222111222122112.title: It obeys your command.

11521112112221112221221121.content:
This wild Vaporeon seemed to be willing to protect you and follow at least this sit command, you begin to remember some of the times the two of you played together. It never seemed to have any real problem with you, but at some point it would just jump into the water and win away, that always mede you feel sad that it had left, and you where only worried that it might do the same to you now.

You turn and run away from its paw and once you feel you are far enough away from the giant blue sitting Pokèmon, you turn to see it had been following you withers eyes.

Taking a deep breath you call out to Vaporeon, “Look, I know you like to leave at a moments notice, but until the others come back, you’ll be all I have” You take a moment to see that Vaporeon is paying close attention, you add, “Please stay with me until then” with your last words, you sound desperate.

This time Vaporeon respond to your words, right after you had spoken, by happy nodding its head at you. You almost collapse feeling completely relieved that you’ll have someone or at least something watching over you.

Now the two of you will…
11521112112221112221221121.title: Take a walk around the house.

choices: You told it to turn into the kitchen.
115211121122211122212211212.content:
You call out to Vaporeon, “Hay Vaporeon, let me sit on your head and I’ll show you around the house”

It wasn’t until after you said that, you felt you could have used better words, but it didn’t seem to have offended your large blue friend, it at first seemed to lay down on its belly and moved right front paw to the front of its muzzle, taking this as a sign from it, you climbed up onto the Pokèmon’s paw. Once you were standing laying on its paw, Vaporeon seem to slide its paw up its muzzle and face, until it reached the base of its head fin. Jumping off you found yourself on the left side of its head fin, sitting down you feel the Pokèmon rise up off the carpet and begin to walk into you home.
115211121122211122212211212.title: Explore the house.

choices: Something interrupted the two of you.
Nothing happened and you both went in.
1152111211222111222122112122.content:
As Vaporeon carefully walked down the hallway, with you happy sitting on its head, the two of you soon reached the kitchen doorway, calling out to the Pokèmon, you said, “In here, please”

Vaporeon had followed your command, made its way into the kitchen, even being in here was a shock, everything seemed to big and this made you wonder about what it might be like in your room, while you are at this size.

But your attention is soon taken up by a letter stuck to the fridge with a Eevee magnet, in short it was a letter from your parents, telling you that, they would be away for the next few days to a week and that they had left you dinners in the fridge and to see the neighbor if you needed anything.

With your parents work it was common for them to be called away at a moments notice, they tried hiring sitters for you, but half the time they ended up leaving mid way through and you always seem to have taken good care of yourself and the Pokèmon, you all found that all you needed was to have someone check on you and everything pretty much worked out alright, you liked being alone in the house, well pretty much alone.

Vaporeon called out to you, which knocked you out of the trance you found yourself in, the Pokèmon had its right front paw pointing to the sink. It continued to call out in a slow way, making you wonder just what it wanted from you. But then it hit you, it might now be the sink its was after, but could it want water?

“Do you want something to drink?” you asked. It responded by slowly shacking its head, as if to say no.

Thinking for a moment, you recall that Vaporeon is a water type and may need or want to be in water more often then you would think.

“O, I see. You want to go swimming?” you asked.

The Pokèmon responded with a call, which to you pretty much confirming your second guess, right off hand you guessed the best place for Vaporeon to get a swim, would be the bath tub, it would just need to be filled first. Not wanting to keep Vaporeon waiting, you directed it to leave, “Okay, lets head back out and keep going, I’ll tell you the right room” with that said Vaporeon turned around and exited through the same door, back into the hallway.
Since the bathroom was at the other end of the house, and Vaporeon taking its time, it was a good ling while before you made it to the bathroom.
1152111211222111222122112122.title: You told it to turn into the kitchen.

11521112112221112221221121222.content:
It was somewhat awkward holding onto this Vaporeon’s head fin, with your right hand, while leaving you to try and brace your left hand on its head. With each step this Pokèmon took, you felt as if your hand might slip and you would fall off its head. While you where laying on Sylveon’s head, you had a nice bow to hold onto.

As the two of you came up to the bathroom door, you pointed towards the door, saying, “Its this one, here” you forgot that Vaporeon might not be able to see what direction you were pointing. Without failure, your Pokèmon companion turned into the bathroom’s open door, leaving you as awestruck as with the kitchen. It seemed that this blue Pokèmon wasn’t so estranged towards what a bathroom was, as it silly walked towards the fixed bathtub and prepared to jump.

“NO… WAI…” was all you could get off, as Vaporeon leaped into the air, jumping over the bathtub’s tiled wall. Once it had reached the highest point of its leap, you found yourself airborne, all you could do is scream as the distance between you and Vaporeon grew wider.

What you couldn’t see is that Vaporeon had already began moving to intercept your fall, the moment its forelegs touched the base of the bathtub, it had swung its whole body around. All you could see was the white of the bathtub and tiled wall, before this massive blue fluke swept in front of you. Feeling yourself hit a massive pound of flesh, a feeling you were now well familiar with, forced you to come to a sudden stop, with a loud thud, everything came to a stop,leaving you at the base of Vaporeon’s tail. With your heart racing,and breathing heavily, you manager to muster a thank you, while Vaporeon breathed a sigh of relief.

Once you had calmed down, from this last ordeal, and while still standing on all fours, you looked up at Vaporeon, asking it, “Can you put me up there?” you pointed towards the mixer tap for the bathtub. This time Vaporeon rated its tail up high toward the rim of the bathtub, giving you easy access to the rim. With a simple jump, you found yourself back on firm ground. The blue Pokèmon wasn’t able to stand next to you, however it stood up on its hind legs, nearby waiting for its next instructions. Posing your hand into the same position, as the taps handle.

“Push it like this” showing the Pokèmon, as you pushed your fingers up with your other hand.

You watched as the Vaporeon used it paw to lift the tap handle up, allowing water to rush out of the spout, only now it seem like a giant water pipe has burst, no longer a simple little tap. Vaporeon however, wasn’t prepared for the gush of water and leapt backwards, its shock soon worn off and it waded through the now shallow water, back towards were you stood.

Vaporeon stood back up on its hide legs, giving you an unhappy stare as its head now sat above the bathtubs rim.

“Sorry, about that, I didn’t think the water would be like that” as you apologised, Vaporeon’s right eye twitched, you followed on by saying, “Um, you’ll need to turn off the tap, once the tap is full” reluctantly Vaporeon nodded.

It was rather an awkward situation, waiting for the bathtub to fill with water and having an unhappy Vaporeon in front of you. All you could think of doing, was to give it a pat, to try and ease things over with it. Carefully you walk right to the edge of the bathtubs rim, reaching out to the blue Pokèmon, hoping it would lean forward.
11521112112221112221221121222.title: Nothing happened and you both went in.

choices: The bathtub filled with water and you two played.
The other Pokemon came to the house.
115211121122211122212211212222.content:
Vaporeon’s unfriendly stare, soon came to an end when it’s head moved forward, towards where you were standing. You flinched as it came closer, thinking it was going to eat you… well again or worse. Holding your hands up in front of you and turing away, was all you could think of doing.

The few moments it took the Vaporeon’s head to be with in biting range, felt much longer. Only once its face had been up right in person, you felt its soft tongue press into your legs, before the soft muscle slowly made its way up your chest and head, leaving you with a coat of saliva, on the front half of your body.

Looking back at the Vaporeon, you see that its more relaxed and cheerful, it even pushed its self back, away from the side of the bathtub, falling a bit into the water and floating on its back.

By now you can see the bathtub is almost full of water, you call out Vaporeon, saying, “Hay we can play soon, once the tub is full and you’ve turned off the water, we can play, okay?”

Vaporeon nodded in retune to what you said, all you could think of was how smart this Pokèmon must be,to understand what you have said to it.

It was nice watching Vaporeon in water you could see the bottom of, how it effortlessly glided through the water, barely creating any ripples on the water surface, you could see the bathtub didn’t have much in the way of space for your friend to swim around in freely. Only Vaporeon seemed more at at home here, then when the two of you where in the hallway.
115211121122211122212211212222.title: Vaporeon leaned forward.

115211121122211122212212.content:
With no light able to pass through the Vaporeon’s lips, you were for the time back in pitch darkness, although you could tell which direction you wanted to avoid, never the less you remained motionless, you could only hope that Vaporeon was taking you back to the other Pokemon or at least home.

The idea of you going home had been crushed, when you felt the Vaporeon slip back into the water, you knew that it wasn’t heading home, but somewhere else. Despite you being on a pool of saliva, its tongue still seem to have a firm hold on your body. As time went on, it felt as if you were inside a roller coaster with all the twist and turns you knew this Vaporeon danced under the water, only now what would be graceful underwater dancing, only make you feel sick.

That soon came to an end, when the sound of splashing water echoed from outside, followed by the sound of gushing air as the Vaporeon took a long a deep breath through its nose. You could feel it take a few steps before, the Pokemon lowered its muzzle, as its jaws finally parted ways, its mouth was filled with light and you could make out all the details of its smooth velvet flesh, as the angel of the Pokemon’s now wide open maw reach what felt like forty five degrees, its tongue lapped out go its mouth, depositing you on a pile of moss.

In-between the Vaporeon’s legs you could see a large body of clam water, it appeared as if the two of you were inside a secret cave, all of a sudden its left leg raised up, the rest of its legs followed suit as it walked around were it had dropped you off.

As you followed the Vaporeon with your eyes, you started noticing the cave it had taken you too, you could see glass bottles unbroken, gathered along the wall’s of the cave and appeared to be reflecting light. To you at this point, the cave seem vast in size, with what appears to be both dirt and rock covering the walls of the cave.

As the two of you stared into each others eyes, you questioned the Pokemon, “Is this were you live?”

It simply replied by nodding its head.

Despite feeling a little unbalanced, you still stood up to try and take in more of this Pokemon’s home. You could soon see that Vaporeon had placed each of the clear bottles, so they would reflect light coming in from small holes around the top of the cave.

You try commenting on its cave by saying, “I love what you have done with the place”

Vaporeon smiled back at you, it always seem to know what you were saying. While it was nice to see were your friend’s home, you really wanted to get back to the other Pokemon you where with. You guessed that this wild Vaporeon would protect you, you still felt that the others where trying to help you.

You call out to the Vaporeon, “Its lovey to see your home, but I really need to get back to the others, can you place take me back?”
115211121122211122212212.title: To its den.

choices: Vaporeon swallowed, so you’d never leave it again.
It started to leave its den.
1152111211222111222122121.content:
The Vaporeon’s mood shifted after you had asked it to take you back, lowering its head the Pokemon no longer foisted on you, but the ground beneath it.

Trying to cheer up your giant friend, “Vaporeon I want to come back, but right now my friends where taking me somewhere and I think it might have something to do my shrinking”

Just thing you could hear something running, well at your current size, it was a big something. Turning towards where you think the sound had been coming from, you make out a tunnel that had been concealed in a darker part of the hidden cave. Soon rushed out a Vulpix, it stopped study as it stand down at you. The red Pokemon quickly shifted focus to the Vaporeon, for a short time is said something you could not understand, and you felt it might have been all about you, the Vaporeon whipped a little, before laying itself down on the cave floor and holding on of it’s forelegs over its head.

Watching the Vaporeon as it huddled itself into this depressed pose, you kind of knew how it felt. With a deep breath you begin to jog over to Vaporeon, while the Vulpix still seem to be talking to it.

As you reached the Vaporeon and as the Vulpix still seems to be trying to talk to Vaporeon, you reached out, placing your hand on the top of the water Pokemon’s head. Out of no where it suddenly raised its head into the air, while turning to look back at you, lucky it hadn’t knocked you over. As Vaporeon stared down at with with rather said eyes, you reached up trying to touch its head, which was out of reach.
Giving this sad Pokemon a soft stare, you say, “Its alright Vaporeon, I want to come back with you, its just we where in the middle of something, and besides you can come along with us if you like”
Vaporeon cuddly lowers its muzzle down to you, it turns it nose away, before softly rubbing your whole body, with its cheek, something similar to how it would rub your hand, when you would reach out to it.

As the Vaporeon pulled away, it began to stand itself up off the cave floor, the Vaporeon quickly lapped its soft tongue out from its muzzle, and whipped it straight over the front of your body, once again hiding you in-between its teeth and tongue…
1152111211222111222122121.title: Vaporeon begins to look sad.

11521112112221112221221212.content:
Finding yourself back behind the lips of a Pokemon, you lay almost motionless. On the outside you can hear that Vulpix talking again, only you couldn’t understand what it had been saying, you being a human and all. Just then you felt the Vaporeon walking, each time one of its paws touches the cave ground, a small tremor can be felt throughout its tongue.

Short time later, you can tell that the Pokemon holding you in its mouth is outside, by the chirping coming from some Pidgey, you however feel the pressure of Vaporeon’s tongue press you into the roof of its mouth, as it swallows another build up of its saliva, still this hadn’t left you dry. As its tongue relaxes, you can hear the muffed sounds of Sylveon talking. As you do the tongue begins to shift, along with the feeling of the Vaporeon’s mouth shifting. You wonder if Vaporeon is becoming nervous, as you hope that it is approaching your party.

You shortly feel your elevation drop and turn upwards, while being almost stuck to the Pokemon’s tongue. Suddenly in a blinding flash, you fall for only a moment and land on a rocky ground, as your vision clears up you at first see the Sylveon you had been riding before all of this, along with the less interested Delcatty and the still concerned Mightyena.

Before you have any chance to respond, one of Sylveon’s ribbons reaches behind your back, it wraps around your body with a firm grip, lifting you of the ground and towards the waiting pink and white Pokemon. Sylveon brings you right up to its own muzzle, before loosing its grip on you and licking the whole front of your body, making you giggles as its tongue licks up your body a small number of times.

Once Sylveon has done licking you, it stars back at you with a relieved expression. Mightyena who’s head hovers above Sylveon’s head, seems to also be relieved at seeing you safe and sound.
Speaking up you say, “Vaporeon saved me, and I want it to say with us”
You could hear the Vaporeon’s voice, it seemed a little surprised. Mightyena and Sylvan both looked at Vaporeon for a moment, saying something you couldn’t understand, while Delcatty remains silent.
11521112112221112221221212.title: It started to leave its den.

115211121122211122212212121.content:
(Please note that in this post, the talking Ninetails
is using telepathy as some Pokemon, in the TV show and Movies have used, I am not injecting talking Pokemon onto this story, got it!)

The sound of rushing leaves, draws everybody’s attention. A Ninetails is seen slowly coming towards you and the group of Pokemon. While you had never seen this Ninetail’s before, you had a guess it was the one everybody whispered about. A wild Ninetails know for causing trouble to those whom annoyed it.

Sylveon’s other ribbons seem to surround you, while Mightyena’s fur stood up, as it crouched a little, while letting out a rather scary growl.
Ninetails wasn’t in a happy mood either, at first it seem to give Mightyena a strong stare, before turing to you and while using telepathy to send its word directly into your mind, as well as everyone else.
A cold feminine voice, echoes, ‘I don’t appreciate others spreading rumours about me cursing the locals’ the Ninetails takes in a deep breath and this time with a less angry voice, ‘Besides, I have no
quarry with this one’

You ask the Ninetails, “Can yo…”

You where cut off as the Ninetails interrupted, ‘No and even if i wanted to I couldn’t. Stop searching for me and move on’

And with that the Ninetails, turned itself around before leaving the way it suddenly appeared.
115211121122211122212212121.title: A Ninetails appeared.

choices: The wild Vulpix wanted a closer look.
1152111211222111222122121212.content:
Once that Ninetails have moved on, all the Pokemon look back towards you, as Sylveon’s ribbons withdraw, giving you a clear view once again.

Taking a deep breath, you tell your Sylveon, “I want to go back to Vaporeon’s home”

Sylveon seemed unsure about at, but without resisting, it said something to the Vaporeon. It was then that Delcatty seemed to say something, before turning the other way and walking off. You guessed that Delcatty wanted to go home, seeing that you now had three Pokemon caring for you, it must have felt it no longer need to be around.

Sylveon placed you back onto of its head, as Vaporeon turned away and appeared to head back to its home, Vulpix walked along side its watery friend. Mightyena seem to follow along as well, it seem to still want to keep an eye on you.

Vaporeon had taken everyone to a hidden part of the forest, to a small hole in the ground, you haven’t seen this part of the forest before, at leave you don’t thin you have. Mightyena seem to have has something to say, before it laid down close to the opening, besides that, the hole in the ground was way too small for it to fit down.

Vulpix, Sylveon and Vaporeon all enters the dark cave one by one, with you in the middle on top of Sylveon’s head. It wasn’t too long before the four of you back up to where Vaporeon had first taken the two of you. Seeing the pool of water’s reflection, along with the light bouncing off the glass bottles, lit the caven up so you could make out most of the details of the rocks and dirt.
1152111211222111222122121212.title: Back to Vaporeon's den.

choices: You convince her youll stay with her.
1152111211222111222122122.content:
The massive Vaproen fixed you with a glare. She didn't look happy at all, i fact she looked almost offended. You backed up slightly as her glare bored into you.

"I uh...Not to say that I dont dislike it here...but I-I need to get home!" You sputtered out. But it was to late. The Vaporeon had made up her mind.

She jumped forward, and before you could react she clamped her mouth over your torso...
1152111211222111222122122.title: Vaporeon becomes angry.

11521112112221112222.content:
Looking ahead, you see a giant Arcanine drinking from the river and you seem to be heading towards its partially submerged mouth. The current was moving you too fast for you to do anything, the water current drives you right into the giant Pokémon’s mouth. You come to a sudden stop, as the Arcanine had closed its jaws with you between them.

You felt yourself being lifted up, you are still in a pool of water, but everything is dark and something soft and fleshy is right under you, you guess it is the Arcanine’s tongue, the rotten smell is a dead give awake you are now in the Pokémon’s mouth.

Suddenly…
11521112112221112222.title: You are coming up on a drinking Arcanine.

115211121122211122221.content:
You wonder if that Arcanine even knows that you are inside its mouth, you do not have time to ask it, as a sudden surge forced you deeper into the Pokémon’s mouth and down its throat. Unlike the time you were eaten by Mightyena, you do not feel anything pulling on you, just that you seem to be falling down a large water slide.

It was not all that long when you finally splashed into a pool of water, only it was the Arcanine’s belly and unlike Mightyena you did not think you would be getting out of here. You try to think of a way out of the Arcanine’s belly, but the smell from its belly and lack of breathable air causes you to fall asleep.

On the outside Mightyena, Sylveon and Delcatty search for you, only that they do not know you traveled just under a Kilometer away and into an Arcanine’s mouth.

The Arcanine began to walk away from the river, knowing full well it had eaten something that was in the water, it walked away from the river bed wondering if it would ever have another chance to grab another one of those little things. It knew that it was alive, but unsure of what you were.
115211121122211122221.title: You go down a waterslide.

choices: It just wanted to get a look at you, and so it eats you
It doesn't want to eat you, and lets you go
115211121122211122222.content:
Suddenly, light floods the dark interior of the Arcanine's maw, and you feel yourself falling. You land in water, and swim to the surface before rubbing your eyes and looking around. A shadow looms over you, and you look up to see the cause. In fear, you see the Arcanine, which is standing over you with its huge black eyes staring right at you.

You realize you're now inches (at your scale) away from the shore, and the current is nonexistent here. You can tread water and stay in place, giving you a chance to look up at the enormous Pokemon, unsure of what it wants. It refused to swallow you, probably because it tasted you, but did it spit you out only to look at you first before eating you anyway, or is it planning to let you go?
115211121122211122222.title: The water drains away

choices: Roar from a more monstrous Pokemon
115211122.content:
Eevee continues to run, and you realize it is heading out of the borders of your backyard and into the woods beyond. You shout at Eevee to stop, but it doesn't care. It's excited to have found a tiny human, and isn't about to slow down and relax. So, you continue to hang onto your fistfuls of its fur and hope it stops soon.

Luckily, it only takes a minute for Eevee to slow down and come to a stop, panting. You sigh and let go of Eevee, sliding off its back and onto the grassy ground of the forest. The forest is not very dense overall, but it's still quite dark and ominous here, as Eevee has brought you into one of the denser parts of the forest. You only ever entered the lighter and less dense parts of it, so it's scary to see the darkness all around. And it's even scarier when you're tiny.

Eevee looks around a bit before collapsing, tongue flopping around as it pants. You walk around to its face, but immediately step back as its hot breath washes over you. You cough a bit and keep your distance as Eevee watches you and tries to calm down a bit. The exertion of running has taken its toll.

You watch Eevee and wonder what you're going to do now, as you're deep in the forest and you're not sure if Eevee is willing to help you get back home. You're taken out of your thoughts when you hear a sudden sound from within the woods. Eevee's ears perk up as it looks around in fear, and you hurry close to its side. The sound repeats, and you think it sounds like a...
115211122.title: The nearby forest

choices: The Houndoom approaches the bush you're hiding in
The Houndoom walks off somewhere else
1152111221.content:
A howl rings out, and Eevee whines quietly. Suddenly, it reaches over with its mouth and bits the back of your shirt before picking you up and hurrying into a nearby bush. You don't resist, as you know Eevee is trying to help you now. Eevee releases you once you're both hidden, and the two of you peek out of the bush to search for the source of the sound.

As you watch, you see a Houndoom and a Houndour emerge from among the woods, both of them looking at each other and quietly barking back and forth. You assume they're parent and child, and you watch as the Houndoom tilts back its head and howls at nothing, making the noise you heard before. The Houndour does the same, but its voice it much higher and cuter than the Houndoom. You presume that the parent Houndoom is teaching its child how to howl.

Eevee and you both stay silent, as you definitely don't want to attract attention from strong Pokemon like these. Or at least, stronger than Eevee. But as you hide in the bush, you notice the Houndoom start to sniff the air. It smells something, but you can't tell what. Your heart beats faster as you realize maybe it smells you or Eevee. If so, your cover will be blown...
1152111221.title: Houndoom and Houndour used Howl

choices: You can't think of anything, just run!
You can surely think of something, stay and help her!
1152111222.content:
A roar rings out, and Eevee whines quietly. Suddenly, it reaches over with its mouth and bites the back of your shirt before picking you up and hurrying into a nearby bush. You don't resist, as you know Eevee is trying to help you now. Eevee releases you once you're both hidden, and the two of you peek out of the bush to search for the source of the sound.

As you watch, you see movement amongst the trees, and then a Nidorina stumbles through a bush with a Venonat running after her. The Nidorina turns and slashes at it with her claws, but the Venonat dodges and retaliates with some sort of powder scattering move. The Nidorina growls in anger, and pushes through to slash again. The attack connects, and the Venonat falls unconscious.

The victorious Nidorina roars triumphantly, confirming that she is the cause of the sound you heard before, but her victory is cut short as a Venomoth emerges from the bushes and attacks her. She fights back, but soon, a strong attack by the Venomoth sends her flying into the bush where you and Eevee hide.

She lands beside Eevee, who jumps away from her and almost crushes you under its paws. You manage to avoid it, and look at the Nidorina with concern. She opens her eyes and happens to see you. Her eyes widen with surprise, but before she can do anything, the Venomoth launches another attack of energy into the bush at her.

The Nidorina cries out in pain, and you feel sorry for her. But you are too small to help, and you're not sure if you could aid her in any way. You hesitate to flee though. Maybe a plan will come to mind if you think hard enough?
1152111222.title: A wild Nidorina appears

11521112222.content:
For some reason, you feel like you can't just abandon her. She may be a wild Pokemon, but you feel pity for her. You decide to stay and try to think of how to help her. While you think, you order Eevee to get away from the Nidorina. It obeys and picks you up by your shirt again, then tosses you onto its back and steps away. The Nidorina struggles to her feet, and is struck by another attack. You can tell she's close to fainting.

As you watch her, an idea suddenly comes to mind. You can't help her, because you're tiny... but there is someone here who can help her, someone who isn't so small as you.

"Eevee!" you shout. "Use Tackle on that Venomoth!"

Eevee, to your surprise, obeys your order, and lunges out from the bush at the hovering insect. The Venomoth falls to ground from the attack, and you barely hang on to Eevee as it lands and attacks again. Though the Venomoth takes little damage, it buys time for the Nidorina to recover and attack. She jumps up and swipes her claws at the Venomoth, and it faints. She lands beside Eevee, and roars once again.

Eevee barks happily, joining in her celebration, but that gets her attention and she looks over at you and Eevee. Or more specifically, just at you. She stares at your tiny form, and you stare back, unsure of what to make of her. She's way bigger than Eevee, and she looks like she could eat you alive, but you did just save her. She's got to appreciate you now, right? She won't hurt you, right?
11521112222.title: Stay and help her

choices: The Nidorina puts you down and leaves, having thanked you
The Nidorina wants to thank you more, and wants to bring you somewhere
115211122222.content:
To your relief, the Nidorina smiles at you and growls happily. But then she does something you didn't expect. She steps forward, causing Eevee to stumble back in surprise, and reaches forward with a paw. You stare at her in shock as she quickly snatches you off Eevee's back and brings you up to her face. Eevee steps back again in fear, unsure whether or not to attack the Nidorina. Is she planning to hurt you?

That same question enters your mind as you struggle in the tight grasp of the Nidorina. But she's far too strong to be affected by your struggles. She just continues to hold you until you finally give up and go limp, locking eyes with her and silently begging her not to hurt you.

Unfortunately, it looks like the Nidorina doesn't care about your pleading gaze. She moves you closer to her mouth, and her jaws part. You catch a small glimpse of the fleshy interior before you close your eyes and scream in fear.

But you don't feel her teeth ripping into you, or her jaws crushing you. Instead, a gust of humid air flows over you, and something warm and squishy pushes into your face before sliding along it from bottom to top. After a second or two, the squishy thing lifts away, leaving behind some sort of sticky goo. You open your eyes, looking through the goo dripping down over your eyes, in confusion about what just happened. You're just in time to see the Nidorina's tongue retract into her mouth and her jaws close, as a smile appears on her face and her red eyes turn on you again.

You find yourself smiling back as you realize what just happened. She meant you no harm. All she did was lick you as a sign of affection, to thank you for helping her. And as you smile at her, her tongue appears again and gives you a second lick, shorter this time. You laugh and smile wider, as the lick tickles you a bit, and you almost feel like you want the Nidorina to do it again. But at the same time, you know that you can't just stay here in her grasp and get licked forever. You need to get back with Eevee, and hopefully, get out of these dangerous woods.

But whether or not you are able to depends on what the Nidorina wants to do, since you're in her fist, so she gets to decide what to do with you...
115211122222.title: She smiles at you--she's thankful!

1152111222222.content: After that, Nindora Bring you into somewhere like a deep forest Evee came along too Nindora took you too..
1152111222222.title: The Nidorina wants to thank you more, and wants...

11521112222221.content: Nindora Took you into a route but you dont know what it is because its so big after that Evee sensed something and Nindora was shocked to see a strong trainer! The Trainer Use his pokemon to attack Both of your pokemon and you were sent flying The Trainer's Pokemon was...
11521112222221.title: A Route

choices: Delcatty told it to release you, and Eevee does so
Delcatty told it to be careful with you, and it lets Eevee carry you around more
1152112.content:
Eevee lifts you off the ground effortlessly and begins to prance about while you dangle from its jaws. You flail a bit, but it soon becomes clear it won't help, so you go limp and hope Eevee doesn't end up hurting you somehow.

Delcatty and Jigglypuff approach Eevee, and Delcatty stands in its way. Eevee stops and looks up at the feline, and Delcatty starts saying something to it. You can't understand it, but when it's done, Eevee does something that reveals what Delcatty had told it...
1152112.title: Walks around with you hanging from its mouth

11521121.content:
Eevee whines and parts its jaws, releasing the back of your shirt from its grasp. You land and fall over, and look up at the three giant Pokemon looming over you. The sight scares you enough to make you run, and you get to your feet and flee as fast as you can.

But you only manage to get a few steps before something heavy yet soft slams into your back and pushes you over onto your face. The pressure lifts quickly, and you roll over to see Delcatty with its paw hovering above you. Before you can get up again, Delcatty gently places its paw on top of you, pinning you to the ground, with only your head not covered by the paw. You squirm under the weight of the feline's foot, but just like with Eevee picking you up, your struggles are fruitless.

Delcatty lowers its head towards you, and sniffs at you a few times. After a few seconds, it snorts and cocks its head to the side. It seems confused by your smell. Could it be that it remembers your scent? Or does it just see you as a little bug that smells odd?
11521121.title: Delcatty told it to release you, and Eevee does so

choices: Yes, and you're about to become its snack
No, it only licked you out of playfulness
11521122.content:
Delcatty finishes talking, and Eevee growls happily before running past it. You bounce about in its grasp, and realize that the Delcatty probably just told Eevee to be careful with you or something instead of telling Eevee to release you. That's rather bad news. Now you're stuck with Eevee.

The Normal type runs into the backyard, dashing through the small flap installed in the bottom of the door, and lies down on the grass before dropping you to the ground. You stand up shakily, wincing as you realize the back of your shirt is coated in Eevee drool. As you glance over your shoulder to examine it, something warm, wet, and slimy pushes you onto your back.

You land with a grunt and look up to see Eevee looming over you, and then it lowers its head and licks you. The giant tongue covers your whole body as it slides from your feet to your face, completely unaffected by your struggles. Eevee finishes the lick and raises its head before barking at you and smiling widely. You look up at Eevee, through the saliva coating your face, and wonder what it is about to do.

It is indeed adorable, and you have always been on good terms with it, but at its size it's also intimidating. It could eat you if you aren't careful. The question is, does it think you're tasty?
11521122.title: Eevee brings you to the backyard

115211221.content:
Eevee licks its lips and growls. Then, it lowers its head and licks you again, and continues licking you a few more times. You start to think it might be planning to eat you, and to your horror, you quickly learn that's true.

The Eevee laps up the tiny creature into its maw. It's too young and naive to understand that the creature is actually a shrunken human, one whose family it is a pet to. It just enjoys the creature's taste, and gulps it down whole without thought.
115211221.title: Yes, and you're about to become its snack

choices: It reaches its nest, and you see it has chicks

choices: I can trust the Poochyena, lets get its attention.
Trust a random wild Pokemon? No thanks, let’s go somewhere else.
13411.content:
Out comes a wild Poochyena which compared to your size was absolutely massive. It seemed like it was taking an average stroll. It doesn’t seem to notice you right away. You look quite amazed yet terrified at the Pokémon since It still looks quite adorable despite your tiny size. You begin to quickly take notice that it’s starting to walk uncomfortably towards you. Not taking any chances, you run to the side just in time as it takes a step right where you were standing before. You notice the paw print it left on the ground and began observing how big it’s paws were compared to your entire body. You walk on the paw print but then accidentally trip into it, not paying attention that it was a little bit bigger than you expected. After getting up, you come to terms with how tall (or small) you are. The height of your entire body was a little bit smaller than even the Pokemon pups paw pad. You become a little worried when you think that any unlucky encounter would be enough to possibly injure you or worse. It starts to walk away but then sits near a what seems like a huge tree covered with some bushes around which you assumed could be the Pokémon’s home.
You consider whether you should go to it and get its attention. Maybe it could help, or maybe with its playful nature have other things in mind for you. If you think it’s too risky, maybe you could run away and go find help somewhere else.
13411.title: It was a Poochyena

134111.content: sadly, trusting a random Pokemon was the end of you. the Poochyena lapped you up and she gulped you down. "stupid human, I could smell you. now you are gonna be ass-fat," she said. sure enough, you were digested into Poochy-Pudge.
134111.title: I can trust the Poochyena, lets get its attention.

134132.content:
Fun fact: Pikachu is called the same in each language!

Sooooo... how 'bout a cute electric mouse?
134132.title: Pikachu

choices: Throws you in her mouth and swallows!
Places you on her head as she heads somewhere...
1341321.content:
Your heart leaping within your chest, you slowly turn around while craning your neck as you glance upwards, noticing that a huge shadow just eclipsed your whole form.

And, standing there, looming above you, you spot a huge creature, completely covered in yellow fur, standing on its hind legs. It has long, pointy ears with black tips, black eyes and red cheeks. A little, black nose rests in the middle of the creature's face.

Your gaze travels down and you notice that the creature has short paws, and a long tail behind itself. Curiously enough, this tail has a heart-shaped tip.

You take a few steps back as you recognize this huge creature as a Pikachu. And a female one, judging from the shape of her tail, which is usually thunderbolt-shaped for the males of the species.

She also confirmed you something else: you really shrunk!

You take a few steps back, unable to believe this.

This isn't real, this can't be real. It must be a dream, a really vivid dream! That's it, this is just a dream...

Again, you look up at the giant rodent, who, unaware of your presence, lets herself fall back on all fours, making the ground beneath you quake lightly while also making you fall on your own behind. You feel a light ache and, with horror, you realize that this is no dream.

You're really shrunken and helpless!

Slowly and carefully, you try to sneak away from the giant Pikachu, deciding that you need to find help as soon as possible. You won't last too much alone like this, so your only hope is to find someone to help you with this dire situation.

But you don't get too far before the Pikachu suddenly moves a step, her right forepaw stopping right in front of you. As a result, you end up bumping straight into it, before ungracefully falling on your back on the hard floor of the 'forest'.

Unfortunately for you, the Pikachu seems to have felt your small body bumping into her paw and slowly rises it upwards, letting her face once again fill your whole point of view.

The yellow giantess seems to spot you on the ground as she moves her head down, her nose stopping near you.

You stay still, not quite sure about how to react, whether try to run or simply let the Pikachu do whatever she has in store for you.

You opt for the choice you believe the safest and lay still. Maybe the giant rodent didn't notice you yet...

But your hypothesis is reduced to nothing as you feel a strong suction power coming from the Pikachu's nostrils as the giantess sniffs your tiny body, telling you that she effectively noticed a tiny human laying before her.

"Pi?" you hear her cry as her nose is removed from your body, the black eyes of the rodent fixing a gaze of genuine curiosity on you.

"Uh... hi?" you try to remain calm, not wanting the Pikachu to be startled by a sudden movement of yours, which would be surely followed by a giant paw slamming on you, smashing you into paste as you were a common bug.

"Cha?" the giantess cries again, moving a paw towards you. Although, against your predictions, the giant paw wraps itself around your body as the Pikachu picks you up while she moves on her hind legs again.

You are roughly brought in front of the rodent's face. It would have been adorable in other circumstances, but right now, from your new perspective, it looks terrific.

"Chu!" the rodent cries for the third time upon noticing that she's holding onto a tiny human!

The Pikachu lets out a few more cries of excitation, before you notice the paw holding you moving you forward, towards her face.

You briefly wonder what she's up to, but you soon find out as the Pikachu...
1341321.title: The rodent giantess

1343.title: We know a lot of pairs...

choices: Find a place to hide for the night
135.content:
You wandered around in the dark forest, fear growing within your entire body. Your awareness was very high as you heard frightening noises in the otherwise silent forest. A light breeze rustled the leaves of the trees, but it did little to mask the cries of the pokemon out there who had yet to notice you. As you walked around, though, you realized that you were very deep within the forest.

You calmed down as much as you could and then considered your options. You were still alive, it'd be best to keep it that way. But is the best choice to run and find an exit to this forest, risking accidentally running into the unseen pokemon, or stay put and hide until you have better chances of survival?
135.title: In Ilex Forest

choices: An hour later, you wake up
Five hours later, you wake up
1352.content:
You needed to take things slow, or at least as slowly as you could. It would be best to find a safe spot to rest and then figure things out tomorrow. You didn't want to accidentally end up in a dangerous situation in the dark. This was the best option, you convinced yourself.

You found a nearby tree trunk to hide beside, hidden from many angles by the tall roots. If a pokemon came from the fifty-degree opening that the roots didn't hide, well... that might be trouble. But, it seemed safe enough--the best you could find--so you relaxed, closed your eyes, and attempted to doze off. Sleep took a while coming. But it came, despite the cold air and wind.
1352.title: Find a place to hide for the night

choices: Go ahead and trust Celebi, return to sleep
Run away quietly before it wakes up
13521.content:
You wake up suddenly, frightened by an odd feeling and shocked to discover that it comes from the fact that a pokemon has taken to sleeping up beside you. You rubbed your eyes, frozen otherwise in fear, but noticed what pokemon it was.

You had learned about Celebi in school, but they had always said she was a myth. Was this a dream? Was Celebi really sleeping beside you, sitting with her back against the tree as if she was protecting you?

You were hardly the size of her foot alone, but you wondered if she had fallen asleep without even noticing you. It was dark out, but even that seemed improbable. In any case, the one-of-a-kind, green pokemon with dark eyelids was resting only inches from you. This was definitely not a dream, so what should you do? Your mind was still numb from lack of sleep.
13521.title: An hour later, you wake up

135211.content: You wonder if she had slept beside you in order to protect you. It seemed very likely of Celebi to do, so you decided that she was harmless. You breathed a quiet sigh of relief and relaxed again, returning to your resting position against the tree. As you tried to sleep, you felt Celebi move in its sleep. At first, her long arm moved across you, shielding your body under her hand, but then she moved again and suddenly her head was upon you. You were trapped underneath her head, being used as something like a pillow. Celebi turned her head, moaning slightly, on top of you, and then relaxed and returned to sleep. You saw her large, dark, closed eyes above you, nearly as big as your entire body itself. She looked very peaceful, so you allowed yourself to be her pillow and find your own (uncomfortable) sleep below her.
135211.title: Go ahead and trust Celebi, return to sleep

1352111.content:
Morning came, but light never accompanied it.

You woke up in a strange, tight space. You were soaked and bouncing around, being tossed between a low ceiling and soft floor. You seemed to be in a puddle of sorts, but it burned your skin at its touch. It took you spotting a nearby berry, the side of Celebi's breakfast, to realize where you were. Even then, you could barely believe it. And, it was too late.

Celebi had moved around again later in the night, removing its head from your body. You had stirred a bit in your sleep, sore from being her pillow, but remained asleep. A few more hours passed before Celebi woke up completely. This was while you were in the middle of your own deep rest. Unfortunately, whatever misconceptions you'd had about Celebi proved to be false as she flew up, plucked a berry from a tree, and returned to the trunk that you were sleeping beside. She sat down again beside you, yawning as she chewed and swallowed the berry. Then, she reached over to the main part of her breakfast and raised you up to her mouth. You were still snoring as she laid you between her lips and onto her tongue. She disliked the taste of blood, so she had merely tossed you around within her mouth--tasting you and savoring her chance to eat a human, shrunken or not--and then sent you into her stomach. Somehow through it all you remained asleep, during the only time when you could've affected your slim chance for survival. Now, though, you were already decidedly chosen to be melted down inside Celebi's stomach as her early morning breakfast.

The burning continued and continued. Then, it ceased. But, by then, you had also ceased.
1352111.title: Morning comes

choices: Celebi decides to have a midnight snack
Celebi yawns and decides to get back to sleep
1352112.content:
You are still sleeping under the legendary pokemon's head, when you are woken by the feeling of something moving. You quickly open your eyes and notice that Celebi has moved once again, removing her head from your body. You hardly stand up and push on your own back, getting a 'crack' out of it. You notice that the grass type pokemon is now standing with her head against the tree trunk. You look up in the sky; it's still dark, it must be around 3 or 4 AM. You go sit down next Celebi, with you arms behind your head. You don't want to go to sleep yet. You just sit there, thinking about this heck of a day. You were supposed to start your journey as a pokemon trainer and you end up mysteriously shrinking and in this forest, completely helpless. You then wake up in the night and find a mythical pokemon sleeping before you. At this point, you look up at Celebi. She is still asleep, you barely see her black eyelids closed in the darkness of the night. But is just a moment, before Celebi moves again in her previous position. But this time, you aren't there to cushion her head, so she hits the ground. Celebi opens her eyes and looks around; she eventually looks down in your direction and spots you tiny figure. She barely sees you due to the darkness, but she still can.

Celebi is in utter confusion. She just found a tiny human before her. Weren't humans supposed bigger? Maybe she was mistaking, maybe it's just some bug. No, it can't be. A bug couldn't possibly have hands, hair or clothes. It's indeed a human. Maybe Celebi is just dreaming. She moves a hand to touch herself. Nope, she's fully awake. She really found a tiny human! Slowly, she extends a arm to pick you up.

You stare ar the legendary pokemon and she stares back at you, maybe trying to find out what are you, when you see her extend her arm. You don't even try to dodge, as you know that running would be useless. You stand still as Celebi's hand closes around your body and lifts you to her face and opens her mouth...
1352112.title: You are woken up again

13521121.content: Before we continue, are you immune to digestion? Which will let you live in the stomach, or will you be digested?
13521121.title: Celebi decides to have a midnight snack

choices: It's over, all over... Let Celebi digest you and return to the past.
No! Don't let it end, you can still salvage this!
135211212.content:
Celebi, one of mother nature's finest specimen was indeed equipped with the faculties needed to destroy any foodstuff unfortunate enough to be ingested. And though remarkably unusual, this human would be no different.

"No no no stoooop!" you yell as Celebi callously shifts your location from her fist to the insides of her mouth. She did not pay any mind to your request, overthinking things was a quality few time-travelers retained. Reality was a paper and Celebi was both the eraser and the pencil, things really only happened when she willed them to. Truly there was no harm in indulging herself if it later turned out to have never happened.

Though mother nature's work is admired by many, she is rather a cruel and unfair matron. Ask any Luvdisc or Unown. Or as things would have it, any shrunken human. You are currently subjected to a view normally reserved for unlucky ants or very careless spiders - The dark insides of a living being. Teeth that could crush airplanes and grind bones to dust! A black hole in the back from which not even light can escape! And your only foothold, a giant tongue that's constantly wiggling, -tasting- your very being to decide your fate.

"LET ME OUT!" you scream at the top of your lungs, slipping to and fro on the massive red muscle. Your screams of terror made Celebi feel a little uncomfortable. She wasn't going to keep it this way after all, she was just having a little fun. To her, anyway, but in the end that was all that mattered if she decided to change the past. And she was definitively curious enough about this tiny little thing to give it another go later, or more accurately, earlier.

Escape seemed like a futile effort, your foothold was very wet, the kind of tongue which doesn't do much talking. Not much eating tiny humans either probably, but you had a bad feeling that was not going to be an issue. Using your mighty intellect, you hastily come up with any excuse to leave this beast intact.

"I'm no bug, I'm human! I'll make a spear out of saliva and cut you open from inside!" you shout in the hopes that she would hear you. Suddenly the mouth shook as Celebi stifled a giggle, which had little effect as you were practically on the edge of her vocal chords. Damn it.

Celebi smiled though she felt even more uncomfortable. She located the feeling to somewhere south of her stomach, like a feeling of guilt in the pit of her stomach. Though less guilty in its characteristics and more... Needy. Feeling a little sheepish she spread her legs and swiped a paw over her sex - Ah. A sharp inhale made your sweating body go freezing cold in an instant as Celebi relished in the now very very comfortable feeling washing over her.

"I have some very, VERY powerful friends! Bug-Types! If they find out anything happened to m-" you continue with your threats as you're once again interrupted by Celebi's voice, less of a shaking giggle this time and more of a deafening moan.

Celebi covered her mouth with one hand while the other continued its ministrations - Why did it feel so good!? Her heart was racing, her crotch was pulsing and her mind overcome with lewd desires - Granted, she didn't have much experience when it came to toying around with shrunken humans, but to live her life thus far without this had to be criminal! She closed her eyes and focused on the little motions inside of her, since she was going to reset the timeline she might as well go all out. Not that she cared if anyone saw her risqué actions, in fact the small visitor in her mouth was almost certainly aware of what was happening.

You were unaware of what was happening, but things were moving. A lot. You feel yourself falling all over the place and finally coming to a stop near the throat.

"N-No...! Please...!" you stammer fearfully in one last attempt, "Not like this...! Why can't we be friends instead!?"
