Celebi stopped for a moment. Yes, she was definitively going to explore the nature of this little creature closer now. Go back in time and undo all of this, treat you nicely. Perhaps in another branch of this story you would be friends. You would be happy. You would be in love.

But in this one, you are her food.

The throat grips a hold of your body and pulls you down, deeper into the digestive system of the mythical Celebi where you will surely meet your end inside a bag of acid...
135211212.title: A victim of Celebi

1352112121.content:
You try to struggle inside the stomach of Celebi, but you can do nothing to prevent digestion. So you lean back against a fleshy wall and start crying, knowing that you'll be soon dead. On the outside world, Celebi is relaxing, sun's first rays filtering through the night's darkness, when she feels that the struggles inside her quitted. Instead she hears something coming from within her stomach... crying? Is the tiny human crying, knowing what awaits him? This saddens Celebi, as she smiles sadly and puts a hand on her belly, before starting to rub it, trying to comfort you in your last moments. Back in the inside, you feel the wall moving from the other side and realize Celebi must be rubbing her belly, maybe satisfied after eating you. You keep crying as you sit down, the acid rising to your neck. The liquid burns your skin as you stop crying: you would at least live your last with dignity. These are your thoughts, before you dissolve in her acid.

On the outside world, Celebi hears nothing more coming from her belly, deducing that her tiny friend was now gone. Even though this, she smiles. She's going to bring you back to life. Maybe after a nap, it's still early. So she leans back and relaxes, falling asleep after a bit.

After a few hours of sound sleeping, Celebi wakes up, and it's fully morning. After stirring for a bit, she stands up; now or never. She flies up in the sky as a greenish white light envelops her. After a moment, she's gone.

The last night, past Celebi is about to swallow you, when a green light appears next to her. The grass pokemon recognizes it as Time Travel as another version of Celebi comes out of the portal. Present Celebi smiles at her past counterpart, before telling her, in their own language, to not swallow you, because she would decide to keep you then. Past Celebi nods as she spits you out, in her open hands "Free at last" you say, dripping with drool, before turning to Celebi "Please, don't do that aga..." you notice something is not right. There are two Celebi?! You are shocked at them as present Celebi looks at you with a smile, glad to see you again. She then cups her hands together. You stare at her confused, while past Celebi smiles, as she know what her counterpart is doing; she undid the timeline where she ate you, so you should be revived in about... now. In fact, a second later, a bright light appears in her hands. When it dies down, an unconscious you is laying on them. Past you looks even more confused as present Celebi prepares to go back to her timeline. She did what she had to do, so it is time to leave. She waves her and your past counterparts as she is once again engulfed in green light. Past you closes his eyes, blinded by the light. When he opens them, the other Celebi is gone "What the hell was that?" he asks to himself as last Celebi encloses him in a hug.
1352112121.title: Time travel!

13521121211.content:
Back to the present, you wake up with the worst headache ever. You had the scariest dream ever: you dreamt that you were somehow shrunk, then the legendary pokemon Celebi found you and ate you. In the end you died in her stomach. You really can't remember what happened then. You slowly and painfully open your eyes. The first thing you see is something dark green colored. Weird, you don't remember having any object inside your house. You feel that your feet are on the cold ground, while your head is laying on this green, soft object. It emanates a comforting warmth. You try to get up, but something keeps you from moving. Looking up you see a light green face, two blue eyes staring down at you. You fully shut your eyes open and see Celebi staring right at you with a concerned expression. She sighs a sigh of relief when she sees you awake, then she smiles kindly. You notice that the green surface you are laying on is actually her belly, and her hands are on your back, keeping you still. Wait. If she's not a dream... she really ate and digested you! And you really died...weird..if you really died you shouldn't be seeing Celebi...or anybody else right now... and why can't you remember nothing about after you died? Your head is killing you, you need to stop thinking. Celebi moves a hand and places in on your head, covering it. She seems to be inviting you to not struggle to rest some more. But you want answers, now. So you use use your hands to try and lift her hand. You obviously cannot even move it, but Celebi does herself and looks at you. You look back at her, finding the right words to speak "How?" is the only thing that comes out of your mouth.

Celebi sighs. She knows that her little friend wants answers, but how can she tell you that she revived you by going back in time and preventing you from getting eaten, when you can't understand her? She groans in frustration, why can't she learn telepathy? So she has no other choice, but try and make you understand her. So, she first points to herself, the she starts glowing. You think for a minute, before realizing: Time Travel. Celebi continues. She then points to herself again, then to her mouth, before shaking her head. She then points to the sky and then to you. You think, trying to translate her moves. After a while, you realize and look up to her "You are saying that you went back in time to stop your past you from eating the past me. You've done it and I was revived?" you ask. Celebi nods smiling, glad that you managed to understand. That was getting pretty awkward. "But why you saved me after eating me?" you ask, confused. Celebi smiles as she closes your body in a hug "You felt guilty because you care about me?" you ask, getting another nod from her. The legendary pokemon then settles you on the ground and stands up, towering over you. You are completely obscured by her shadow.

Celebi knows that now she has brought you back, she has to treat you nicely and become friends with you like she promised to herself. Maybe after that you two could even... that is still far. For now, the first thing to do if she wants to become your friend is...
13521121211.title: Back to the future

choices: Celebi decides to get something to eat.
Celebi can't wait any longer! Time to find Mew!
135211212111.content:
Celebi exactly knows what 'game' she wants to play with you. She will never forget the great feeling she had last night. And she wants to feel it again. So she snatches you from the ground and moves you towards her open mouth. Again, your fears of being eaten awake "Not again! Please don't do it!" you yell. Celebi stops to give you a warm smile, before moving you in her mouth and closing her lips, trapping you in darkness once again. Her tongue starts to lick you all over "Please don't!" you yell again. On the outside world, Celebi spreads her legs and slides a hand towards her waiting sex. She starts fingering herself once again. Your squirming inside her mouth, your pleads for life, your fear, it all gives her a sense of... power. A great sense of power, and she loves it. But this time would be different. She won't swallow you. Back in her mouth, her tongue is still sloshing you around the cavernous mouth, each movement of it causing you to slide a little deeper. Your fear grows each time you get closer to the throat "Please let me out!!" you tell at top of your lungs. You don't want to experience death again. Celebi, half giggling and half moaning, moves you closer to her throat with her tongue. She doesn't want to eat you, she's just pushing the line to the extreme. But you are unaware of her true intentions. So you couldn't help but feel horrified. And why in the world is her mouth shaking? What she's doing? You achieve these facts as secondary, because right now your first thought is about not being eaten by the legendary pokemon. Celebi just moves you a little closer, you almost fall again in the dark abyss that caused your death just last night. So, in a desperate attempt, you yell "Please! I thought you cared about me! Weren't we friends?". Celebi stops at this. It's just like last night: the human is pleading for his life while she was busy with her own business. But this time is different. In this branch of story you are NOT her food. You are her friend. You are her possibly lover. Lover. That word sticks to Celebi's mind, making her smile. Sure, that would be a bit difficult, as human - pokemon love is forbidden under Arceus' laws, and sure she will have to do a lot of talking with Mew and Arceus himself. But she has made up her mind. Sooner or later, the tiny, cute human will be hers, no matter what. And nobody will stop her.

Whatever Celebi is doing, she stops and opens her mouth, letting you slide out of your dark prison, right in her open hands. Free at last. You are covered in a thick coat of saliva "Why'd you do that?" you ask, while Celebi cleans your face from her drool with a hand. After that, she proceeds to clean your body. After cleaning you completely, she tightens you in a tight hug. You are still unable to get why in the world she did that. After a few minutes, Celebi releases you from her grasp and holds you close to her face. You see a smile spread across her face as she puts you on her head and turns around.

After putting the human on her head, Celebi prepares to fly off.
135211212111.title: Playing a game together

choices: Arceus doesn't agree. This will end bad.
1352112121112.content:
Celebi flies fast. You have to hold on tightly to one of her feelers, or else you could fall to your death. Within a minute, Celebi is out of Ilex Forest, and she starts flying towards east. She can't wait any longer, she has to talk her about her feelings about you. She knows that Mew is for sure at the Tree of Beginning. Or at least, that is where she should be. In fact, Mew is known as the most cheerful of all the legendaries, and she often left the tree in search of something fun to do. Celebi remembers that the Tree is at Kanto's confines, so she will have to fly for a while to get there. So she makes sure that you are holding on tightly, before increasing her speed.

After an hour or so of flying, Celebi finally was out of Johto. You are curious about where she wants to bring you. After a little while of flying, she spots some crystals on the ground. Looking up, you see a gigantic structure completely made out of crystals.

You heard about the Tree of Beginning at school. That is supposed to be Mew's home. But why Celebi wants you to see Mew? Maybe she wants to talk to her and possibly get you back to your normal size? That would be great. Little you know is that Celebi brought you here because she wants you to be hers. But first, she needs Mew's approval. Celebi smiles; Mew would for sure give her approval. The two were always great friends, and Mew always said that humans are nice after all. So she shouldn't be much contraire with Celebi's new love. Getting Mew's approval would be a great headstart with Arceus. He, on the other hand, will be surely pissed with this. These are Celebi's thoughts as she uses psychic to move you in between her wings. You hang on for dear life to her skin as she touches the crystal of the Tree. Immediately, the two of you are engulfed in light as the Tree takes you to its core.

Mew is resting, when a light shines. She opens her eyes and looks to see that the Tree is letting someone to its core. Who could that be? She wasn't expecting anyone. So she moves closer as the light dies down, revealing Celebi. Mew instantly flies to her to give her a hug. Celebi gladly returns it.
*Momentarily pokemon speaking*
"Hi Celebi!" Mew beams, waving her short paw "What brings you here?". Celebi gives a small blush, looking at the ground. Mew stares curiously at her as the grass pokemon decides to speak " Mew, I came here because I'm... in love " she says. As expected, Mew explodes in cheering "Who's the lucky pokemon?" she asks, a huge smile on her face. Celebi blushes even more: this is going to be awkward "Well... it's not... actually... a pokemon" she admits. Mew stares at her confused "He's actually a.... he's a human" she says. Mew tilts her head. Has she really heard Celebi saying that she fell for a human? Nonetheless, she still is happy for her friend "And what does this guy have for you to fall for him?" "Well... you see...".

You are still between Celebi's wings. You hear her talking with a Mew, judging by what you hear. Suddenly, Celebi picks you from her wings and shows you to a Mew. The car like pokemon is shorter than Celebi, but still huge to you. The pink pokemon stares at you for a but, before speaking " Quite the catch you got there. He's a cutie!" Mew says, giggling. Celebi nods "Listen, I wanted to know if you ..." "I do" "... approve my love. What?" Celebi asks, not sure of having heard good "I said I approve. Who am I to judge love? And again, this human is one of the cutest things I've ever seen" Mew replies, smiling "But..." she then says "Arceus had to be informed about this. Can't wait to see his face when we tell him" she giggles. Celebi nods as Mew grabs her arm and uses teleport.

In a flash of light, you are staring at a golden ladder, which, looking up, leads to a marble platform. The Hall of Origin. Celebi looks at Mew, who nods. The two fly up to the platform. Standing there, a majestic equine figure. It has white fur, golden hooves, a golden wheel around its waist, adorned by four gems. Arceus. The god of pokemon. You are staring at the strongest of all legendary. He's apparently resting, judging by his closed eyes. But he probably feels you as he opens his green and red eyes. Celebi quickly hides you behind herself as Arceus speaks "Mew, Celebi, what are you doing here? And why do I feel there's a fourth presence here?" he asks. Mew giggles "It's about our Celebi. She found love!" she beams. Arceus looks surprised "I'm happy for you my girl. His he the fourth presence I feel? If that's so, why can't I see him?" Arceus asks. Celebi blushes again as she reaches for you. She picks you from behind herself and shows you to the Alpha pokemon "I'm in love... with this human... And... I wanted to know... if you... approved..." Celebi admits. Arceus stares at you silently, before talking...
1352112121112.title: Celebi can't wait any longer! Time to find Mew!

choices: Go back to the forest, and have a chance to escape
Stay here, and try to get to know Celebi
13521121211121.content:
*Pokemon speaking*
Arceus studies you for a while, before speaking "Celebi, my girl, this takes me by surprise. You know that pokemon can't fall for humans under my laws. And how come this human is so small in size?" "I really have no clue about his size. And, yes, I know that I shouldn't love him" Celebi says, lowering her head; she looks she's about to cry. Arceus looks at her sadly: he couldn't bear the sight of his children sad, so he continues "But... If you truly do love this human, may he be your special other" he says. Celebi's eyes widen. Has she heard right? She looks at Mew, who nods smiling, confirming her doubts. A huge smile spreads on you Celebi's face as she turns to you. You don't understand anything about the whole situation. You look more confused than ever. What in the world is happening? Arceus seems to notice your confusion, so he speaks up "Celebi, I need to ask you something" he says "What is it?" she asks "Does this human return your love?". Celebi sweat drops. She didn't think you didn't have a clue about her feelings. She doesn't answer " Does he even know about your feelings? " Arceus asks again. And again, Celebi doesn't answer. Mew face paws. Arceus sighs 'May as well tell him' he thinks "Put him down Celebi" he says. Celebi does as commanded and gently puts you on the ground. Arceus lowers himself to talk to the human.
*Human speaking*
You stand there, not daring to speak as the three legendaries speak; you know that a wrong step could cause your end, when Celebi puts you on the ground and Arceus lowers himself so he is almost eye level with you "Hi there" he says "H-hi" you reply, shocked that he just spoke human "Listen, it seems that Celebi has developed a strong feeling for you. Practically, she fell for you" he says. You stand there, your mouth wide open. Celebi has what?! How come a legendary pokemon could fall for you?! These are your thoughts as the Alpha pokemon goes on "Me and Mew there..." "Hi there!" the cat pokemon waves you giggling "... we accept her love for you. We just need to know: do you return her feelings?" he asks. You don't know what to think. You just discovered that Celebi is in love with you, and the Alpha pokemon is asking you if you love her back. You look at the three pokemon; Celebi is staring at you, a strong hope in her eyes. Mew is also staring at you with a hoping expression. Arceus is staring at you with an amused expression. You carefully think what to do; if you reject Celebi's love, her heart will shatter for sure. And probably Mew would make you pay for making her friend suffer. In the end, Arceus would probably erase you from existence. And this time, no Celebi to bring you back with Time Travel. You shiver at the thought. Plus Celebi is an adorable and sweet pokemon, no doubt about that. And being chosen by a legendary pokemon to be her other half, you should feel honored. Also, you owe her from when she brought you back after you died. So you take your decision.

Maybe it's not really what you want "I... I do return her feelings" you say. You're not sure if this is the best decision, but it's too late now. You already spoke. In a second, Celebi snatches you from the ground and encloses your whole body in a tight hug. She is happier than she has never been.
*Pokemon speaking*
Celebi is literally squeezing the air out of you, when she puckers her lips and kisses your cheek "Awwwwww" New says, giggling. She is happy that one if her best friends is happy. After all, she's always happy when someone around her is happy. Arceus just rolls his eyes. You meanwhile blush wildly; a pokemon just kissed you, can this day be weirder?! You try to shake your blush off. Well, you guess, even if it isn't the right choice, you'll learn to love Celebi. Arceus stares at the scene for a bit, before speaking again "Wouldn't you want him normal sized?" he asks Celebi. The grass type pokemon thinks to this "No" she then says, taking that Alpha pokemon by surprise "I want him to remain this size so I can protect him better. Also, he is already cute as he is". Arceus nods in understanding as Mew grabs Celebi's arm "Come on Celebi, we're done here. Let's go!" she says, before turning around "Bye Arceus" she says "Thank you for everything" Celebi adds. Arceus waves a hoof dismissively as the two pokemon and the tiny human disappear.


You all return back to the Tree of Beginning in a flash if light. Celebi has a huge smile painted on her face: she just achieved her goal, the tiny human is finally hers. Forever. She just can't wait to get back to her forest with you. From now on, she will have to protect not just Ilex Forest, but also you from the dangers. So Celebi turns to Mew "Thank you for everything Mew. I think I'll get going now" she says. Mew, on the other hand, wants you two to stay here some more. It was boring around here and she was completely alone. You two are her only company right now. And plus she wants to explore the little guy's nature, make sure she won't hurt Celebi in any way "Wait, guys. What do you say of staying here for a while? It gets really boring around here. Would you like to stay?". Celebi thinks to this. She really wanted to get back to Ilex Forest, but staying here she could have some fun with her friend and her tiny, new lover. So she decides to leave the choice to you.
*Human speaking*
You don't have any idea of what is happening, but you don't pay much attention to it: you are trying to collect the memories of the past two days: First, you wake up one day to find yourself shrunk and in Ilex Forest. After avoiding the dangers for the whole day, you finally fall asleep and then wake up and find the legendary Celebi sleeping on top of you. Then, she wakes up and eats you, killing you. Then she goes back in time to prevent her past self from eating you and so save your life. This morning, after threatening to eat you again for some reason, she spits you out and brings you to Mew, then to Arceus. And here she confessed her feelings for you. Then she kisses you. And here you are "Little guy?" a voice snaps you out of your thoughts. You look to see Mew staring at you. Wait, did she just speak to you? Then you remember that she can use telepathy "Yes?" you ask "Would you like to remain here for some time, before going back in the forest?" she asks. You look at Celebi, she shrugs, so you get that she's leaving this decision up to you. You think about what to do. Going back to the forest would mean staying alone with Celebi. Or you could have a chance to run away. Seriously, you don't know if this was the right choice. Or you could stay here, and thanks to Mew, you could understand her and perhaps making you feel sure about your choice of accepting her as your lover. In the end you decide to...
13521121211121.title: Celebi' new lover

choices: "I'll keep you company for a while," you say, "We'll catch up with Celebi later&
"Why don't you join us?" you ask. Safety in numbers, right...?
135211212111212.content:
"Boring sound pretty good right about now," you tell the two enormous creatures who were apparently letting you decide. Escaping through the woods was tempting, but in your reduced state it would be inviting danger from the forest's critters and its patron deity who was currently busy speaking gibberish with Mew. No doubt Celebi was prettier on the outside than inside, but you had a feeling you might be seeing more of both in the near future unless you thought of something very smart very fast. Perhaps you two could reconcile later, when you were a lot bigger and a lot less fragile.

You turn your attention towards the pink legendary. You knew absolutely nothing about her, except that you can speak with her through telepathy and so far she hadn't tried to eat you. The way she and Celebi were chatting it up suggested a close friendship, but your chances of survival would increase dramatically if you manage to somehow make her sympathize with your situation.

'Mew... Can you hear me?' you think loudly. Aside from a light shift in posture, Mew gave no signs of responding. So she can't read your thoughts. Good to know.

"So how come you two know each other?" you ask, trying to make casual conversation, "We flew pretty far from Ilex Forest."

Both of them stop talking turn their attention towards you. You feel like an ant under a magnifying glass, pronounced by the fact that their eyes were absolutely gigantic.

"Silly, we've known each other for ages!" Celebi said with a giggle, though you can't understand her.

"Celebi only just moved to Ilex Forest last year," Mew spoke inside your head before looking a little dejected, "Why do you think I'm so bored?"

"That's rough," you lie, having been forced to redefine 'rough' since passing through someone's digestive system, "What do you do when you're all by yourself?"

"Oh..." Mew responded before the communication of your minds suddenly cut off for a moment, and Mew's gaze moved off to the side as a faint blush spread across her cheeks, "... Things."

"What things?" you press on, despite Mew's flustered behavior. Things were going swimmingly - If the two of you had some common interests then you might be able to find out a bit more about this new hope of yours. However, Celebi was getting a little annoyed by this one-sided conversation, especially with her mind full of all the nice things you could be doing together in private. Soon you find her elongated verdant arm reaching down towards you. Fighting the urge to cower, you stand tall as she picks you up like a household object, the force of her most gentle grip threatening to pop your lungs out of your ribcage.

"Come on, let's go back home!" Celebi chimed excitedly before looking at the somewhat embarrassed Mew, "I've been away too long, you never know what might happen! But thanks for the help!"

"Already?" Mew asked with a not-so-subtle hint of disappointment.

"W-Wait!" you shout, struggling to catch a glimpse of the gentle giant from the perch of another, "You said you were bored, right!?"

Mew looked at you with those pleading sapphire eyes ten times the size of your body, before nodding.

"Then..."
135211212111212.title: A Mew Hope

choices: "What 'things' were you talking about earlier?" you ask.
1352112121112121.content:
"... then I'll keep you company for a while!" you shout. Your words have an immediate effect.
"What?" both pokemon ask simultaneously, one with a forming smile, the other with a disappointed expression.

Once again, the two huge pokemon are staring at you with their as-well-huge blue eyes.
"What are you talking about?" Celebi asks, her cheerfulness gone, replaced by an annoyed expression.
Not understanding a word, you decide to go on.
"Yeah Mew, I can keep you company for a while, then we could catch up with Celebi later," you state, giving your best convincing smile.

"Really?" comes Mew's reply.
"Yeah, there's no problem."
"I don't know... what do you say Celebi? Is there any problem with this?" Mew asks her lifetime friend.
'Yes, I for one wanted to be alone with him for a while.' Celebi says in her mind.
"Well, no, but we wouldn't want to bother you," her mouth says instead, while she mentally groans, faking her best smile in the meantime.

"Bother me? Are you kidding? That would be great!" Mew says excitedly at the idea of having someone to play with.

Celebi sighs. She's unaware of the true intentions of her little boy, so she simply assumes he really want to keep Mew company. So, even though very reluctantly, she decides to agree.

Upon hearing her friend affirmative response, Mew explodes in cheering. Celebi gives a warm smile at her friend childish attitude, then she turns to you.
"Little guy, you can stay for a bit. I'm going home now. I'll be waiting for you there~" she says.

You rub the back of your head.
"Uhhh..." you say, having not understood a word ( as always though).
Mew momentarily stops her cheering.
"She said that you can stay, she's going home." she translates before getting back into laughing.

You give a triumphant smile while Celebi talks with Mew, before picking you.

She pecks your cheek.
"Later cutie~" Celebi says cheerfully. She's hiding it really good, but she's pissed off for not getting her 'private fun' with you. She puts you down.
Then, she suddenly disappears, sucked out of the core of the Tree.

You can't even realize what happened. Mew has already scooped you up and started nuzzling you.
"Thank you thank you thank you!" she beams in your mind.

It takes a while for her to calm down and let you breath.
"So, we have a while before I bring you back to Celebi, what do you want to do?" she asks excitedly.
"Well...
1352112121112121.title: "I'll keep you company for a while,"...

choices: Mew brings you back in Ilex Forest.
You insist to stay with her a little longer.
13521121211121211.content:
You stare into the sapphire eyes of the pink legendary who is letting you choose the first thing to do.

You decide to stick with your original plan of try to know the pokemon better. You just need an excuse or something...

‘Hey, are you alright?’ Mew's telepathic voice interrupts your thoughts. You nod.
‘I asked you what you want to do. You didn't answer.’ a slight hint of concern could be heard in her tone.
"Um... don't really know... How about you pick?" you ask her, hoping for something that'd give you a chance. Mew smiles brightly.
‘Let's play!’ she cheers.


Meanwhile, one pouting legendary flies above the sea at supersonic speed, her tiny, yet long arms crossed, while her face shifted from her previous, loving smile to a noticeable unhappy look. And Celebi has more than just one reason to be pissed.
"Why did he want to keep Mew company? He barely knows her!" the annoyed time traveler keeps repeating to herself as she flies in direction of the forest she calls home.

When a sudden thought makes her stop in mid air.
"Maybe... maybe he's mad at me for eating him last night?" she questions to nobody in particular.
‘Of course he's mad at you! You literally killed him!’ a voice, deep inside her mind, shouts.
"But I did revive him! And he said that he loves me back!" Celebi says to herself as she resumes flying.

It's a sunny day, the sky is clear and there's a small breeze. The grass type sighs. At least, she can enjoy a nice flight on the way back home.


"Play what?" you ask to the now excited pokemon.
‘Cat and mouse! Cat and mouse!’ she cheers
"What's that?" you ask.
‘It's like hide and seek, only better. There's a time limit, and, if you can escape me for the whole time, you win. But, If I find and catch you, I win.’ she explains, before flashing you a smile, her eyes gleaming with her hardly-contained excitement.
‘So, are you in or not?’ she asks.

You nod. What other choice do you have?

‘Alright then, you have an hour to escape me. Go hide, you!’ the titaness giggles, before settling you down on the grass. She then turns around, brings her paws to her eyes and starts giving out incomprehensible cries, meaning that the countdown has just started. Without thinking, you start running away from Mew, trying to get as far as possible before hiding.


Meanwhile, Celebi finally reaches her destination, her beloved Ilex Forest. Flying deep into the forest, she stops to sit on the roots of a huge tree, giving out a deep, annoyed sigh.

Plucking a berry from a nearby bush to fulfill her missed breakfast, she tosses it into her mouth, chewing and swallowing. In the process, images of what she's done not even eight hours ago come to her mind. The tiny human's screams, his struggles to get out of her mouth, the intense pleasure...

Celebi shakes her head. Fantasizing about 'her' little one won't help her dealing with his absence. But she can't help but wonder what him and Mew are doing right now. Yet, she's sure of one thing: until Mew brought you back, she was going to die of boredom.

Aside from some fights for food of the forest's inhabitants, Ilex Forest was known as a quiet place. But that just worked to her disadvantage right now...

Shaking her head one more time, Celebi leans back, deciding to take a nice nap. The events of last night left her still tired, and she hasn't had much time to sleep afterwards.

So, giving a yawn, she closes her eyes, her baby blue eyes disappearing behind her black eyelids as she soon starts snoring quietly...


You peek through the leaves of a bush you hid in. This wasn't your first hiding place, and, almost certainly, it won't be the last. You decided to hide around, as you would never be able to go further.

You managed to avoid Mew for quite some time now. You're pretty sure that the hour is about to run out.

But you're now aware of why the pink legendary wanted to play this one game. She's simply formidable at it. She found (and almost got) you, like, three times. And you practically had to do the impossible to escape her. Last time, you almost got caught in her tail while running. Luckily, you managed to dodge it and ran. It wasn't any easy task, as there are crystals coming out of the grass that could reveal your position to Mew at any moment. But, in the end, you managed to make her lose your tracks.

And now, you're hiding in this bush, waiting for the time to run out. But you're unaware of a certain pink pokemon approaching from behind...

Mew smiles. She's sure that Celebi's newfound little one is hiding in the bush in front of her. It's the only one she hasn't checked yet.

Slowly, she glances into the bush. A smile spreads on her face as she notices the little human standing there. Giggling silently, Mew uses her ability to become invisible and slowly slips into the bush, careful to not make any noise.

She stops right behind you as her tail slides near you and wraps tightly around your waist.
"Hey... What...?!" you exclaim as Mew pulls you off the ground and becomes visible again.
'Waiting for someone?" she places her paws on her mouth as she giggles, floating out of the bush.

She flies over one of the many 'bubbles' that lead into the core of the Tree and sits next to it.
"So... game over I guess..." you say, making her giggle.
"Unfortunately. You're good at this!" she cheers, before continuing.
"You know, I have to thank you." she says.
"For what?" she blushes a bit.
"It's been ages since I had a playmate. And good one, too. Thank you." she says. The sudden declaration makes you smile.

"It's nothing, really." she pulls you in a hug. You are smothered between her paws and her warm, pink fur as she displays affection for you.

Deciding that this is the best moment to take action, you call out for the pink giantess.
"Hey Mew, may I ask you something?" she nods slowly.
"Well... what do you do when you're all alone here...?" you ask curiously, as your previous question was rudely interrupted by a certain green pokemon.

Once again, Mew flushes red.
‘Didn't I answer to that question already...?’ she asks awkwardly.
"No." you reply, flatly.
‘... Things...’ she repeats her previous answer. And, before you could ask what she meant with 'things', she talks again.
‘Hey, now that I think about it, how did you got so small?’ she asks.

"Uhm... I don't quite know. I just woke up yesterday, and I was like this, in Ilex Forest." you reply.
‘Dear. And how did you meet Celebi?’ she asks again.

It's now your turn to blush.
"Uhm, you know... she found me... and she..." you say, stopping at the memory of her gulping you down, sending you on a one way trip to your doom. You almost want to cry again just thinking about being in that fleshy hell full of liquid fire.

But Mew doesn't seem to notice your disease.
‘... She...?’ she asks, tilting her head, motioning for you to go on. You recompose yourself.
"She... brought me here..." you say, voluntarily skipping your journey into Celebi's stomach and her trip through time to bring you back to life.

Mew seems satisfied with your answer.
‘Hey, speaking of, I forgot I have to bring you back in Ilex Forest. Celebi must be worried.’ she observes. Your heart freezes at the statement.

The legendary looks at you.
‘Well then, little one,’ she says through telepathy.
‘Ready to go back?’ she asks.
13521121211121211.title: A legendary playtime.

choices: Mew agrees, and sticks with you.
135211212111212111.content:
‘Come on, I'll bring you back to Celebi.’ Mew speaks before you can even reply.
"W-wait..." you try to say, but she doesn't pay attention as she gets up.

Your world shakes as she floats in midair, you still enclosed in a gentle grasp.
"And now..." she mutters to herself as she places you down in the ground.

You're about to ask what she's up to, when you notice her long, pink tail moving towards you. And, before you can even react, it already has firmly coiled around your waist. The tail lifts you off ground, and brings up to the smiling face of Mew.
‘Ready for departure?’she places her paws on her mouth as she giggles. You roll your eyes at her naive behavior.
‘Hold on tight!’ she telepathically says, letting out another giggle.

Then, making sure she has a good grip on you, Mew starts flying away from the titanic structure of the Tree at unbelievable speed. If, by any chance, you had said something, the sudden acceleration would have thrown your words right back down your throat.

In a matter of minutes, Mew starts floating on the crystalline seawater, enjoying the warm sun hitting her back and the marine breeze through her fur; you, meanwhile, keep your gaze upwards, doing your best to try to not look down. The only sight of the height Mew is flying at, along with the increasing speed, would make you throw whatever you've eaten up. But Mew didn't seem to notice at all, as she keeps flying, her tail swaying up and down as she does so. You gulp. What would happen if she suddenly releases you for any reason? With these thoughts, you tightly grip her tail with your tiny hands.


You've been flying for an hour or so now. After a bit, Mew starts slowing down. You assume you're almost there.

And, since she's now merely floating, you decide to ask her something, hoping she would hear you.

"Mew," you call out, thinking she can't hear you. But your voice didn't escape her sensible hearing.
‘Yes?’ she responds almost immediately.
"May I ask you something?" she turns her head and gives a slight nod.
"Well... this may sound weird, but... do you, by any chance, know a way to return me to my original size?" you ask, deliberately filling your voice with hope.

At the question, Mew stops and brings her tail to her face. Once again, you find yourself staring into those immense sapphire lakes that are her eyes.
‘Come again?’ she asks.
"Well... do you know how can I return to my size? I mean... everything's frightening at this minuscule size..." you admit.


Mew gives you a sorrowful look.
‘Forgive me, but I really have no clue...’ she replies. And, seeing your head dropping, she hastily continues with a more cheerfully tone.
‘Hey, no need to be sad. Look at the bright side. Celebi will protect you!’ she says.

You wanted to tell her that it's mainly Celebi that scares you, but you keep that thought for yourself.

Almost like she's reading your mind, Mew continues with a soft voice.
‘Please, don't ever hurt her.’ she says.
"... I don't think it is physically possible." you reply. Returning her normal self, Mew giggles.
‘No, silly. I mean, be nice to her.’ she says. You nod. Obviously, being nice is the key two remain alive around Celebi. Giving a smile, Mew resumes floating.


After another while, Mew finally reaches her friend's home, Ilex Forest.
"It's been awhile since I last saw this place..." she says quietly as she ventures into the forest, you floating right behind her.

After a few minutes of searching Celebi, Mew finally spots the time traveler, quietly napping under a tree.
‘Look who I found.’ she says cheerfully as she moves you forward.

You look at the sleeping pokemon. She looked adorable from this perspective, but still, this wasn't any reason to be less scared of her.

Silently, Mew floats over Celebi. She lowers herself and gently starts to shake her.
"Celebi..." she whispers. The grass type moans out in her sleep, but she doesn't wake up.
"Wake up, Celebi!" Mew cries, louder.

The sudden call succeeds in waking Celebi from her slumber. The time traveler starts stirring, and, slowly, her dark eyelids open up to reveal her bright blue eyes. She blinks a few times before recognizing the smiling face of her friend.
"Mew?" she asks, giving a yawn.
"Exactly. And look who I brought." Mew says, moving her tail, and so you, in front of Celebi.

In an instant, Celebi's full attention was on you. It takes her mind a second to process who you are.
"Cutie!" she chimes, her paws rushing to snatch you from Mew's tail.

Immediately, you are shoved into her her chest as she hugs you tightly, knocking all the air out of your lungs and threatening to pop your eyes out of your skull.

"Thanks Mew!" Celebi happily thanks her friend, who smiles in return.
"No problem, really. It's been great to have a playmate!" she replies. But Celebi isn't fully paying attention, more focused on the little guy tightly held in her paws.

Mew giggles.
"Well, guess I'll be going now. See you soon!" she says before looking at you, who are still enclosed in Celebi's hug.
‘Little one, I'll be leaving now.’ she says.
‘Bye!’ she adds.
"Bye Mew!" Celebi says cheerfully. And her cheerfulness comes from her imminent 'playtime'.

"W-wait!" you stammer. You expected her to stay longer. Mew is your hope right now. If she's around, Celebi wouldn't try anything weird... at least, that's what you hope.

Mew stops to look at you. Celebi's gaze also travels down to you.
‘What now?’ the grass type thinks
"Mew, w-why don't you stick with us?" you ask.
‘What?’ Celebi thinks to herself, unsure to have heard good.

You go on.
"Yeah... you know... it's been fun... Why don't you stay here for a while?" you hastily ask the confused-looking legendary.

A moment full of tension follows. Celebi's annoyed gaze doesn't leave you, while Mew seems to be pondering.

So far, she hasn't shown any malicious intent towards you, she would be a great help. You just hope you effectively managed to convince her to remain in the forest...
135211212111212111.title: Back 'home' you go.

choices: Agree - play with them for a while.
Disagree - you don't know what they could do with you!
1352112121112121111.content:
A few minutes separate your question from Mew's answer. But it's not too long before she shows off a bright smile. And, by the time she talks, you are already pretty sure about her decision.

‘Alright!’ she mentally cheers, slightly startling you. She repeats it in her own language.
"Alright!" although you can't understand this, the tone she used is the same, so it's pretty easy for you to get the meaning of the words that just came out of her mouth.


You and Celebi have different reactions; a slight smile takes place on your face, while she looks somewhat pissed.

Her expression gets Mew's attention.
"Is something wrong Celebi?" she asks with concern.

But the time traveler ignores her, focusing on you instead. Using her paws, she brings you upwards, right in front of her face.

You find yourself staring into those huge blue eyes of hers. You can almost see your reflection in them.
"Tell me the truth, little guy," Celebi says you.
"You're mad at me, aren't you? Is that why you want Mew to stay?" she asks with an extremely soft voice.

And, without waiting for an answer, she encloses you in yet another hug.

You're about to ask her what's going on, but you soon feel something hitting your head.

Gazing upwards, you notice Celebi, her eyes lidded by her dark eyelids, tears pouring down her cheeks.
"Celebi... what...?" you mutter, before a familiar voice talks in your head.
‘Are you... mad at her for any reason?’ you recognize it as Mew.

You briefly glance backwards, noticing the pink giantess looking at the scene with a confused look.

Ignoring her, you look right back at Celebi.
"Celebi, I'm not mad at you. What you did to me was wrong, alright. But you fixed it. There is no reason for me to be mad." you reply. In fact, you're not mad at the giantess, you're just really afraid of her...

Hearing you, Celebi slightly opens up her eyes.
"I'm so sorry. You have every right to be angry. What I did to you was foolish..." she cries.

Before you can ask what she just said, Mew translates her words for you.
‘What she did was foolish..." she says, before cocking her head in a perplexed manner.
‘Is there... ehm... something I don't know...?’ she asks you. She was curious about the reason of her friend's tears. Apparently, you had something to do with it, and she wants to find out what.

You sigh. Sure, this new situation might not be the best you got into, but a rough start like this one won't help you.
"Come on Celebi. I forgive you... just stop crying, alright?" you say.

Your words seem to have an effect on the green titaness, as her mouth slowly curls into a small smile; one of the two monolithic paws holding you releases you, leaving you fully grasped into the other as Celebi wipes her tears away.

"Bi!" she cheers down at you, before leaning down, pressing her lips into your forehead, which immediately starts burning hot; a fiery blush finds its place on your face as she pulls off.

Noticing that the conversation between you and her friend stopped, Mew takes the moment to speak up.
"Celebi, what happened? What is this story?" she asks. She can't wait any longer, she wants to know.

But Celebi just giggles.
"Sorry Mew! All forgotten!" she cheers.
"Please!" Mew pleads.
"Nope. It's a secret between me and little guy." Celebi replies, playfully shaking her head.


Mew sighs at this last remark, before smiling again.
"Remember, Celebi. I will get you for that. On the playground!" she shouts. Celebi smiles as well.
"You mean-" Mew interrupts her.
"Yep. Let's play!" she shouts.

Celebi's about to let out an excited cry, when she remembers about you; you had watched the two talk without understanding a single word, but now they suddenly look overexcited.
"Wait a moment Mew," Celebi says, although you can't actually understand her.

You notice her gaze traveling down to you.
"Little guy, wanna play with us? Please?" she asks. You blink a few times, making it clear that you didn't understand anything about what she said. Seriously, that is a problem...

Noticing your uneasiness, Mew acts up.
‘Come on, little buddy, let's play for a bit! It'll be fun!’ she says you.

So that's what Celebi wanted to tell you. The two want to play. With the small amount of time you spent with Mew, you got she's into childish, harmless fun. But Celebi's idea of 'fun' is still a mystery to you.

Soon, you notice the duo looking at you expectantly, clearly eager to start with whatever they've got planned.

You think about it long and hard, but, in the end, you finally make a choice...
1352112121112121111.title: The tears of a time traveler.

choices: Forget it, and search for another place!
13521121211121211111.content:
"Uh, sure. Why not?" you finally reply, figuring out that bonding with the two would be a good way to remain alive. Also, you have to admit, you're pretty curious about the game they want you to play.

As soon your words come out of your mouth, their faces seem to brighten up. Both of them let out excited cries.
"Now, just to pick which game should we start with..." Mew says.

Celebi's eyes start sparkling with excitement.
"Oh, I know! Let's play cat and mouse!" she suggests.
"Little guy here is just as small, helpless and cute as a mouse, he is just perfect!" Mew smiles brightly.
"Well, you do have a point. Our little buddy would make a perfect mouse. I say, let's play!" she cheers.


You stare at the two as they talk, leaving you completely out of their discussion. Just as the thing starts to get annoying, you find Mew's gaze shifting on you, a cheerful smile on her face. Apparently, they're done talking.

‘Hey, little one, we just found the perfect game with can play together." you nod your head, silently encouraging her to continue.
‘It's called cat and mouse." the title of the game is not unfamiliar to you.
"Wait, the one where you have to hide while the others have to find you before the time runs out?" Mew nods her head.

‘And guess who is the mouse~" the legendary chimes.

You pale, as you realize your role in their game.
"C-can... Can't we play something less... lethal?" you stammer.
"Nope." Celebi replies to your question. You rise your head, noticing her shaking hers. Damn...

Soon, you find the arms of the time traveler lowering to gently letting you on the grassy forest floor.
‘Alright, now you'll have five minutes to run as far as you can and hide. If you avoid getting caught until...’ Mew abruptly stops to look at Celebi.

You notice the two talking about something in their own language.

They end the discussion with two excited squeals.
‘... As I was saying, if you avoid getting caught until sunset, you win.’ you're not sure you heard good.

Until sunset?! How are you supposed to hide from them until then? You briefly glance at the sun, which is still shining high in the sky. For a moment, you wish it would settle down right now. But it obviously doesn't. There's no way out of this, you'll have to play their game.

Mew continues.
‘Also, if you win, you'll get a reward from both of us..." Mew adds cheerfully.
"But if we catch you, you'll be all mine to deal with~" Celebi speaks up. You need no translation to understand her intentions...

‘Five minutes starting..." Mew says. Celebi kneels down to give you a light peck on a cheek, which you interpret as a 'good luck'.
‘...Now!’ as soon the telepathic shout echoes in your head, you see the two turning around.

You instantly look around, searching for an ideal hiding place. Judging by the position of the sun, it must be around 2 PM. Meaning that you'll have to hide for more or less six hours.

You keep looking around but, finding nothing like an hiding place (no surprise in a forest), you decide to dash away, looking for one, be it a large leaf or a puddle where you can avoid the gigantic eyes of the two legendaries.

You run for a few minutes, until you stop, completely breathless. Pearly drops of sweat pour down your face while you pant, taking big breaths in order to fill up your lungs with air.

While you slowly regain your breath, you take a look around, searching for a place where you can easily hide without the risk of being discovered.

Your eyes soon fix on a wooden structure, which looks like a shrine. Wait, didn't people build a shrine dedicated to Celebi? Apparently, it is the thing you're staring at. And, looking at its base, you see that it is held by four 'legs', leaving a slight space between itself and the grassy floor.

Your eyes widen. It seems that the space between the ground and the shrine is just large enough for you to fit completely beneath it. There you could hide undisturbed, waiting for the sun to piss off.

But, what if that is the first place that Celebi and Mew will check? It surely wouldn't take long for them to find you underneath it. And it would even less difficult to catch you... You also consider finding another spot. Sure, the choice is pretty limited, but better safe than sorry, you guess...

Soon, you hear two excited squeals, that you immediately recognize as Celebi and Mew. You urgently realize that the five minutes you had to hide are up, and they're coming for you!

Still unsure about what to do, you hastily think about the best choice, but you better hurry - the two aren't far!
13521121211121211111.title: Cat, fairy and mouse.

135211212111212111111.content: You decide to crawl inbetween the space that the shrine left. After all, Celebi and Mew would easily see you out in the open. Three minutes after you hide, you hear the two Mythical Pokemon somewhat near your hiding spot. Panicking, you run out into the open and get seen! Now you have to lose their sight or it’s curtains for you.
135211212111212111111.title: Quick, hide under the shrine!

1352112121112121111112.content:
The moment Celebi lays her eyes on you, a big smile spreads on her face.
"Oh, cutie~!" she chimes.
"You won't escape!" Mew, who spotted you as well, cries excitedly.

In less than an instant, both legendaries fly in your direction at supersonic speed.

Startled by the two approaching legendaries, you start running as fast as you can, towards no destination in particular.

But Mew and Celebi are obviously faster than you, and quickly catch up with you, the shadow casted by their heads covering you completely.
"You're mine!" you hear Celebi's cry. You turn around, just to see a large, green paw making its way towards you.

But, in a desperate attempt to dodge it, you roll out of the way.

And, luckily, you end up in a patch of tall grass, your minuscule form completely hidden by the two giantesses.
"Hey, where is he?" you hear Mew asking in poke-speech.
"He must be around here. Do you me, my little human? I'll find you, be it the last thing I do!" Celebi exclaims. Her voice is followed by Mew's signature giggle.

Shortly after, a green paw digs into the grass, missing you by mere centimeters. Your heart galloping in your chest, you take your chances, and start crawling away.

And, after a while, the giggling and the cries of Mew and Celebi can't be heard anymore, meaning that you've gotten far from them. At least, far enough to come out of the grass.

Sighing, you poke your head out of the thick 'forest'. And, as expected, Celebi and Mew aren't there. They must have remained back to search for you, you judge.

But, mercifully, now you can move freely. You have to search for a new hiding spot while you still can. So, glancing around, you start walking towards a casual direction - obviously, not the one you came from as there are two giantesses currently looking for you back there.

--

"I don't think he's around here, Celebi," Mew says, rising herself from the grass. Both she and Celebi have been searching for the little human for at least fifteen minutes. But there was no trace of him in the tall grass.
"Maybe you're right. He must have gotten away." Celebi says with a hint of resignation.

Mew giggles.
"You sure picked a smart little guy. I almost envy you." she remarks, sending Celebi into giggling as well.
"You're right, Mew. But the game is only just started.
Come on," Celebi says, helping Mew up.
"Let's go find that cute little mouse of mine." with that, the two laughing legendaries venture into the forest, searching for you.


--


It feels like a lot of time passed when you finally stop to rest for a bit. At least an hour.

You look around, trying to find some kind of hiding place. And you seem to find one as you spot the uncovered roots of a big tree.

Without second thinking, you slide in between them. Not the kind of place you'd call comfortable, but the roots are at least tall enough to completely hide your form from eyesight. You've picked the right place to hide.

You try to recollect your thoughts. The sun has started its descent, but it is still high in the sky. You assume it must be around 4 PM. Meaning that it's been two hours since the game started. And you almost got caught.

Can you really escape Celebi and Mew until sunset?

A sudden noise interrupts your train of thought.

You gaze upwards, discovering two certain, mythical pokemon floating around.
"Little one! Come out wherever you are~!" Celebi cries excitedly as she looks around, trying to spot you.
"We'll find you sooner or later!" Mew adds.

The two then split up. From your hiding place, you notice Mew checking some bushes, while Celebi... she's coming straight in your direction!

Out of good ideas, you lay down, arms pinned to the sides and legs closed together. Maybe she'll mistake you for one of the roots and she'll leave. You nervously wait as Celebi checks the roots one by one.

But soon, the giantess is upon you. You sweat drop as you see her staring right at you. And you notice her smirking.
"Hey, I've never seen this kind of roots. It's almost kind of cute," her paw travels down to you. She pokes your nose with a finger.
"So cute in fact that I could just snatch it up and kiss it all day long~" her paw moves from your nose to your chest as she tries to pick you up.

But you don't let her. You rise your legs and kick her open palm with both your feet, managing to push her paw back. And, much to the grass type's surprise, you stand up and sprint away.
"Mew!" Celebi cries, getting her friend's attention.

Two sapphire eyes fix on you as the pink pokemon turns around and spots you. A toothy grin appears on Mew's face.
"There you are!" she cheers, floating towards you.

In response, you run faster. You dodge her swinging tail and turn around. Only to notice Celebi flying straight at you at ground level, her paw extended, ready to get you...

In the blink of an eye, you leap up, avoiding Celebi's paw. You land on it and, with another leap, you are in the grass again. You dash forward, in direction of the forest, leaving two upset legendaries behind.
"Almost got him..." Celebi says, lightly pounding the ground.
"There's still plenty of time. We'll catch him sooner or later!" Mew says cheerfully. Celebi smiles.
"You know what, Mew? I'm done playing nice." she says.

--

A few more hours pass. And now the sun is definitively about to settle down.

Lost, hungry and tired, you walk aimlessly through the forest. You managed to avoid Celebi and Mew a couple more times, but you're too tired to do so again.

You just hope that you'll manage to win this. You really don't want to know what Celebi has in store for you if you lose...

You are led to Celebi's shrine once again. Too tired to think of a better hiding place, you slide underneath it once again. After all, the two legendaries didn't actually find you the first time...

You lay down, the grass concealing you from the world while providing you a soft surface to lay on.

But, soon, you hear two distinct cries. Celebi and Mew.
"Where could he be? It's been hours now..." Celebi says.
"I really don't have any idea. Either he disappeared or..." Mew distractedly eyes the shrine. She suddenly remembers about earlier.
"Or maybe..." she points at the shrine.

Celebi looks at it, then at Mew, and nods. Slowly.

From beneath the wooden structure, you watch as the two get closer and kneel down. Before they can see you, you quickly lay down again.

Soon, two pairs of gigantic eyes start scanning the area beneath the shrine... one single question echoes in your mind - what to do now?
1352112121112121111112.title: The game continues

13521121211121211111121.content: Through the power of intelligence, you decided to stay put, as last time you ran from under the shrine, you almost got caught. The next few moments were tense, considering your chances of winning were solely luck by now. Soon enough, they take their leave, and you get out from under the shrine. Just then you realize...
13521121211121211111121.title: Stand still, don't move.

choices: They manage to catch you. Game over...
135211212111212111111211.content:
As soon as you get out from under the shrine, you glance up at the sky, and you sigh in relief as you notice that the sun has descended even more. It won't be long until it sets.

You then take a look around, making sure that Celebi and Mew really left. They aren't here, it appears. There's just you.

You turn several other times to make sure they aren't going to come out while you're not looking.

Once you're completely sure that they left, you let out another relieved sigh. Only to take it back the next moment.

Something just touched your back, and a light, familiar giggle could be heard.

Slowly, you turn around. Your face is greeted by a pair of gigantic, blue eyes and a large mouth - which is inevitably smirking. Both belong to a green face you learned to fear.

And fear is the only thing that keeps you from running right now.


Celebi lets out a cute giggle.
"Finally. Face to face," she says incomprehensibly. Your gaze shifts on another creature that just flew closer.
‘Looks like it's over, little one. You were the mo-" before she can end her sentence, you turn around, and sprint away as fast as you can.

"Don't count on it!" Celebi's cry follows you.

You suddenly trip over something and fall down. Before your mind can process what just happened, you feel something wrapping around your body, immobilising you.

You open your eyes to notice that it's grass! You look at the legendaries, and you discover Celebi glowing green.

You figure that it makes sense. A grass type fairy could have nothing less up her sleeves...

The two joyful pokemon slowly approach your trapped body. The same grass that saved you earlier is now delivering you straight into the paws of the two giantesses.

Hastily, you put your brain to work, thinking about a plan that can save you right now.

Soon, the grass keeping you still untangles front our body as you are picked up in a pair of large, green paws and you are brought up to the smiling faces of Celebi and Mew.
‘As I was saying, you're the most skilled opponent I've ever had in this game,’ Mew telepathically says.
"What a shame, I was having so much fun! But, finally I got y-"
"Pokeball!" you suddenly shout, pointing behind the two.

Both giantesses turn around, alarmed. Celebi's grip softens.

And you take the opportunity.

Swiftly, you slide out of Celebi's grip and fall down to the ground, the grass (mercifully) softening your landing.

Then, without losing anymore time, you once again dash away from the two. But it doesn't take long for them to discover that they've just been tricked.
"You're not getting away! Let's get him, Mew!" Celebi shouts cheerfully, happy that the game hasn't reached its end yet.

The two legendaries start chasing you at their full speed. And, once again, Celebi tries to get you with her signature power. But you were expecting that, so you dodge the blades of grass that are trying to catch you.

Again, you glance backwards at the two pokemon. They're incredibly close, shouting their names in excitement.

A couple more times, you dodge Celebi's paws, Mew's tail and a few plants suddenly coming out from beneath you. But, glancing at the two again, you don't notice you're running straight towards a tree.

Turning around again, you halt your run just in time to avoid bumping into it.

You try running left. A pink wall of fur stops you.

You try running right A green mountain floats in front of you, blocking you.

You try running in between them. Both form a living barrier to keep you from running away.

Celebi and Mew laugh hysterically.
"Alright, I didn't have a so heated game in lot of time," Mew compliments, though you can't understand her.
"Me neither. But now..." Celebi looks at you with grin.
"The game is up. And I want my reward~" she sings, extending her long paws towards you, ready to grab. Mew reaches out for you as well, her stubby, short fingers wiggling, eager to get a hold of you...

You let out a defeated sigh. You lost.

That means Celebi is going to do Arceus knows what with you...

You resignedly glance at the sky, and you notice is very close to setting.

Your brain suddenly intensifies its work. Without even thinking, you suddenly throw yourself aside, dodging Celebi's paws.

Once again, you start running, but Celebi and Mew were clearly expecting this, as you soon find their shadows covering your form, their paws reaching out to get you...
135211212111212111111211.title: Tricked!

1352112121112121111112111.content: You were caught, meaning you lost. Now as variety is a good thing, there will be a choice for who catches you, and gets the “reward”. Sorry to make a chapter like this. So, did Celebi or Mew catch you?
1352112121112121111112111.title: Game over...

choices: Looks like Celebi finally gets to play...
Turns out you aren't alone on this tree...
13521121211121211111121111.content:
You strongly hope that you'll make it. That the sun would settle now. That you'll escape the two legendaries and their sure-as-death nasty plans.

But, sadly, it never happens.

With an excited, ear-shattering squeal, the green fairy chasing you speeds up, while lowering herself to ground level and reaching out for you.

Time seems to go in slow motion as you get tackled down by the giantess. If you were any smaller, you would be probably dead now.

Laughing merrily, Celebi rolls on the floor for several times, her catch solidly held in her paw. Only when she finally stops, now laying on her back, she brings you to her face.

You notice her blue eyes sparkling with excitement.
"You're not going anywhere now, are you?" she says with a giggle.

Then, her lips dart forward. She places a small kiss on your forehead.

Mew hovers closer, giving a bright smile. You notice her looking upwards, and so do you: the sun settled.
‘The game is officially over now.’ her voice echoes in the depths of your mind.
"Honestly, this little guy was the best mouse ever," she then says, turning to a still laughing Celebi.

The fairy recovers enough to talk:
"Mouse? Sneasel is more like it! Sneaky and swift just like one!" she compliments.

And then, her smile shifts into a grin, her eyes no longer sparkle with excitement, but with mischief.
"Mew," she says, still holding you in front of her face, so that you get to see the smirk she's giving you.
"Go get some berries, please. A LOT of berries." you don't understand a word, but you hear Mew giggling behind you.
"Sure." she replies, giving a big wink.

And, before you can say anything, the pink giantess leaves, disappearing into the depths of Ilex Forest.
‘What is going on?!’ your mind screams.
"W-What..." your mouth says instead.

You suddenly feel something touching your head. Looking back, you discover Celebi staring down at you, her grin widening second by second.
"So, it's only you and me now, cutie," she says, inching you closer to her face, to the point that you can feel her warm, mint-smelling breath gently blowing into your own face.
"I caught you fair and square, and I want my reward now. I've been waiting for the whole day, you know," she continues.

You swallow.
"N-Now Celebi, don't do anything you would regret, l-like last night," you stammer, recalling your brief stay inside her stomach, which ended sadly for you.

The smile fades from the giantess' face.
"I already cried my tears for that, mind you. Wasn't that enough of an apology?" she asks, laying down on her back, while keeping you up in the air with both paws.

Now, not understanding a word, the only reply you can give is a flat:
"Uhh..." Celebi sighs. To you, not understanding pokemon speech is normal; to her, it's stupid.

You notice the fairy smiling again. Not grinning, but smiling reassuringly.
"Relax, will you? I just want to have some fun~" she chirps, ending her sentence by rubbing your chin with the back of her paw. Very slowly.

You blush, sure that you understood the last part.
"Isn't it a bit... early, Celebi?" you say, choosing to remain calm and to try and talk your way out of this situation.

A faint, red shade appears on her cheeks as well.
"Maybe," she replies, shrugging, making you fall down.

You land straight on her belly. The fairy rises her head and looks in your direction.
"But after all, who says we can't spend some private time?" she adds, that mischievous glint returning in her eyes.
"Celebi-" you're interrupted by one of her paws, which she places on your mouth, silencing you.
"Look, we have more or less ten minutes before Mew comes back. That's all I need." she says, her paw removing from your mouth and wrapping around your waist instead. The other paw soon joins the first.

Starting to fear, you watch as Celebi sits up and flaps her wings, starting to flutter.
"Now, just to find a more private place..." she mumbles, hovering upwards, you held in both of her paws for 'safekeeping'.

Your world shakes as the fairy reaches the highest branch of a tall tree, roughly sitting down on it, making sure to spread her legs in the process. You catch a glimpse of her sex, and you hurry to look elsewhere. Celebi giggles.
"Come on, my shy little guy," she sings.
"Our playtime is about to begin~" that said, she brings you dangerously close to her face.

More specifically, to her lips. You watch them part as she talks again.
"Ready?" she asks, softly pecking your nose.

"C-Celebi, don't do anything you might cry about later. It could end really bad for someone you really care about..." you try. At least, you hope that she really cares about you. After all, she did declare her devotion towards you, didn't she?

Celebi grins.
"Don't worry about it." she simply responds. With Mew gone, you stuck with her and nobody around to ruin her plans, she can finally take out all of her repressed desires. And if something bad happens to you... she'll be sure to undo it with a quick leap back in time.

With those happy thoughts, Celebi looks at you, grinning, as she gets ready to start...
13521121211121211111121111.title: The reward of the the fairy - you!

choices: It's too risky! Stick with the two of them!
135211212111212111111211111.content:
The fairy stares at you intently, that unnerving grin not leaving her face.
"Do you know how much I waited for this? It felt like forever," she says, though you can't understand her.

She continues anyway.
"I've been all alone for the past years. And you may understand that a pokemon like me isn't fit for being alone." she looks upwards.
"Sure, I had Mew. Best friends, almost sisters, but you can surely understand that she couldn't satisfy my... physical needs," her gaze becomes even sweeter, and you soon find her paw moving to your head, gently caressing you.
"And that's when you come in. Finally, I have someone. Someone I can talk to about..." her paw shifts position from your head to your chin.

"... Intimate stuff." she says seductively.

You can't understand whatever Celebi just said. Seriously, what does ‘Bi le bi’ mean? But you felt the mischievousness in her tone. And it surely means nothing good for you...

--

While Celebi enjoys her... quality time with her little human, Mew keeps herself busy with gathering berries for a decent dinner, deliberately plucking as much as possible. Just to give Celebi and her human some time together.

Not long passes before her short, pink paws are full of berries of all kinds. It isn't a particularly amusing task, but the real purpose behind it is enough for her to go on, now simply snatching berries with her psychic powers.

"Hope those two are having fun," she giggles to no one in particular.
"I can't believe that Celebi found love before me.
And she found such a cute and smart little one, too." she then says with a small, imperceptible sigh, which is followed by her signature giggle.
"Who knows, I might just find my catch soon. Maybe I'll find my own shrunken human!" she starts laughing.

"Hehehe, for now, I'll just find more berries, I guess," she says cheerfully, more berries floating towards her from the nearby bushes, forming a large, hovering group.

--

"S-stop! Stop!" you stammer, as the barrage of kisses you have been put through dies down.

You feel like you're on fire, and you're certain that you're really burning red while the green giantess in front of you giggles.
She's been kissing you repeatedly for the past few minutes.

And, since you were 'blinded' by her large lips, her free paw 'accidentally slipped' over her sex. Some good way to start off.

But Celebi isn't done with you just yet.
"That was fun! But," she grins at you.
"I'm still really hungry..." for some reason, her belly growls in this exact moment.

She looks at it. Then, she looks at you, smirking. She already knows what to do next. You know as well.
"Cele-" you don't get to finish; the grass type roughly moves you to her mouth, and opens wide.
"See you later, cutie~" she giggles.

And then, she drops you inside of the dark cavern.
"No-" all the lights fade away as she shuts her mouth, sealing you inside

Immediately, you start to struggle to get out.
"Come on, Celebi, let me out!" you shout out. The only things you achieve are a mouthful of saliva and a giggle coming from the dark abyss behind you.

The giant tongue beneath you throws you back and forth within the slippery, dark confines of the mouth. Mercifully, you don't get to have a close meeting with her teeth, but still, this is terrific.
"Ce-Celebi, let me out! I-" you lose your footing and fall face down on the slimy red mass. And you notice it dragging you extremely near the edge of the fairy's throat.

Celebi keeps licking you while moving you around in her mouth. In the meantime, one of her paws rubs her crotch. The human's taste, his screams, his struggles and his pleads for her mercy, all these things mix together, forming a huge wave of pleasure that expands within her, overwhelming her.

Obviously, she's not going to swallow. But, she decides, the human - no, her human - doesn't need to know that. His fear is the main part of this game of pleasure.

Giggles and moans simultaneously escape the fairy's closed lips. She couldn't explain why it feels so good. It simply does. And she intends to enjoy every last bit of it.

--

A last, sharp moan coming from behind you marks the end of Celebi's game, though you're unaware of her activities.

Your green host leans back, and lays her head against the trunk of the tree.
‘W-Wonderful...’ she thinks, unable to talk because of the little 'captive' in her mouth. She decides that you can surely endure another minute in her mouth while she recovers.

Inside of her mouth, things stopped moving. Something you're grateful for. But you're still too near Celebi's throat, your legs already partially caught in the darkness below. You don't dare to move a muscle. One wrong movement, and you're going straight back in her stomach. Although that you're pretty sure that you're going there either way. Why would Celebi want to eat you again? Why did she say she loved you when she only considers you as food? Why-

You have no more time for questions. Lights pours inside the mouth as she opens it. The fairy digs her paw inside and gets a hold of you.

You're pulled back to the outside world, greeted by a full moon enlightening the sky. And, of course, by the face of a giant, time-traveling pokemon who just attempted to make a snack out of you again.
"Welcome back, little one~" she giggles, her free paw traveling to you, starting to wipe away the layer of drool covering your body.

You take a deep sigh.
"Okay. Why?" are the only two words you manage to say. The fairy laughs.
"Can't get enough of your taste~" she says. You decide to ignore her. You're just happy to be alive.
"Where's Mew?" you ask instead as the fairy floats off the tree and back to the clearing where her shrine is.

The giantess offers a shrug, suggesting that she has no clue about her friend's current location.

‘I'm closer that you might think,’ a familiar voice echoes in your mind. You turn to see the smiling face of a certain pink pokemon coming out of a nearby bush, paws full of fruit. A large amount of berries floats out as well, and is gently deposited on the grass.
"Hungry?" Mew playfully asks.

--

You silently eat your meal, which consists in a single berry - that, with your current size, isn't dinner. It's a feast.

In the meantime, the two legendaries are chatting merrily while they eat their own meal. Not understanding their speeches - which, judging by their laughs, are about nice stuff - you simply mind your own business.

Seriously, you don't know how to feel about this day. About what you just went through. Celebi didn't eat you again, but she easily could. And that's the third time you visit her mouth in less than a day.

Your train of thought is interrupted by a loud yawn. You look at the two, taking notice that all the berries are gone, while you're still finishing up yours. That only contributes to make you feel like a helpless bug, completely at the mercy of these two giantesses...

--

Once you're done eating, the two declare their intention to hit the hay. Mew helpfully translates for you.

Before you can reply, you notice two green paws getting a hold of you.
"Bedtime, little one," Celebi chimes.

The two lay down, and you soon find yourself laying from the waist up on her belly, while your lower body slides past her pubic area and hangs a few inches from the ground.

"See you in the morning, Mew," Celebi chimes.
"See you in the morning." Mew replies.

The green fairy then turns you.
"Goodnight, you." she says, leaning forward to plant a small peck on your head. You mumble something incomprehensible in response as she lays back down, one paw traveling to your back, pinning you down.

--

Soon, the two are fast asleep. You, in the meantime, have some troubles.

But, as you start to feel drowsy as well, it begins to dawn on you that this is the perfect opportunity to escape! After all, the two proved themselves unpredictable, you can't risk. You were almost eaten for the second time just one hour ago. Escaping seems really tempting...

But, on the other hand, Celebi and Mew are the only ones who offered their help so far. And escaping would mean giving up on their protection and face the forest and its critters. Alone. Plus, you wouldn't go too far at this size and the two would find you soon. And you're not sure how you're going to face an enraged Celebi, angered by your leaving.

For the next few minutes, you do nothing but wonder what to do, wether to slip out of Celebi's grasp and leave while the two are asleep - and face the forest's dangers - or stay with them - and face whatever they've got in store for you.

You remain perfectly still (then again, you can't move too much because of the giant paw pinning you down), thinking and rethinking about your next decision.

But, in the end, you pick what you think is the safest option...
135211212111212111111211111.title: Fairy's funtime

choices: Wake Celebi up, tell her about your 'encounter'
Keep it for yourself, go back to sleep
1352112121112121111112111112.content:
Just as you're about to make your ultimate decision, the unpredictable happens.

A bright, green light shines in the forest, momentarily forcing you to close your eyes; Celebi gives a slight moan of annoyance, but she gives no other sign of wanting to wake up.

The light dies down after a few moments. Only then you dare to look. And your jaw shuts open at the sight.

A wide awake Celebi, fluttering there. Your gaze shifts on the surface you're laying on. You're still laying on Celebi!

As your mind tries to process what is going on, the awake Celebi notices you awake and smiles.
"Hi there." you freeze, having heard someone talking.

You rapidly look around, trying to spot whoever just spoke up. No one but the two Celebi and Mew. Though one Celebi and Mew are currently asleep, so that only leaves one alternative.
"C-Celebi?" you reluctantly ask.

To your shock, the fairy nods, and gently moves the sleeping Celebi's arm off you.
"I'm sure you'd like answers," she speaks perfectly, holding out a paw for you to climb on. How can this be? The Celebi you've known couldn't say nothing but her name since you met her!
"Let's go for a walk." the fairy says again.

--

"So, er..." you try to say something. In the past few minutes, the other Celebi, as you called her, brought you into the forest to talk... at least, you think she wants to talk.

Your suspicions soon fade as Celebi speaks:
"For starters, let me introduce myself. I am Celebi,
alright, but from another timeline. From an alternative timeline, as you may have guessed from my... talkativeness..." she says, giggling.

You're unaware of what she's talking about.
"Alternative timeline?" you ask.
"Yes. A timeline pretty similar to yours. Forgot that I'm a time traveler?" she giggles.

You vaguely blush.
"So, why did you come here? I mean, if you're from an alternative timeline..." you inquire.

The other Celebi suddenly stops laughing, and looks at you seriously.
"Right. Listen, as I already told, my timeline is pretty similar to yours. That means I had 'my own' you," she explains.

The color drains from your face as one particular catches your attention.
"H-Had?" you ask. The blue eyed time traveler nods somewhat glumly.
"That's why I'm here. Just like the Celebi of this time,
I had you for the first day. We went to sleep, but the next morning..." her voice grows more and more sad as she talks, bringing her to the verge of tears.

You try to ask what happened, but she precedes you:
"Y-You were gone." she speaks.
