She spends the next minute crying silently, occasionally wiping tears away. You don't quite know how to comfort her. After all, you don't quite know what is going on, if this all a lucid dream or a lucid nightmare or if you're wide awake and Celebi is actually talking to you.

Finally, the grass type calms down a bit.
"M-Me and Mew searched for your through the whole forest and outside of it. It was like you simply disappeared. I was worried sick about you. I thought you ran off because of what I did. I think both me and you know what I'm referring to," she says. You nod, knowing she's referring to the fact she actually ate you.

Celebi sniffles a couple times.
"We kept searching and searching. Until, three days after your disappearing, Mew told me 'We should give up Celebi'. We... we cried for days, and we were sad for weeks..." she inhales deeply as she says the last phrase.

"But I didn't accept that. I didn't want to accept that.
I was going to have my little one back, no matter what. And so I traveled trough time... and here I am!" she says, smiling a little.

Then, her expression returns serious.
"Uh... I..." you try, but she places a finger over your mouth, silencing you.
"Now, I'm not here to bring you with me or something like that. I just want you to promise, to swear, that you're not going to leave the Celebi of this timeline. I... I beg you... cutie..." she pleads.

You don't know what to reply, but the sad sparkle in Celebi's blue eyes - along with the fact that you might just die out there - is enough to convince you.
"I promise that I won't leave Celebi... er you... or Mew." you simply say.

The green giantess smiles, and places a small peck on your head. Suddenly, you notice, her body looses its normal green color.
"Celebi... What's this?" you ask. She smiles.
"It's the confirm of your promise. The timeline where... or when if you like... you left is being undone." she explains.
"I'll bring you back now," she murmurs, floating into the forest again.

--

Celebi float right back where the guardian of Ilex Forest of this timeline and Mew are still sleeping, unaware of what just happened to you.

The other Celebi gently places you back down on her counterpart.
"What will happen to you now?" you ask.
"Don't worry about it. Trust me, tomorrow you'll wake up and think of this like it all was a dream," Celebi says.

She then smiles at you.
"I'll return to my timeline now. Goodnight, you," she then says, leaning down, placing a kiss on your forehead.
"It was great to see you again cutie~" with these last words, Celebi glows green, and disappears in a flash of light.

When it dies down, you just lay there, dumbfounded about what just happened. The Celebi from an alternative timeline just came to tell you to not leave.

You already knew that your chances of survival alone aren't exactly the best, so the least you could do was accepted.

And you did so.

But everything, every word the other Celebi told you bounces back and forth within your head, leaving you incredulous of what happened tonight.

Seriously, a time-traveling legendary pokemon shows up and talks to you, revealing you things from an alternative future. It is very hard to take in.

A big part of you wants to talk about it. And, you decide, maybe to should wake Celebi up, tell her about what happened while she slept peacefully.

On the other hand, you think, maybe you should keep this a secret. How would Celebi take it if you reveal her you wanted to leave? Sure, you could also not mention it, but she would find out anyway, judging by your tale.

Still, you feel the urge to talk about this.

Taking a few moments to think, you decide to...
1352112121112121111112111112.title: News from an alternative future

13521121211121211111121111122.content:
In the end, you decide to keep what you just saw to yourself. You're not sure of how Celebi would take it - or how she would take being awakened in the middle of the night.

So, sheepishly, you readjust your position on top of her, trying to get a few hours of shut-eye before going through another day as a shrunken human.

You let out something between a deep sigh and a deep yawn. The events of the left you tired... and yet, you can't sleep. You just don't feel comfortable sleeping with a giant fairy who claimed you as hers. Sure, anyone would tell that you consented, but what other choice did you have? Either that or face the legendaries' wrath.

You cringe at the thought.

Almost as if sensing your uneasiness, Celebi's arms lovingly wrap around you as she hugs you to her chest. A smile spreads on her face as she readjusts.
"Bi."

You flush with embarrassment... but you really can't deny that this actually feels very nice. The green skin of the fairy emanates a comforting warmth, and it's really smooth, while the beats of her heart provide a sweet, rhythmic lullaby.

Life surely changed a lot in the past hours... but you can tell that you could get used to this.
"Well, I'll give you that, Celebi: you make a wonderful bed." you mumble under your breath as you wiggle in her grasp, getting comfortable.

The, you lay your head on Celebi's chest, sighing loudly before closing your eyes. Soon enough, your consciousness fades away, replaced by sleep as your mind drifts off to a sweet, dreamless slumber...

--

The sun shines through Ilex Forest, enlightening the area around a certain shrine dedicated to the forest's patroness.

Said patroness is currently sleeping beneath a tall tree, her best friend Mew sleeping beside her while her little human is still caught in her long arms as she cuddles him to her.

Celebi was having great dreams. Maybe it was for the human's presence, or maybe because she was just excited about having what humans called a ‘boyfriend’, but her dreams are sure better than before.

...

At least, until fate decided to be cruel and let sunshine on her dark eyelids. Bothered by the sudden feeling, Celebi fidgets in her sleep as she tries to relegate her incoming consciousness in the back of her mind.

However, the resistance is for naught.

Giving a groan, the annoyed legendary gives out a yawn, before sitting up. Both her paws let go of whatever she was holding and they travel up to her eyes. While she rubs them, she feels a foreign weight dropping onto her lap.

Lazily, Celebi removes her paws from her eyes and shoots her lap a tired gaze, taking notice of a small human sleeping there, inches from her-

The patroness' eyes lit up as she remembers who the human is. Her precious little lover.

The legendary's paws travel down to you as she gently gets a hold of you. The fairy brings you up to her face, whispering sweetly:
"Wake up, my little human," the call goes completely unheard as you keep on sleeping.

"Wake uuup~" Celebi repeats in a singsong voice that sadly doesn't manage to wake you up.

The green fairy giggles.
"Someone's a sleepyhead... didn't know that~" she says to herself.

Then, the fairy brings you to her lips as she plants a kiss on your face.

The action has the desired effect: your eyes shut open and a fiery shade of red appears on your cheeks as you find yourself face to lips with the fairy that 'caught' you yesterday.

Said legendary pulls off, leaving you startled and blushing.
"Oh, you're awake..." she sings cheerfully.

Because of the annoying language barrier, you can only assume what she just said.
"Yeah, yeah, good morning Celebi..." you say, physically trying to rub the sleep out of your eyes.
"What? Couldn't sleep?" you then ask, still quite bothered by your early - forced - awakening.

The fairy snickers
"Actually-" before she can say how you affected her dreams, she is interrupted.

"Meeew..." both you and Celebi turn to see a familiar pink legendary rolling in her sleep.

You turn back to the fairy, noticing her with her eyes closed. A vague sense of déjà vu comes to you as you watch her muttering some incomprehensible words:
"Bi bi bi..."

Memories of last night flash across your mind. The talking Celebi from an alternative timeline, the heart-shattering tale she told you.

For a few moments, you remain completely still, wondering what happened your future self after he ran from the two legendaries. Did he find help? Did he get back to his original size?... Did he even make it? Or did he-

Your thoughts are interrupted as something pokes your head. You look up, discovering a concerned looking Celebi staring down at you.

"Something wrong?" the fairy's voice fully snaps you back to reality.
"Uh?"

Celebi points at you, before tilting her head slightly, a clear sign of confusion.
"Oh... I'm fine... just thinking..." you say, quickly remembering to keep your mouth shut about what happened.

To change topic, you glance at Mew.
"How long does she...?" Celebi sighs.
"Let's just hope she's up by midday..." she mutters.

And then, a small grin grows wide on her face.
"Hey, it's just us two for now... why don't we play for a bit?" she says.

You look at Celebi, trying to decipher what she just said.

Seeing you struggle to understand, the green legendary sighs, before deciding express herself in body language.

She points at you, then to herself, before eyeing you with a smirk.

"Y-You wanna play?" you assume. Celebi nods, shooting you an expectant look.

You pause as you detect the problem. The giantess wants to play, you don't like her idea of 'fun'.

You could easily suggest some else to try and make her give up on whatever game she has planned... but, she DOES seem pretty eager. You fear that any attempt of refusal won't be accepted.

What to do...?
13521121211121211111121111122.title: Secrets

choices: Mew wants to talk to you...
13521121211121211111121112.content:
You keep running without looking back. You rise your gaze instead as you look at the sun: it's about to set, you almost won!

... Almost.

Laughing, Mew suddenly increases her speed, paws wide open as she reaches out for you.
"You mouse, you are..." you get tackled down by a mountain of smooth pink fur.

When you finally realize what happened, you discover yourself firmly enclosed in Mew's grasp, her short paws pinning you down against her chest.
"... Mine!" the pink giantess giggles loudly.

Ignoring whatever she said, you shift your attention on a certain green pokemon that just flew closer, stopping in front of her friend.
"Hehehe, looks like you won, Mew. Like always," Celebi laughs.
"And that makes two!" Mew chimes, recalling the first game she had with you earlier today.

Celebi smiles before looking at the sun as well, only to discover that it's gone.
"Yep, it's official cutie, we cats win," Celebi says, looking at you with a grin.

The time traveler fairy then leans down, snatching you from Mew's paws.
"Do you know what that means?" she cries, bringing you to her face. You can feel her purposely starting to breath heavily, her warm, mint-smelling breath blowing into your face.

Whatever she said, you don't like it one bit. You learned pretty fast that Celebi using that mischievous voice is never a good sign.

At least, not for you.

Desperate, you look back at Mew, silently asking for help. But she ignores you. In effect, Mew seems to be thinking about something as she has a paw over her mouth and her eyes staring at the now darkened sky intently.

"Mew?" Celebi calls out.
"Mh?" Mew asks, snapped back to reality.
"Me and this little guy here need a moment alone. Do you mind~?" Celebi chirps, sending shivers down your back.

"Actually..." this word makes Celebi drop her smile, and makes you look back at the pink pokemon.
"I was wondering... I did catch him... so wouldn't it be fair if I got the 'reward' after all?" Mew asks Celebi, a faint blush spreading across her face.

"Come again?" the time traveler asks.
"Yes... couldn't I... " Celebi looks at her friend with confusion.
"B-But..."
"Please?" Mew pleads.

For a moment, Celebi doesn't answer. She just floats there, trying to process what Mew just asked.
"Uh... what is happening?" you speak up, noticing the grass type's uneasiness. You've been silent, expecting her to want to... start with you right away.

Instead, Celebi and Mew just exchanged a few incomprehensible words. And now Celebi looks confused for some reason.

The fairy looks at you, her beloved little one.

What is Mew planning to do with him...?

Celebi notices Mew floating closer and she shakes her head. She always could trust Mew, so she assumes that her friend hasn't any malicious intent towards the human.

"Alright?" Celebi says, while holding you out.
"THANKS!" the pink legendary shouts happily, while picking you up from Celebi, closing you in a hug.

"H-Hey... what...?" you ask, taken aback by the sudden shift of position, from Celebi's open paws to Mew's tight hug. What the heck is happening?

Apparently, Celebi is wondering the same thing.
"What are you planning to do, Mew...?" she asks, worried. Mew giggles in response.
"Relax, will you?" she cheers.
"I won't steal this human from you... even if he's admittedly really cute..." she says. Celebi pouts at the last remark.

"No, I just want to get something to eat, and he's coming along, alright? No funny things!" Mew cheers again. Celebi stares at her friend for a moment, before nodding slowly.

The pink legendary smiles, before turning to you, who are still staring at the two confused.
‘Hey, let's go get something to eat, me and you, alright?’ Mew telepathically asks, making her intentions clear.

"... Alright?" you say, not really seeing anything bad with it.

Smiling even brighter, Mew starts to fly off.
"Later!" she cries before hovering into the forest that is Celebi's home, leaving said deity pokemon floating there, still dumbfounded.

--

Once she feels that she got far enough from her friend, Mew stops in the middle of the forest.
‘Hey,’ she says, slightly startling you.
"What?" you ask her.
‘I know, we should be finding berries but... do me a favor...?’ she asks, her sapphire eyes sparkling.

"...What is it?" you ask.
13521121211121211111121112.title: The cat gets the mouse

1352112121112121112.content:
‘I'm sorry,’ Mew starts.
‘I would gladly stay here, but I really have to head back now...’ she states with a noticeable unhappy voice. Then, she gives her usual, cheerful smile.
‘But don't worry. I'll be visiting soon!’ she adds.

"M-Mew! W-wait..." you shout, struggling to free yourself from Celebi's hug. But the grass type hasn't any intention of letting you go anytime soon.

Mew doesn't let you finish.
‘Bye!’ she says, before looking at the green time traveler who is currently holding you.
"Bye, Celebi," she gives her a wink.
"Don't play too rough." Celebi giggles.
"No promises." she replies, sending her friend into giggling as well.

And, with a last wave of her short paw, Mew flies off, soon engulfed by the thick forest.

You stop struggling. There's no point in doing so now. Your hope is gone. Now you're at the mercy of Celebi. You gulp down. What could she have in store for you?

You can feel your body freezing as you notice Celebi moving you in her paws.

You find yourself staring at her chest. You look upwards, finding her bright blue eyes fixed on you, something between a warm smile and a wild grin on her face.

"So," she says. You gulp.
"It's just you and me now," she lets out a giggle.
"What. To. Do. First~?" she sings excitedly.

Ignoring whatever Celebi just said, you focus on the excitement you heard in her voice. That can't be any good for you.

The large, green paws wrapped tightly around your body start to move upwards, dragging you up to Celebi's face. You can literally see her eyes sparkling.

You start trembling lightly. Whatever comes next, you're sure that you aren't going to like it one bit.

Celebi notices your little body shivering. Her smile drops, a concerned expression taking place on her face.
"Is something wrong?" she asks.

Then, she realizes why you're shivering.
"You're scared of me, aren't you?" she asks very softly.

Then, without waiting for an answer, she encloses you in another hug.
"I'm sorry." she continues, closing her eyes. You look up.
"I'm so sorry. What I did to you is unforgivable. I am unforgivable." while you can't understand a word, you can definitely catch the sorrow in her voice. Is she apologizing to you for the events of last night?

Assuming that she is, you stop shivering and look at her. She looks a lot less scary now, with her eyes closed, as if she's about to cry.
"Uh... I forgive you...?" you state, trying to sound calm.

Celebi breaks her hug, and cups her paws beneath your legs, letting you sit on her palms. She stares down at you.
"You have all the right to be mad at me," she says.
"But I swear I'll do anything to make it up to you." that said, she goes silent.

Clearly she's waiting for an answer.
"Uh... okay?" you try.

Celebi smiles a little. And, without any warning, she lifts you up to her lips, smooching both your cheeks.
"Cutie~" she says, her voice returning to its cheerful tone.

Even with the massive blush on your cheeks, you caught yourself smiling.

Celebi continues.
"Now then," she says.
"Today, I'll go easy on you. No serious stuff... yet. But, nonetheless, I can finally play!" she cheers.

Catching the seductive hint in her voice, your smile drops. And you can't help but wonder what the giantess has planned for you...
1352112121112121112.title: The sorrowful time traveler.

choices: You are awakened in the middle of the night.
13521121211121211121.content:
"I know!" Celebi chimes playfully.
"Let's start off with this!" she exclaims.

Before you could ask what she's up to, her lips dart forward, pressing into your face.

You can feel your face burning as her lips leave you, just to assault again, over and over, showering your face with pecks and smooches.

The whole thing goes on for a while. Celebi gives you a brief break to let you catch your breath. You could notice a pink shade spread across her cheeks, though her blush was far less intense than yours.

"You've had enough of a break." she declares after a few moments, shoving you right into her lips yet again.

Unable to breath properly, you try to squirm out of her grip several times. But you have little success, as her paws are far too strong for your tiny body.

Deciding that struggling isn't going to work, you stay still, enduring the barrage until the titaness pulls off. Not before giving you one last, long, wet smooch that almost pulls off your face along with her lips.

And, before you could even inhale fresh air, Celebi's paws push you into her cheek.
"Bi! Bi!" she squeals as she nuzzles you.

After a few minutes, she stops, bringing you back in front of her face. The blush on her face had widened, although not by much.
"Bi~" she chimes. Still burning bright red yourself, you give a deep sigh. This is going to be a long day.



Aside from Celebi's relatively harmless 'games', the day went on pretty uneventful. The warm sun of the day has been replaced by a full moon.

After a dinner made out of berries, Celebi gives a small yawn.
"Well, bedtime I guess." she mutters to herself. Her gaze travels down to you, who are sitting beside her.
"Ready to go to sleep, my little one?" she ask.

Then, without waiting for an answer, she picks you up and lies down.

Understanding what the grass type giantess is up to, you start to struggle.
"W-wait... I'll sleep on the ground...!" you stammer.

Celebi giggles.
"Silly, the ground is hard and cold. I'll keep you warm. Why would you want to sleep on the ground anyway?" that said, she gives a smile.
"If you need anything, just wake me up," she says, letting a giggle escape her mouth.
"And I do mean anything." while she says this, she slides a paw over her nether regions. You hurry to look elsewhere. You don't even want to know what her words meant.

Celebi places you down on the dark green landscape of her belly. Her grassy skin is soft, and it carries a comforting warmth.

Celebi's paws wrap around your form, closing you in a soft, yet firm, hug.
"Sleep tight." you hear her indecipherable words.

Within five minutes, you hear the time traveler snoring softly, her belly rising up and falling down along her breathing. From here, you can hear the noises coming from the inside of the giantess.

You sigh. There's no way you could possibly escape: Celebi is holding you in a solid hug, leaving you unable to even squirm. And you're too tired to even try to run anyway.

Giving another sigh, you lie your head on the soft surface beneath you, trying to recollect the thoughts of the day.

At least, Celebi hasn't shown any mischievous intention... or not too mischievous anyway. That left you feeling a bit more safe around her.

A little.

Yawning, you decide to catch some sleep.

So, closing your eyes, you quickly fall asleep, tired out from the events of the day.
13521121211121211121.title: Celebi's playtime...

choices: Celebi speaks:" Let's go get something to eat
1352112121112122.content:
Celebi moves you closer to her head. She stops as you are in front of her face, to give you a light peck on the cheek, before putting you on her forehead "Come on cutie, back home we go. We have so much to do~" she says, lifting herself up in the air. You don't care about the huge blush that had grown on your face, you go on "Mew, if you are bored, why don't you come with us? I bet it could tons of fun!" you try, giving your best convincing smile. You are strongly hoping that she'd take your advice. You don't want to stay alone with Celebi just yet. Arceus knows what she could do with you, now that you are her actual other. Celebi stops her ascend and looks up at you with a weird expression. 'Why do you want to bring Mew along?' she thinks, annoyed by the fact that, if Mew accepts, goes her chance to remain alone with you. She then looks at her friend, she seems to be thinking, before giving smile "Count me in!" she beams. Celebi mentally groans. There goes her fun. But outside, she fakes her best smile. You meanwhile smile for real. Your plan worked! Mew accepted to come along! You sigh in relief as you grab one of Celebi's feelers; the grass type pokemon looks at you again 'Better for you to not have strange ideas cutie. Or else' she thinks, before flying off, Mew following close.

After a few hours of flying in between Kanto and Johto, you finally get back to Ilex Forest, aka your new home. Celebi stops to breath in the fresh air of the afternoon "Home sweet home" she says as you stop holding her feeler. You see that Celebi is heading to a wooden structure, that reveals to be a sanctuary. Her sanctuary. It was built by humans long time ago, when she first came here. From then on, Celebi was knows from humans as 'The voice of the forest'. Celebi smiles at her memories as she sits down on the wooden surface. Mew follows her and sits down as well. Celebi picks you from her head and sits you on her lap, before wrapping your body, except your head and legs, in her green, long arms. Your head is pressed against her soft, warm belly. You have to admit, this is pretty relaxing. Maybe this was not the wrong choice, you could get used to this.

After a while of staying like this, the two pokemon break the silence simultaneously...
1352112121112122.title: Safety in numbers

choices: Mew goes get food, leaving you alone with Celebi
The two of them go get food, leaving you alone
13521121211121221.content: Celebi and Mew break the silence at the same time. Mew smiles "You first" she says "Thanks! As I was saying, why don't we get something to eat? Last time I ate was last night" Celebi says, leaving out the part when she actually ate you last night. As to confirm her words, her stomach growls loudly. You, who are still plucked in a hug to her belly, feel the shaking sensation from behind you. It's so loud that it threatens to break your eardrums. You can't understand what the two pokemon are saying, but for sure you can tell that Celebi is hungry. Your only hope is that she doesn't considers you as food again. She wouldn't est her actual boyfriend, right? The grass type pokemon seems to feel your fear and giggles, poking you with a hand "That ugly monster scared you little one? You poor thing" she says between giggles, making Mew giggle as well "What kind of beast lives in there girl?" she playfully asks, with the only effect of making Celebi giggle harder. After a good two minutes, they finally stop laughing "Now, the thing to settle: who will go get food?" Mew asks. They both look at each other, then at you "I got an idea" Celebi says...
13521121211121221.title: Celebi speaks:" Let's go get something ...

135211212111212211.content:
"Mew, why don't you go get food? I want to have some private time with this cutie here" Celebi asks, winking. Mew giggles "I get your point. Well, I think I'll go searching for food. But I don't see any berry tree nearby. I think it'll take time" the cat pokemon giggles, winking at her friend. The time travel pokemon grins, while Mew lowers herself to talk to you "Hey there. Listen, I'm going to get something to eat. Since we can't risk leaving you alone, Celebi will look after you, since she's your... how do you humans call that?" "Girlfriend?" you ask "Yeah, that. Later" she says, lifting herself from the sanctuary "Wait!" you shout. You don't want to remain alone with Celebi. Surely enough, she was waiting for this to happen "Bye" Mew giggles, before disappearing through the forest. You groan.

Celebi watches her friend leave, before giving a smile. Finally, she's alone with you. And nobody to disturb the both of you. She turns her attention to you. You sigh defeated as you sit back down on the grass - type pokemon's lap. But just after you sit down, Celebi's arms reach for you. Enclosing you in her three - fingered hands, she brings you to her face. She stares at you with those big baby blue eyes, a sweet smile on her face. She is absolutely gigantic to you, her mouth is about the lenght of your small body, her eyes are like two titanic mirrors. Her feelers are like trees to you. She could end your life with a single move, and you know that. You just hope that she really loves you, at least to spare your puny life.

Celebi stares at you in her hands for a bit, deciding what to do with you. The tiny human doesn't move, he just stares at her silently, maybe wondering what she has in his for him. Her smile widens. This little guy 'trapped' in her hands was sure the cutest thing she has ever seen in her whole life. And she lived for ages. Noticing she is moving you closer to her mouth, you close your eyes, waiting, with great fear, for her to do anything. In fact, not even a second later, you feel a pair of lips being pressed on your cheek *smooch* Celebi kisses you. You open your eyes, finding the green giantess staring at you smiling, a faint blush on her face. She stares at you for a little bit, before...
135211212111212211.title: Well... this had to happen sooner or later

choices: Zoroark drops you in and swallows!
Zoroark is hit by an aura sphere! Mew is back!
1352112121112122112.content: You are waiting for Celebi to do whatever she has in mind for you, when a rustle catches your attention. You turn around, and see a bush moving. Celebi stares at it curiously. Out of its hiding place comes a black creature, with long arms and legs, bloody red claws and a red and black mane. Two blue eyes shine, seeming to stare into your very soul. A Zoroark. It roars at your sight, a roar that you recognize as pure hunger. This pokemon was hunting for food, and surely enough, it believes that you'll make a more-than-good snack. It doesn't even bother thinking how a human could be so small, it's just too hungry right now. Celebi's expression shifts from an amused one to a angry one. Putting you down on the sanctuary, she lifts herself from the wooden structure "Stay where you are. Don't move" she says. Of course, you can't understand her, so you can just watch as the Zoroark roars once again and charges Celebi. The grass type prepares to hit, but the Zoroark suddenly disappears from her sigh. Celebi stares confused at the void. She knows that Zoroark is a pokemon that is capable to give illusions to its foes, so she has to be careful. Celebi flies back to the sanctuary and gets in front of you, shielding you with her body. She's not going to let that beast to hurt you, no matter what. She's too focused on what is on front of her, that she doesn't notice a red claw appearing out of nowhere behind her. Zoroark fully reveals itself and strikes Celebi with nigh slash, knocking her to the ground. Celebi can't move, a big slash mark on her back. She desperately tries to get up, but she can't. She yells in pain as the fox pokemon approaches you. You cower in fear as its black paw reaches for you. Snatching you from the sanctuary, it moves you to its mouth and dangles you over it...
1352112121112122112.title: Something unexpected happens

choices: "I'll do anything, just don't eat me!" you shout, understanding Zoroark a little
You scream incoherently, and Zoroark realizes she's wasting her time with you
13521121211121221121.content:
Celebi watches as her tiny human flails around desperately in midair, before landing on the hostile Zoroark's tongue. Before she can formulate a plan the unthinkable happens - The Zoroark bites his pitiful body in half.

"BIIIIIIIIIIIIIII!" Celebi screams as she closes her eyes, unable to witness the gruesome scene any longer. You cover your ears and tremble as the Zoroark holds you close to her chest, swallowing hard before licking her chops. From your position you can see what appears to be blood dripping down her chin, which was strange because aside from two discomforted eardrums you were feeling quite alright. Even stranger is what happened next - The wall of fur you were being held by and up to tensed and began to change appearance, everything moving very quickly as you were carried far away from the screaming legendary.

A few minutes later you come to a stop as your hostess dispels her illusion and holds you up to her massive face.

"A human," she says, mostly to herself as you cannot understand her. You had a pretty good idea of what her intentions were, however.

"N-Now... Don't do anything hasty," you stammer in an attempt to calm down after the tumultuous trip, "I'm not food."

"Humans aren't food," Zoroark states bluntly while examining you closer, "Humans make stuff. Including food."

"I'm serious! If you eat me, I'll grow back to my original size and burst you open from inside!" you insist as the giant fox suddenly flips her hand over, catching you between the tip of her two spiky fingers.

"Humans aren't the only ones who are tricky though," she mutters before raising her voice in an attempt to make herself understood, "Listen. I'm only not eating you because you might be useful for something else. But if you can't understand a word I say then I might as well just end you right here and now before you summon another legendary or something."

Something about the tone of Zoroark's growls and her cold, uncaring stare made you suddenly wish you were back with Celebi. This wish gained further ground as the giant Zoroark opened up her mouth and showed off her fangs, surprisingly enough gleaming white instead of dripping with blood.

"No! Wait! Stop!" you shout in desperation as you try to tug your leg free, knowing from experiences that your chances in the wind were far better tahn your chances on a tongue.

"What'll it be, then?" she continues while making sure to keep her mouth open between each syllable, "Slave or food?"
13521121211121221121.title: Separation anxiety

choices: Celebi and Mew to the rescue!
135211212111212211211.content:
You're shaking wildly, your fear overwhelming you. You try your hardest to get the words out of yourself, but your fear simply won't let you. But the Zoroark has very little patience "Pick one already human! Either a slave or food!" she shouts, her teeth shining as she says the last word. You really don't want to pass through another pokemon's digestive system, so you force yourself to talk "P- please! I'll do anything, j-just don't eat me!" you shout out of fear. Zoroark's eyes widen, a smirk appearing on her face "Very well, human, good choice" she says, moving you towards her mane "What are you-" you can't finish that the fox buries you in her mane "Better for you to hang on for dear life human" she says, starting to walk away. You obey and grasp her fur as tight as you can.

Mew is getting back to the sanctuary, with a large amount of berries in her paws - and a larger amount floating behind her- 'Who knows what did those two do while I wasn't with them' she thinks giggling, when she hears something. Crying? Is someone crying? Curious to find out who's crying, Mew makes her way to Celebi's sanctuary. And what she sees makes her drop all the berries she's carrying. There on the ground is Celebi, crying desperately. A big slash mark is on her back, tears are pouring down her cheeks, her whole face is literally standing in a small lake of tears. Without losing any time, Mew rushes to her "Celebi! What happened here?! How did you got hurt? Where is your-" Celebi looks up, her eyes full of suffering. Painfully, the time travel pokemon stands up, sniffles a few times, before speaking.

You can't see anything due the fur covering your view, but you can tell that Zoroark is moving from the constant shaking. Suddenly the movement stops. And three red claws reach for you in the thick strands of fur. Grasping you tightly, they bring you face to face with the Zoroark again. You look around, she brought you to a cave "Welcome home slave!" the dark pokemon says "Now, you begin your work. For starters, I had this itch on my back for a while, so you have to solve my problem" she says, laying down on her belly. Reclutantly, you get on her back and start scratching through her fur "Oh yeah, that's the spot... mhhmmmhhh" Zoroark moans "Keep up the good work slave". It's a rather humiliating job, but you have to do it if you want to stay alive. You keep scratching her back, Zoroark moaning the whole time, when suddenly "Hey Human" she calls out "W-what?" you ask "Answer. How did you manage to summon the legendary Celebi? She already barely shows up to pokemon, why show up to a shrunken human?" she asks.

"A-a Zoroark came out of nowhere, it attacked us and it-it-it ate my poor little guy!" Celebi explains, bursting back into tears as she says the last part. Mew takes in all the facts, feeling sad and angry at the same time. She then focuses, maybe you are somehow still alive. She can't have her friend suffering, and she doesn't want you to die either. She's just making friends with you right now, why does they have to lose you? It's simply not fair. Focusing on the various auras of this forest, she tries to find yours. After a few moments, she spots an aura. A weak one, right next to a stronger one. Gotcha! "Celebi! He's still alive!" Mew shouts. Celebi looks at her, her eyes still watering "How can you say?" she asks "I feel his aura. Focus, and you'll feel him as well!" Mew explains. Celebi sniffles before focusing. Mew is right, she feels you. You're alive! Shouting in joy, that green pokemon floats into the air "He's alive! He's alive!" she shouts "Yeah, but we still don't know where are they" Mew says "Trust me, I perfectly know where they are. I know this forest inch by inch" Celebi says, starting to fly off. Mew looks at her confused, before flying behind her 'Don't worry my little guy' Celebi thinks 'I'm gonna bring you back to me, be it the last thing I do'.

You tell the Zoroark your story, about how you woke up one day shrunken, and of how Celebi found you and became your girlfriend. Still, you aren't comfortable with using that word, you are still considering running away. You shake the thought off, Celebi and Mew would find you, and Mew would probably beat you up. And right now, you couldn't escape even if you wanted. This Zoroark is keeping you under surveillance "So you're saying that Celebi feel for you and became your lover? And should I believe that?" she asks "Believe me or not, that's the truth" you say "Hmpm. Whatever you say human. Now, good job with the back" the dark fox says, removing you from her back and placing you roughly on the ground, before standing up "Now, time to rub my paws" she says, sitting down, her paws right in front of you. The smell isn't bad, but it isn't good either. You sigh deeply.
135211212111212211211.title: Slave to a Zoroark

choices: Orders you to get back to work
Declares your work ended and decides to go hunt for food
1352112121112122112111.content:
You really don't have any choice, so you reclutantly start rubbing one of Zoroark's paws. It's not a simple task as you are smaller than her paw, so you rub the hardest you can. Zoroark seems pleased by your work, you notice by her small moans of pleasure "That's it slave... keep this on... pleasure your mistress" she says between moans. You feel both humiliated and angry. Humiliated because of the job you're doing right now. Angry because this dark fox treats you like you are her property. A filthy bug that she could squish or eat whenever she wants. You don't notice that, thinking about these things, you are just rubbing harder, pleasuring the fox more.

After a while of rubbing, Zoroark declares your work decent and orders you to rub her other paw. You do as commanded and start repeating the process on her right paw. While you rub, you try to recollect the memories of how you shrunk...

2 days ago

Finally! School's over! Forever! These are your thoughts as you enjoy the party with your friends. You had finally graduated from pokemon school and you can finally become a pokemon trainer. You imagine yourself taking on the gyms, the elite four and in the end the champion, just to become the strongest trainer of them all. Of course, your dream would take a lot of time and training to become real. But you will do it, you're sure.
After partying for the whole day, you return home. You feel excited like never before. Now the only thing to do is to get your first pokemon and you'll start your journey. Opening the door, the first thing you notice is that your parents are standing there, smiles painted on their faces "Welcome back son" your father says you, giving you a pat on the shoulder. Your mother is literally crying in joy "We're so proud of you, you finally can become a trainer" she says, hugging you. You hug her back "By the way son, both me and your mother thought it was time" your dad says. You look at both your parent curiously, your mom smiles "That's right sweetie, we thought it was time for you..." "To get your starter pokemon!". As soon your father finishes his sentence, you shout in joy. You run and hug both of them, they hug you back, before moving out of the way. On the table behind them stands a pokeball. With the biggest smile ever, you reach out for it...

Present time

The last thing you remember is that you blacked put and ended up here in Ilex forest, just to be eaten by the legendary Celebi and then brought back to life, seeing Mew and Arceus and becoming Celebi's special other. And now you're here, rubbing the paws of this fox to remain alive. Suddenly a hand grabs you. You are moved towards Zoroark's face "Good job slave, you deserve five minutes of rest" she says. Sighing you sit down in her hand and start rubbing your sore arms. Five minutes pass and Zoroark...
1352112121112122112111.title: Get rubbing

13521121211121221121111.content:
You rest for a bit, sitting on the black, clawed paw, while Zoroark stares at you for some reason. She lets you rest for another minute, before declaring
"Come on human, time to get back to work, you rested long enough." saying those words, Zoroark places you down on the ground.

Then, the dark fox lies belly down, arms crossed beneath her muzzle.
"Climb on." she orders, extending one of her paws in front of you. You do as instructed and climb on the black, furry surface as she moves you on her mane.
"Now, please me." she orders, her paw retreating to her muzzle. She talks again.
"You have ten minutes, little one. Let's see what you can do." she says.

You rub the back of your head. How the heck are you supposed to please her now?! Not really knowing what to do, you kneel down and start petting the bloody red fur of Zoroark's mane. Which seems to work as she lets out a pleased sigh.
"That's good, keep going." she says, her eyes disappearing behind her eyelids. You sigh as you continue your work. This day doesn't seem to be getting any better. You just hope luck would turn to your side at some point.


Meanwhile, back in the forest, two certain mythical pokemon are flying around rather fast, trying to spot the dark fox that took Celebi's little human.
"I thought you knew where they were Celebi." Mew suddenly says. Celebi blushes. Telling the truth, she thought she knew where her newly found love and his host were, but the cave where she and Mew have been turned out to be the wrong place.


"Hey, feeling auras isn't my thing! And I really don't understand how little guy is alive. That Zoroark ripped him in two. I saw it. I saw the blood. I..." Celebi stops to bring her paws to her eyes, a couple tears falling down her cheeks. She can't bear to think about that scene again. It makes her suffer.

Understanding her friend's pain, Mew hugs her.
"It didn't happen for real, I bet it was just an illusion. That's why I can feel little guy, because he's alive. And we'll find him, no matter what." she says calmly, comforting Celebi.

The grass type sniffles, before nodding, a small smile forming on her lips.
"You're right, we'll find him." she agrees with Mew, who smiles brightly.
"Ready then?" she asks.
"Of course, let's go! ... But, you lead the way this time..." Celebi says. Mew laughs as she start resumes flying, Celebi following close.


"Grawr... Good job, human. Really. Keep up like this, and I might just reward you later." the dark fox growls in pleasure from beneath you. At least, your petting is pleasing her. ‘Just what's wrong with this day?’ you think, annoyed. Just two days ago you were a normal person, and now you're first bug-sized snack for a legendary pokemon, then a bug-sized pleasure slave for a Zoroark. How did you even got into this mess?

You rub until your arms get sore, in which point you stop petting.
"Hey!" comes the immediate protest from Zoroark.
"Keep going, you lazy human!" she exclaims.
"But my arms hurt!" you retort.
"Whoever said you have to use your arms? Show me your loyalty, go further!" she growls. You groan. What can you do?

Lacking good ideas, you simply decide to rub your whole body against Zoroark's fur, trying to please her.
"Better." she says, relaxing again as you throw yourself against the black landscape.
‘Will this day come to an end?’ you ask yourself.


"Alright, I think they're in there." a certain pink, legendary pokemon says, stopping her flight a few meters from a well hidden cave. Celebi stops a little further from Mew, and peeks into the cavern. Her paws travel to her mouth as she keeps herself from gasping.

"What?" Mew asks, her voice reducing to a whisper.
"I saw my little guy on top of that Zoroark... he's rubbing himself on her!" Celebi exclaims silently.
"That's... not so bad...?" Mew says, confused. Celebi facepalms.
"Mew," she begins.
"She's using him like a slave." she reveals to her confused friend.

Mew's eyes widen.
"Then, let's get in there and rescue little guy!" she states.
"It's not so simple. Zoroarks are tricky. They can create illusions. We need a plan." Celebi says.
"Right." Mew agrees.
"But what should we do?"
"I've got an idea..." Celebi says.


"Time's up, small one!" Zoroark says. You stop as her paw comes to pick you while she sits upright. She says you
"Not bad, not bad at all." a compliment. That's good.
"I wonder if you are good for other things too..." you don't like that phrase. Nor the grin on her face.

Then, a noise is heard. Rustling. And it comes from outside the cave.
"Stay here, human." Zoroark orders, placing you down, before getting up, walking towards the entrance of the cavern. She looks around, unaware of the invisible presence sneaking into the cave...


Mew carefully slides next to Zoroark. That is a delicate part of the plan. Using her ability to become invisible, she sneaks into the cave, while Celebi, hidden on the high trees of Ilex Forest, makes noise. And, as expected, Zoroark came out to check the source of the noise. Great. Slowly, Mew nears herself to the tiny human on the ground as she carefully picks him...

Suddenly, you are picked up by an invisible grasp. You try to talk, but something is pressed on your lips as Mew becomes visible, her paw keeping you silent. Your heart seems to melt in relief. Finally rescued. Mew carefully moves you or her head and waits...

"Hey!" an alerted and irritated voice shouts from behind her. Mew doesn't even turn around as Zoroark is hit by an attack coming from upwards, which is strong enough to send her face down on the ground.

Mew turns to face the dark vixen and flies over her, striking her with her tail, which is far more stronger than her stubby paws. That was totally unnecessary, but after kidnapping this new buddy of hers, this Zoroark deserved a few hits.

The vixen grunts as she stands back up, facing Mew angrily. And then, Celebi comes down from the protection of the trees. Zoroark quickly understands the situation. These two legendaries surely came to take back her slave and, judging from his tale, Celebi has a pretty good reason to do so.

Quickly calculating her chances of victory, Zoroark comes up that her best choice is to retreat. For now. And, before the two legendaries can attack again, she uses her signature night daze, momentarily blinding the two and disappearing.

"Hey! Where did she go?" Mew exclaims, recovering from the hit.
"She disappeared!" Celebi replies.
"Should we search for her?" the psychic type asks.
"No. For now, let's focus on important things." the time traveler says, snatching the tiny human from Mew's head.

Squealing, Celebi shoves you into her chest as she hugs you. You hug right back. If there was a moment in this day you were glad to see Celebi, it would probably be this.
"Aw!" Mew cheers from behind both of you.

"You can't even imagine how worried I was. I thought..." Celebi stops in mid sentence to shake off the thought, before planting a kiss on your cheek. Even though you aren't able to understand her, you get that she's happy to see you.
"Come on, let's go back home. You've got a lot to tell me, cutie." she then says, starting to float away, you safely held in her arms, Mew following.

You spend the next hour eating berries that Mew gathered for lunch earlier, while telling what you had to do in that cave. Then, after declaring you're stuffed, you wait for both pokemon to finish their meal.

Giving a satisfied sigh, Celebi picks you and places a paw on your stomach.
"You've got a filled tummy there. Are you tired?" she asks. You blink a few times, which, in universal body language, means ‘uh?’. Celebi looks at Mew, who rolls her sapphire eyes.
"Tired?" she asks you. You nod, yawning again in confirmation.

The two quietly make their way under a huge oak tree, which shields the three of you from the afternoon sun. Celebi lies you on her smooth belly, her paws wrapping around you like a grass blanket. Giving a third yawn, you decide to rest for a bit. And, soon, you pass out from relaxation.

You wake up several hours later. You notice the sun has disappeared, and the sky is starting to turn dark.
"Finally awake, sleepyhead?" someone chirps from upwards. You look up to see a certain green pokemon staring down at you with a smile.
"You took your time, buddy," Mew says with telepathy.
"We almost thought you were fainted!" she giggles. Celebi rolls her eyes.

You spend the successive hours chatting with the two... if a mix of incomprehensible words translated by Mew can be called 'chatting'. Yet, Mew didn't talk about the 'things' she talked about this morning.

Then, the two gather more berries to eat. You aren't really hungry, but, to avoid upsetting Celebi, you force yourself to eat.

By the time you're done eating, the moon fully rose up in the sky. After a while, the two legendaries declare that it's bedtime. Celebi picks you and lies you on her green belly again.
"Do I really have to sleep here?" you ask as she encloses you in a hug.
"Oh, hush. That's the comfiest place in all Ilex Forest!" she giggles.

Deciding to simply do as she wants, you lie your head on the soft, grassy skin.
"Good night you two. See you in the morning." Mew says, closing her eyes.
"Good night, Mew." Celebi says, before turning to you. She says you the same thing.
"Goodnight, my little guy." she says, ending the sentence with a peck.

Blushing furiously, you close your eyes, soon falling into a deep slumber...
13521121211121221121111.title: Orders you to get back to work

choices: Have Celebi and Mew bring you home.
135211212111212211211112.content:
You are soundly asleep on Celebi's belly, her paws still firmly wrapped around you, keeping you still. Too bad that, far away in dreamland, you don't notice a big, slim figure sneaking its way to the shrine on the nearby trees...

Leaping on yet another tree branch, a certain dark type vixen stops and looks downwards, in direction of the shrine dedicated to Celebi, where the forest's guardian herself, the other legendary and the tiny human are sleeping. Zoroark smirks. That will just aid her with her plan. With these thoughts, Zoroark proceeds with her plan.

You are still sleeping when you feel the grip on you fading for an instant, before a new one replaces it and lifts you. You open your eyes a little. You notice Celebi staring right down at you with a smile. Too tired to discuss of the reasons of her sudden awakening, you close your eyes back up, instantly falling asleep again, your head dropping into the grass type's belly.

With a smile, she starts carrying you away, leaving you unaware that the real Celebi is still snoring beneath the shrine.

With her sleeping 'captive' held in her illusionary, green paws, Zoroark, who has taken Celebi's semblances, makes her way to a distant, well hidden clearing.

Once there, ‘Celebi’ quietly sits near a tree and releases you on the ground.
"Sleep human, you'll have to work again tomorrow." the dark fox whispers, laying on a side, not dropping her illusion. If the human wakes up and notices the trick, he'd run away while she sleeps. Zoroark closes her eyes, and, slowly, the dark type starts snoozing.


Meanwhile, back to the shrine, Celebi keeps on sleeping, unaware that her little one had disappeared. At least, until her paw moves in her sleep, trying to hug you. And, as result, she ends grasping her own skin.

Slowly, Celebi's black eyelids open up. Instinctively, she looks over her belly, where her little guy is supposed to be sleeping.
"Bi?" the grass type asks herself upon noticing that her tiny human is no longer there. Both her paws rush to her mouth, keeping her from screaming. Her little one is gone. Alone. In a huge forest full of predators. Alone. In the middle of the night. Alone.

Quickly glancing at Mew, Celebi notices her heavily asleep. Like always. Not even giga impact would wake Mew up.

Sighing, the grass type gets up and starts floating in midair, silently venturing into the depths of Ilex Forest.

She flies for an hour or so before finally passing through a literal wall of plants, arriving to a small clearing. And what she sees hits her. Laying there, sleeping, is another Celebi. A counterpart from another timeline? What is she doing here?

Momentarily forgetting about you, Celebi flies over the other Celebi to touch her. But, as her paw gets near, the green figure disappears for a moment, before returning. But it was enough for Celebi to realize the truth...

"Bi!" she exclaims, waking both you and Zoroark. The dark type looks at the forest's deity pokemon, and so do you. Specifically, you're looking at both.
"Celebi... and Celebi? Time travel?" you ask them.

Celebi turns to you, shaking her head frenetically. She then points to Zoroark, then to herself, and shakes her head again.
"That's... not a Celebi?" you try, surprisingly getting a nod from the grass type.

Zoroark, who was being silent until now, gets up as we and imitates Celebi's movements. The two pokemon start arguing. You soon get sick of this situation.
"Stop!!" you yell. The two instantly go silent and look at you.
"Just prove me who's the real Celebi already!" you exclaim.

Celebi gives a smile. She practically already won. She starts glowing green, the plants around glowing of the same color, as many flowers start blooming around filling the nearby trees and bushes. That's something only she could do.

Your mind puts two and two together.
"... Zoroark?" you ask as the dark type drops her illusion with a growl.
"It's not over yet." she says, using night daze, disappearing like she did earlier. When you regain sight, you find yourself firmly wrapped in Celebi's hug.

Quietly, the grass type makes her way back to the shrine, where Mew is still sleeping, like nothing had happened. Celebi sits down at the feet of the shrine. And she notices you pondering something. She pokes you with her paw. You look up to her. She's staring down at you with a curious smile.
"You want to know what I'm thinking about?" she nods.

You take a deep breath.
"I just don't know, Celebi..." you start with a sorrowful voice.
"... About the love thing, I mean. I'm not even a pokemon, how can this work? We can't even communicate..." Celebi's smiles fades to a serious look.


You continue.
"...I'm so vulnerable at this size, that Zoroark already took me twice and, just yesterday, you at-" she presses her paw on your mouth, stopping you from talking.

She removes her paw, before pointing to you, then to the forest. Then, she cocks her head.
"You want to know if I want to run?" she nods.
"I don't know... I like being around you and Mew, i really do, but I'd also like returning home..." you admit.

At this point, Celebi points to herself, then to Mew, then to you, before hugging you.
"You're saying youand Mew will protect me from that Zoroark?" you ask. She nods her head.

Then, she points to you, then to her mouth, before shaking her head.
"You won't eat me anymore?" you ask. She nods again, before extending her open, free paw.

It suddenly hits you. She wants you to forgive her for eating you. Slowly, you place your minuscule hand in her tree sized paw. As slowly as you, her paw closes around it. Celebi smiles as she pulls you into a hug.

Just then, dawn's first lights enlighten the place. You both stay silent, your mind thinking about what to do and, judging from her look, hers is doing the same thing.

You're so focused that you don't notice a certain pink kitten starting to stir.
“Gold morning you two.” she greets cheerfully. You reply with a simple nod of your head, but Celebi looks at her.
"Mew," she says.
"I need your help." she states.

In a matter of minutes, you are settled on the ground, while the two legendaries sit down in front of you.
“Little guy, Celebi wants to talk, I'll translate for you.” Mew says telepathically. You nod.

Celebi starts talking, while Mew translates word by word.
“Little guy, if you want to return to your home it's perfectly fine with me. But, we're going to bring you there. And we'll stay with you there. I don't want to get separated from you. I need you. You can pick wether if you want to return home or stay here.” Mew translates.

"Really, Celebi? You want to stick with me if I pick to go home?" she nods. You turn to Mew.
"What about you, Mew? You're really willing to follow me home if I want to go there?" she nods as well.
“I'm with my best friends, why not?” she giggles.

Then, they both look at you seriously. And you get that the moment has came for you to choose, wether you want to get home or stay in the forest.

A big part of you wants to return home... even though the two legendaries intend to stay there with you. But another, smaller part wants to stay in the forest. What would your parents say if you return home with at the size of one inch tall, with two pokemon that are supposed to be a myth, and with one of them being your actual 'girlfriend'?

Ultimately, you take a decision...
135211212111212211211112.title: The night of illusions.

choices: She returns the cave safe and sound
Two familiar pokemon come out and stop her
13521121211121221121112.content:
"Come on you lazy slave, time to get back to work" Zoroark says "Now, I...." she is interrupted by her own stomach grumbling loudly, asking to be filled with food. Zoroark looks right at you as soon the sound ends. You stare at her, your eyes filled with mortal fear. With a smirk, Zoroark moves you closer to her mouth and opens it up. She dangles you over it. You close your eyes as Zoroark drops you. You expect to fall in the dark abyss of her mouth, but you are wrong. Instead, you fall on a soft surface and you hear the dark fox laughing hysterically. You slowly open your eyes and notice you are on Zoroark's hand "You should have seen your face!" she laughs. Pale and shaking you sit down on her hand, panting. Your whole life passed right before your eyes. Zoroark finally stops laughing "I already told you slave, I won't eat you as long you keep doing things for me. And if you ever protest..." she shuts her fangs closed, making sure to show her sharp teeth to you "Am I clear?" you nod vigorously as the Zoroark smirks "Now that's settled, my stomach is still asking for food, so it's hunting time. Consider your work done for now" she says. A thought crosses you mind "M-maybe... leave me here?" you attempt. If this fox goes hunt and leaves you here, you could have a chance to escape! But... what if Celebi and Mew find you? Well, that wouldn't be as bad as this. But, to your misfortune... "Do you think I'm that dumb slave? If I leave you alone, you'll run away. And, to show you just how dumb this was, what if a pokemon came here in my absence and ate you? Nope, the only one who'll eat you will be me if you keep trying to escape me. So you're coming with me" Zoroark says. You stare at her, your jaw wide open. This fox is smarter than you! Well, you at least had to try. Clenching you in her grasp, Zoroark makes her way out of the cave. Once outside, she makes a great jump and lands on a tree branch "I'll need my hands free to hunt so.." she says putting you in her mane. Like last time, you hang on for dear life as Zoroark jumps from branch to branch, each jump threatening to make you lose your balance.

Not too long passes that Zoroark spots her prey. An Ursaring. And a pretty chubby one too. She just hit the jackpot today. A slave and a hearty meal. It appears that the Ursaring is resting, sitting with its back against a tree. Silently making her way down, Zoroark lands behind the tree. She then hides in a bush and starts moving. The Ursaring notices the bushes rustling behind it and goes check what's making this noise. Meanwhile Zoroark is in the bushes right in front of him. Making sure that it's nothing, the Ursaring returns to its resting place, but Zoroark starts moving, making noise. As expected, the bear pokemon goes check once again, but as it gets closer the bush, Zoroark strikes him with her claws, piercing him and killing him on the hit. The Ursaring is dead before even crashing to the ground. Zoroark retreats her claws and comes out. Shaking the blood off her sharp fingers, she grabs the Ursaring by the legs and makes her way to her cave.
13521121211121221121112.title: Hunt time

135211212111212211211122.content:
Zoroark drags the dead pokemon to her cave, unknown that she is observed.

Up on the trees, two pokemon stare down at the dark fox, death glares in their eyes. One is light and dark green colored, the other is totally pink. Celebi and Mew, looking down, studying the fox, trying to come up with a plan to get her. Celebi wants revenge for getting you away from her. Whoever tries to steal you from her is unforgivable. Mew just wants to help her friends.

The two pokemon wait for Zoroark to be completely beneath them "Now?" Mew looks up "Now" Celebi replies. Turning invisible, the two pokemon fly down the tree. Zoroark jeeps dragging the chubby, dead bear, stopping to wipe some sweat from her face "Man, this Ursaring is too fat!" she exclaims. In her mane, you are living pure hell. It's hot in here and Zoroark is sweating, making her fur slick. You have to hold on with all your might to not fall to your very probably death. Every step that the fox makes threatens to make you lose your grasp, each time your heart ends up skipping a beat. Suddenly, you hear Zoroark's scream.

Zoroark looks around her. Something just hit her in the stomach. Weird, nobody is here. Suddenly, another attack hits her in the side. Yelling in pain, she starts to look around frantically "Who's there!? Come out if you have the guts!" she yells. Just as she says this, she's tackled down, Celebi and Mew come into view. Celebi holds her down, a glare in her eyes "We'll ask just once. Where is MY little guy?" she asks in an angry yet incredibly calm tone "Hmhp! Not telling you!" Zoroark retorts, trying to slip aways, but the two pokemon are too strong for her "If you don't tell me right now, death will be the last of your problems" Celebi says. She always and still does hate threatening others as she is known as one of the kindest legendaries. But now, the life of her tiny guy is threatened, and she will do everything she can to get you back to her. Zoroark snorts and looks away. Groaning, Celebi glows green "You asked for it" she says, firing leaf storm. Zoroark is hit badly. Mew, who was being silent the whole time, uses aura sphere. Hit by a fighting, and so super effective move, she falls down.

As soon Zoroark crashes to the ground, you lose your grip. Sighing, you sit down in her fur, relieved that you don't have to hang on anymore, when "Bi cele bi!". Celebi is here? Maybe she's searching you! Slowly, you stand up and poke your head out of the dark fox's mane. Mew and Celebi come into view "Celebi?" you call out. As soon she hears your voice, the grass legendary stops glaring and looks in your direction. The biggest smile she has ever has spreads all over her face as she reaches down for you.

Closing you in a tight grasp, Celebi brings you to her chest and closes your body in a hug "Little guy! Are you alright? I missed you so much! But now you're back with me, and I'm not letting you go ever again. In fact, you will never go anywhere without me from now on!" Celebi says, almost about to cry from joy. Though you can't understand a single word, to get that she's euphoric to have you back. Smiling a little, you hug her back, relieved that this nightmare is over "Awwww, aren't you two so precious" Mew giggles, while flying to hug the both of you.

Zoroark stares at the scene, disgusted. How could a pokemon, and plus a legendary one, fall for a human? That's just impossible. Snorting, Zoroark closes her eyes. She had been beaten enough. She has to rest "Be sure that I'll have my revenge slave" she whispers before fainting.

The two pokemon squeeze you in their hug for about two minutes before Mew pulls off; Celebi softens her grip on you. She does kiss your cheek though. Rubbing the back of your head, you turn to Mew "Um, what now?" you ask "Oh right. Well, I think it's time for lunch" she says "Come on Celebi, a big bunch of berries is waiting for us!" Mew exclaims excitedly. Celebi's stomach growls at 'berries', sending shivers down your back. Mew giggles "Come on!" .

After a bit of flying, you reach the sanctuary. You notice multiple Rattata's and Weedle's fainted on the ground, a lot of berries near them. Celebi looks at Mew "Oh right, I forgot. I put a barrier on the berries, I didn't want to lose lunch!" Mew giggles. Celebi giggles as well. They both sit down and pick the berries with psychic, levitating them closer. Setting three berries in front of you and the rest in front of them, they start to eat "Isn't this a lot to me?" you ask "We have to celebrate out love and reunion!" Celebi says with her mouth full "She says you have to celebrate your love and reunion" Mew explains. You blush and start to eat as well.

After eating more than she has never ate before, Celebi lies down "That was great! Right little one?" she asks. You are literally about to blow up. You ate too much. Celebi snatches you from the ground and lies you on her belly, you listen to the food being digested in there, glad that you aren't part of it again. Mew lies down next to Celebi "You ate a lot! When was last time you actually had a meal?" she asks. Celebi looks at her "Can you keep a secret?"

"So you're saying that you actually ATE your boyfriend and then you used Time Travel to bring him back?" Mew asks. Celebi nods "Please don't think of me as a monster" she says "I don't" Mew replies "Really?" "Celebi, I understand that what you have done was a only chance in life, and I understand that you felt sorry for that. So no problem" Mew says. Celebi smiles "Thanks a lot Mew. You are a true friend" she says. Mew blushes, though it's hard to notice "Don't even say that. However, I want to know something." "What?" "Is he tasty?" she asks "Yeah, he is really tasty, I couldn't believe it last night" Celebi admits "If that's so... could I try?" Mew asks "What?!" "Without swallowing of course, I just want to taste him". Celebi thinks for a few moments "You won't swallow?" she asks "Promise" "If you say so, alright then..." Celebi says, reclutantly handing you to Mew. You stare into her blue eyes for a second "Uhhhhh, what now?" you ask "Don't worry" she says in your head. Before you can ask what she means, she drops you in her mouth "Ahhhh... Mew let me out please!!!" you yell "You're right, he's tasty!" Mew beams to Celebi. The grass pokemon smiles, but in her mind she's praying Arceus that Mew won't actually swallow you by accident. Mew sloshes you in her mouth for a bit, before...
135211212111212211211122.title: Rescued

choices: Mew manages to get you out!
1352112121112122112111221.content:
Mew keeps sloshing you in her mouth, a sweating Celebi staring at her. You are moved back and forth into the cavernous mouth, the huge red muscle that is Mew's tongue gets you near her throat "Mew! Don't do this please!!!" you scream in horror. Too bad that Mew is in ecstasy right now, so she can't hear you. Your taste is incredible! Mew has never eat a human in her life, but your taste is absolutely delicious! No wonder that Celebi ate you last night. Mew is so lost in her thoughts that she doesn't notice that you are dangerously close to her throat. You close your eyes, waiting for the inevitable. Which obviously happens *Gulp* Mew swallows you. You fall in the tight yet soft tube of her esophagus, the walls squeezing you from head to toe. Mew licks her lips satisfied "Man, was he tasty!" she exclaims. Celebi's stare goes from a worried one to a horrified one "W-wait 'was'? W-what do you mean?" she asks, praying Arceus that she didn't swallowed her little guy "Oh, I swallowed him" Mew says, just noticing what she just said. She assumes her best worried expression "Oops" she says. Celebi stares at her, a mix of worry and anger in her eyes. The only things that keeps her from fainting is probably the hug worry for you. She doesn't know what to think. Right now her mind is yelling her to hit Mew hard until she spits you out. But Celebi doesn't. The only thing she does is drop to the ground and cry, hard.

You are dropped in a large, fleshy chamber thst Mew's stomach. You land in a pool of acid. Since you were in Celebi's stomach just last night, you perfectly know what happens if you don't get out of here fast. So you start struggling, trying to get a hold to one of the slippery walls "Mew! Let me out!" you yell at top of your lungs, while desperately trying to climb the walls of the stomach. But every progress you make, you just end slipping and falling back into the pool.

Mew stares at Celebi, sadly. She always hated to see her best friend sad, but now she isn't sad - she is desperate. Her blue eyes got red and puffy from all the crying she had been doing, tears are pouring down her cheeks "My little guy! My innocent, poor little guy is gone!" she cries. Mew flies next to her "Celebi calm down" she says, but Celebi ignores her. The sadness from losing you overwhelms her, she can't help but cry. She wants to scream, she wants to hurt Mew. But she can't do none of that. Even though Mew ate her boyfriend, Celebi would never hurt her, not at any cost at all.

Mew feels struggling in her belly and assumes her tiny friend is trying to get out, without making any results. She has to admit, she's starting to worry about you as well. But she can't help it. She has a very careless nature, it's not her fault. But she can't bear the sight of Celebi crying, so she has to try and get you out of her stomach. Focusing her psychic powers, she focuses on the struggles in her stomach and uses psychic...
1352112121112122112111221.title: Swallowing you!

choices: Zoroark shows back up! And she's not alone...
13521121211121221121112211.content:
Still trapped in Mew's stomach, you climb on a piece of berry and try to think a way out of here. There must be one. Well, there is one, but you really don't want to take the 'back door'. Plus you're not even sure if you can reach it without being digested. So you reject the idea. You already tried to climb back up, but the slippery walls just won't let you. Your only hope is that Mew manages to throw you up. Disgusting, but it's the only way to exit through the mouth. Luckily for you, Mew has other plans.

Focusing on the tiny presence inside her, Mew uses psychic. Back in her stomach, a blue aura envelops as you are lifted from the berry you're on. Of course! You totally forgot that Mew is a psychic type! "Mew you're a genius!" you yell from inside her. She giggles in your head "Why thank you. Now, let me focus so I can get you out. A short time later, you find yourself being lifted in the esophagus, back in the throat and into Mew's mouth. Mew loses her psychic grip on you and you're dropped on her tongue. She then opens her mouth and lets you slide right in her short, pink paws. As soon you land, she hugs you; her pink fur is like an actual pillow, its softness and warmth drying you from the digestive juices "Welcome back" Mew tells in your mind. You smile briefly, when something catches your attention. You see Celebi crying with her head on the ground, so she hasn't seen you yet. You suddenly feel sad. Be it that you never could bear the sight of people crying, or be the fact that you are now stuck with Celebi for the rest of your life, you look to Mew "Mew, can you put me down please?". Mew looks at you, then to Celebi and smiles "Sure" she says, lowering you to the ground "You'll be sure more successful than me at comforting her about 'your loss' " she giggles, winking.

You make your way towards the crying legendary. Once you reach her face, you start to pet her titanic cheek "I'm here Celebi, don't cry anymore" you say softly. As soon the legendary hears your voice, she looks up, tears still pouring down her cheeks, and looks in your direction; you notice that her eyes are completely red and puffy. She blinks a few times to make sure you're not some kind of mirage created by her suffering brain. Nope, you're really in front of her, petting her cheek. In a moment, you are launched upwards and land in Celebi's open hands. She closes you in a hug, and a tight one too. Even though your organs are about to explode from the pressure, you manage to smile. Celebi stands up and a her mouth curls in a smile as tears start falling from her eyes again, though these ones are tears of joy "Little guy! You're back! I'm so happy! I was so worried that I could have lost you forever that... I don't even want to think about what I could have done" she says. As always, you can't understand, so you just return the hug "I'm happy to see you too Celebi" you say "But can you release me now? I'm about to die from the lack of oxygen". Celebi instantly softens her grip on you and turns to Mew "Mew, I don't know how did you manage to get him back, but I'll be eternally grateful" she says. Mew blushes "Don't even say that, I did the crime after all. Tell you what, I should be ashamed. None of this would have happened if I hadn't been so careless" she says "I forgive you. All that matters is that my little guy is back with me. And he'll be for a loooooooong time" Celebi giggles, making Mew giggle as well.

You are still plucked in Celebi's grasp. You notice the two pokemon giggling. Smiling, a thought crosses your mind. You never got to get to know to Mew as you planned back at the Tree. So you clear your throat "Mew?" "Yes little one?" she asks looking at you "Could I ask you a few questions?"
13521121211121221121112211.title: Mew manages to get you out!

choices: She drops you in and swallows. And no illusions this time.
Showing an incredible willpower, Celebi gets back up.
135211212111212211211122112.content:
"Sure, what is it?" Mew asks. You are about to reply, when the sound of a bush rustling is heard. You turn your head as a very familiar pokemon comes into view. Just the sight of it makes you cower in fear "No! Not again!" you yell. Zoroark grins evilly, happy that she manages to terrorize you with her bare form. Celebi, on the other hand, sends a glare that would make even the bravest of all pokemon flee "You again?" she says angrily "What's the matter? Angry that I took your little bug for myself last time? Well bad news, it's gonna happen again" Zoroark says mockingly "Like you could. We're two against one, you have no chance" Celebi retorts "That's what you think" the dark fox replies. In fact, two other pokemon come out from the same bush. A Houndoom and a Drapion. They both smirk at your sight "You're after them? They look pretty weak" the male Drapion says "Yeah, we'll do this in no time" the female Houndoom confirms "You two idiots better not lower your guard. Those two are stronger than they look. Not for nothing they're legendaries, you know" Zoroark tells them, with a disinterested voice. Clearly, she doesn't care if the two live or die in the battle, she just cares about getting her slave back. And maybe getting a payback on the two psychic legendaries for what they did earlier. Yeah. She will snatch you from that green pokemon and swallow you in front of her. Maybe she will bring you back later. Or maybe she will have you pass through the back door, not her problem if you are digested. These thoughts make the fox smile. You look into her blue eyes, you see all of her cruelty in them. So you fearfully hug Celebi's skin. The grass type legendary closes you in a hug, she wants to protect you. She HAS to protect you. And she's determined to do it, no matter what. Zoroark will not take her little guy again.

Houndoom is the first to attack, firing dark pulse at Mew. Mew dodges and hits with aura sphere. Houndoom, showing and incredible speed, dodges and uses flamethrower, this time aiming to Celebi. Celebi dodges, but she then sees a sludge bomb coming in her direction, fast. She has no time to dodge, so she turns around, the attack hits her back. Gritting her teeth, Celebi uses ancient power on Houndoom. She dodges a few rocks, but one of them hits the target. Houndoom falls to the ground, while Mew uses aura sphere, hitting her and causing a small explosion. When the smoke fades, Houndoom is seen fainted on the ground. Drapion roars and tries to use poison fang, but Mew fires another aura sphere, while Celebi uses energy ball. Both attacks collide with Drapion's poisonous fangs, causing a big explosion. That is enough to knock him out "Now for their leader" Celebi says, turning to Zoroark, surprised to notice she's no longer there "Wha-" Mew tries to say, but she's hit in the back by a super effective night slash. Celebi gasps as a second night slash hits her as well. She falls to the ground. Luckily for you, she falls on her back, avoiding to crush you under her body. You stare in horror as Zoroark comes into view "You got beaten by the same trick I uses last time. The good ol' methods never fail" Zoroark states as she reaches down for you. Moving Celebi's arms out of the way, she picks you and dangles you over her month "Ready slave?" she asks, keeping her mouth wide open like she did earlier. You're pretty sure she will swallow this time. You're shaking with fear, a great fear that blocks your body and shuts your mouth closed.

Celebi stares at the scene. Mew is on the ground next to her, fainted. The fox is about to drop her little guy and she can't do anything about it. She feels so weak right now. Her mind is screaming her to get up, to fight the cruel fox until the very end. Zoroark stares down at the legendary. She's looking at you, perfect "See ya later slave. Or maybe not" Zoroark laughs as she lowers you in her mouth...
135211212111212211211122112.title: Zoroark shows back up! And she's not alone...

choices: You and Mew manage to find the herbs to heal Celebi
Another pokemon predator attacks, leaving you and Mew to protect Celebi
1352112121112122112111221122.content:
Zoroark looks at Celebi one more time, smirking evilly "Say goodbye to your precious lover" she says, before turning her attention back to you. She once again dangles you over her mouth, making sure you see her sharp fangs, making your fear grow more. The fox lowers you, but suddenly a energy ball hits her. She steps back and loses her grip on you. You fall to the ground, but you are saved from your very probably death by Celebi, who hardly stands up. She squeezes you in a protective manner "As I said, you won't get my little guy!" Celebi yells, putting you on her head; she would need both of her hands to fight. Zoroark growls frustrated as she uses night daze. Celebi is hit by the attack, which causes and explosion. The grass type manages to hang on and hits with ancient power. The rocks hit Zoroark, while Celebi uses energy ball repeatedly, attacking out of rage. Everything that Zoroark did to her... everything that Zoroark did to her little guy... she has to pay! These are Celebi's thoughts as she fires energy balls in rapid succession. You notice that her body is shaking in frenzied manner.

When Celebi finally stops her frenetic attack, Zoroark is on the ground, barely alive from all the hits she received. Celebi gently puts you on the ground. You still can't believe this gentle and sweet pokemon can turn into such fighter when she is backed up against the wall. Celebi gets near Zoroark and glows green, a leaf storm attack forming "You will never bother us again!" she yells exasperated. Zoroark closes her eyes, awaiting for her doom. Celebi readies herself to fire, but she looks back at you. Mew has just woken up, and she's staring st the scene shocked. Celebi momentarily stops her attack. If she kills the cruel fox, her friend would probably think of her as the cruel monster she's not. And her little guy would probably be scared of her. And Celebi doesn't want any of that. So she turns back to Zoroark "You're lucky. The only thing that stops me from killing you is the fact that I'm not a killer like you. So I'll let you live. But you're not bothering me or anyone anymore" Celebi says with an unusual poisonous yet extremely calm voice. The dark fox looks up, a smirk on her face "What do you mean?
