If you let me live, I'll heal up and hunt you down. So I'll probably bother you again" "No you're not" "What makes you think that?" Zoroark asks "Well... it's the fact that I'm... I'm banishing you from this time!!!" Celebi yells, glowing green.

It all happens really fast. A green portal appears behind Zoroark. Celebi quickly shoves her in with all her might. Zoroark tries to hold onto the ground, but she is sucked in the portal, which disappears just after. Celebi drops on the ground. Mew snatches you from the ground and flies to her friend "Celebi?" she calls "It's over. She's gone" the grass legendary pants "What did you do to that Zoroark?" Mew asks "Simple. I sent her back in the past. She won't bother us anymore" Celebi states. You can't understand a word as usual, so you look at Mew "Mew? What happened to Zoroark?" you ask "Celebi sent her back in time. Speaking of which, where did you send her, Celebi? Or maybe 'when did you send her' is more accurate" Mew asks. But she gets no reply. Celebi fainted from both the wounds and the tiredness "Looks like she fell asleep" Mew giggles. But you notice her body full of scratches and bruises "Mew, help me. Celebi is badly bruised. We have to heal her" you say. Mew nods "How can I help?" "Well, can you use heal pulse? Then, I'll need help to find some medical herbs" you say. Mew nods again and uses heal pulse on her fainted friend, healing part of her bruises "Perfect. Now for the herbs...
1352112121112122112111221122.title: Celebi's last resort

13521121211121221121112211221.content:
"According to what I learned from school, there should be some herbs with medical effects around here" you say. Mew nods her head "Yes, you're right. I came here a few times and once Celebi showed me some of the herbs you are talking about" Mew states "Really? Then do you know where can we find them?". Mew shakes her head "Well, no, but I know what they look like, so it'll be easier to find them". You nod as Mew extends a paw "Hop on little guy, let's give a look around here" she says. Nodding, you hop on her paw and sit down, while Mew starts flying.

Not too much passes before Mew spots a weird shaped herb "There it is" she says picking it up with her free paw "Glad I'm not Celebi right now. These herbs are bitter!" Mew sticks her tongue out in disgust "They may be bitter, but they can heal you for good" you state "Yeah yeah, as you say smarty pants, did you ever tried one?" Mew asks. You give a little of a blush "Well no...". Mew giggles "Just kidding little guy" she says pulling you in a hug. Blushing even more you clear your throat "Le- let's find a sitrus berry too, just to be sure" you say, getting a nod from Mew. The cat pokemon looks up and spots the berry, which is pulled by psychic and floats to Mew "Here we go! Now let's get to Celebi" she says.

Mew has been flying silently for a while, so you take the opportunity "Hey Mew?" "Mh?" "Remember earlier when I asked you to answer a few questions?" you ask "Yeah?" "Could you do it now?" "Sure, go ahead and ask" she says "Well, first, I wanted to know what do you do when you're all alone at the Tree" you ask. Like last time, a blush appears on the pink pokemon's face "Well, I do things..." she replies, exactly like last time, but now no Celebi to interrupt you "What things?" you ask "W-Well, you see, there are some toys I brought to the Tree, I play with them" Mew lies sheepishly. The little guy mustn't know that one particular thing yet. Maybe when the two of you are closer friend. She has to be sure that he won't tell anyone first. The truth is that when she is all alone in the three, she can't help but fantasying about how great falling in love and mating would be. Some of her legendary friends did it, some of them fell in love and mated. Mew and Celebi are different. Both never fell in love, and both are still virgin. Well, Celebi is in love now, and with the tiny human Mew is holding right now, so the cat pokemon is now one of the few legendaries without a boyfriend. That's why she has these thoughts when she's all alone, and she can't deny that she likes it "Mew?" a voice snaps her back to reality. Looking down she notices the tiny human staring at her worriedly "Yes? What is it?" she asks "Mew, I asked you what do you if toys bore you out" you say "What happened?" "Oh, nothing important. I was just thinking. However, when toys bore me, I leave the Tree and search for something funny to do" Mew explains "And you like doing something in particular?" "Having fun" "That apart?" you insist "Playing" Mew replies "Nothing else?" you ask "I also like eating. A lot. And I like taking naps. That's practically all I do when I don't play" Mew says giggling "And you can learn every pokemon move?" you ask. Mew nods "Yes, I can. And that's quite handy" she states "That's cool" you say "You can say that" Mew giggles.

A while passes before you two get back to Celebi. Luckily, she is still where she was before, still fainted. Mew brings you in front of her and puts you on the ground "What do I do now?" Mew asks "Squeeze that herb" you say. Mew squeezes the herb until it pops and a white liquid comes out of it; it splashes on Celebi's body. You hardly climb on her body and start rubbing the liquid on her bruises. In her sleep, Celebi moans softly. Mew giggles "Aren't you so romantic, helping your girl in this hard moment" she says between giggles. You blush wildly "It's not like that. I just can't bear the sight of hurt people and pokemon, that's all" you say "Yeah sure, admit it! You like Celebi back!" Mew giggles louder "Fine I do like her. At least a little" you admit "Isn't that love?". You are practically as red as pepper now "N-no! Listen, I know Celebi loves me, I accepted it as I accept my new life, but I think it'll take some time for me to completely fall for her. We met just last night, and she ate me, then she brought me back and I learned about her love for me earlier today, and it was Arceus who told me. So everything it's kind of sudden, but I accept it. It'll just take time for me to fall in love with Celebi, okay? I can't deny I like her though" you say. Mew nods, a smile still on her face. You resume your rubbing when "Bi cele bi?" a faint voice is heard. You look up and see Celebi staring down at you, smiling "You said you like me?" she asks. You don't understand a word, but you get that she was listening to the conversation. Your blush grows wider as two green hands reach for you and bring you to Celebi's face. She nuzzles you "You're so sweet, taking care of me" she says weakly. Clearly she's not fully healed yet. Celebi continues "I heard everything. You're so cute, accepting your new life with me. And take as much time as you want, I don't mind" she says, puckering her lips and kissing your cheek "Uhhhh... Mew?" you look to the pink pokemon "She heard everything; you can take as much time as you want to fall in love with her" Mew explains. Your face is about to explode from the embarrassment you are feeling right now. Turning back to Celebi, you notice she fell asleep again, a smile on her face and you grasped in her grassy arms. Slowly, you slide out of her grip and turn to Mew "Mew, feed her the berry. She's still weak" you say. Mew nods as a psychic force opens the grass legendary's mouth. Mew moves the berry towards it and makes Celebi close her mouth once the berry enters the dark cave that was the cause of your death just last night. Celebi instinctively swallows in her sleep. You sigh and sit down on the ground, Mew sitting next to you "Well, it's just 6 PM. Do you want to do something while we wait for Celebi to wake up?" you ask "Well yes, I say, let's...
13521121211121221121112211221.title: Healing Celebi

choices: A three clawed paw, that you recognize as a Weavile's, steps in front of you
135211212111212211211122112211.content:
"Let's play!" Mew shouts with glee "I'm not sure..." you say "Aw come on, it'll be ton of fun!"
"Well..."
"Please" Mew says with pleading eyes "Okay fine!" you shout. Suddenly, you are lifted by a psychic force and you are brought to Mew's open arms, and pressed into her pillowy pink fur. She closes you in a hug "Thank you!" she beams
"*Sigh* you're welcome. What are we playing?"
"What about hide and seek?"
"Fine by me" you reply "Then go hide! You have until ten to hide. And if you manage to touch that log-" Mew points to the log where Celebi is sleeping "-You win". You nod as Mew turns around "One... two..." before she reaches tree, you dash to a nearby bush and hide in it "Ten! I'm coming little guy!" you hear Mew shouting.

Mew searches for you for a while, she checks in possible hiding place but the bush you're hiding. She's getting more and more excited from the game, the little guy I good at it. Mew looks around and spots the bush you're in. Giggling, approaches your hiding spot.

You poke your head out of the bush, and you see Mew approaching. Luckily, she doesn't seem to have seen you yet. So you retreat in the bush. Shortly after a pink object, that you recognize as Mew's tail, enters "Little guy? Where are you?" comes her voice. You stay as still as possible, while the tail retreats. You sigh in relief. But suddenly the leaves glow blue and they move apart, letting Mew come into view "Found you!" she shouts excitedly. Without even thinking, you make a dash for it.

You run faster than you ever had, a laughing Mew behind you "You're mine!" she yells
"Not yet!" you yell back, laughing as well. You reach Celebi's sleeping body and jump towards the log...
135211212111212211211122112211.title: Let's play!

choices: Wait... is that a Mandibuzz? And it's... it's coming your way!!!
1352112121112122112111221122111.content:
You jump in the log's way "I can't let this end yet! This is too fun!" Mew giggles, extending her tail towards you. For a second, you think you won't do it. But you're wrong. In fact the reassuring feeling of the wood under your palm makes you smile.

"I won!" you yell, while Mew simply giggles "You sure have little guy!" she replies, her voice giggling in your head, as her long, pink tail makes its way under your chin, tickling you, making you laugh
"You won what?" a third voice asks curiously. Well, to you is just a "Le bi?", but you understand perfectly who spoke.

Turning around, you see Celebi fully awake and, it appears, fully healed. She's staring down at you with a curious smile "Glad to see you awake Celebi. Are you feeling fine?" you ask, getting an eager nod from the green pokemon "Thanks to both of you! I owe you so much right now!" Celebi beams, standing up. She then hugs Mew, who hugs her back. Then Celebi breaks the hug and picks you up. She presses you into her green skin, before lowering her head and pecking your cheek "Hey no fair! I got no kisses" Mew giggles, sending her friend into laughs as well, while you rub your head sheepishly.

"What were you doing while I was sleeping?" Celebi asks "Oh, really nothing. Just playing hide and seek" comes Mew's reply. Celebi's expression drops a bit "Without me? You meanies!" she says, pouting. Mew simply giggles "Well, it isn't like we can't fix that"
"What do you mean?"
"What else could I mean? Let's play!" Mew beams. Celebi's smile returns "Sounds good"
"Great! You two have the first round!" Mew replies, turning around. You don't understand anything, but due the fact Mew just turned around, you assume you're going to play again. And you have to hide... with Celebi. The thought of what she could do if she's all alone with you makes you gulp.

You play hide and seek for many hours. Surprisingly enough, Celebi didn't do anything weird when you got rounds together. But eventually the sun sets, the afternoon fading to make place for the night. And a heavy yawn from Mew declares the game ended. After a quick dinner made out of berries - seriously, you'll have to find something else to eat apart from berries, you can't just always eat them - the two pokemon decide to go to sleep. So both fly up to a tree branch and lay down. You are about to lay down as well, but Celebi's hand stops you. Looking at her, you see she's pointing to her chest, to the point where both shades of green meet. You sigh. If there's a positive side of this weird day, is probably the fact that you won't sleep on the 'cold ground'. So you let Celebi move you to her chest and put her hands around you like a blanket "Well aren't you cute" Mew giggles loudly. You ignore her, you don't want to feel more embarrassed than you already are. So you relax back and try to fall asleep.
1352112121112122112111221122111.title: You touch the log

choices: Sort of. Might be worth to stick with this Weavile for a while.
"It's all just a misunderstanding, can you bring me back?"
1352112121112122112111221122112.content:
Aside from the shrine dedicated to a certain mythical time-traveling Pokémon, Ilex Forest was also famous for its nightlife. The wide assortment of weak yet delicious Pokémon who spent the dark hours of the day sleeping meant that nocturnal predators never went hungry. Some would consider it unsporting to gouge and feast upon a sleeping prey - Clearly starvation is merely a theoretical concept to these people.

It's not as if being a creature of the night didn't come with drawbacks. Daytime, for one. A quick snooze can turn even the most skillful predator into a trampled mess if they pick the wrong location. This particular Weavile had spent the night on an unsuccessful hunt (had there been some kind of commotion around these parts? Not one Pokemon was sleeping!) and been forced to stretch out the hours until dawn broke. Yawning, stumbling, hungry, she walked aimlessly around the forest looking for a place to hide and wait for the sun to piss off.

Eager to reach Celebi, you hastily leap up and grab a hold of her foot. Being of diminished stature, everything looks really strange to you so you didn't even realize you weren't scaling the roots of a really odd shrub until it suddenly moved. The slick surface of the clawed toes made hanging on impossible as you fell back on the ground with a painful thud.

"Hmm?" the Weavile exclaimed drowsily. You stare up at the ginormous Pokémon who looked back at you with hazy, unfocused eyes. She didn't even notice Mew (Flying through the air didn't make much noise after all) who quickly stopped herself. Wondering if maybe you could sneak off you start to slowly move backwards, but the Weavile bends over and reaches down towards you. You try to run but even with her slow, lumbering movement, this Pokémon is just way to big and easily snatches you up in her clawed hand.

Mew's mind was racing. Another Dark-type. With claws. Near a vulnerable Celebi. With claws. Picking up her little human. With claws. Having made a quick assessment of the situation, she held up her hand in the air.

"Let him go!" she shouted, startling the Weavile who quickly looked up at her. Mew focused her powers into the tip of her fingers and let a lick of fire ignite, and even though the Weavile was still in a bit of a daze the sight made her heart race.

"L-Let who go?" the Weavile stammered fearfully as you repeatedly punch her metallic claws to gain her attention, a completely fruitless effort since you weren't the one threatening her life at the moment.

"Now! Last warning!" Mew exclaimed in a panic, remembering how quickly Zoroark had been able to steal you away. She wasn't about to let that happen again and quickly sent out a focus blast towards the Weavile's legs in an effort to incapacitate her.

"Ahh!" the Weavile screamed as she jumped up, just barely avoiding the attack as the blast struck the ground and made a decent. Looking at the furious pink legendary, she did what any good predator would during the day and ran like hell.

"Stop!" you shout while being thrown to and fro by the giant Pokémon as she zipped around trees and over rocks as the area just behind her filled up with fiery explosions. Despite all this tumult, the giant Pokémon finally realized she was holding something and looked down at you.

"What the hell!?" she yelled with confusion as she started to shake her hand back and forth, "Get off me!"

Normally someone of your size would have responded by making a graceful flight before becoming paste on the trunk of a nearby tree, but hours of hanging onto a Celebi moving through the skies at super-sonic speed had hardened your will to live and let you cling on like the most stubborn tick that ever existed.

"P-Put me down carefully!" you try to shout down the tornado as more explosions roared around you. You were getting pretty tired of all these massive Pokémon treating your safety so callously, what did Mew think would happen if the dark-type you were holding on to suddenly caught fire?

"Do you think I have time for that!?" the Weavile replied agitated, not used to bugs talking back to her, "Make her stop!"

"Do you think I can!?" you scream, "She's going to blow us both up!"

This hectic chase had left the Weavile fully awake, and her mind finally began to put two and two together.

"What, you're being cased too!?" she asked with panic and a bit of concern, though mostly panic, "Alright, hold on!"

Most good chase scenes end by jumping down a waterfall or across a giant chasm. As neither of these would even slow Mew down, the Weavile instead opted for the more mundane method of changing direction and quickly zig-zagging between the trees until the fearsome legendary wasn't on their trail anymore.

"Haah... haah..." the Weavile panted before suddenly remembering that you were there, "Looks like we made it. Are you OK?"

You look at her with surprise and then examine yourself. You were bleeding. Not profusely but her sharp claw had cut up part of your left arm during the commotion.

"Hehe, whoops," she snickers as she notices your wound and the startled look on your face, "Well at least you didn't get cut in half or anything."

You didn't quite know how to respond, everything had happened too quickly. This Weavile had snatched you away from the legendaries, but unlike Zoroark her intent didn't seem malicious. Almost like this whole thing had been a big accident. She squints at you for a moment before putting you down on the ground and crouching over your tiny form.

"By the way, you're really small," she states bluntly while holding a clawed hand next to you in order to measure you up, "Why."

"That's, uh..." you stammer. Being honest hadn't done much to improve your situation in the past, so you figured this was a good opportunity to change that.

"I ate a shrunken creature. And somehow that made me shrink down too," you lie, "I think it's some kind of virus."

"Huh. How contagious?" the Weavile asked as she slowly retracted her claw.

"That pink Pokémon used to be like 50ft tall before I met her," you joke. She looks worried for a few seconds before starting to snicker again.

"Yeah, right. That really was the legendary Mew, wasn't it?" she continues with her questions, "Did she have any reason for trying to kill you or is that just how she normally greets people?"

"Well..."
1352112121112122112111221122112.title: A victim of Weavile

choices: Better safe than sorry, stick with the Weavile!
It's your opportunity! Go back to Celebi and Mew and hope they'll protect you!
13521121211121221121112211221121.content:
"Well... Sort of..." you lie. Deciding that telling the Weavile the truth would probably end up with you being her snack, you decide to stick with your lie. At least until either Mew and Celebi rescue you - again - or the Weavile finds out that you've been lying, in which case you'll be probably very sorry.

A growl of your captress' stomach confirms your decision to lie.
"Sorry, it appears I'm really hungry. And tired. I haven't been eating or sleeping since last night. Boy, I need to sleep." the Weavile yawns.
"Maybe that cave over there will solve your problem," you say, pointing to a small cave in the forest.

You decided that maybe, if you become friends with this Weavile, she won't hurt you - or worse - if she finds out the truth.

Weavile seems to agree with you. Without answering, she roughly grans you, though careful to not slash you to pieces with her claws, and makes her way to the cave.

Once in the rocky surroundings of the cave, Weavile deposits you on the ground and lies down.
Giving one last yawn, the dark pokemon falls asleep.

As you watch her sleep, an idea crosses your mind. She's dead asleep, and this makes you realize two things: one, she was really tired, two you have the opportunity to escape and go back to Mew and Celebi right now.

But... if you run away... Weavile will probably realized you lied to her and would most probably hunt you down. Another growl of her stomach makes you shiver, and it also makes you remember that she's currently very hungry, so her first thought when she wakes up will surely be about food. And if you run away, you'll probably be her dinner.

But, then again, if you manage to get back to Mew and Celebi, they can protect you, right? They're legendaries, and aren't legendaries supposed to be the strongest pokemon ever? Memories about the earlier fight between Celebi and Zoroark - with the not-easy victory of Celebi - cross your mind.

Yeah, Celebi will definitely give Weavile a fight to protect you. Plus Mew will surely fight alongside her. That if you decide to run and get back to them. Everything that will happen to you depends on your choice.
'What to do?' you think.
13521121211121221121112211221121.title: Sticking with Weavile

choices: Make one last ditch effort to convince her to keep you!
135211212111212211211122112211211.content:
Ultimately you'd be trading a giantess which may or not eat you for two legendaries who may or may not eat you. And countless Pokémon who will most certainly eat you in between. Deciding your safest option is to stay, you wait for daylight to fade.

But it never does. In just a few minutes the Weavile regains consciousness, undoubtedly awoken by the growls of her own empty digestive system. You sit firm and make an effort not to shy away, hoping it wouldn't trigger some sort of latent predatory instict inside your new host.

"Hey," the Weavile said, her eyes half lidded from weakness, "What's it like being so small?"

"What do you mean?" you ask, wondering if she was looking for a more specific answer than "it sucks". She blinks once and then grabs a hold of your body, lifting it up into the air.

"Like is this scary?" she asks casually as a terrifying sense of vertigo sets in.

"YES!" you shout as she snickers, calmly setting you down on top of her stomach. The black hair which covered it was so fine that it didn't even reach up to your knees.

A frightening noise emanates from the ground below, a deep gurgling amplified tenfold here compared to when you were just at the Weavile's side. It reminded you of your current predicament as you looked at her face with a pleading expression.

"And my belly rumbles like an earthquake?" she asks in the same casual demeanor, a smirk appearing on her lips.

"N-No..." you hesitate, noting that the ground hadn't actually been shaking aside form the constant movement of the Weavile's breathing, "Just really loud."

She smiles for a moment before yawning, and then fixes her gaze onto you.

"Y'know... I was thinking..." the Weavile said dryly, "If I were small, all the food in the world would be really big."

"Yep. Everything in the world is big - And very very dangerous," you clarify in an attempt to dissuade her from this line of thinking.

"I'm pretty fast though. I could fill up on nuts and berries," she continued despite your efforts, "Wouldn't have to hunt anymore. Hunting is also dangerous, and makes it really hard to make any friends. I mean, it's not like I enjoy killing."

"That's... Good to know," you say. An awkward silence fills the cave as she continues looking at you and her stomach growls once more. Granted, you were never that adept at reading the atmosphere, but if you had any chance whatsoever of running away, you would be doing so now.

"Of course... If it meant I never had to kill anyone else ever again..." the Weavile reasoned, slowly snaking her right hand up her body, "I could make one tiny little exception. For the greater good."

Chance be damned! You turn around and run like hell down the black landscape. It proved troublesome to decide on a direction - The north side was blocked off by two subtle hills which ended with the one fang-filled thing you were trying to get away from. Jumping off the side seemed like a pretty poor idea considering it would be hard to continue a prolonged chase with two broken legs and lots of screaming. Your blood pumping with adrenaline removed all sense of bashfulness as you hastily made your way towards the recline of her pubic bones, thinking you could possibly repel yourself down her soft womanhood and she'd be all the more reluctant to wave her claws around the region.

All of this was, of course, pointless as the Weavile's swift hand instantly pressed you down against the warm flesh of her belly.

"W-Wait! What're you doing!?" you scream with futility.

"Oh, don't be like that," she complains as she drags you along her fur so that you're back to facing her again, "I never wanted to be a predator. If I eat you, I'll shrink down and I finally won't have to be alone anymore!"

"What do you mean, don't be like that!?" you shout back, "I don't want to die! I thought you were cool!"

"Hmm," the Weavile thinks to herself for a moment, she did like to think of herself as cool and not sadistically ruthless like some predators, "Well... Maybe if I just take an arm? Or a leg?"

"I'll still die!" you burst out in terror.

"Then what if I drink some of your blood?" she rationalizes before shrugging, "Nah, you're right, that's too mean. If I swallow you whole then you can just, sort of, drift off I guess. That's the nicest way of doing it, really."

Her stomach growls, and this time it really felt like an earthquake. You realize that her simply talking about eating you was already kicking her digestive system into gear, the machinations that would be your demise. You were going to be hearing it even louder soon, feeding this giant creature who decided to eat you on a whim.

On a wh-

"Think about it! You're just delirious from hunger!" you attempt to reason with her, "If you don't want to be alone, then I'll be your friend! How are you going to keep friends if you eat them!?"

"See, that's where the shrinking down and switching diet part comes in," she quips with a small grin. You are reminded of the lie you told and suddenly you realize your terrible mistake. It's time to set things straight.

"OK OK, you got me," you admit with a hint of shame, "I didn't shrink from eating someone. I just shrunk one day and made up an excuse to keep others from eating me."

She looks a little confused for a moment. Then she starts to laugh as your whole world shakes up and down.

"Hahaha, oh wow! You totally got me!" she laughs, showing that at least she didn't hold any hard feelings at being played, "You're such a clever little thing, I really wish I could keep you!"

"W... Wish...?" you whisper fearfully. The Weavile sighs.

"Listen. Maybe I'm delirious. Probably, haven't slept or eaten," she slowly admits, "But I don't want to die either. And I can't risk passing up a meal in this dire situation."

She picks you up and brings you to her face, which is looking less cute and more terrifying by the second, especially the wise-cracking mouth. You shield your face and cower up, not again, NOT AGAIN-

Suddenly she stops. You find yourself hanging not far from a frown as the Weavile hesitates.

"Right. It scares you," she mutters sympathetically, "It won't be so bad, I promise I won't bite. You'll just go inside my mouth, slide down my throat and you'll be right back where you were, but, y'know, on the inside."

"This... Is a nightmare..." you utter breathlessly as you shiver, each of the Weavile's syllable presenting you with your final destination. A cave of no return coupled with a kiss of death. This whole thing was making her feel uncomfortable, she was used to her prey being too dead to complain about going to her stomach.

"Look, I'm sorry. Is there anything I can do to make it easier?" she suggests, "Any last requests? Which don't involve me getting up?"

Your mind starts racing for something which might help you get out of this situation. However, before you can think of any, the Weavile's expression suddenly lights up with a smile.

"Oh, I know! We'll just keep talking!" she says, "My hearing is really good, so if you shout I'll still be able to hear you!"

With nothing holding her back, the Weavile opens her mouth, stretches out her tongue and starts to move you towards it.

"N-No! Wait! you yell in desperation, but she doesn't slow down one bit.

"Even I don't know what my insides look like, you'll be the first to find out!" the Weavile chirps happily, "Isn't it exciting? Make sure to tell me every little detail!"

She gives you a playful lick, her wet tongue reaching out to touch you. You attempt to gather your thoughts one last time, but hurry - Your fate is rapidly approaching!
135211212111212211211122112211211.title: From Friend to Food

choices: Looks like it's the end for you...
There's still hope! Mew is here!
1352112121112122112111221122112111.content:
You desperately try to find something to convince me to keep you, but you can't think of anything.
"I'm sorry little guy. I promise it'll be painless." Weavile says with a sad smile, before dropping you in her mouth.

She closes her lips behind you, sealing you in darkness. Terrorized, you try to struggle to get out but, like last night in Celebi's mouth, your foothold is too slippery to even keep your balance. You constantly end up falling on the red muscle of Weavile's tongue.

The dark type tastes you satisfied, before tilting her head, making you slide in the dark abyss of the throat.

Your eyes widen in fear, you scream. You are about to die again, but this time, Celebi isn't here to save you. You travel down the tight esophagus and end up splashing in the stomach.

Like yesterday night, you find yourself in a bag of acid. You quickly look around, trying to find anything that could help you getting out of here intact.

But to your misfortune, the stomach is empty apart from you and the acid that will soon cause your death. Tears start to fall from your eyes, as you think you're about to die again.

Memories of your previous 'trip' to a stomach left you dead, so there is very little chance that you could escape this fleshy hell unharmed.

"Hey, little guy? Are you in my stomach?" the booming voice of the Weavile comes, startling you.
"Yes! And I'll be dead in a few minutes! Are you happy now?!" you yell between tears.
"Come in don't be like that. What the inside looks like?" she asks. You give no response, you just keep crying.
"Little guy?" the voice calls out again, but you have no intention of answering.

Getting that you don't want to talk to her, Weavile starts rubbing her belly, in a useless attempt to comfort you before you're gone.

You can't help but just cry. Why life had to be so unfair? Why? Why did you have to wake up shrunken, in a forest. Why did you have to die twice? It's just not fair. Your mind travels to Celebi and Mew. You wonder if Celebi is still asleep as you left her, still unaware of her little boy's fate. You wonder what Mew is doing, if she's still looking for you, or if she gave up.


Unknown to you, Mew didn't gave. She's still wandering around the forest, searching for that dark clawed kidnapper of a Weavile. Angry, worried, bored, she flies all around the forest, before stopping in a particular place. She felt something... an aura... your aura! It's very faint, but she can notice another, stronger aura very near yours. The Weavile!
"Don't worry little guy! Mew is coming to save you!" she thinks, flying as fast as she can in your direction.

She flies at supersonic speed through the forest, looking for any dark type pokemon with claws she finds.

Back at you, it's been a while in this stomach. Whatever it's keeping you alive, it's starting to disappear, as the acid starts to burn your skin. You yell in pain, more tears falling from your eyes.
"Goodbye Celebi. Goodbye Mew. Goodbye everyone. Whatever higher, please, have mercy of my soul." you think...
1352112121112122112111221122112111.title: A trip down the giantess...

choices: Weavile recovers and tries to 'rescue' you.
13521121211121221121112211221121112.content:
Weavile lies there on the ground, happily patting her belly, satisfied with her little 'meal'.

But suddenly, the ground shakes as a pink creature with sapphire eyes flies into the cave at supersonic speed.

Mew finally managed to find the exact location of your aura and, as soon she did, she rushed there. And apparently, she wasn't wrong. The figure of that dark type with claws who kidnapped her best friend's little guy is here, laying on the ground.

Without giving the Weavile time to think, Mew tackles her. If she had been standing, she would have fell on the ground. Even though Mew is way shorter than Weavile, she manages to block her arms, careful to not touch those sharp claws of hers.

"I'll ask you once: where's the little guy?" Mew inquires coldly.
Weavile gulps down, hard.
"I a... I ate him..." she says, almost in a scared whisper.

Mew expression drops for a second, before shifting into one of both anger and worry.

Without even replying, she floats upwards and uses aura sphere. The glowing sphere hits Weavile right in the stomach.

Still trapped in the dark type's stomach, you can't make out what is happening outside, but you suddenly find yourself being thrown into the esophagus. After a short flight, you are in the mouth.

Weavile spits you out, before letting her head lie on the ground. It was a miracle she didn't faint or worse from the twice super effective move.

Covered in a mix of drool and digestive fluids, you clean some of the stuff from your eyes. And you notice two things. One, you aren't in Weavile's stomach anymore, you are standing on her belly. And two, Mew is floating before her, a smile on her face.
"Little guy! Are you alright?" she says through telepathy.
"Yes, I am... Mostly." you reply.

Right then, you find yourself enveloped in a blue aura and floating towards Mew, right in her open paws. She hugs you for a second, before letting go. If it wasn't for her psychic, you would have fell to your death.
"Ew, you're all sticky!" she exclaims somewhat grossed out, before giving a small smile.
"Come on, let's get you washed. Then we can head back. Hopefully, Celebi is still sleeping."

And with that, Mew heads out of the cave, with you sitting on her head, relieved to be still alive. If it wasn't for Mew, you would have been dead.

Sighing in relief, you let her carry you out of the cave, glad to be able to enjoy the fresh breeze of the afternoon again...
13521121211121221121112211221121112.title: Hope is the last to die.

choices: Celebi is still there, still sleeping.
Celebi isn't there, maybe searching for you... leaving you alone with Mew
135211212111212211211122112211211121.content:
Still laying on the ground, Weavile moves lightly, but she doesn't dare to get up. So she just lets Mew float out of the cave, carrying you away with her.

You sit on Mew's head, glad to be still able to enjoy the softness of her fur and the cool breeze of the afternoon.
"Thanks Mew. I thought I was going to -" you try to say, but she cuts you off by picking you and pressing you into her fur, hugging you.
"Shhh, it's okay, you're safe now, don't even think about it." she comforts you.

You can't help but feel happy. You met Mew just a few hours ago and she's already showing that she cares for you deeply. So you hug her right back.

She keeps you grasped in her hug while flying through the forest. Then, she suddenly stops.

You turn, expecting to see the figure of Celebi, still sleeping under her shrine. But instead, your eyes meet with the sight of a small lake (that is as big as an ocean to you).

"Mew?"
"Yes?"
"Why exactly did you bring me here?" you ask.
"Well, I told you, you need a bath," she replies looking at your body, that is still soaked in liquids from within Weavile. The mix of fluids you're coated in makes your body all sticky and it makes it hard for you to see. Plus, it makes you smell horrible.

"You're right, I really need a bath - now." you say. Nodding, Mew releases you from her hug.
"Ew! I think I need one as well..." she replies, pointing to the wet spots on her head and chest.

"So, how I'm going to do this? I don't want to... you know... drown," you tell her.
In response, she smirks.
"Well, I do have an idea..." she says.

Then, without waiting for a reply, she floats over the lake and dunks her whole self - and you, who she is still holding, as well - in the water.

Comprehensibly scared, you try to fight Mew's grasp to, bit she's holding you too tightly. So, assuming she doesn't want to drown you, you give up and let her stay underwater until your breath runs short.

You start to struggle from the lack of air. Luckily, Mew fells your struggles and merges.
"Mew *puff* what the *pant* heck." you say panting.
"Relax little guy, I would never do anything to hurt you... Celebi would kill me right then... And then again, we're friends!" she giggles.

Then, she starts rubbing your body, freeing it from the sticky and disgusting fluids - and almost tearing off your clothes in the meantime.

Once Mew is done cleaning you and herself, she floats out of the water. She then shakes to get dry, threatening to make you throw up.
"There! All nice and clean!" she exclaims once she's done.
"Yes, but I still have that disgusting smell." you reply, dizzy from the 'ride'.

Mew smiles.
"I wouldn't worry about that," she says.
"What do you mean?".
You get no response. Instead, she closes her eyes as the air suddenly smells like flowers. You start to feel dizzy again.
"Mew... What's happening?" you ask.
"Don't worry little guy, that's sweet scent. So you won't have that smell anymore," she replies with a giggle, completely ignoring the fact that sweet scent is threatening to make to make you faint.

In a minute, Mew is flying through the forest again, this time directed to the shrine.

It takes her a while but she eventually arrives...
135211212111212211211122112211211121.title: Mew carries you off.

choices: Mew manages to grab you and teleports away!
Weavile manages to grab you and flees!
135211212111212211211122112211211122.content:
Before Mew can carry you off, Weavile hardly stands up.
"Urgh... Let him go..." she says with a groan. Mew turns around.
"Why would I? To let you eat him again? Never!" she exclaims.

The successive moments are full of tension, before Weavile attacks with night slash. Mew dodges the attack.
The pink pokemon looks shocked for a second, before carefully setting you on the ground.
"Stay there, don't move." her voice rings in your head.

You can do nothing but nod. The terror you're feeling shuts your mouth close.

Before Mew can even think of attacking, Weavile attacks again with slash. Mew manages to dodge again, and she strikes Weavile with mega punch.

Weavile groans in pain, before using metal claw. This one attack manages to hit Mew, who is sent flying back.

Mew groans. She can't give up, she has to fight to protect you from this dark predator.
'I have to fight, I won't let her eat him again!' Mew thinks.
And the thought seems to encourage her. She uses aura sphere.

The attack hits Weavile. She falls on her knees.

She doesn't exactly know why she's doing this for you. She ate you, you were her food... but seeing how Mew was trying to kill you before, surely she has an even worse fate than digestion in store for you.
'If I manage to save the little guy, I swear I won't eat him.' she thinks.

And so the fight goes on for a while. You stand there, completely unable to move; you're terrorized at the thought Mew could lose, and Weavile would eat you again. And your heart skips a beat each time Mew gets hit.

Mew is running out of energy. This dark type is giving her quite the fight, she won't be able to resist much longer. She could always grab you and teleport back to the shrine. But that would need enough time to grab you and teleport away.

Weavile keeps fighting the pink legendary with her remaining strengths. But she's still tired and hungry, so her attacks are pretty weakened. Her opponent looks tired, bit she gives no sign of wanting to give up. So her only chance is to snatch you up and flee once again.

The two keep fighting for a while, until Mew uses aura sphere; Weavile uses shadow ball.

The two attacks collide and explode, causing a huge cloud of smoke.

You cough and close your eyes. Too you don't notice Mew and Weavile coming your direction...
135211212111212211211122112211211122.title: Weavile to the rescue!

1352112121112122112111221122112111221.content:
You cough as smoke fills your lungs, making it hard for you to breathe. But luck seems to turn to your side. In fact, a pink, stubby paw suddenly snatches you from the ground.

To your relief, Mew is the one who has a hold on you now. And, before Weavile can try to snatch you from her, the pink pokemon teleports in a flash of light.

In a split second, you find yourself back at the shrine of Ilex Forest. And, as expected, a little, green, familiar pokemon is there, opening her blue eyes.

Almost immediately, Celebi spots you enclosed in Mew's grasp.
"There you are, you two." the green pokemon says excitedly while reaching out for you. But she immediately represses the urge to hug you upon seeing the state you are in.

"Little guy, why are you so... dirty?" she sniffs at this. She instantly turns her head with a disgusted expression.
"And you smell horrible too. What happened?" Celebi asks.
"Better you don't know." Mew says, shaking her head.

"Well, one thing is clear: this little cutie needs a bath..." Celebi snatches you from the pink cat pokemon.
"... And I'd be more then willing to help him." she says with something between a grin and a seductive smile painted on her face.

"Mew? Mind if I take this little guy to wash for a while?" Celebi asks her friend.
"Of course not. I'll just wait here." Mew replies smiling.

Returning her smile, Celebi carries you off into the forest. You wonder where she's taking you.

Your question is answered when you see the time traveler pokemon stopping by a small lake. You quickly figure out the reason of why she brought you here.

Celebi flies on the surface of the water. Gently, she lowers you, you almost can touch the water. Understanding what Celebi wants you to do, you quickly jump off her paws and into the water.

Immediately, the sticky sensation vanishes. You swim around for a bit, Celebi not losing sight of you.
Stopping, you notice the green pokemon giggling.

And, before you can ask yourself what she's up to, she flies up in the air before rocketing into the water.

What normally would be a splash of water generated by Celebi diving at supersonic speed, to you is a tidal wave that washes you away. Spitting out water that ended up in your mouth, you notice Celebi emerging from the water.

She looks in your direction and notices you got farther than you were before. She smiles.
"You want to play this game little cutie? So be it!" she beams, diving again.

You try to make out what just happened when a shadow appears beneath you. You try to swim away, but a certain green pokemon emerges again, missing you of a few inches. Giggling, Celebi dives again. Understanding what she has in mind, you decide to play along.

The shadow appears again. This time, you are prepared and quickly swim away as Celebi emerges yet again.
"Aw, I'll manage to get you sooner or later, I swear!" she exclaims, diving again. But this time, you dive as well, just to see Celebi swimming rather fast towards you. You dodge her just in time.

The game goes on for many rounds until finally Celebi manages to catch you, snatching you in her paws and hugging you, giggling like crazy.

The little green then has an idea; she lies down, floating on her back, and lies you on her belly. You have to admit, this is pretty relaxing. One good way to end this heck of a day.

By the time Celebi takes you out of water, sun already settled, the moon shining up in the sky. Smiling, the grass type carries you back to the shrine, where Mew was waiting half asleep for her friends to return.

After a quick dinner of berries, Celebi and Mew decide to hit the hay. You are pretty curious on where are you going to sleep.

Your doubts are soon answered when Celebi looks at you while pointing at her chest. It takes her a good while to convince you with her best puppy eyes, but finally you gave up and agreed to sleep with her.

Or at least, to stay with her, since you can't sleep at all! The two pokemon are soon fast asleep, but you, on the other hand, have some serious problems to get to sleep. The events of the day left you too alarmed to just sleep: First you met Mew and Arceus, then you discovered about Celebi's feelings towards you; then you are enslaved by a Zoroark who is then banished in another era from Celebi. And in the end, you are kidnapped and eaten almost for by chance by a Weavile, just to be then rescued by Mew.

It's really too much to take in. Five minutes pass, twenty, almost an hour, and you still can't sleep. Time passes and you...
1352112121112122112111221122112111221.title: Mew manages to grab you and teleports away!

choices: Go ahead and explore the forest. Maybe you'll be fine.
It's not a wise idea. Find something else to do.
13521121211121221121112211221121112212.content:
You still can't sleep. Everything around you is quiet yet you still aren't able to get some shut eyes.

So you lie there, on the belly of the same pokemon who ate and brought you back to life in less of a day.

You stare at the night sky, countless stars lightening it along the moon. You can't help but wonder how did you end up in this predicament; shrunk down to size and in Ilex Forest, where its cute little deity ate you, just to revive you right after by going back in time. Then she revealed her love for you and decided you were going to be hers without giving you a choice.

Heck, you think, if you ever manage to grow back to your normal size and tell this story, no one is going to believe you.


IF you manage to grow back to your normal size.


The sound of a nocturnal pokemon screeching distantly snaps you out of your thoughts.

You sigh. If you can't sleep, you need something to do. But, before you can think of anything, Celebi hugs you in her sleep. A soft moan escapes her lips. You wonder what she's dreaming of.

It takes you a while, but you finally manage to slip out of Celebi's embrace. You get up and walk at the edge of her belly and slide down on the ground. The green pokemon felt none of this.

Looking around, you try to find anything that might catch your interest. There's nothing here aside the two sleeping pokemon and, of course, the shrine dedicated to Celebi.

"Maybe I can explore around a bit." you whisper to yourself. But you shake the idea off. Ilex Forest is full of pokemon that hunt for food in the night. This remembers you of Weavile, of how she ate you. The thought sends shivers down your back. Definitively not a good idea, you might have a close (unwanted) encounter with one of the many nocturnal predators that inhabit Ilex Forest.

But, then again, there's nothing much you can do aside exploring. Seeing you don't have many choices, you could explore for a bit...
13521121211121221121112211221121112212.title: A sleepless night

choices: Stay with Weavile a bit longer.
Ask Weavile to bring you to Celebi.
1352112121112122112111221122112111222.content:
Your eyes are closed, you can't see anything, and the smoke is threatening to make you suffocate. Then, suddenly, you feel yourself being lifted.

Then, you feel something closing on your head, like you are trapped in a cage. You open your eyes, but you still can't see anything as you are now trapped in darkness. You notice you're sitting and try to stand up, but your head bumps into a hard surface. Rubbing your head, you decide to stay still until you find out wherever you are.

Upon securing you in both of her paws, careful to not accidentally kill you, Weavile dashes out of the cave, leaving Mew still trapped in the smoke.

When finally the cloud of smoke clears, Mew looks around, and she notices both you and the Weavile are gone. She's completely alone.
"Uh oh, Celebi isn't going to like this..." she mutters.

Weavile runs as fast as she can - which, for her species, is at supersonic speed - until she stops at the feet of a huge tree. Deciding that it would be a safe place to rest, Weavile closes you in one paw and starts to climb the tree.

You don't know what's happening, but your prison suddenly got tighter. So tight that you can barely wriggle.

Then, suddenly, your surroundings get less and less tight, until you can finally breath again. And the first thing you notice is the face of Weavile, who is eyeing you with a concerned expression.

Your heart stops at the sight of the same pokemon who ate you not even an hour ago.

Seeing the scared expression on your pale face, Weavile snickers.
"Looks like I managed to traumatize you. Relax, will you? I won't eat you." she says with the best convincing voice she can.

Finally, you calm down enough to talk.
"You... you won't?" you say in a scared whisper
She shakes her head.

Your face lits again.
"Really?"
"Have you looked at yourself? You're all filthy. I would never even dream to eat you again." she lies.
You just seem to notice the thick layer of drool and digestive acid.

Five minutes pass. You give Weavile time to snatch a berry from a near branch and eat it.
"Now, back at us," she says.
"It's getting pretty late, so I will have to go hunting soon. Now, since I won't eat you, you can stay with me," she offers.
"But if you don't won't to stay with me, I understand. If you want, I'll bring you down and let you go on your own."

You try to think of what to do. Weavile offered you to stay with her. But sooner or later, Celebi and Mew will find you for sure. And then again, why would you abandon two pokemon who fought to protect you twice in a day?

But, Weavile is unaware of everything that happened to you. And she still thinks Mew wants to kill you for some reason. Maybe, is she really won't eat you, you could still stick with her... or you could ask her to bring you to Celebi!

"So? What are you going to do little one?" Weavile asks impatiently.

Ultimately, you decide to...
1352112121112122112111221122112111222.title: Weavile manages to grab you and flees!

choices: Staying here. What could go wrong?
13521121211121221121112211221121112221.content:
You aren't sure of what to do. If you accept the offer, you'll be in deep troubles with Celebi. But, if you refuse and ask Weavile to bring you back to Celebi, she would never believe you are her actual other.

Eventually, you decide you don't want to take risks.
"Hey, someone's in there?" Weavile asks once again.
You let out a sigh.
"Weavile, I think I'm going... I think I'm going to stay with you for now...".
"That's good." she says with a snicker.

You sit down in front of the giantess. Her gigantic figure sitting there, looking at you with a smirk reminds you of earlier today, when you were 'enslaved' by Zoroark. With the only difference Weavile is much more gentle than the dark fox... Yes, she ate you, but she was starving to death, and most of yourself already forgave her. Though you are still a bit scared of her.

Mew makes her way to the shrine, a thousand thoughts running through her head.

Finally, she gets there. Celebi is there and, judging from her stirring, she's just waking up. Mew gulps as her friend opens her eyes.
"Hey Mew. Why do you look worried?" Celebi asks. Mew sweat drops.
"Celebi, you aren't going to like this..."

A while passed. You both sit there, silent. The sun is slowly settling down over the horizon.

Suddenly, a very familiar noise catches your attention. Weavile's stomach growling. You shiver. Weavile smirks and suddenly picks you.
"Hey, you sure look tasty for a little human," she says.

You gulp down hard. Weavile moves you over her mouth and opens it. She dangles you over the cavernous mouth.

Scared to death, you close your eyes. Weavile lets go of you.

You expected to fall into her mouth and be swallowed; instead, you landed on a soft surface. Opening your eyes, you notice you're sitting on Weavile's belly. She's laughing, sending shockwaves through her body, threatening to make you fall.
"You should have seen your face!" she laughs.
"Will you ever relax? I told you I won't eat you again, why are you scared?".

A while passes before you recover from the scare you had.
"Don't do that again..." you mutter. The dark giantess snickers in response.

"Look, sun settled down..." Weavile suddenly says. And, in fact, the sun is no longer there, replaced by the moon.

Weavile's grin drops in a somewhat annoyed expression.
"And I'll have to go hunting again." she says.

She removes you from her belly. But, before jumping off, she suddenly stops.
"Wait, I can't leave you alone. You could be attacked," Weavile states.
"But, if I bring you along, I'll need to keep an eye on you...".

Weavile turns around, thinking, before deciding to let you pick.
"Little guy, what do you want to do?". The question catches you off guard.

"What? You're saying that little guy was kidnapped by a Weavile, he was eaten, brought back and kidnapped again?" Mew nods, confirming her story.
"That's horrible! We need to find him! My poor little guy, Arceus knows what he's going through right now!" Celebi exclaims, before flying into the forest at supersonic speed, with Mew following.

Back on the tree, a good five minutes passed, but in the end you decided the most safe thing to do is...
13521121211121221121112211221121112221.title: Stay with Weavile a bit longer.

choices: "... I suppose... Maybe... You're telling the truth..."she says, believing you
"... I'm sorry. It'll be painless, I promise." she says. She doesn't believe you
1352112121112122112111221122112112.content:
You're paralyzed with fear. This whole mess is your fault, you shouldn't have lied in the first place. But now, your mind is working hard to find something to convince Weavile to keep you.

The dark type pokemon moves you closer to her mouth, you can see the wet, slippery insides and the sharp, white teeth that seem to shine, awaiting for the new meal. Weavile opens wide enough to let you see her throat.

A dark abyss, a dark abyss like the one you died in just yesterday. The only difference is that its owner hasn't the same kind intention of spitting you out, nor reviving you by going back in time...

You start to shake, memories of yesterday, when you were about to be swallowed by Celebi, fill your mind, startling you. Then, memories about earlier, when you were in Mew's mouth...

Wait! Mew! That's it!
"Wait!!" you yell, causing Weavile to stop. You are mere inches from her mouth, her frosty breath blasting in your face, making you shiver with both fear and cold.
"What is it?" she asks in a cute voice. Clearly, she's making the futile attempt to not scare you too much.

"D-Do you remember Mew?" you ask.
"Thar crazy pink pokemon that tried to kill us both? Yeah, why?"
"About that, I lied again. Mew wasn't trying to kill me, I don't even think she was trying to kill you, she just wanted to rescue me," you admit.
"Rescue you? Why?" Weavile asks curiously.
"You see...".

"Wow, now that's some story," Weavile comments your (mis)adventures, before starting laughing.
"You really said a big one, little guy. Celebi's love approved by Arceus and Mew? That's hilarious!" she snickers
"I told you the whole truth! Now, probably Mew is looking for me, and maybe she wants to make you pay!" you state. Clearly, this dark pokemon doesn't believe you.

"Yeah, right! You're funny little guy. Man, you don't know how much I would want to keep you. But, little guy, truth or not, I still want to eat you. Being tiny and finally have some friends... that would be too good to let it go" Weavile says.
You can't take it anymore.
"Are you nuts?! Tell you what, if you do, not only you won't shrink, but if Celebi manages to find you, you'll be surely dead! Or you'll wake up one morning, just to find yourself somewhere in another era! I told you, I lied about eating a shrunken creature, why won't you believe me?! You said you don't like to kill. Well, I'll have you know, you're about to kill me pointlessly! Do you like the idea?!" you burst out, exasperated.

Weavile seems taken aback from your burst out. She stares at you, seeming to think. She waits for you to calm down before talking.
"Little guy...
1352112121112122112111221122112112.title: Make one last ditch effort to convince her to k...

choices: She's too hungry, she eats you anyway.
13521121211121221121112211221121121.content:
"Little guy... I suppose... maybe you're telling the truth..." Weavile says, after thinking for a while. Your body seems to melt from the relief.

"Now, let me see if I understood everything: you woke up in this forest yesterday, shrunk. You decided to find a shelter and you got asleep, just to wake up beneath the legendary Celebi's head while she was sleeping. Right?" she asks. You nod.

"Then, she wakes up eats you, just to go back in time and keep herself from eating you, before bringing you to Mew. The two of them then brought you to Arceus - who is the god of all pokemon - and he told you about Celebi's love?"
"That's right." you confirm.

"OK, then this Zoroark kidnaps you and makes you her slave, but Celebi and Mew rescued you. Then Mew swallowed you by accident, but she brought you back up, and you were attacked by Zoroark and other two pokemon.
You were almost eaten again, but Celebi saved you by sending Zoroark back in time, but getting hurt badly. Now, after healing her, you ran into me while playing with Mew. Did I got it right?" Weavile asks. You nod.

"Wow... Everything's so hard to believe..." she says, before starting to snicker.
"Tricky, clever little thing, I can't imagine how hard it must have been for you to survive this one day here. Ehehe... Groan!" she groans as her stomach growls loudly again, asking for a meal.

"So... hungry..." she says, clearly suffering from hunger.
"I need something to eat... We... Weavile..." she says, reverting to some wild instincts.

Still grasped in her metallic claws, you try to slip away before she can think of you as food again, but as expected, her grip is too tight for you free yourself.

Weavile looks at you, hunger in her eyes. Her stomach growls again, louder than ever this time.
"Vile... Hungry..." she says, sending shivers down your back.
"Little guy... forgive me but... I need to eat... Don't be mad at me, I could die... and you're the only one thing that I can eat right now..." she says, licking her lips hungrily.

Terrorized, you just watch as she lowers you near the fang filled cave that could cause your death in a matter of moments! Then, suddenly, your survival instinct kicks in and you start to struggle.

"No! Wait!! I thought we were friends! Would you eat... Would you eat your only friend?!" you say, in attempt to convince her to keep you, at least until Mew manages to find you. If really you're her only friend, then, you hope, she'd be more than reluctant to turn you into food.

Weavile momentarily stops to look at you. The little guy in her claws is for sure trying to trick her into letting him live. She now knows about your cleverness. But, trick or not, you're right. You're her only friend. The only one living being that has ever even talked to her. And she's going to eat you. She stares into your eyes, you're terrorized, she can tell. Is she really going to end such a innocent life to satisfy her hunger?

Then, her stomach growls again, making her grit her teeth in pain. Her brain is screaming to eat the little human if she wants to live; Her heart is screaming that eating your only friend is even worse than hunting. And Weavile is in between this fight that threatens to make her head to burst...

Still firmly held up in Weavile's claws, you see her eyes closed and a suffering expression painted on her face. You simply assume she's too hungry. You cower as she opens her eyes and looks at you, having taken a decision...
13521121211121221121112211221121121.title: "... I suppose... Maybe... You're telli...

choices: Weavile decides you're better alive than dead to her. She keeps you.
She still intends to eat you...
135211212111212211211122112211211211.content:
"Look," the dark type holding you starts.
"I am sorry, but I can't do otherwise. I'm too hungry. Believe me, I don't want this, but you're the only thing I can eat right now. So..." she moves you dangerously near to her mouth. She opens wide, beginning to descend her claw into the razor-sharp teeth-filled cave.

"W-Wait! You don't have to do this Weavile! I-I can get you food, don't eat me!" you exclaim, fear once again overwhelming you. You look into the pokemon's half closed eyes, seeing a strong regret in them. You just have to try and convince her to keep you. At least, until either Celebi or Mew (or both) manage to figure out where you are and rescue you. Her mouth closes back up. She goes silent for a few seconds, just eyeing you tiredly.

"I'm sorry... I really am, but I need to eat. Like now. Don't hate me for what I'm about to do." she says, almost in a whisper.

With your mental activity increased by the fear, you quickly reply.
"H-Hold on," you stammer.
"Didn't you say you wanted to keep me? I could be really useful to you... yeah! I could do things for you!" Weavile seems to ponder.
"I said I wished I could keep you. And right about now, the only thing you could do for me is provide me dinner." she says, her tongue once again darting out of her mouth to lick you.
"You know, you're pretty tasty..." she says, a playful smirk on her face. Her stomach growls once more, asking to be filled. She looks at it, then at you, a somewhat sad smile on her face.

You gulp down hard, big drops of sweat pouring down your face.
"C-Come on Weavile, we're... we're friends, aren't we? Didn't you bring me here because you thought Mew wanted to kill me?" you ask. Once more, Weavile seems to be pondering.
"You're just trying to make feel guilty, aren't you? You clever, little thing," she snickers.
"You don't know how much I wish I could keep you. You'd be a great company. Too bad that apparently it can't be..." she says with a soft voice, opening wide once again. You descend of another centimeter.

You start shivering as you come up with another excuse.
"Then... why not? Let me stay with you, I'll keep you company. I can even get you food, just don't eat me!" you exclaim.

Weavile shuts her mouth close again. The tiny human is trying to trick her again. For someone that small, he's really smart. He's even offering to give up his life to keep her company. The only one who ever did that. The other pokemon she met were a little too... deceased to make such offer.

The storm of thoughts raging into her mind has the effect of making her forget about her growling stomach. The clawed paw that is holding you rises back into the air, away from her mouth.

Weavile observes you, who are sweating heavily, shivering from head to toe. That's really the most pitiful sight she's ever seen - and, being a natural huntress, she has seen many.

Finally, the dark type talks again.
"You'd really give up your life to keep me company? I mean, aren't you Celebi's..." she says.
"I hadn't a choice in the matter. She practically just decided I was going to be her... other." you reply. Weavile snickers loudly, before her stomach growls again, louder than before. Weavile glances at you once more. You really hope you managed to convince her...
135211212111212211211122112211211211.title: The end... Or is it?

choices: Weavile brings you along with her while she hunts.
Weavile leaves you in the cave, giving you a chance to escape.
1352112121112122112111221122112112111.content:
As her stomach gives out another, loud growl, Weavile glances up to you.
"Soo hungry..." she says, licking her lips. And then... she drops you, opening her mouth wide in the meantime.

Your eyes shut close, your mouth lets a scream of terror escape as you fall to your doom...

You land on a soft surface. Weird. You expected her mouth more... wet than this. And then... an earthquake, which menaces to break your eardrums. It lasts a few seconds, before ending. And then, a new noise assaults your ears, along with new vibrations from beneath you. Although it seems much less of an earthquake and more like... laughing.

Taken by surprise, you slowly open your eyes. You glance upwards, noticing that you're not in the fleshy 'cave' you expected to be inside of. Instead, you notice the laughing face of Weavile, miles of black fur away from you.
"Hahaha, oh man! When was the last time I laughed like that? Y-You should've s-seen your face!" stammers the giantess, unable to control her own laughter.

You just stand there in disbelief, pale, shivering, sweating as she keeps laughing.
"Y-You..." is the only thing you managed to stammer after several minutes.
"Cheer up, lil' one, I'm not going to eat you... yet." she teases you, her laughter reduced to a mere snicker. You drop on your knees on what you determine is the furry surface of her massive belly.

A second later, you wish you hadn't done that. Her belly growls again, louder than ever before. Your hands rush to your ears. Otherwise, the vibrations sent from her empty digestive system would have broke your eardrums for real this time.

"Mh, right." you hear Weavile, her voice muffled by the whining of her own stomach.
"Since I won't be eating you, I need to go get food. Like now." she says. Just as she says that, both you and her notice the sun disappearing over the horizon, meaning that the time has come for the nocturnal inhabitants of the forest to rise and get the daily meal. And Weavile is no exception. She gives a deep sigh. A sigh of regret.

Before you can even speak, she moves her claw in your direction, snatching you from her belly and placing you down on the ground. She then places both her clawed paws on the rocky floor of the cave and stands up. One of her paws travels to her mouth as she yawns deeply.
"Well, time to go." she states, starting to walk over the entrance of the cave.

Only to stop almost immediately, remembering about her small friend. She turns to look at, who still haven't spoken a single word.
"What about me?" you ask after a moment of hesitation.
"I don't know." the dark type replies bluntly.
"I usually don't have... guests when I hunt. How can I hunt if I have to keep you safe? I mean, you're sticking with me now, right?" she asks, with a not-so-subtle hint oh hope in her voice.

"... yes..." you lie. Secretly, you're waiting for Mew to come and rescue, even though Weavile said she wouldn't eat you. You have a feeling that Celebi wouldn't be so pleased to wake up to discover that you are gone - and with a formidable predator as a Weavile.

Seeming to not notice your hesitation, Weavile keeps thinking about what to do with you.
"... But if I leave you here alone, some other pokemon might get in here and attack you..." she states.

Darn. She's right. If she goes hunting alone, some random pokemon could try to eat you. Unless... unless you run away and go straight back to the shrine. Of course, if you manage to make it there unharmed... It all depends from what Weavile decides to do right now...

You glance up at the silent giantess, who seems to have taken a decision...
1352112121112122112111221122112112111.title: Weavile decides you're better alive than de...

choices: Womb (chance to become tiny female sneasel)
13521121211121221121112211221121121111.content:
"I'll bring you with me." She decided, before continuing. "But I can't carry you in my hands, and I use my ears, and nose for hunting. The only other places are my butt, which is a no since hunting causes intense pressure there that would kill you when I prepare to pounce like that Joltik I once discovered afterwards, my mouth, and womb are the other two, and while both are less dangerous,each carry danger. My mouth, I may accidentally swallow you, Although if you hide, under my tongue, or in my cheek, that danger is lessened, and my womb well it is the safest, even if you have to get to it from my vagina, but if I go into heat, which will be either tonight or tomorrow, there is a chance you could become my child, and unless I find a male before then my dna would be the only one effecting you, turning you into a female sneasel, and you might still be tiny, so which one do I pick, mouth or Vagina."

This caused you to stare in shock. Especially after learning she once had a Joltik in her butt, and didn't notice until it was dead.

"What do you think?" Weavile asked.

Can't I stay here?" You question.

"Sorry no." Weavile, said. "It is too dangerous, so which one do you want to ride in, my mouth or womb?"

At this you sigh before deciding.

"Alright." You say. "I choose..."
13521121211121221121112211221121121111.title: Weavile brings you along with her while she hunts.

choices: Weavile manages to get away again...
Mew manages to catch up this time...
135211212111212211211122112211211211111.content:
"Well, as... uhm... fascinating as it sounds..." you start.
"I'm not going in there." you point to the dark type's midsection, a slight shade of pink visible on her black fur.

Weavile blushes.
"Heh, as you wish," she says, picking you by the back of your shirt with her claws, which she then brings up to her smirking face.

You dangle in front of her gigantic crimson eyes. And this only contributes to make you feel more like a helpless insect.
"That leaves only one alternative though," she continues.

You swallow.
"Ca-Can't I just stay here? I'll wait for you know a dark corner or something..." you suggest.

However, Weavile shakes her head.
"Sorry, but no," she says, taking notice of the terrified look upon your face.
"Aw, come on! I promise I'll be extra careful with you!" she exclaims, throwing her claws up in the air, letting go of you in the process.

No longer held, you scream as you fall down. With your reduced size, even the lowest height is a danger.


Luckily, Weavile are known also for their quick reflexes. As a result, the giantess catches you almost immediately after your fall. Which was caused by her anyway.

Weavile snickers upon seeing your paled face.
"Hehe, okay, starting now I'm going to be extra careful with you," she says in a somewhat apologetic manner.

The dark type giantess waits for your face to return to its characteristic color, before holding you up in front of her mouth.
"Ready?" she asks, her lips parting as she opens wide, her razor sharp teeth shining sinisterly.

If you were sure about this before, you're not anymore.
"Weavile... are you sure this is safe?" you ask, comprehensibly scared.
"Well... no," she bluntly says with a smirk.
"But, I'll try to not move you around too much," she quickly reassures.
"You, on the other hand, try to hang on, alright?" she says.

Seeing no other way out of this, you meekly nod your head. Weavile snickers as she opens her mouth wide again.
"Ready?" she asks, making sure to keep her mouth open.

You glance at the wet insides of her mouth.
"Yes..." you respond, closing your eyes as Weavile moves you closer to her opened lips.

Before long, she gently places you on her tongue, before her lips fall back in place, sealing you in darkness.

--

Feeling you readjusting within her mouth, Weavile stifles a snicker as she turns around and walks out of the cave, watching as the sun sets, marking the beginning of her hunt.

Careful to not accidentally swallow the tiny human inside her mouth, the dark type weasel walks towards a tree and starts climbing with the agility of her species.

Soon enough, the dark type is standing on one of the high branches and stands still, waiting for any pokemon weak enough to enter her eyesight.

A while passes quietly. Inside of her mouth, you sit onto the giantess' tongue, afraid that any wrong movement might bring you to meet Weavile's teeth up close.

Or even worse, the giantess could simply swallow you by accident, embarking you on a one way trip into her stomach, like she wanted to do before.

As if the thought alone isn't terrible enough, the inside of Weavile's mouth is hot, and it smells like whatever she last ate.

Big drops of saliva fall from her palate, hitting your head while soaking you to the bone.

Suddenly, things start to shake, and you are carelessly thrown around inside the giant mouth as Weavile leaps onto another tree branch.

Then on another as she carefully scans the world below, trying to spot any sleeping pokemon, or any weak pokemon she could ambush and easily beat.

The giantess' stomach growls as she grits her teeth. She won't be able to resist for much longer...

Weavile suddenly thinks of the human within her mouth. It could be so easy to just swallow and finally fulfill her hunger! Curious, the dark type starts tasting you.

The giant muscle beneath you suddenly starts to move as it licks you, soaking you in saliva more. You open your mouth to protest, but the only you achieve is a disgusting mouthful of saliva.

Weavile keeps tasting you. The human... he's tasty!

Luckily for you, just when the idea of swallowing penetrates Weavile's mind, a bush suddenly starts to shake down below, drawing the giantess' attention.

Sighing, the giantess silently leaps down, throwing you back and forth within her mouth.
"Weavile! Careful!" you shout, getting another mouthful of saliva. Disgusted, you spit out and grasp the giantess' tongue, trying to avoid getting eaten.

Outside, Weavile lands right in front of the rustling plants and rises her claws, ready to strike whoever is going to come out.

Soon, a pokemon comes out. And Weavile's claws dart forward...

--

Mew was still wandering around the forest, searching for the dark type who stole her new little friend away.

She's been searching for hours now, and she still didn't find them. The pink pokemon dreads the chance that the Weavile might have hurt him... or worse...

As she floats through another bush, Mew is greeted with the sight of a set of three claws darting towards her.

Without even thinking, Mew closes her eyes and puts up a psychic barrier.
"Mew!" she cries as the claws collide into the barrier.

Upon realizing that she wasn't hurt, Mew opens her eyes to look at her aggressor.

Those sapphire eyes of hers widen as her face contorts into an unusual frown.
"You!" she cries as she notices that she was attacked by... the Weavile!

The dark type retreats her claws with a startled expression on her face.
"Mh mhh..." she cries, unable to talk because of the human in her mouth.

Though Mew did not know about that particular.
"The human. Where is he?!" she cries, menacingly floating forward.
"Mhh..." Weavile moans, the sound echoing throughout the insides of her mouth, almost deafening you.

Mew's are close into two slits.
"Your mouth. Open it." she demands.

In response, Weavile leaps back. She already experienced what happens when Mew is angry. And she doesn't want to experience it again.

Worried and angry at once, Mew starts floating towards Weavile, who leaps to the side. Mew turns to face her, an orange sphere forming in her paws.
"You let the human out this instant," she says.

"Mh!" Weavile exclaims, making you cover your ears.

Just what is going on out there?! Did Weavile find a prey? Or did she become one?

Not understand the intentions of the Weavile, Mew unleashes her focus blast. The weasel's eyes go wide as she dives out of the way.

Without losing time, Mew flies over her, her paw closing into a fist as she performs mega punch; Weavile's claws glow as she intercepts with slash.

Mew cries in pain, a single drop of blood falling from her paw. The pink pokemon glares daggers at the dark type who, realizing that fighting a legendary pokemon such as Mew makes as sense as committing suicide, does the only logical thing she can think of right now: she turns around and starts running.

"Not this time!" Mew cries, enraged, as she starts chasing Weavile.
135211212111212211211122112211211211111.title: One dangerous ride...

choices: Mew tells Celebi about the Weavile
Mew decides to keep quiet about it
1352112121112122112111221122112112111112.content:
Upon hearing the legendary's shout, Weavile's heart stats beating faster. Adrenaline pumps along with her blood as she dashes through Ilex Forest, trying to get away from the enraged legendary.

However, Mew wasn't going to let it happen again.

She starts flying faster as she chases the dark type weasel, who nervously glances backwards. Only to notice a pink blur coming directly at her.

A wave of pain takes over Weavile's body as Mew collides with her at supersonic speed, tackling her to the ground.

--

Inside Weavile's mouth, you are doing your best to hang to the giantess' tongue. A not-too-easy task: the red slick muscle is too big for you to actually hold onto, and it keeps slipping out of your grasp.

However, what seems an explosion makes you let go. You are ready rocketed forward, straight towards the giantess' razor sharp teeth.

You pale. In a split second, your whole life flashes before your eyes. You close them, waiting for one of the teeth to tear your body apart.

And soon, you hit a hard surface.

...

Are you... are you dead?

Your hears catch sounds of roars and cries of pain. Your heart skips a beat.

Did you die and end up in hell?!

Gathering all your courage, you slowly open your eyes and look up. Your whole being sighs in relief: you are sitting on the ground.

The impact must have made Weavile open her mouth, while you were thrown out of it unharmed.

Your gaze is fixed on your body as you check if you're really in one piece, before you look up.

Mew and Weavile are on the ground, busily fighting each other. It seems like they completely forgot about moves as they're fighting the old-fashioned way.

The two roll onto the ground, Mew trying to hit the startled Weavile, and Weavile desperately trying to fight back the raging Mew.

The two fighting titans also forgot about you, it seems, because they suddenly roll in your direction!

Your heart leaping in your chest, you hastily leap out of the way, the two rolling where you were before. You back up, dreading that you might end up as a red stain on the ground if they're not careful enough.

The two keep fighting for a while more.

But it all comes to an end when Mew, now on top of Weavile, delivers a powerful slap across her opponent's face with her tail.

An ear-splitting sound menaces to break both your eardrums as Weavile cries in pain, before her head hits the ground. The dark type lays motionless afterwards, suggesting that she just fainted.

Seeing as Weavile is no longer able to fight, Mew sighs as she rolls off her opponent, exhausted.

Breathing in relief, you slowly walk over the panting titaness. Soon, you come to a halt beside her.

Even when laying down, Mew towers above you. That only makes you feel even weaker than you currently are.

"... Hey," you say. Mew's eyes open as she looks down at you, giving a small smile.
"Mew mew...?" she weakly asks, clearly too exhausted to use telepathy.
