"Please be alive..." she muttered as she took place beside the fainted feline and placed her claws on her stomach.

She hesitated for a moment, before closing her hand in a fist and driving it into the Meowstic's belly.

The feline winced, a moan escaping her mouth. Aside from that, nothing happened.

"Hm..." Weavile muttered as she raised her fist, before punching the Meowstic in the gut once again, causing the psychic-type to since again.

"Come on!" Weavile shouted in frustration and worry as she slammed both her claws onto the fainted pokemon's stomach, almost piercing her body.

The dual-tailed feline began coughing in her sleep, a thin river of blood beginning to escape her mouth as she did.

And then, something finally happened.

The Meowstic coughed harder, before spitting out something tremendously similar to the human that Weavile let to earlier.

She felt her heart skipping a beat as she watched your body making a short flight in the air before landing on top of the Meowstic's furry chest.

Weavile shot a pitiful stare upon seeing what state you were in; you were covered in saliva, slime and blood.

Also, you were frighteningly unmoving.

Hastily, Weavile picked you up and held you in front of her face. She cleaned some of the stuff that covered you and stared at you attentively.

With a wave of relief washing over her, she noted that you were still breathing, but you were unconscious, much like the pokemon who ate you was.

Weavile sighed, relieved she had managed to rescue her human friend.

Carefully, the dark-type turned around and, leaving the Meowstic where she was, she left.

--

You did mention you were staying with Celebi, Weavile recalled as she made her way to Ilex Forest's shrine.

If it was real, she should have given you back to the legendary, at least for the time being.

It couldn't be long before dawn, and if the patroness of the forest woke up without her little human, she was going crazy.

Although, if she did wake up, noticing Weavile herself with her shrunken human...

The dark-type gulped, terrified. She considered turning back and return to the cavern where she had almost eaten you earlier.

But it was too late.

She arrived to the clearing where Celebi's shrine was.

With a mix of stupor and fear, Weavile noticed the two legendaries that were sleeping beneath it: Celebi herself and the Mew who had chased her earlier over the same human she was holding now.

Silently and carefully, Weavile approached the green time-traveler and bent over her, holding you out.

Carefully, the dark/ice-type began moving you towards the legendary's chest.

But, as if Celebi sensed a threat in her sleep, she began flailing around.

Weavile felt her heart freezing.

Celebi was waking up!
1352112121112122112111221122112112121121.title: Predatory Savior

choices: She decides to let you go, and places you on the ground.
She decides to keep you with her, and starts walking away.
1352112121112122112111221122112112121121.content:
The Meowstic continues tasting you for a while before realizing something - your taste is horrible!

Still trapped inside of the cavernous mouth, you are praying Arceus that the cat pokemon doesn't swallow you, a thing she could be doing anytime now she has tasted you long enough. You stare at the shiny white teeth, glad that, at least, you didn't get to meet them.

Then, all of sudden, your world shakes as you are spat out of the mouth, completely covered in saliva.

You luckily land on Meowstic's furry paw and sigh relieved. Either she decided to spare you or she didn't like your taste. Which is probably the reason you're still alive. No wonder about it though, since the other times you've been in a mouth you never got to bathe. Or maybe this Meowstic is just really very picky about her food.

Whichever was the reason she didn't eat you, you don't care, you're just glad you're out of the traumatizing, slippery chamber full of sharp teeth, ending with a dark abyss that leads to a certain, horrible death.

Recovering a bit, you turn to face the Meowstic, who is staring right back at you silently. You get to take a good look at her. Those red and yellow eyes of hers really seem to stare into your very soul; the two long ears on her head are probably twice your height - and she even hasn't them fully opened! The large paw you're sitting on is a white and blue land of fur to you, her tails are almost as big as planes.

You keep staring at the cat pokemon for a good while, before finally deciding to talk.
"Um, hi there..." you say.
The Meowstic tilts her head, a clear 'go on' sign.
"Um, you see, I'm a human, and I'm not supposed to be here right now, so if you let me go, I'll be on my way home...".

Meowstic just just keeps staring at you, deciding whether to do as you asked and let you go, or keep the you with her as a sort of pet. That would be a unique opportunity, she knows that. And plus you would be safe with her, while you would take so many risks walking through the forest alone. Sure, she almost ate you but, since she isn't going to anymore, she decides you're more useful alive than dead to her.

By the time Meowstic decided what to do, sun fully rises. The cat pokemon ponders on what to do for still a bit before acting...
1352112121112122112111221122112112121121.title: The Meowstic dislikes your taste, and spits you...

choices: ... It is just licking you out of friendliness!
1352112121112122112111221122112112121121.content:
Seeing you don't actually have any use for her, the Meowstic decides to just let you go.

Carefully, the white and blue pokemon lowers her paw to the ground. She waits for you to leap down on the ground before walking off.

You stand there, blinking a few times, trying to take in what just happened. A Meowstic shows up and shoves you into her mouth, scaring you to death, just to spit you out and leave. Seriously, what the heck was that?

You shrug, drops of drool falling from your body.
"Right. I need to wash myself, I can't go back like this." you say.
"Maybe I can find a pond somewhere nearby.".

In fact, walking around for a bit, you spot a little puddle of water. It looks like a lake to you though.
"Perfect." you say, walking towards it. You dunk yourself into the puddle, cleaning off the drool covering your body.

You walk out of the little puddle and decide that you absolutely have to return to the shrine. It must be around 7 AM, and if Celebi or Mew (or worse, both) are awake, you'll surely have to explain where you have been. And why you are all wet.
"I'll just have to think of an excuse." you say to yourself as you walk towards the shrine.

Surprisingly enough, you get there unharmed. Finally seeing the place in the forest you call 'home', after two terrifying experiences, at least makes you feel a little safe. A little. You are still stuck with two huge pokemon that can crush you with a finger if they want to. And speaking of your two companions, you see a pink cat pokemon still sleeping, while a certain time traveler pokemon looks at you, a smile spreading on her face.

Before you can act, you find yourself enveloped in a light blue aura that lifts you off the ground. You look at Celebi, her eyes are glowing of the same color of the aura. She must be using psychic.

Your hypothesis is confirmed by the fact you are floating towards the green giantess. More specifically, you are floating towards the green giantess' open paws.

Celebi encloses you in a tight hug. But her smile soon changes into an expression of surprise.

Surprise of finding you completely wet.

"Bi?" she asks you.
"Still can't understand pokemon language..." you remind her.
Celebi sighs and lowers you, so you can see the little spot that got wet because of drops of water falling from your soaked body. Celebi then points at you.
"You want to know why I'm wet?" the grass type nods in response.

"Y-you see, I just went to take a bath. Yes, that's it." you lie. Celebi cocks her head.
"Yeah, I noticed I was all dirty and I decided to take a bath nearby...".
'That's not completely a lie after all.' you think.

Ignoring the fact you bathed with your clothes on, Celebi smiles, seeming satisfied with your explanation.

Sitting with her back against her shrine, Celebi moves you closer to her mouth. Afraid of what she's going to do, you close your eyes. But Celebi wasn't going to put in her mouth again, like she did a few times, she just presses her lips on your cheek, smooching you.

Opening your eyes, you notice the time traveler giantess smiling at you warmly, a pink blush appearing on her cheeks as she hugs you again. One of her paws found its way to slowly caressing your head, soothing you, while Celebi relaxes herself with the quietness of the morning forest.

The feeling of the soft paw gently rubbing your head makes you drowsy, making you remember you didn't sleep all night long. Yawning, you decide to sleep, at least for a bit. It doesn't take you long to do so.

You wake up again after a while, just to find Mew still asleep and Celebi resting, with her paw still on your head. You must have slept for an hour or so, and the grass type must have fell asleep as well in the meantime.

Somehow, you manage to free yourself from Celebi's hug and carefully get off her. Her arms move a bit in her sleep, as if noticing your absence, but get down as Celebi relaxes once again.

Quickly growing bored to just stay there and stare at the sleeping giantesses, you decide to wander around. You do not dare to walk into the forest though; if Celebi doesn't find you around when she wakes up, you're sure she'll get mad at you. Which would end pretty bad for your well being. Plus Ilex Forest's inhabitants are much more active during the day than the night, and it wouldn't be difficult to have a close encounter with some pokemon looking for breakfast.

Suddenly, as you walk around, a noise makes you turn your attention to a nearby bush. You stare at it curiously as a golden, fox-like pokemon with fiery red eyes and nine tails steps out. A Ninetales.

The majestic pokemon walks in your direction, lowering itself to sniff the soil. You almost get sucked into the Ninetales' nose. That's when the nine tailed creature spots you.

Curious about what you are, the Ninetales starts licking you, its tongue pinning you to the ground.

Getting soaked in saliva again, you quickly look back at Celebi and Mew. Both are unfortunately still asleep.
'Please wake up please wake up please wake up!' you mentally, unable to talk because of the hot, red tongue shutting your mouth close. Ironic. Both pokemon are psychic types, yet none of them can't read your mind.

Scared, you try to push the gigantic muscle away with all your might. Which obviously doesn't work. Instead, the golden pokemon starts speeding up its licking. You realize it is actually...
1352112121112122112111221122112112121121.title: She decides to let you go, and places you on th...

choices: No (and Celebi and Mew wake up)
1352112121112122112111221122112112121121.content: Does it like your taste?
1352112121112122112111221122112112121121.title: ... It is tasting you!

choices: Fortune favors you! (Celebi or Mew to the rescue)
Fortune abandoned you! (Digestion or you escape somehow)
1352112121112122112111221122112112121121.content:
"Prrrrr, Niiiine..~" The Ninetales' tails swished eagerly, the fox seeming to have grown rather fond of your taste, which was not what you were hoping to see, more hot licks continued, slower, pressing firmer, the kitsune mon continuing to taste, before finally slipping its tongue under and lifting you into its parting, fire type maw, teeth interlocking shut with a soft clack.

In the heated humidity of the fox's maw, you started to struggle and thrash, but your squirms were quickly quashed by the tongue pressing you against the Ninetales' ridged maw roof, the tongue grinding and licking along your back as the kitsune growled pleasedly, before tossing and swishing you between its wet cheeks, more purrs vibrating through your tiny frame.

Now and then you'd feel the fox's carnivorous teeth prodding and poking into you, sending shivers down your spine as the predator could easily bite you apart and chew on your remains, yet it only nibbled with careful grace, uttering a soft whine of happiness.

Tired and heavily panting, the tongue undulated, then flicked you towards the kitsune's throat, sending you into a panicked flail, inhaling to scream, but before you could.. [b]Squelch![/b] Your form impacted at the entrance to Ninetales' throat, the fox lifting his head up and swallowing with a wet, long [b] [i]Guuulp..[/b] [/i] Sending you well on your way to its grumbling stomach.

The fox licked over its lips, tracing your small lump with one of its forepaws, purring louder, gulping a couple more times to firmly squeeze you deeper and deeper.. Until finally you sunk enough that your lump vanished behind the kitsune's chest fluff, oozing and squelching out into its steaming hot belly, which had just begun to slowly pool bubbling stomach acids.

"Mryuuu, Niiiine!" the kitsune happily huffed, satisfied with the tiny human becoming its delicious breakfast, its stomach groaning, starting to churn noisily as the fox trodded on about its day, Arceus knows what will become of you if something or someone doesn't save you from this sweltering fire pit...
1352112121112122112111221122112112121121.title: Kitsune Breakfast

choices: Celebi decides to get breakfast, and brings you along.
1352112121112122112111221122112112121121.content:
The nine tailed pokemon keeps licking you for a while, tasting you. You are once again completely covered with drool coming from yet another pokemon trying to eat you.

"Urgh... stop... please" you try to say between the licks of this golden pokemon. Which obviously ignores you. Like every other pokemon who wanted to get a taste of your body after all.

As you start to think you're going to 'visit' your fourth stomach in the two, almost three days you've been in this forest, a sound makes your heart fill up with hope.

"Biiiiiiii." you hear Celebi yawn, which probably means she's going to wake up.

Much to your joy, your supposition was correct. The green pokemon opens her black eyelids, revealing her blue eyes. The Ninetales stops licking you and raises her head to face Celebi, who is staring at the scene incredulous.

But it's just a moment before she gets what's going on and flaps her wings, floating up in the air.
"Leave him alone!" she shouts at the fire type, her paws glowing green as a sphere is formed.

The Ninetales stares back at her with a wondering look. Sure, the little guy has a somewhat good taste, but the golden pokemon didn't like it that much, so she decided to let him live.

But then again, when was the last time she had a good battle? And she has the opportunity to challenge a legendary pokemon, she cannot let this chance escape.

She gets in front of the tiny human, fire forming in her mouth. The legendary Celebi obviously likes him, so if she pretends to be wanting to eat him, she'll fight at top of her skills.
She growls, a clear way to say 'He's mine.'.

The moment between the two pokemon is full of tension, when Ninetales shoots flames from her mouth. The grass type dodges the attack and throws her energy ball ball to the Ninetales, who dodges as well.

Many minutes pass as the two pokemon keep throwing attacks at each other. But you are in utter shock. You know Celebi from a little more of a day, but you could never guess she could turn into a fiery warrior like now.

She's fighting her opponent heatedly, either dodging or enduring the fire attacks coming from the Ninetales, just to attack herself with her best shots. You know she's doing this for you; she wants to protect you, no matter what. And the only thing you can do is just sit there and stare. You feel so weak right now. You wish you could help somehow, but due your reduced size, and so reduced speed and strength as well, there is nothing you can do.

The battle goes on for while. Weirdly enough, Mew didn't wake up even with all the explosions roaring around her. Aside from an occasional shift of position, she's giving no sign of being alive.

Dodging one last flamethrower of the opponent, Celebi glows and fires leaf storm. Thousands of leaves are sent flying to the fire type pokemon. Just when the attack is about to hit her, the fox pokemon leaps up, dodging it. The leaves keep going, now aiming at... at you!

The powerful attack coming right at you, the ear splitting scream coming from Celebi, your heart racing, your mind shouting you to move and your fear keeping your small body still... your head skips a beat as the barrage of sharp leaves gets nearer.
'Well, this is it. Goodbye everyone...' you think, bracing yourself for the impact.

Which never comes. Instead, an explosion is heard. You open your eyes, you find yourself enveloped in smoke. The attack must have hit. Which is weird, cause you're feeling pretty fine.
"Am I... am I dead?" you ask yourself as the smoke clears, revealing that Ninetales is standing in front of you.

Understanding that the golden pokemon protected you, you fall on your knees. That was too much emotion for one day.
Just then, the Ninetales starts laughing. Both you and Celebi look at her curiously.
"What an amazing battle! I hadn't one like that in ages! You really deserve your title." she suddenly says to Celebi, before lowering herself to nuzzle you.

Before you or your green companion can act, the fox pokemon starts walking away.
"I hope we'll be seeing again. Can't wait to battle again." she states, disappearing into the woods. Celebi stares at the now empty spot before remembering the reason of the battle and rushing to you.

"Le bi!" Celebi exclaims, cleaning off the last drop of saliva on your body, before giving you a light peck on your cheek.
You sigh.
Celebi goes and sits down against the shrine, settling you on her belly.

Quietly, you start rubbing the green skin, getting a small moan from the grass type giantess.
"Thanks for everything you did for me." you say her. Another peck on the cheek is your reply. You chuckle.

A few minutes pass, before...
1352112121112122112111221122112112121121.title: Don't wake the sleeping pokemon.

choices: Mew is still asleep... looks like Celebi gets to have her fun...
Mew is awake... and some other pokemon is with her...
1352112121112122112111221122112112121121.content:
Hearing a loud growl coming from her belly, Celebi decides to get some breakfast. Hopefully, she'll still be able to play with you later. Her smile grows into a grin. Knowing Mew, she'll be asleep for still a while, so Celebi will have quite some time to 'deal' with you.

Unaware of her intentions, you notice Celebi looking at you smirking, just right before her as big as pool tables paws rise you. Having just heard her stomach asking for food, you at first think you are going to be her breakfast. You start to shake, waiting to once again enter the dark cavern they caused your death not even a day ago.

But it never happens.

The green paws rise over Celebi's mouth and gently deposits you on her head, in between her feelers.

Wondering about what she's up to, you see her floating in midair before starting to fly off, into the depths of the forest, leaving an asleep Mew alone at the shrine.

Once she is far enough, Celebi stops and looks around, searching for some sweet pecha berries that she knows to be around here.

Finally, Celebi spots what she is looking for and flies up on a high tree branch. She sits down and snatches a berry, before settling you next to her with her free paw.

You desperately try to not look down, knowing the height of the branch you're currently sitting on. Celebi meanwhile picks a small - to her at least - red berry and hands it to you.

This thing is at least as big as your upper body. You look at Celebi, but she's already enjoying her own meal, so you decide to eat as well. You grab a bite of the red berry. It's very sweet, yet it has a... wild aftertaste.
"That sure is a strong berry." you state, getting a giggle from the pokemon next to you.

It is pretty ironic. Celebi is considered one of the most rare and powerful pokemon there are... yet she acts like a little girl around you. And yet she could crush you easily, even if you were still normal sized. From what you read about her back at school, you knew she was supposed to be childish, but you were sure you'd never discover it from Celebi herself... in such predicament.

You snap back to your senses when you accidentally bite the void. You notice you ate the whole berry in your trance.
Celebi giggles as two large paws wrap around your body and bring you up to her face.

Two green lips press on your cheek. You stare at Celebi, unsure of what to do now. She stares right back at you with a sickeningly sweet smile, clearly wanting you to say something.
"Uh you're... pretty?" you try.

The green pokemon's reaction is very close to what you expected, if not the same you expected. Her mouth grows into a huge smile, her eyes shine from the compliment she just received.

But the next thing is something you'd never expect.

"Bi... cu... le... cut... le... cutie!" your jaw shuts open at the realization the legendary before you just talked.
"Celebi... you just said something, I wasn't dreaming right?" you ask her.
"Cutie! Cutie!" she exclaims again, clearly excited about the whole thing.

Showing a bit of a blush, you smile. This is just great. If you can teach Celebi to talk, you have a feeling that living with her will be much more easy.

Still smiling, the green legendary lifts herself from the branch and, sealing you in a tight hug, she starts flying back to her shrine. She can't wait to tell Mew the news. That is, if she already woke up.

You sigh. This is just a little step. But you know that, if you manage to make Celebi able to communicate with you, this relationship would be much easier. Not that you are falling for the green pokemon, but if you have to stick with her, might as well understand her.

Again carried away by your thoughts, you don't notice Celebi arriving back to the shrine...
1352112121112122112111221122112112121121.title: Celebi decides to get breakfast, and brings you...

choices: Mew wants to play, let's go back to Celebi!
1352112121112122112111221122112112121121.content:
Upon seeing her pink friend still asleep, Celebi's smile grows wide on her face. Finally she gets to have a bit of fun with her little boy.

Still holding you in a soft yet firm hug, the grass type quietly raises herself on the branch of a big tree and sits down.

She releases you and holds you in front of her, looking at you. A sweet smile illuminates her face.
"Cutie~" she says, nuzzling you against her cheek, before planting a peck on your forehead. Celebi then holds you near her mouth.

Too much near her mouth.

You can feel her warm breath in your face. You are pretty sure of what is about to happen, and you don't like it one bit.
"Uhh... Celebi? What are you doing?" you ask, trying to not sound scared as you obviously are. Your shaking voice betrays your intentions though.

Mentally cursing yourself, you turn your attention to the green giantess holding you.

Celebi giggles softly. Her little guy is scared of her. Cute.
"Cutie... in you go..." she says sweetly, opening her mouth.

Except for the word 'cutie', the rest of what Celebi just said is pretty incomprehensible, being just a mix of 'le bi ce'.

But the mere sight of her opening her mouth wide makes you shake with fear.
"Celebi please..." is all you manage to say before she gently drops you in the dark insides of her mouth.

Sunlight fades as you are enveloped in the slimy, dark cavern you've been in a couple of times. And each time, you get to see the traumatizing sight of the dark abyss that leads to a most certain death.

You uselessly try to get on your feet, as the slippery tongue simply won't let you, while Celebi licks your body over.
"Celebi, get me out! Please!" you shout.

A stifled giggle is what you get for an answer.

Celebi giggles gleefully. The scared squeaks coming from inside her mouth are, as always, doing a great job in making her aroused. Covered by the thousands of leaves of this tree, she spreads her legs and starts rubbing her sex.

She can't quite explain why it feels so good. She should feel bad for scaring you to death... yet those muffled screams of mercy, those little struggles for freedom, her tongue overpowering that tiny, helpless body... somehow, everything makes her feel great.

You are, once again, living a nightmare. The fleshy 'walls' are moving along Celebi's movements, throwing you back and forth into the 'cave'. Until you reach the edge of Celebi's throat.
"No no no no no no!" you exclaim out of fear. It's happening again. You're about to get swallowed again, and you can't do anything about it!

In the same moment, Celebi lets out a stifled moan. She retreats her paw, a small puddle forming around her sex. The green pokemon lets herself fall with her back against the trunk of the tree. She lets you lie still on the back of her throat for a bit as she recovers.

You lie there, shaking with fear. Things stopped moving, which you were grateful for, but you still are a mere inch from falling to your death.

Deciding that she has terrorized you long enough, Celebi digs her paw into her mouth. Getting a hold of your body, she gets you out.

You are welcomed back to the outside world by comforting sunlight. And then by a certain green pokemon smiling warmly at you.
"Please... don't do that again..." you mutter, unable to talk from the lack of energy.

Celebi just smiles, proceeding to clean saliva off your body, before starting to pet your head with her paw softly. You let out a sigh of relief, just glad to be still alive. But why does she keep doing this!?

Quietly, Celebi makes her descent, to the grassy ground, letting you sit on her paws. Mew is still sleeping. You look up; sun is now fully arisen in the sky.
"How much can she sleep?" you think out loud.

Just as you say that, the pink cat opens her sapphire eyes and yawns. A smile quickly spreads on her face as she sees her two best friends.
"Morning you two," her voice telepathic voice rings inside your head.
"Hope you didn't do anything weird." she says cheerfully, making you blush. You can't deny though that what happened was pretty weird.

Before Mew can say anything else, her stomach growls. She rubs it slowly.
"I need to fill my tummy. Hey little guy, come with me, it'll be fun!" that said, her long tail wraps around your waist and snatches you from Celebi, before carrying you away. The time traveler stands there confused for a second, before pouting.
"I wanted to come too..." she says irritated.

"Mew!" New beams, eating her tenth berry. You just sit there next to her, assuming she must be really hungry after sleeping for at least twelve hours. Or maybe she usually eats this much amount of food. Whatever it is, she's really enjoying her meal.
"That was delicious!" she suddenly exclaims.
"No wonder of why you ate so many berries." you say with a small smile. Mew pats your head in response.
"Aren't you just cute?" she says giggling. You blush at her statement.

You both spend the next few moments completely silent. The only one noise that can be heard is the sound of the wind. Then, Mew suddenly gets up...
1352112121112122112111221122112112121121.title: Mew is still asleep... looks like Celebi gets t...

choices: Play their game - and risk being eaten... or worse.
Try to talk your way out of this.
1352112121112122112111221122112112121121.content:
A good while passes. Tired of just sitting there and doing nothing, Mew gets up.
"Man I'm bored. Come little one, let's get back to Celebi, so we can play!" the pink cat pokemon exclaims, her tail sliding in between your legs and lifting you off the ground, before wrapping solidly around your waist. The grasp of the pink tail is soft, yet firm, so it keeps you perfectly safe as Mew floats back to the shrine.

You get to enjoy the quietness of the morning forest, as Mew flies slowly, without any rush at all. A small breeze blows through the forest, which is completely silent. Aside from you and your two pokemon companions, the other inhabitants of Ilex Forest are most probably still asleep. So you get to experience the complete silence, interrupted just by the occasional rustle of the leaves or the roar of a distant river. You sigh happily; this is the first time since you're in this forest that you feel actually... safe.

Eventually, Mew gets back to Celebi's shrine. Her green friend is sitting on it, with her back to Mew. The pink cat approaches her friend.

Her tail lowers and unwraps from your body, gently letting you on the ground. Just then Celebi turns to face Mew.
"Oh, you're back. Where's my little guy?" she asks her friend. In response, Mew just points to you.

Giving you a cheerful smile, Celebi lowers her green paw for you to hop on. Which you do reluctantly.

The paw you're standing on brings you to the green legendary's face as she starts nuzzling you.
"Missed you little guy~" she whispers.

"Come on, let's play!" Mew exclaims impatiently.
"Sure... but what?" Celebi asks.
"What about cat and mouse? Ohhh, little guy would make a perfect mouse!" her excitement grows as she speaks.
"That's some idea." Celebi admits smiling.

"Little guy?" Mew's voice says in your head.
"What?".
"We want to play cat and mouse. Wanna play?" she asks.
"Cat and mouse? What's that?" you ask.
"We count to one hundred while you hide in the forest. If you win, you'll get a reward!" Mew beams
"And... if I lose?".

Celebi smiles seductively.
"You'll wish I didn't revive you when I'm done with you." she says with a playful giggle, while winking at you.

Even though you didn't understand a word of what the green legendary just said, you definitely felt the mischievousness in her voice. And you don't like it at all.
"So little guy, what do you say? Are you in?" Mew asks again.

You are unsure about what to do. You can always refuse... but you have a feeling that you will regret it if you do. You can try to convince them to play some other game... but they seem very excited about the idea, so they'll almost certainly force you to play.

Your best shot seems to play their game right now.. And you're curious about the reward anyway. But if you do, you could be attacked and eaten by wild pokemon... and worse, if you lose, you're sure your 'penalty' won't be so nice, judging by the two pokemon's excitement.

You think for a bit, desperately trying to find a way out of this situation, but you need to decide quickly though - the two legendaries are growing impatient!
1352112121112122112111221122112112121121.title: Mew wants to play, let's go back to Celebi!

choices: You manage to avoid them in time. You won!
You can't move and they catch you. Uh oh...
1352112121112122112111221122112112121121.content:
You take your time deciding what to do, if play, risking being eaten, crushed or even worse by wild pokemon, or refuse, risking to get on the two pokemon's bad side, which would surely led to a horrible fate.

"Come on, are you in or not?" Mew's telepathic voice rings impatiently in your head. You look up to the two pokemon, who are awaiting your choice.

"I... I'm in..." you mutter, not completely sure if this was the right decision. But it's too late to go back. Mew and Celebi already exploded in cheering, before Mew's tail gently pushes on you.

"Go hide then. We'll count. And better for you if we don't find you." Mew finishes, before she and Celebi turn around, their backs to you.

Before they can start, though, Celebi turns around again and talks with Mew, who nods.
"Right, I forgot, there's a time limit. If we can't find and catch you within that, you win."
"And how much time do I have?".

Mew and Celebi looks at each other, seeming to be wondering something. Mew then smiles.
"What about an all-day match?" she suggests.
"What?".
"Yes. You have to hide till sunset to win. Are you in?" she asks.
"Great idea!" Celebi beams.
You just nod timidly, not daring to refuse the terms of the game.
"Great, let's play!" with that, they turn around again.

As soon you hear what you assume is 'one', you start running.

You run into the forest, without knowing where are you going, you just know that you need to hide. And soon. But you know you haven't gone far, since you soon hear two simultaneous screams, followed by excited squeals.

Getting that Mew and Celebi are done counting, you stop, looking for whatever place you could hide in. There's nothing here, but some bushes and some big leaves, probably fallen from the big trees of the forest.

Deciding that the bushes are a too easy hiding spot, you go for the leaves. You manage to lift one and look back, checking if any of your two 'chasers' is coming your way, before getting under the dark green 'shelter'.

Minutes pass. You don't hear anything around you so, careful to make no noise, you poke your head out of the leaf.

Just to discover Mew floating right in front of you. Luckily, she has her back to you, so she hadn't seen you. Quickly, you retreat under the leaf. Right before Mew turned around, scanning the ground, searching for any weird looking bug that could be her tiny human friend.

Then, something catches her attention. A small lump under a leaf. She smirks, extending her paw to pick the leaf.
"I wonder what is under this leaf~" she says in a singsong voice, before snatching the leaf up.

Just to find nothing.
"Aw, I was sure I got him!" Mew whines, unknown you are hanging on the other side of the leaf she's holding for dear life.
Huffing, Mew places it, and you along, back down, before leaving.

"Urgh, better get out of here before I become food for some Caterpie." you state, getting up.

Not sure of how much time passed from your close-catch, so you just keep wandering around, trying to find a good hiding place.

You're pretty sure Mew or Celebi are already on your tracks, so you need to hide, fast.
Then, a familiar giggle makes your heart skip a beat. Celebi!

You start looking around frenetically, trying to find something you could use as a hiding place.
'She's coming! What do I do? What do I do?' you ask yourself. The shadow of the forest's guardian comes into view.

Startled, you jump behind the first bush you see and wait, sweat pouring down your face.
"Cutie~ where are you~? Come out wherever you are! I just want to squeeze you in my hug all day long~" she giggles.

Aside from the word 'cutie', which made you blush, you aren't able to understand anything else she said, but you can definitively make out one thing: she knows you're here.

You attempt to stay as still as possible as Celebi searches around, trying to find you. Just when you hear no more noises, you dare to let out a sigh. Right then, a green paw appears through the leaves, and slams to the ground, mere inches from you. You can feel your own heart racing as Celebi's paw moves around for a bit, trying to find any small body that could be hiding here.

Luckily, you manage to stay still and silent until the paw retreats. You can hear a groan and some incomprehensible words, before Celebi leaves.

Calming down a bit, you step out of the bush.
"Time for a new hiding place." you mutter.

You can't really say what time is it now, but you assume that you are hiding from Mew and Celebi from at least six hours. Hungry, tired, sore, you somehow manage to get back to the shrine. Literally collapsing to the ground behind it, you look up to the sky; sun is on its way to set down, so you assume it must be around 6:30 PM.
'Still a bit... I can do this...' you think.

Almost an hour and a half passes. You are quietly napping under the shrine, when a loud groan wakes you. Your first though is about checking the sky: you smile as you see the summer sun descending over the horizon.

But then, you notice the cause of the noise that woke you up as two familiar pokemon sit down on the shrine; they don't seem to have seen you though.

"Man, it's like he disappeared! How come we can't find him anywhere?" Celebi asks Mew with a huff.
"Well, he's pretty small, and the forest is pretty big, so he could be anywhere." Mew states.
"And he's about to win...".

Just then, you happen to snooze. Normally, no one would have been able to hear it, but it unfortunately didn't escape Mew's sensible hearing.

Turning around, she spots you under the shrine. Her mouth curls into a smirk.
"Look who's here." is heard in your head. Celebi, who turned around as well curious about her friend's actions, smirks as well.

In less than five seconds, you are securely grasped in Celebi's paws.
"What a shame." Mew says, while her friend nuzzles you.
"At least one more minute and you would've won. I almost feel bad...".
Celebi raises her head, smiling.
"You're right, it would be a shame to end it like this. Look, let's give him thirty seconds. If he can avoid us, he wins. If he can't..." Celebi's smirk grows at the last sentence.

New nods. Celebi puts you back on the ground and the two fly quite distant from you.
"You have one more chance," Mew warns you.
"Avoid us, and you win!".

With that, the two rush to you. They are coming fast - you have to dodge them, quick!
1352112121112122112111221122112112121121.title: Playing with the giantess(es)

1352112121112122112111221122112112121121.content:
Mew and Celebi fly at you at supersonic speed. Celebi lets out an excited squeal. One more second and you'll be hers to deal with.

That's what she thought.

On the very last moment, when the two pokemon are about to catch you, you dive out of the way, which results with Mew and Celebi surpassing you. And that's when the sun completely disappears over the horizon, meaning you just won.

Exhausted, you drop to the floor, trying to catch your breath. Just to be grabbed by two massive green paws and smothered between them and one of Celebi's cheeks as she nuzzles you.
"Good match little one!" Mew exclaims in the meantime.
"You did pretty well for your first time!".


"And now, since you won, I think it's time you get your reward~" Celebi says sweetly. Just then, your belly growls loudly.
"Right, I didn't eat all day long..." you remember as your belly growls once again.
Celebi smiles warmly.
"I may have an idea for your reward..." she says.

Obviously unaware of her intentions, you just look as she glows green, a nearby flower blooming into a heart shaped berry. Celebi snatches it and holds it in front of you; it's the size of a car to you.

Helping herself with many other berries from nearby bushes, Celebi sits down, settling the fruit she got in between herself and Mew, who sat down as well. In the end, Celebi settles you on her lap.
"Eat up!" she beams, starting eating hungrily, soon followed by her pink friend.

You stare at the two pokemon eating voraciously berry after berry. Feeling quite sheepish now, you bite your own berry. Its taste isn't bad, it's really sweet. You take another bite, it's delicious! You start digging in, enjoying the sweet flavor of the berry. And so do Celebi and Mew, judging by their cheerful expressions.

You let out a satisfied sigh. The berry is no more, gone bite after bite into your stomach.
"Thanks Celebi. That was really nice." you thank the mythical pokemon, getting a squeal, that you just assume is a 'you're welcome'. You stare at the two as they chat merrily. You try to make out whatever they're saying, but it's a literally impossible task. So you just keep listening to the incomprehensible words coming out of the two pokemon's mouths. Once or twice, though, you hear Celebi repeating 'cutie', so you assume she's talking about the first human word she learned. Mew seems pretty excited with the thing.

Finally, after a while, Celebi and Mew decide to hit the hay. Celebi, as careful as she can be, removes you from her lap and lies down at the feet of a huge tree, soon followed by Mew.

The green legendary looks at you for a moment, before smiling warmly.
"Cutie~" she says, before moving you towards her lips, giving you a long smooch on you cheek, threatening to pull your face off along her lips. Even though she didn't, she still left a furiously-blushing you staring at her as she lowers you on her belly, laying you down on it.

"Good night you two." Celebi proclaims.
"Good night. See you in the morning." Mew replies, looking at you.
"Uh, right. Night." you reply sheepishly.

Both pair of blue eyes close, while two long, green arms wrap around your body, like a blanket, pressing you into Celebi's belly. Soon she falls asleep, you can tell by the constant rising and falling of the green land beneath you.

You are still reluctant to sleep though. You perfectly know that you promised Weavile you'd go 'visit' her, but the events of the day left your extremely tired. You don't know if it's the case to leave. What if you accidentally fall asleep in the middle of the woods and some wild pokemon eats you without any second thought? That's too much of a risk.

But maybe you could make it to the cave unharmed, due the inactivity of many pokemon right now... But then again, you're currently being squeezed in a quite tight hug from your green pokemon companion. If she feels you escaping her grasp, she could wake up and notice you leaving. Then she'll surely get mad at you, which may result quite... unhappy for you.

In the end, after many minutes of deciding, you manage to choose...
1352112121112122112111221122112112121121.title: They miss, you win.

choices: Something catches your attention. Is that Weavile?
1352112121112122112111221122112112121121.content:
You yawn tiredly.
"I can't go to Weavile like this." you whisper.

Deciding that you'll find her later on, you get comfy the best you can and close your eyes, trying to get some sleep. The comforting warmth emanated by Celebi's soft skin, plus the soothing sounds coming from within her body and the constant movements of the dark green land you're laying on, are a great aid.

In fact, you soon drift off to sleep.

Too bad your dreams aren't as good as your bed is.

You find yourself no longer laying on Celebi's comfy belly, but instead sitting on the hard, cold ground.
"Must have fell off." you state, before realizing that Mew and Celebi aren't here anymore.

You're completely alone. In a dark forest full of pokemon ready to make you a perfect midnight snack.

"Celebi? Mew?" you call out, desperately hoping they are around here.
"Mew... Celebi... please come out... this isn't funny... please..." you get no reply.

With your fear rising, you start looking around, with the hope that you manage to find anything that could tell you wherever the two pokemon are.

Unluckily, you find nothing like that, but you manage to make out two bright blue eyes staring at you. You can't quite see the body of the pokemon because of the darkness.
"C-Celebi?" you call out hopefully.

The creature that comes out upon hearing your call isn't Celebi at all. Your blood freezes in your veins. The two blue eyes, you figure out with horror, belong to a slim, black, fox like pokemon with a long, red mane.
'Please don't be her please don't be her please don't be her!' you mentally scream.

"Hello slave." she says in a frosty voice. Damn it!
"I see those two left you alone." she continues, smirking.
"This is going to be fun." she moves a step towards you.
You try to back away, but your legs seem to be freezed. And you can just stare with fear as Zoroark approaches you...

Celebi opens her black eyelids, revealing her blue eyes. Something's moving on top of her. Looking up, she notices her little guy struggling on her belly.

She giggles silently.
"Nightmares, sweetie?" she whispers, starting to caress your head with a finger.
"Don't worry. Celebi is here for you." she pecks your head.

Smiling upon seeing your struggles stopping, Celebi lies back down and wraps her paws around you tightly.
"Sweet dreams little guy." she says, soon returning to sleep.

You don't know what just happened. Zoroark was there, ready to grab you in her infamous clawed paws... but she suddenly disappeared. Somehow, you are now sitting on a grassy field. Sitting in front of you is Celebi, smiling warmly at you.

Then, you start levitating to her, her lips pucker up, ready to smooch you...

You open your eyes.
"That was weird..." you state, noticing you're covered in sweat.
Wiping some of the liquid away, you try to collect your thoughts, concluding that you just had a nightmare.

You try to calm down a bit. That nightmare left you terrified. Sighing, you lie down again, hoping that you'll manage to sleep again...
1352112121112122112111221122112112121121.title: Demons of the dreams.

1352112121112122112111221122112112121121.content:
Sighing, you decide to give up on going and find Weavile tonight. You're extremely tired and currently squeezed tightly between Celebi's paws and the dark green skin of her belly, so it's literally impossible for you to get free or even walk.

So you just lay back down as your eyes close once again. You quickly fall asleep as your mind drifts off yet again.

Unfortunately, your slumber is once again disturbed by another nightmare.

You open your eyes to see you're no longer in Ilex Forest: you're in a cave.
"Whe-where am I?" you ask yourself, as booming footsteps are heard. Soon, a black, clawed paw steps in front of you.

It takes you several seconds of looking up, but you manage to see Weavile, towering above you, a toothy grin on her face.
"Weavile, thank goodness, can you help me?" you ask with a smile.
"Oh sure, I'll help you..." she says, scooping you in her paws.
"Oh tha-" you try to say, but she cuts you off.
"Help you get in my stomach little snack!" she snickers.

"What? I thought we were friends!" you yell, all your relief turning into terror.
"Yeah, right. I lied, so you would have stopped whining." she states, licking her lips.

No! This isn't happening, this isn't possible! Weavile throws you up in the air. You see her opening her fang filled mouth. You scream at top of your lungs as you fall to your death...

"Little guy wake up!" your eyes shut open. You notice you're completely covered in sweat.
"Little guy?" the voice calls again.

You slowly shift your gaze upwards. You notice two pairs of blue eyes staring at you with worry, while a large, green finger rubs your head.
"What happened?" you ask weakly.
"You should tell us! You were screaming like crazy! And you woke us up!" Mew's telepathic voice rings inside your head.

"Sorry... I think I had a nightmare... It was horrible..." you mutter.
"Another one? Dear." Celebi replies, while shoving you into her belly, hugging you.
"Hey, what do you mean by 'another one'?" Mew asks.
"I think he had another nightmare earlier, he was struggling in his sleep, like he was trying to get away from something bad... or someone..." Celebi explains. Mew nods.

"Hey, I've got an idea. Maybe I can find something nice to calm your nerves." Celebi smiles warmly, while gently settling you down on the ground. She then starts floating away, disappearing into plants and darkness, leaving you next you Mew.

"Little guy, what did you exactly dreamt about?" Mew asks you, her tail starting to rub against your back.
"Well, I dreamt about that Zoroark. She wanted to eat me again... I was alone..." you reply.
"And then? You had two nightmares, right?".
"Well... I don't remember..." you reply, not wanting to reveal about Weavile.

Mew nods silently as her tail retreats. You just sit there, silently looking at the point where Celebi disappeared a few minutes ago.

The whole forest is completely silent, not one noise disturbing its quietness, with the exception of the night breeze.

Then, suddenly, some plants starts to shake, breaking the silence. You stare curiously as...
1352112121112122112111221122112112121121.title: A horrible night.

1352112121112122112111221122112112121121.content:
You stare curiously at the shaking plants, thinking it may be another wild pokemon ready to kidnap or, very probably, try to make a snack out of you. Mew is probably thinking the same thing, since she suddenly gets up, her paws glowing blue, forming a small sphere.

But your fears reveal to be unfounded. Thanks to the pale moonlight, you are able to see a green pokemon coming out. The sphere that has formed in Mew's paws instantly disappears as Celebi gets closer, holding a small, red berry.
"Found it." she says with a smile, flying over you.

Her paw wraps around your upper body and lifts you off the ground, bringing you at her chest level. She hands you the berry, which is as big as your head. You recognize it as a cheri berry. You look up to see Celebi looking at you hopefully.
"Uh... Thanks?" you say. A huge smile brightens her face as she sits down at the feet of a big tree, soon imitated by Mew, who's staring at the scene giggling.

You eat the berry fastly. Its sweet taste calms your nerves a bit. Just then, Mew yawns.
"I guess I'm going to sleep. See you in the morning." she says, laying down. Celebi looks at her for a second, before turning to you, who are still grasped solidly in her paws.
"Well my little one, I guess it's bedtime for us too." she says, laying down, while settling you down on her belly.

One of her paws wraps around your body, while the other finds its way to caress your head slowly. You sigh. This is going to be your life now.
"Thank you Celebi..." you say. If this 'relationship' with Celebi has to go on, might as well be nice to her.

The green pokemon smiles hearing your words and pecks your head. Then, she resumes petting you with her free paw. You just seem to remember how tired you were before. In fact, with a last yawn, you fall into a deep slumber.

Celebi keeps caressing her little guy's head until she hears a soft, faint snoring. Smiling, she understands that her tiny boy just fell asleep. Cute. Her paw stops its activity to wrap around his body, like the other one.

Celebi then closes her bright blue eyes. Giving one last, happy smile, she drifts off as well.
1352112121112122112111221122112112121121.title: Celebi returns.

1352112121112122112111221122112112121121.content:
Dawn eventually takes place in the sky, sunlight brightening the clearing where the shrine dedicated to a certain green pokemon is situated. And where the same green pokemon, her pink friend and you are still sleeping at the feet of a tree.

Maybe it was the fact that Celebi soothed you to sleep, maybe the Cheri Berry helped you to sleep, or maybe it was the constant movements coming from the living surface beneath your small body cradling you to sleep, but you managed to rest for all night long like you hadn't in quite some time, your nightmares not daring to disturb your slumber again. Much more nice dreams replaced them, with the effect of a sweet sleep for you.

You're still snoring, unaware of the world around you. Instead, the green time traveler giantess you're laying on suddenly gives a yawn and wakes up, her dark eyelids opening. It takes her mind a few seconds to remember about you.

Raising her head, she looks down at you. She smiles seeing you still soundly asleep. Carefully to not wake you up, she snatches you from her belly and raises her back to sit against the trunk of the tree she slept under.

Gently, Celebi deposits you on her lap. The grass type stares at you, silently laughing to herself.
"Still asleep, my little one? I'm not surprised after last night." she whispers sweetly, while one of her green finger slowly slides on your head, petting you.

Celebi just sits there, waiting for either you or Mew to wake up. And soon enough, her pink friend starts moving in her sleep, before opening her sapphire eyes. Stirring Mew gets up as well.

She looks around for a moment, before spotting her smiling friend.
"Good morning Mew." Celebi greets the pink pokemon. Mew smiles at her friend.
"Where's little guy?" she asks. In response, Celebi points to you, who are still sleeping on her lap.
"Wow, I never thought someone could wake up after me." she laughs, sending Celebi into laughter as well.

A while passes as you sleep. Celebi and Mew are now having breakfast, while chatting and occasionally laughing. Though none of that does any actual progress in waking you up.

Eventually, the two pokemon grow bored to wait for you to wake up.
"Man, I'm bored!" Mew whines.
"Me too. Wanna play?" Celebi asks.
"I'm listening." Mew says, a smile forming on her lips.
"How about a friendly battle? It's been forever since the last one." Celebi suggests.

The pink pokemon seems excited with the idea.
"You're right, I'm in!" she beams.
"Very well then. Come on!".

The two pokemon fly in front of each other.
"Ready?" Mew asks with growing excitement.
"When you are." Celebi replies.
1352112121112122112111221122112112121121.title: The next morning.

choices: Celebi and Mew get up. They want to play again... with you...
A wild pokemon shows up, curious about the explosion...
1352112121112122112111221122112112121121.content:
While you keep sleeping, Celebi scoops you up. She moves toward her shrine to place you down on it, but she stops, remembering something, about how, two days ago, the tiny human was kidnapped by that Zoroark because of her. What if another pokemon comes out, grabs her little guy and flees?

Celebi shakes her head. No way she's going to let that happen ever again. She's going to be extra careful with you from now on.

"Celebi? What's wrong?" Mew worried voice stops her train of thought. The green pokemon turns around to face her friend.
"What you're waiting for? Come on, put the little guy down and let's get to battle!" Mew cheers, waving her paws, all her excitement returned in a matter of seconds.

Celebi thinks about what to do for still a few seconds, before finally talking.
"About that... I'm not really sure. I mean, remember that Zoroark who took him? It was all my fault." Celebi says.
"Yeah, good that you don't know about the Weavile..." Mew mutters.
"What?"
"Nothing!" Mew quickly says, mentally remembering to keep her mouth shut close about That. If Celebi ever finds out, she'll most probably stop talking to her. If she's lucky.

Luckily for Mew, the green time traveler decides to forget it and goes on.
"Anyway, I was thinking little guy should stick with me." she says.
"But you can't exactly fight if you hold him with your paws." Mew states.

Celebi sighs. Her friend is right. If she protects her little boy, there goes her fun. She wonders what to do for a minute, before she has an idea.
"I got it!" she exclaims.

And, before Mew can ask what she's talking about, the little guy floats out of her friend's paws, surrounded by a deep blue aura. He does not fall, though, he keeps floating in midair, between herself and Celebi. Mew notices Celebi's eyes glowing the same blue surrounding the human.

Realizing Celebi is using psychic, Mew smiles.
"Okay, now that's settled... ready?" she asks, getting into fighting stance.
"You bet!" Celebi exclaims with determination.

Then, without adding any other word, Mew's paws lit with energy as she fires focus blast. Celebi avoids the attack, as large rocks start to float around her. She throws them right at Mew, but she simply teleports, not a single rock hitting her. She reappears with a smirk across her face.
"Good one! But you'll have to do better!" she laughs playfully.
"That's just the beginning!" Celebi retorts, laughing as well.

Even though explosions, laughs and excited squeals can be heard in almost the whole forest, you stay asleep the whole time, your mind still far away in dreamland. On one hand, that's a good thing; you wouldn't like to wake up while you're floating in midair, while two huge pokemon throw moves that could kill you in one instant at each other.

Back at the fight, Mew is hit by the thousands of leaves from Celebi's leaf storm. She's sent flying back. Then, plants coming from the soil wrap around her body, keeping her from moving. Mew notices her friend absorbing sunlight.

Laughing, Mew uses ember to get rid of the plants blocking her and forms an azure sphere in her paws.
Celebi uses solar beam, while Mew fires ice beam. The two beams collide, exploding instantly. When the smoke clears up, Celebi and Mew are floating in front of each other, smiling and panting.
"Like last time?" Mew asks after catching her breath.
"Like last time." Celebi confirms.

The two pokemon fly back. Mew glows with power as a blue sphere takes place in her paws. Smiling, Celebi crates a huge green ball of energy. Both pokemon stare at each other, before throwing the spheres, which collide. Energy ball blocks aura sphere for a few seconds, before the two attacks explode, creating a huge cloud of smoke, and waking you in the meantime.

Both Celebi and Mew are sent flying backwards against a tree, you following along Celebi's psychic. It's a miracle she didn't drop her psychic grasp on you while she fought. Otherwise, you would have fell to your death.

Your two pokemon companions laugh uncontrollably.
"Uh, Celebi?" you call out, not quite realizing the situation. Immediately, you start to float over Celebi and you're dropped in her open paws.

She squeezes the air out of your tiny lungs as she hugs you, not stopping laughing, the vibrations coming from beneath you, along the lack of oxygen, threaten to make you throw up. Luckily, Celebi softens her grip. Still, she does plant a kiss on your forehead.
"Uhh, care to explain what's going on?" you ask.
"Just having some fun." Mew's happy voice says in your head.
"Yeah, like I will be doing with you once I recover, little cutie~" Celebi says playfully. You gulp down hard. You learned what happens when Celebi talks with the mischievous voice.

You lie there on Celebi for what seems hours, while the two pokemon recover from that huge display of power. Every once in a while, Celebi would start caressing your head with a finger, while muttering incomprehensible words of affection.
Mew would just giggle at the scene, finding it sickeningly cute.

Then, after a good while...
1352112121112122112111221122112112121121.title: Friendly battle: Celebi vs Mew!

choices: Weavile is here... and she looks somewhat pissed...
Weavile is not here, go back.
1352112121112122112111221122112112121121.content:
Suddenly, two shadows obscure your body. You look up, noticing that the pokemon are standing up, towering over you, smile painted on their faces.
"What?" you inquire, starting to worry. You don't like those smiles, you're pretty sure they mean that Celebi and Mew are intentioned to play.

Celebi bends and scoops you in her paws as gently as she can. Almost crushing your ribcage and knocking the air out of you.
"Cutie~" Celebi says with affection, while you pant to catch your breath, in a huge (though pretty much useless) effort.

Just when the Ilex Forest's guardian notices you struggling for oxygen and softens her grip on you, air starts to fill your lungs again.
"Sorry!" she exclaims with a sorrowful voice.
"W... What now?" you ask once again, panting.

"Well, we want to play little guy. Are you in?" Mew asks as if nothing happened right now.
"Play what?" you ask. Mew smiles at this one point.
"Well, we have quite some ideas about that." she states.

You can't help but feel the excitement in her voice. Which means that, whatever the two have in store for you, it's going to be absolutely no fun for you. You look at Celebi; her mischievous smile is all you need to confirm your thesis: you won't like it one bit.


You groan. You're now laying down on Celebi's belly while she sleeps, Mew sleeping beside her, the moon up in the sky.

You were right, you had to play all day long, until sun settled down over the horizon. Your back hurts. A lot. You had to go through many games, such as hide and seek, cat and mouse, and you even had to run while Celebi and Mew chased you. Without flying. You swear you can still feel your heart beating like crazy since Celebi almost stepped on you.

You slide down on the ground, pushing on your own back.
"Ouch!" you yelp in pain.
"Urgh, Celebi I agreed to stay with you alright, but I'll never do this again." you whisper.

Taking a few steps to make sure you can walk properly, you head toward the dark depths of Ilex Forest. Probably, She's waiting for you. Probably she's worried because you didn't go to the cave last night.

It takes you almost an hour, but you manage to get to the cavern where you where you were almost eaten two days ago.
Wiping sweat away from your face, you peek into the cave...
1352112121112122112111221122112112121121.title: Celebi and Mew get up. They want to play again....

1352112121112122112111221122112112121121.content:
You look into the cave. Everything inside is dark and completely quiet. And, if it wasn't for the crimson red 'crown', you would have never noticed Weavile sitting there, legs and arms crossed. Even when it's dark, you can still see her claws shining menacingly.

Quietly, you make your way inside the cavern.
"Ahem." you try to clear your throat. Too bad it sounds more like a scared squeak. Though, it still draws Weavile's attention to you.
"Human? Is that you?" comes her voice.
"Yes, it's me. I don't think enemies would make their presence known." you reply.
"Hmph. Good point." she says, in a somewhat cold voice.

You don't reply, walking to the sitting giantess, who extends a clawed paw in front of you. You climb on it.

Your world shakes as the giantess gets up, walking out of the cavern, examining you at moonlight. Her red eyes are fixated on you as they seem to scan within your soul. You start to feel uncomfortable.
"So... how are you?' you try to break the ice.
"I'm Fine." she mutters in response without dropping the annoyed tone she's been using since you stepped into the cave.

You return her gaze.
"Okay, this is ridiculous. Just tell me what's wrong." you inquire.
"You're asking me what's wrong? You should know too well, human. Why didn't you come last night?" she asks back, her voice now filled with ice.
"Long story short, I couldn't."
"And that is because...?" she asks again.
"I dare you to try and break free from two arms the size of trucks." you partially lie.

Weavile nods.
"Still, that doesn't change the fact I was worried! I thought some pokemon killed you!" the weasel like pokemon exclaims.
"Be sure Celebi would have killed it right then..." you reply.

Weavile sighs deeply.
"Look, I'm not mad at you." she admits, finally dropping her icy voice, that is now replaced by the best caring tone she can talk with.
"But don't do that anymore, alright? You really scared me.".
You sigh. Guilt is the last thing you need right now. Still, you find yourself nodding your head.

Weavile's mouth curls up in her usual smirk.
"Good. How about a hug?" she asks. Images of your body slashed to pieces cross your mind.
"No!" you exclaim, pale as death, sending Weavile into snickering.
"Ju-Just kidding you know." she says, unable to control her laughter.
"Not funny." you whisper, startled.
"Please, don't do that again...".
"No promises" she laughs.

You can't really figure out what's happening right now. Talking about making it up to you for her joke,
Weavile placed you on her head a couple of minutes ago, before climbing on a tree and starting to jump from tree to tree, heading to an unknown destination. You tried to ask her where she's going a few times.
"Wait and see." is the only reply you managed to get from her.

After what seems hours, Weavile finally stops on one last branch, before climbing down to the ground easily. From what you can see, you're in a small clearing, which ends with a slope. The whole place is completely enlightened by moonlight, giving it a mystical atmosphere.

"Where are we?" you ask, while Weavile gently picks you and places you down. Tall blades of grass surround you, almost like a tiny forest.
"It's a very secluded area. I think even Celebi herself doesn't know about it." the black weasel states.
"I doubt that." you reply, while your mind goes back to Celebi. She indeed knows each inch of her forest... so, what would happen if she wakes up right now and, not finding you cuddled to her, tries to find you? Most likely, she'd find you within five minutes, which would end bad for both Weavile and you.

You shake your head. Celebi is supposed to be protective toward Ilex Forest's inhabitants... except for the ones she believes a threat for you. You remember Zoroark, and how the green time traveler sent her Arceus knows where.

You return to reality, feeling something poking you. You quickly realize it's Weavile.
"Anybody in there?" she asks.
"Oh, yes, sorry. I was thinking." you reply.

Laughing, the dark type walks over the slope and sits down. Quietly, you reach her, making grass rustle as you walk. You sit beside Weavile.
"Look down." she says you. You do as she asked and look down. A literal sea of flowers dominates a field beneath you.
"Wow, that's amazing!"
"Indeed. As I told you, not many pokemon know about this place. I feel lucky to have found it." Weavile says, using a happy voice for the first time since you know her.

Both of you stay silent, just enjoying the enchanting place in its beauty. Until...
"Little guy? Where are you?" a voice cries distantly. Weavile immediately jumps on her paws, alerted, while your heart seems to freeze. You could recognize that 'le bi le bi' everywhere. What Celebi is doing here? She should be sleeping... unless... the thought from before somehow came true, and she woke up, noticing you missing. You're in trouble now...

Weavile looks at you. You can see pearly drops of sweat running down her face.
"She's looking for you, what are we going to do?" she whispers, fear pretty noticeable in her voice.

You hastily try to think of something, your brain working hard to find something that could save both your skin and Weavile's fur. But you can't think of anything but either hide in the grass, or try to come up with an excuse.

Celebi's voice gets closer and closer, she's coming here!
"I got it!" you exclaim.
1352112121112122112111221122112112121121.title: Weavile is here... and she looks somewhat pisse...

choices: You are awakened by a loud bang.
1352112121112122112111221122112112121121.content:
Without losing anymore time, you hide in the tall grass, disappearing into the thick 'forest'. Right before Celebi comes into view.

Celebi scans around the small clearing, hoping to spot her little one somewhere. She woke up because of a bad dream, and she noticed that her little guy was no longer laying on her belly. And, without waking Mew, Celebi ventured alone into her beloved Ilex Forest, trying to find the human somewhere.

A rustling sound makes turn her head.
"Cutie?" that word, the only one she learned, but correctly pronounced in her little boy's language, should catch his attention. But she gets no reply. Instead, Celebi just seems to notice a lone pokemon, a Weavile, standing there, seeming to not have noticed her. Maybe it saw her little guy!
"Excuse me...".

Weavile gulps. Whatever the tiny human has in mind, she hopes it works. Feigning an indifferent expression, Weavile turns around to face the mythical time traveler. She's never seen her so closely, and it's years she lives in this forest. Her only presence, along with the thoughts of what she could do to her if the plan fails, is enough to make her heart race with fear.

"Yes?" Weavile asks in a neutral tone, trying to keep her composure.

In the meantime, Celebi is choosing her words carefully: Weaviles are known to be formidable predators.
"I'm sorry, do you happen to have seen a weird looking bug? That looks like a tiny human?" she asks. Weavile pretends to be surprised.
"A bug that looks like a tiny human? I've never heard of something like that... but, no, I didn't see it, sorry..." she replies.

You stay perfectly still. You can't risk of being discovered, so you try to stay as quiet as possible. You can hear Celebi and Weavile talking to each other. Then, you hear an irritated screech and the noise of leaves shaking. Then, after two minutes of silence, a voice speaks up.
"Human? You still there?" you recognize it as Weavile.
"She left, you can come out." she adds.

Celebi flies through the forest. The Weavile hasn't seen her little boy. She groans. Where could he be? Why couldn't she talk through telepathy, like Mew? And why in the world did he leave in the middle of the night?! A whole lot of questions is now occupying the green pokemon's mind.

Sitting down, Celebi tries to think of something. But the only idea she can think of is trying to use telepathy. She sighs. Even though she doesn't know it... trying won't hurt. So she focuses, trying to send thoughts in your mind.
'Hello?'.

'Hello?' a voice says in your mind, startling you. What was that?
'Hello? Little guy?' the voice talks again.
'...Mew?' you think.
'No silly, it's me, Celebi!' the voice exclaims in your head, revealing you who is talking.
'Celebi? Are you using telepathy?' you ask back, confused.
'No... I can't learn that... This is more... I think this is a small psychic connection that has formed between us. It allows me to talk to you!' Celebi exclaims happily.

And then she remembers what she was doing before.
'Hey, why did you leave anyway? In the middle of the night? And most of all, alone?' she now sounds pissed.

You quickly think of an excuse.
'Ehm, you know, I was thirsty and I went searching for some water. I was just heading back...' you mentally reply.
'Alright, fine. But don't do it again, I was worried!' Celebi's voice exclaims.
'Sorry...' you think.
'Don't worry. Just come to the shrine, alright? I'll be waiting you there, I'm tired.' she replies.
'Okay, I'll try to get there fast.' you state.
'Be careful little guy. Later.' that said, Celebi stops talking.
"Hey! What's wrong?" you hear Weavile instead.

You look up to see Weavile's worried face.
"What?" you ask.
"What happened?" she asks back.
"I'll explain you later. But now, can you do me a favor?" you ask.

You explain the situation to Weavile as she dashes across Ilex Forest.
"I see. A connection. So that is why you suddenly got weird." she states.
"Yes. I was talking with Celebi." you confirm from her head, as she stops, gently scooping you and letting you down on the ground.
"So, I'll be seeing you later?" she asks.
"If everything goes smoothly, very probably yes." you reply.
Nodding, Weavile turns around and dashes away, soon disappearing, engulfed in plants and darkness.

You sigh and walk into the clearing where the shrine is placed. As expected, Celebi and Mew are laying at its feet.
"Celebi?" you call out. The mythical pokemon raises her head, smiling at the sight of you.
'Finally. There you are.' the voice from before, which you now know that belongs to Celebi, talks in your head.

You walk over the green giantess, who extends a paw for you to climb on. You hop on it as she retreats it to her face.
She pecks your face, before pressing you into her cheek, nuzzling you.

"Biiiiiiii!" she lets out a deep yawn.
"You're tired, aren't you?" you ask her. She nods in response.
'Good night my little one. Sleep tight.' her voice rings in your mind as she lies you down on her belly.
'Please, don't leave without me knowing again.' she adds, her paws wrapping around your small body, keeping it still.
"I won't." you lie, knowing that you'll have to next night.

But Celebi just smiles, proceeding to move one of her paws to your head, gently running her three fingers through you hair, soothing you.

You sigh. This is actually the first time in three days that you feel fully safe and relaxed around the green pokemon. If you ever return to your normal size, you think, nobody is going to believe your story. It sounds pretty crazy, thinking about it.
'At least we can communicate now. Things will be easier like this.' you think to yourself, before closing your eyes. And, in a few minutes, you fall asleep.

Celebi keeps petting her little guy until she feels him snoring quietly. She giggles, removing her paw from her tiny human's head to wrap it back around his form.
"We finally found a way to talk little cutie." she says in a whisper.
"Can't wait to see Mew's face when I tell her tomorrow. But I'm not giving up on talking human language. You'll have to teach me that, wether you want it or not." she giggles, before yawning again.

"I really should to sleep now." Celebi whispers, her eyes closing, her breath slowing down as she relaxes. And, shortly after, she joins both Mew and her little guy in dreamland.
1352112121112122112111221122112112121121.title: Hide!

choices: Celebi and Mew try to rescue you.
1352112121112122112111221122112112121121.content:
Your eyes open. You heard what seemed an explosion. Apparently, Celebi and Mew heard it too, because they suddenly rise themselves in midair.

"What was that?" Mew asks, rubbing her eyes.
"No clue. Maybe some branch fell from a tree." Celebi suggests.
"Or a whole lot of branches." Mew says. Before replying, Celebi remembers about you and looks down at you, who are still enclosed in her arms.

She notices you awake.
'What happened?' she asks you.
'I don't know.' you reply, remembering about the newfound connection between the two of you.

Celebi sighs.
'Looks like we aren't sleeping tonight, are we?' she says.
'Apparently'.

Mew starts poking Celebi's arm.
"What?" she asks. In all response, Mew points to a black figure, blue rings shining brightly in the night. Both you and Celebi quickly realize it's a wild Umbreon. And a shiny one, judging from the blue rings on its body.

You assume that it's probably the responsible of the noise you heard before.

The three pokemon eye each other for a full-of-tension minute. Then, the Umbreon's eyes shift on you, scanning your little body with interest. Celebi squeezes you in a protective manner.

But then, the Umbreon suddenly disappears, striking Mew just then.
Realizing it just used quick attack, you stare at Mew, who recovers. Electricity starts to flow through her paw as she uses thunder punch on her opponent.

Celebi glows of many colors, using dazzling gleam to aid her best friend. The Umbreon doesn't even try to dodge. Instead, it lets the attacks land. Even though darkness, you can see its muzzle curling into a smirk.

And then, the Umbreon glows blackish purple, before tackling Mew, who is sent flying into a tree, not getting back up.

You realize that the move Umbreon used was payback. And, since Mew attacked it first, the damage was doubled...

Before she could do anything to help her friend, Celebi gets hit by payback as well. She is sent flying as well, next to Mew. Her grip on you weakens, but she still refuses to let go of you.
"I'm not going down just yet." she states, somehow standing up and back in midair.

Celebi gently lets you on the ground, before turning to the Umbreon, who seems amused in Celebi's determination. It used quick attack again, but Celebi dodges it, before cloaking herself in multicolored leaves, throwing them at the Umbreon, who is hit by magical leaf. The shiny pokemon groans in pain, while slowly getting back on all fours.

The two pokemon fight for a while, until the Umbreon, dodging a powerful leaf storm, uses foul play, hitting Celebi in the stomach, sending her crashing into a tree.

And, without waiting for her to recover, the Umbreon walks over you with unnerving slowness. You glare up at it, as its two black paws, which are literally black pillars of fur from your point of view, step in front of you. The Umbreon stares down at you with curiosity, its blue rings shining of a blinding light.

Then, after observing you for a while, it opens its mouth, lowering it toward you. You stand tall, expecting it to trap you inside its mouth. But, instead, the Umbreon's fangs close around your shirt, scooping you off ground as it raises its head, letting your body hang from its lips.

Then, the Umbreon starts to walk away...
1352112121112122112111221122112112121121.title: You are awakened by a loud bang.

choices: Try to heal Eevee with Umbreon's help.
A pokemon comes into the cave. It's... Weavile?
1352112121112122112111221122112112121121.content:
Hanging from the Umbreon's lips, you look at Celebi and Mew, who are still knocked out. You can't help but glare up at this new dark type who, undisturbed, begins carrying you away. You don't even attempt to struggle, knowing that, if the Umbreon opens its fangs, the fall would kill you as soon you make contact with the ground. And so you you just let it carry you away, bitter thoughts about you being useless surfacing in your mind.

You are able to see where Umbreon is going thanks to the light coming from its rings. You can't figure out wherever the pokemon is going though. The only things you can see are plants and your helpless body hanging like a common toy...
'But where is this pokemon carrying me?' you think, looking up at Umbreon. You've already met pokemon that could speak the human language perfectly in this forest, but you can't guess if this one Umbreon has that ability. And, with its fangs currently closed around your shirt, it can't produce any sound.


Celebi starts to move as she slowly regains consciousness. It takes her a few seconds to remember what happened. Her head starts to dart in every direction, hoping to spot your tiny body somewhere. Not finding you, Celebi realizes what happened.

She quickly founds Mew laying against a tree. Celebi flies over her, starting to shake her body.
"Mew... wake up... Mew..." Celebi tries to awake her friend. Luckily, it seems to work, as Mew slowly opens her sapphire eyes.
"C-Celebi? What happened? I remember getting hit by payback and everything went dark." Mew says.
"You fainted. That Umbreon knocked me out as well, and she took my little guy away!" the small time traveler exclaims with both irritation and worry.

"What are we going to do then?" Mew asks, her attention fully turned to Celebi now. Mew had always been playful and cheerful, but when it came down to her friends, she became dead serious.
"We rescue him of course! I swear I'm going to find little guy before dawn, or else I'm going to give up on the title of legendary!" Celebi exclaims, her eyes shining venomously.
That said, the green legendary focuses.
'Little guy? Can you hear me?'.

You shiver. You just heard Celebi calling you once again.
'Yes, I can.' you think, replying to Celebi's question.
'Thank Arceus, you're alive. Where are you?' she asks again.
'Uhm... don't quite know... but I'm hanging from the Umbreon's lips, it's heading somewhere...' you inform Celebi.
'Alright. Hold on little one, we're coming!' she replies. With that, the connection interrupts.

"He's alive. But he's still with the Umbreon, we gotta go find him!" Celebi exclaims.
"How did you know these things?" Mew inquires curiously.
"I'll explain you later. For now, let's just find that Umbreon!".
"You're right, let's go!" Mew exclaims, following Celebi into the forest.

The Umbreon keeps walking for what seems an eternity, but it's really an hour or so. Until it suddenly stops in front of a cave, which is covered by leaves, making it hard to find. Silently, it walks inside, making leaves swish at its passage.

Once inside, the Umbreon lowers its head to the ground, its mouth opening to let you go. A small cry, coming from the depths of the cave, catches your ears. Looking forward, you notice a small Eevee, covered in a huge leaf, shivering.

And then, the Umbreon suddenly talks...
"You're a human, right?" it asks, sounding female. You look up at her.
"What do you want from me?".
"Are you a human or not?" Umbreon inquires once again, clearly nervous. You choose your words carefully.
"Yes, I am. Why?' you ask back.
