"You're a human. You can fix Eevee!" Umbreon suddenly exclaims.

"W-What?" you ask.
"You heard me. Eevee is sick. You can help." Umbreon replies.
"And you had to knock out my friends and kidnap me - and all of this in the middle of the nigh - for this?" you ask.
"I was searching for food, but I found you. If you help me, I'll bring you back to those legendaries. But you're not moving from here until Eevee is fixed." Umbreon states.
"But what is it to you?" you ask.
"He's... he's my little brother... I've tried to heal him myself, but he didn't got any better..." Umbreon lowers herself to face you.
"Help him... I beg you..." she suddenly says, a single tear rolling down her cheek. You facepalm. Guilt feelings be damned!

You gulp as you get closer to the Eevee. You touch his forehead, quickly retreating your hand: it burns.
"He's got fever." you whisper to yourself. You're not sure of what to do. You learned how to heal pokemon back at school, but you never had to deal with sick pokemon. Maybe, if you can wait for Celebi and Mew to find you, they could help, somehow... Although you do remember that some medical herbs can be found around here. Maybe you can convince Umbreon to find them...

You shake your head, thousands of thoughts threatening to blow up your head.
'What to do?' you ask yourself, hoping that Celebi and Mew show up soon... even though you're sure they would most likely attack Umbreon before for kidnapping you before understanding the situation...
1352112121112122112111221122112112121121.title: Umbreon's problem.

choices: Just then, Celebi and Mew break in!
1352112121112122112111221122112112121121.content:
"Umbreon?" you call out for the shiny pokemon.
"What?" she asks, tilting her head in an inquisitive manner.
"I know what to do to heal Eevee, but I need your help to find specific herbs that should help him recover. I know they are found around here." you declare.

Umbreon seems confused though.
"Herbs? Didn't you humans got things to heal sick pokemon? How do you call those?" she asks you.
"Medicines. And I've got nothing like that with me, so we'll have to arrange with what we've got." you reply.

Umbreon stays silent for a few seconds, as if taking in every word you said, before nodding. She then walks over you and lowers her head, placing a paw by her muzzle.
"Climb on. I'll help you." she says.

You do as told and climb on her paw, which she moves up to her head. You hop on it as Umbreon makes her way out of the cavern.

"It's been a while, where can we find these herbs?" Umbreon asks impatiently.
"Be quiet, we don't need pokemon attacking us. And I told you, they're supposed to grow somewhere around here." you reply, trying to find what you're looking for. The light from Umbreon's rings is a great help, yet you still didn't find anything similar to the particular herbs you saw back at school.

Until you manage to spot something which can be distinguished from the grass because of a darker green color. A revival herb!
"Hey Umbreon, I found it!" you yell up to the dark type, who raises her head from the grass. She sticks her tongue out at the sight of your catch.
"A revival herb? That's disgusting!" she exclaims.
"But it can help. I need a few more things though. Let's go." you state while Umbreon lets you ride on her head once again.

"Okay, if I'm right, this is an energy root." you huff, picking up the object and coming out of the sea of roots you just ventured in. You couldn't breathe down there, and it took quite some time to find the energy root.
"Good job human. What else do you need?" Umbreon inquires.
"Well, we need some energy powder, a sitrus berry and some water. If we can find those things, we'll be able to heal Eevee." you state.

"What are we waiting for then? Let's go!" she exclaims, clearly wanting to help her little sibling. She uses psychic to lift the root out of your hands. It joins the revival herbs you found earlier and starts floating behind her. Umbreon lifts you on her head, before walking off.

The dark type carries you over a stream of water.
"Okay, we found everything you said, we just need water now, right?" Umbreon asks.
"Indeed. The only problem is: how do we get it?" you ask.

As if replying to your question, several leaves float from the nearby trees over Umbreon thanks to her psychic. They start wrapping around each other, forming some sort of bowl.
"Good idea." you compliment the dark type.
"Oh hush. Let's get over with this." she replies, even though you can feel she liked being complimented.

Quietly, she dunks the leaf bowl into the stream, filling it up with water. The bowl joins the four other things behind Umbreon.
"Careful, don't spill it." you warn Umbreon.
"Okay then, now I should be able to make Eevee recover." you say. The shiny pokemon nods.
"Thank you... for all the help..." she says. You can feel the gratefulness in her voice.
"Don't thank me yet, we're not done." you state. She nods again.

But, as she starts carrying you off...
'Hey.' a voice speaks in your head.
'Celebi?'.
'Yes. Have you figured out where you are?' she asks.
'Yes. I'm in a cave. Its entrance is covered with leaves." you reply, making her know where to go.
'Covered with leaves? I think I know that place. Hold on, we're coming! We'll save you!' she exclaims.
'About that, I'm not in...' you try, but the connection interrupts.
"... danger." you say out loud, your palm making contact with your face. Now the duo is going to think Umbreon is torturing you or something, and they'll probably blast her to oblivion as soon as they see her.

"Who are you talking to?" comes Umbreon's voice instead.
"Forget it, get to the cave as fast as you can." you say.
"Why?".
"Trust me, please." you tell her.
"If you say so..." she replies, speeding up.

You wish you hadn't said that. Umbreon is now dashing at full speed through the forest. You have to hang on for dear life to her short fur in order to not be sent flying off, turning into paste into a tree.

Finally, after what seems hours, Umbreon stops in front of the cave. She steps inside and lowers her head. You dizzily walk down on the rocky floor and head for the still shivering body of the Eevee, Umbreon joining you.
"You'll be fine now, hold on." she whispers to her little brother, before looking at you.
"Let's get over with it.".
1352112121112122112111221122112112121121.title: Try to heal Eevee with Umbreon's help.

1352112121112122112111221122112112121121.content:
Celebi has been flying through the dark forest for quite a while now, Mew following close, both heading to the cave the tiny human told them to go.

"Hey, you didn't tell me how you know where little guy is." Mew casually asked at one point.
"Long story short, there is a connection between us." Celebi replied without stopping her flight.
"A connection? Cool!" Mew then exclaimed with her usual excitement, momentarily forgetting the situation. But a look at her friend's face told Mew that Celebi wasn't up for a laugh.
So she went silent for a while.

The duo keeps flying until Celebi suddenly stops in front of a wall of leaves.
"There." she points to a small, well hidden opening in the leaves.
"The perfect hideout, uh?" Mew asks. Celebi nods.
"Ready?" she asks.
"Sure." Mew replies.


The things you and Umbreon collected are gently deposited on the rocky floor of the cavern.
"So, what now?" she asks you.
"Well, if I'm correct, Eevee should just ingest everything. He should feel fine soon." you reply, starting to stroke the small - at least, compared to Umbreon - pokemon absentmindedly. Umbreon nods.
"What are we waiting for? Let's..." she doesn't get to finish.

In a second, two pokemon burst in, startling both you and Umbreon. You immediately recognize them as your legendary companions. But, by the looks in their faces, they don't seem willing to hear any kind of explanation.

Umbreon gets into fighting stance.
"We'll tell you only once." Celebi states.
"Give us back the little guy and we're not going to hurt you." she points to you, not seeming, though, to notice the small, shaking pokemon covered by a leaf.
"Listen, I can explain everything..." Umbreon tries.

A blue sphere misses her of a centimeter, exploding into the back of the cave. Umbreon glares back at the two legendaries.
"If that's what you want..." she says, turning to you.
"You. Help Eevee. I'll handle these two." she says, before turning again and charging the two legendaries.

With a gulp and a nod, you turn to Eevee. Grabbing the revival herb, you move it in front of the normal type.
"Come on Eevee, open up." you whisper. The pokemon opens his eyes, giving a weak cry.
"Listen, I need you to open your mouth, I can help you feel better." you state. Eevee seems still wary.
"Look, your big sister there helped me collect this stuff for you. She trusted me, so I need you to trust me as well." you say, desperately trying to convince the normal type.

And it seems to work. Eevee points his gaze to his currently fighting sibling. With a small nod, he opens his mouth, finally willing to let you help him. With a small smile, you place the revival herb in his mouth. He chews slowly, looking disgusted, but in the end, he swallows it.

So, one by one, you feed Eevee all of the things you found earlier, before dragging the leaf bowl full of water in front of his face. He starts drinking as you place your hand on his forehead. You smile in relief. His fever is rapidly descending. "You should feel better by the morning. Now sleep." you tell Eevee, who gives you a a grateful lick, coating you in saliva, before closing his eyes.

You wait for him to be asleep, before looking over the three, fighting pokemon. Just to see Umbreon blown away by unknown attacks coming from Celebi and Mew, who are now charging respectively leaf storm and aura sphere.

Thinking quickly, you run, stopping between Umbreon and the two legendary pokemon.
"Stop!" you shout. Their attacks vanish instantly. Both stare at you curiously.
'Sweetie, this Umbreon...' Celebi's voice is heard in your mind. However, you cut her off.
'... Kidnapped me because she needed help.' you think, getting an inquisitive look by the green pokemon. She wants answers. And she wants them now.

You clear your throat, feeling sheepish since all the attention is now focused on you. You try to talk, but no sound comes out of your mouth.
"So? We're all ears little guy, speak up." Mew's telepathic voice now rings in your head. You look back at Umbreon, who nods while slowly getting back up. You sigh.
"You see...".
1352112121112122112111221122112112121121.title: Just then, Celebi and Mew break in!

choices: A pokemon shows up while you sleep.
1352112121112122112111221122112112121121.content:
"Again, could you please explain what happened?" Mew asks yet again, sitting down in front of you, right next to Celebi. You look back; Umbreon had already sat down, waiting for you to talk. Not one pokemon seems intentioned to stop looking at you.

So, having no choice, you start to explain what happened after Celebi and Mew were beaten by Umbreon.
"I noticed she was carrying me somewhere, though I couldn't really understand where." you tell them.
"It took a while, but Umbreon took me here. She wanted me to help her little brother over there." you point to the big leaf, which isn't shaking anymore. Eevee probably feels better already.

Celebi and Mew just seem to notice the little Eevee sleeping soundly. Then, they look back at you.
'... And then? What happened?' Celebi talks to you through the connection.
"Well, me and Umbreon went to find some things that could help Eevee." you continue. At this one point, Celebi looks pissed.
'Hey, when I contacted you, you said nothing about all this, you just told us where to go!' she states, pointing an accusatory finger at you.
"You should have listened. I was about to tell you that I wasn't in any real danger, but you stopped talking!" you retort.

Mew puts her paws over her muzzle, giggling at her arguing friends. Then, she turns to Umbreon.
"Hey, maybe I can help your little brother." she says with a friendly smile. And, without waiting for an answer, she lazily floats over Eevee, placing a paw on his forehead. Suddenly, Mew starts glowing pink, energy flowing through her body, transferred to the small pokemon.

The, Mew stops glowing.
"Dear old heal pulse never fails." she giggles.
"Thank you." Umbreon thanks her, cracking up a smile.
"No problem. Take that as an apology for bursting in and... you know... hitting you. Now, let me get these two out before Eevee wakes up" Mew states.

"I should..." Celebi is interrupted in mid sentence as Mew slides her short paws around her body.
"Come on Celebi, let's just get over with it. It was all a misunderstanding." she says with an happy smile, playfully pretending to drag her green friend. Celebi calms down and sighs, while Mew unwraps her arms from her body.

Celebi then extends a paw down on the ground, right in front of you.
'Just get on. Let's go home.' even though that phrase was said mentally, you could hear Celebi exhausted. Smirking, you step on her paw as she carefully lifts it up. She then turns to Umbreon.
"Uh, sorry for everything..." Umbreon gets closer.
"I mean, for breaking in and thinking you meant to hurt little guy..." Umbreon stops right in front of Celebi.
"Don't worry." she whispers, leaning forward.

Umbreon starts nuzzling you with kindness.
"Thank you for helping me! You know, for a human, you're nice." she admits gleefully. You just smile, petting the blue rings on her forehead.

According that she would come to find you when Eevee feels better, you greet Umbreon one last time, before letting Celebi carry you out of the cave. Within fifteen minutes, both her and Mew are back to the shrine. The time traveler giantess literally collapses at its feet, quickly followed by Mew.
"You're tired, aren't you?" you ask. Both nod.
"Guess because of who." Celebi says with a smirk.
"Not mine." you reply. She pouts.
"Is that so?" that said, she places you on the ground, turning around.

Mew laughs.
"What's happening Celebi? You don't like him anymore?" she giggles.
"Nope, don't know why I chose him in the first place." Celebi replies.
"Really? Well then..." Mew smirks, picking you up in the meantime.
"Hey little guy, you'll be sticking with me from now on. Just imagine it! Me and you traveling around the world, having lots of fun, that'll be amazing!" she mentally beams.

Celebi turns around, eyeing Mew grimly, but without talking.
'Just play along little guy.' Mew says through telepathy, while winking. You silently nod, while Mew continues her silly game.
"I think we should sleep together from now on, so-" Mew is interrupted when Celebi snatches you from her at light speed.
"Mew! What are you doing with my little guy?!" she exclaims indignantly, closing you in a hug that threatens to crush each and every bone in your body.

Mew smiles. Goal achieved.
"You said you didn't like him anymore Celebi." she says.
"Of course I like him. I ate him, scared him to death more than once and I almost crushed him - and all in just three days - and yet, he chose to stay with me!" Celebi cries. This sends Mew into a blissful laughter.
"Good, because I was just kidding. I would never dream to take little guy away from you." she states.

Celebi sighs. This one was not funny. She turns to you.
'Why didn't you say anything? It was cruel!' she says.
'Just playing along.' you calmly reply.
'Well, don't do that again. I don't know what I'd do if I ever lose you.' she admits. This makes you smile.
'I won't.' you reassure the time traveler, getting a peck on your cheek for answer.

Celebi yawns.
"Man, I could sleep for weeks now." she states.
"Well, that'll be a bit hard." Mew says.
"What do you mean." in all response, Mew points to the sky, where dawn slowly emerges from the horizon.
"Dawn already? Damn!" the grass type whines.
"Well, I think we can still take a nice, long nap wouldn't you agree?" the pink cat pokemon asks cheerfully.
"You're right." Celebi nods.


No sooner said than done, the get comfy.
'I'm going to sleep for a bit little guy. I suggest you do the same, you had a long night.' Celebi says, caressing your chin. You yawn in confirmation of her words.

Soon, the both of you are ready asleep, she at the feet of the shrine, you on her belly. Mew looks at you with a smile.
"Little guy, I was kidding alright, but I wasn't laying on one thing: traveling around the world together and have lots of fun would be amazing." she whispers to herself, careful to not wake you or Celebi.

With those happy thoughts, Mew lies down as well, next to her green friend. She's sure that's whatever day it'll be today, it's going to be wonderful.
"And rescuing little guy is becoming a funny habit." Mew giggles one last time, before falling into a deep slumber, one like she didn't have from a long time.
1352112121112122112111221122112112121121.title: One long explanation later...

choices: She decides to bring Mew along.
She leaves you with Mew while she time travels.
1352112121112122112111221122112112121121.content:
The morning sun shines brightly up in the sky. You are still asleep in Celebi's solid grasp; the forest's patron is asleep herself, still tired after last night's events; next to her, a certain pink, furry pokemon is snoozing like her two friends. None of you three gives the minimal sign of waking up.

Hours pass as you and your pokemon friends keep on sleeping. Just after midday, around 3 PM, Celebi gives a deep yawn. Absentmindedly, she starts to stir, while sitting up, making you slide on her down her belly, right back on her dark green colored lap.

Shifting her gaze downwards, she notices her tiny boy sleeping there, right before her legs. Cute.

Moving her arms down, she snatches you up and starts to gently shake you. At least, as gently as she can. Which, you learned, is very little. In fact, she's currently squeezing the air out of your lungs while throwing you back and forth, threatening to make you throw up whatever is in your stomach. But, at least, she achieved her goal: she woke you up.

"Don't do that again..." you say dizzily, making a huge effort to keep your previous meal where it is.

Giggling at you, Celebi turns to Mew.
"Mew, wake up." she says. No reply, the pink cat doesn't wake up.
"Come on Mew, wake up." Celebi repeats herself, still with little success.
"Well then..." the green time traveler says mischievously, turning to you.
'Little guy, will you help me with something?' she asks with a honey-filled voice. How can she do that with her mind?
"What?" you ask.
'You see, Mew isn't going to wake up anytime soon. And, if we don't wake her up, she's going to miss all the fun. You know we're best friends, so.I know Mew has one big weakness.' Celebi explains.

"And that would be?" you ask again.
'Tickle. We're going to tickle her. She is very, very ticklish. I assure you we'll laugh for days.' Celebi says with a playful smirk. You nod as she picks you up and deposits you on Mew's furry belly.

Her pink fur is so fine that it barely reaches your ankle.
'Ready?' Celebi asks. You nod.
'Now!' she presses her paws into Mew's sides. You do the same and 'dunk' your arms into the fur of her belly.

The effect is exactly what you expected from Celebi's description. Mew immediately bolts upwards, shaking as she laughs heartily at the tickling sensation.
"P-Please stop!" she began between laughs.
"I'm afraid not, Mew." Celebi laughs herself, keeping on with tickling.

Two minutes later, you stop. Celebi stops as well, letting her friend breath.
"Boy, when was the last time I laughed like that?" Mew asks.
"Let me think." Celebi comments sarcastically.
"Just yesterday, the day before, and the day before, and the day before." she says, giggling at her own joke.
"And you helped, you naughty little human?" Mew giggles, her short paws wrapping around your body as she hugs you.

"Hey, easy there." the time traveler says, her smile suddenly disappearing.
"Aw come on Celebi, don't be jealous." Mew says cheerfully.
"Right, we're just buddies. Friends do hug each other." you aid her.
"Exactly. We hug each other too." Mew says, patting your back. Celebi nods.
"Point taken." she says, her smile back on her face.

A while passes. Celebi had picked up berries for the three of you to eat, but then, everything went quiet, none of you talking.
"I'm bored!" Mew suddenly whines.
"Celebi, do you have any plans?" she asks.
"Well, I was thinking to time travel with little guy..." the grass type replies Mew's eyes lit with excitement.
"Can I come too?" she asks with energy.
"Uhm... you see, I wanted some private time with him..." Celebi replies, shaking her head.

And, in fact, she was thinking about bringing you somewhen where she could finally try some of the ideas that are present in her mind from days, making her smile sheepishly each time she thinks about them. She isn't sure how you would like them, but she's sure about one thing: she would enjoy every moment of it.

"Aw, but I don't want to be alone!" Mew whines again.
"Being alone is no fun..."
"That's true..." Celebi admits, while scooping your form up easily.

"Then... why don't you leave little guy with me while you time travel?" Mew asks.
"What? You know why I want to time travel, right?" Celebi asks back.
"Yes, quality time, I got that, but couldn't you... I don't know, go back to before you found him and have fun with him? " Celebi shakes her head.
"I don't want to risk altering anything, little guy's already scared as he is. Imagine me doing things to him, then disappear as another me comes out and eats him." she says, recalling what happened when she found you hiding in those roots.

"Then, what to do?" Mew asks. She understands that her best friend wants some alone time with the tiny human she loves, but she doesn want to be left behind. Waiting alone for hours while waiting for her friends to return would be an agony for her.

Celebi sighs. There is no way out. She wants to have some quality time with her little human badly, but, in the meantime, she doesn't want to leave Mew alone. She knows Mew suffers solitude (which is practically the whole reason of why she leaves the Tree so often). Maybe she could bring Mew along and give up her private fun with you.

Or she could leave you with Mew, giving up her fun anyway, resigning to postpone her... 'playtime'. Maybe she could visit the future this time, getting a look at how things are going to go with her tiny cutie. Only thinking about it makes her blush furiously, but it also makes her kinda happy.

You, meanwhile, can't help but wonder what Celebi is thinking about. First she talks with Mew without you understanding anything of what they said, then she goes silent and blushes as a smile spread on her face. Is she ignoring you?

"Celebi?" the grass and psychic type is brought back to reality from her daydreaming upon hearing Mew's voice.
"Sorry, I got carried away... What is it anyway?" she asks.
"So? Have you decided?" the powerful, pink legendary asks.

Celebi sighs and shakes her head, making one final decision...
1352112121112122112111221122112112121121.title: You wake up later.

choices: Celebi finally returns. And she looks wounded!
A pokemon, which you recognize as a Purrloin, comes out!
1352112121112122112111221122112112121121.content:
"Mew, I think I can leave little guy with you for a while." the green pokemon says, looking unsure. But she knows it's too late to take that back, Mew already had exploded into cheering. The grass type reluctantly hands you to Mew, who eagerly takes you from her friend's paws, like a kid would with chocolate that is being offered to them.

You can't make out one single thing of what the two pokemon are doing. Celebi handed you to Mew like a common doll, yet she looks very upset. Mew, on the other hand, is cheering as she pushes you into the pink landscape of her belly, hugging you.

You look at Celebi with a look that clearly shouts 'what the hell is going on?'. The grass type seems to understand, since she starts talking in your head through the connection you both share.
'Sweetie, I'm going to time travel for bit. I'm leaving you with Mew in the meantime.' she says.
'Time travel? Why are you leaving us behind?' you ask.
'Trust me, I wasn't planning on leaving You behind...' she replies, sounding pissed.

Then, she turns to Mew.
'Please, be gentle with him.' she says, still unsure about entrusting your life in Mew's paws. Mew nods.
"And don't play rough with him..." Mew nods again.
"And..."
"Come on Celebi, you can trust me, he'll be perfectly fine. And then again, little guy isn't some mindless pet. Actually, he's pretty smart. He healed that Eevee in a few hours, shows he can look after himself. He even healed you, remember?" Mew says.

Celebi is convinced by Mew's words.
"Alright then... See you later..." she says, backing up a little. And then... she floats over her friend and plants a kiss on your forehead, which almost immediately starts burning with embarrassment.
'See you later my little one~' Celebi tells you, while Mew giggles loudly.

And then, Celebi glows green as she slowly rises herself in the air, before disappearing.

Mew looks at the spot where her friend was for a few seconds, before turning to you, who are still blushing furiously.
"Looks like it's just you and me now little guy." she says, a noticeable hint of excitement in her voice.
"Why do I know what's coming next?" you say.
"Because you want it too. Let's play!" the pink pokemon shouts happily.

You sigh.
"So? What game have you got this time?" you ask.
"Cat and mouse?" Mew quickly asks. She loved the previous match she had with you and Celebi, and she wants to play again.

But you shake your head.
"How about something more simple? Which doesn't involve me getting lost and possibly eaten by the first passing pokemon?" you ask. Mew seems to ponder something.
"Something simple but fun... How about tag?" she asks, before her mouth curls into a smirk.
"Or, if you're brave enough, we could make it extreme..." she says.

"What do you mean by 'extreme'?" you ask. Mew smiles.
"We could play ice beam tag." she says.
"What's that?" you inquire again.
"Well, you have to escape while I shoot you with ice beam." she explains. She giggles seeing that your face turned pale.
"Aw come on, I'm sure you'd like it better than thunderbolt tag or flamethrower tag." she laughs.

"And normal tag it is." you mutter. Mew huffs.
"Fine. Spoil all my fun." she says, before poking you with her tail.
"Tag! You're it!" she shouts, flying away.
"Hey, no fair!" you yell, starting to chase her.

Obviously, it's almost impossible for you to reach Mew, who keeps flying away each time you get close.
"You'll have to do better than that!" Mew shouts a couple of times.

And, like any funny chasing scene, Mew starts floating in circle, as you struggle to catch up to her. Which is totally useless, the psychic type is too fast. Or, more accurately, your tiny legs are too slow.

You run until you have to stop to catch your breath. You also try to come up with a plan, as you can't go on like this. You're never going to catch Mew if you don't think of a strategy.

And then, you get an idea. You quickly let yourself fall back down on the grass, faking a collapse. Not that your legs can hold you any longer anyway, so this better work.

"Hey, are you alright?" comes Mew voice as she gets close to you, poking your chest with her tail.
'Now.' you think, rocketing upwards, startling Mew as you get a hold of her elongated tail.
"Tag... you're... it..." you pant, falling back down. Mew's tail wraps around your waist, scooping you up and bringing you to her pouting face.
"Hey, you cheated!" she exclaims.
"And this is coming from the same pokemon who is twelve times my size and flies instead of running." you retort.

The pink pokemon crosses her short arms.
"Fine, you won this round. Guess it's my turn now." she says, letting you on the ground.
"Can I rest for a minute?" you ask.
"Nope. But I'll give you an head start. You have five seconds." she says.

You start running. Mew counts to five before starting her chase. And, as expected, she quickly catches up with you. Even if you weren't running onto shaking legs she would have reached you easily. But, clearly, she doesn't want to win easily. In fact, she leans forward, trying to catch you with her paws, instead of simply extending her tail to catch you. And, with the advantage of her short paws, you manage to leap out of the way, avoid her.
"Almost got you now!" she shouts playfully.

You keep avoiding her for full five minutes. But Mew soon grows bored. And, as she reaches you once again, her tail darts in your direction, like a snake striking its prey from the shadows.

In a desperate attempt to dodge, you throw yourself as far as you can from Mew. You land on your belly on the grass, exhausted, unable to run - or even move - anymore.
"Looks like the game's up little guy." you hear Mew saying.
"You're quite the opponent, I must admit. But now, it all ends here~" she literally sings the last part, her tail gently sliding beneath your tiny body, letting you on it.

Mew brings you up to her paws and closes you in a hug, squeezing that little amount of oxygen left in your lungs out of you.
"You're good at these games. You're one of the best playmates I ever had." she compliments you, flying under a tree, with you in a solid yet soft grasp.

The sun settles down. Mew got that you were far too tired for anymore games, so she just sat there, you in her paws, as she asked how did you shrink down and get in Ilex Forest.

"I graduated from school." you explain her.
"I returned home, where I would have got my first pokemon. I was planning on starting my journey the day ahead. But, when I tried to find out what pokemon was inside the pokeball my parents gave me, I suddenly blacked out. I woke up here, shrunk. I tried to find shelter in some roots and fell asleep. When I woke up, Celebi was sleeping right on me. She then woke up, she noticed me and... I think she told you how things went then." you say.

Mew nods.
"She ate you, then went back in time to save you. And then she decided you'd be hers. And, honestly, I can't blame her. You're pretty sweet, smart and, let's say it, you're a cutie." Mew giggles, while your face turns of a fiery shade of red.

The pink cat gets berries for you and her to eat.
"Honestly." you say with a mouthful of fruit.
"I don't think I can go on with just berries. I'll eventually need meat." you state.
"Well, I don't know about it since Celebi doesn't eat any meat - you excluded." she says before you could point out that Celebi actually ate you.
"But I think we'll find a solution." she finishes.

After finishing your meals, Mew settles you on her belly, waiting for Celebi to return. Or for anything interesting to happen, whichever comes first. And then, when she is about to fall asleep from boredom - and you from drowsiness - something finally happens...
1352112121112122112111221122112112121121.title: An afternoon with Mew.

choices: ... I think it was another legendary!'
1352112121112122112111221122112112121121.content:
A blinding green light suddenly shines. You close your eyes for a moment. When you open them, a very familiar green pokemon is laying there, looking half unconscious. Several scratches and burn marks cover Celebi's body.

As soon Mew notices Celebi badly bruised, she rushes to her, completely forgetting about you on her belly. Which results in you flying off her belly and landing with a painful thud on the ground. You hear Mew calling out for her friend in pokemon language, screeching worriedly.

Rubbing the back of your head, you stand back up and slowly reach the two pokemon. Mew is shaking Celebi, trying to wake her up. And it apparently works.

Celebi slowly opens her eyes and slowly turns her head.
"Mew? Where's little guy?" she asks with a weak voice. Mew points to you. Celebi turns her attention to your small body. She gives a small smile as you walk closer.
"Celebi... how did you get hurt?" you ask.
"Le... bi..." she replies, clearly too weak to use the connection.

You look at Mew.
"Mew, I'm going to find something to heal Celebi. Can you stay here and take care of her?" you ask. The psychic type stares at you with pleading eyes.
"But... it's not safe..." she replies. You look to Celebi, who weakly shakes her head. She doesn't want you to take risks.
"Trust me, I'll be fine." without saying anything more, you dash off, leaving the two pokemon behind.

You run as fast as you can. Yes, as Mew said, it's not safe. Good thing you got friends. Specifically, a friend. Yes, Weavile would most likely help you out. So you head towards the cave where she usually waits for you at night.

You keep running until your breath is too little to go on. You stop, inhaling huge quantities of air in order to fill up your lungs.
"You shouldn't wander around the forest nighttime. It's not safe." a voice says. You look upwards, right in the direction where it came from.

You spot a lone pokemon sitting on a tree. Weavile smirks at you.
"Already heard that..." you mumble.
"I need your help." you then say.

The weasel like pokemon leaps down to the ground and lands gracefully.
"Why? What happened?" she asks, her smirk dropping as she sees the look on your face.
"It's Celebi. She got hurt. I need your help to find some stuff... and to not be killed by other pokemon..." you say. Weavile looks at you for a moment, before lowering a claw.
"Sure. Hop on." she says.

With Weavile's help, thanks to both her speed and agility, you manage to find plants that are supposed to heal burns and some that should relieve pain. Luckily, no nocturnal pokemon showed up so far - something you are grateful for - and Weavile keeps dashing undisturbed, you on her head, and everything you collected safely hold in her arms.
"I think we got enough plants. Celebi should feel better with these." you tell her.
"Alright. I'll bring you back to the shrine." she replies.

In a matter of minutes, she stops behind a tree. You can clearly see the shrine. Celebi looks asleep, while Mew seems to be waiting, most probably for you.

Weavile gently lets the plants on the ground and picks you off her head, before placing you down.
"Are you sure you can carry all that stuff?" she asks. You nod.
"Alright. So... tomorrow?" she asks.
"Yes, I'll be there." your reply as she leaves.

With your arms full of plants, you walk towards the two pokemon. Mew immediately eyes you.
"Little guy, are you alright?" she asks you.
"Yes. Now, these plants should heal Celebi." you reply. Mew nods, the plants floating out of your arms, enveloped in blue light. You make your way to the green pokemon. You slowly climb her body, and you hardly make your way to her belly.
"Come on Mew, give me some of those and help me." you say.

Aided by Mew, you start squeezing the plants you've gathered, white substances splashing on Celebi's burns and scratches. Once the pile of plants is reduced to zero, you start rubbing the white stuff on Celebi's wounds, getting pleased moan from the mythical time traveler.

"We'll need some berries too." you point out once you're done rubbing. Mew looks upwards, her eyes glowing briefly. Not even a second later, a bunch of berries falls down from the trees. She scoops some in her paws and brings them to Celebi.
"Celebi?" you call out to her. The grass type's black eyelids open up a little.
"Come one Celebi, eat up." Mew says, handing her a berry.

At this point, Celebi looks at you on her belly and smiles. She takes the berry from Mew's paws and places it near you. Then she opens her mouth wide and points to it with a finger.

Mew starts giggling, while you shake your head, blushing. Celebi wants you to feed her. You start pushing the berry towards her mouth. You shove it in. Celebi chews and swallows, squealing delighted.

One by one, all the berries disappear into the time traveler's mouth and are sent into her stomach.
'That... felt... good...' her voice says in your mind as she slowly stands up, getting a hold of you in the meantime. And, before you can reply, she shoves you into her lips, showering your body with kisses, leaving you breathless
- and completely red - when she pulls off.

It takes you a while to recover from such barrage, while your two companions laugh heartily, hugging each other. At least, Celebi is totally healed.

"Now," you say, interrupting the two from their laughs.
"What happened? What, or who, reduced you in that shape?" you ask Celebi, who suddenly becomes dead serious. She picks you and sits you down on one of her legs - which is the length of two tree trunks to you - and looks at both you and Mew.

'Well... you see... I time traveled to about two months in the future. I met our future selves, we started chatting, and then, suddenly, some pokemon attacked us... or will attack us, yeah, I think that's better... Anyway, it was very powerful. Me and my future self, alongside with future Mew - speaking of which, she says hi! - managed to fight back, we protected you, but we all got in rough shape. I used the remaining of my energy to return here.' Celebi explains. You nod in understanding.

"Hey! You know that I can't hear anything if you talking through a connection, right?" comes Mew's voice.
"Celebi and our future counterparts got attacked by a powerful pokemon. And future Mew says hi." you synthesize Celebi's tale.
"How nice of her!" Mew giggles.

You shake your head at Mew's naive behavior and turn back to Celebi.
"Do you know what pokemon was it, Celebi?" you ask the grass type.
'Well...
1352112121112122112111221122112112121121.title: Celebi finally returns. And she looks wounded!

1352112121112122112111221122112112121121.content:
'I... I don't remember... I was sent flying at some point. I crashed into a tree or something and got knocked out... When I woke up, the pokemon was gone and the others were unconscious. So I got back here.' Celebi explains.

You nod your head in understanding.
"Ahem..." a certain pink, furry pokemon clears her throat, getting annoyed by this one sided conversation. You sigh.

You are about to look up to Mew and explain, but Celebi beats you. She talks to her friend for a minute.

"I got it. But you traveled to the future, am I right?" Mew asks. Celebi nods.
"Then... How do we know when this pokemon is going to attack us?" she asks, her usual smile fading to a worried look. Something that doesn't happen too often.
"In about two months... whenever another me from the past comes here..." the grass type replies, getting a nod from Mew.

The pink cat yawns loudly, tired out.
"Boy, I need to sleep. Let's just forget it for tonight, shall we?" she asks.
"Agreed." Celebi replies with a nod of her head.
"See you in the morning, you two." Mew says tiredly, laying down on her side.
"Good night, Mew." Celebi says.

The green pokemon then looks right at you, and points to her belly, smiling playfully.
'Get here you.' she says.
'Do I have to walk? Can't you give me a lift?' you mentally ask.
'Nope. You'll have to do it yourself, cutie.' Celebi replies.
'Fine.' you say, getting up and walking to the edge of the leg.

'Hey, what are you doing?' Celebi asks.
'Getting down. I'll sleep on the ground.' you reply. One of Celebi's paws comes to wrap around your torso, scooping you up.
'Aw, aren't you just cute, thinking you have a choice.' she brings you at her chest level. You look up to her.
'Do I have to remember you I helped you twice when you got wounded?' you retort.

Celebi sighs defeated. She knows that too well.
'You may have won this battle, my little guy, but the war is still far from over.' she says, pouting.

Celebi smiles as she hears Mew's snoring.
"Time for some fun~" she says in pokemon language, with the effect of you not understanding anything about what she said. But that mischievous voice can't mean anything good...

Silently, Celebi gets up and starts floating upwards, you safely grasped in her paws. She sits on a high tree.

The grass type moves you to her mouth. Just when you are about to talk, her tongue comes out of the cave as she starts licking you, coating you in thick saliva.
"W-wha..." you don't get to finish, as Celebi sticks you inside her mouth, her lips sealing behind you, trapping you once again in the slippery, dark confines of the 'cave'.

Feeling the little human starting to struggle in the inside of her mouth, Celebi spreads her legs, while her left paw travels down to her sex.

Once again feeling aroused because of the activity in her mouth, Celebi starts rubbing her pulsing crotch.

Back in the inside of the 'cavern', you try to get a foothold, which is practically impossible because of the reddish pink 'floor' throwing you back and forth.
"Come on Celebi, let me out!" you shout. Why in the world does she keep doing this?! Celebi swishes you around, ignoring you. Mercifully, you don't get to meet her teeth.

Celebi's tongue starts pushing you further into the mouth, extremely near her throat. Your heart skips several beats. You open your mouth to shout once again, but you just get a mouthful of saliva. You almost choke as the muscle you're laying on moves you further again. At this point, your feet and part of your legs are practically already in the dark abyss of her throat.

On the outside world, Celebi moans blissfully. She's feeling great, her blood pumping in her veins, her heart galloping within her chest... If she accidentally uses her psychic, with this amount of pleasure, her powers would go wild for sure. But that gives her an idea. Giving one last push with her tongue, she shoves her tiny human into her throat.

Your heart almost stops. Celebi swallowed you. Is this the end? Are you going to die again?
You struggle as you are moved into the esophagus, trying to halt your fall somehow. Which obviously doesn't work.
"No..." you whisper, unable to believe this is happening again.

Celebi feels the little lump travelling down her throat. She giggles. Her little guy must be terrorized. Not stopping giggling, she focuses on the movements down her throat and uses psychic.

Your body suddenly stops falling. You find yourself glowing blue as you are brought back up into the mouth. The psychic grasp releases you on Celebi's tongue. Just then, the giantess lets out a sharp moan, sending vibrations through her mouth.

The grass type relaxes back, a small puddle forming around her sex as her paw retreats.
'That... felt... wonderful...' she thinks to herself. She feels her little human struggling to get out again. Smiling, she digs her paw in her mouth, getting a hold of you.

You are pulled back out by Celebi's paw. She lets you lay there, pale, shaking, dripping both saliva and sweat. Her free paw finds its way to your head as she gently caresses you, waiting for you to recover from the frightening experience you just had.

It takes a while, but you calm down enough to talk.
"Y-You swallowed me!" you shout. Celebi laughs.
'Quit being such a baby, I did bring you back up.' she says you. "...Why? Why do you keep doing that? The mouth thing, I mean." you ask, as calmly as you can.

Celebi's legs immediately close together, hiding the puddle several feet beneath you.
"Bi~" she starts giggling. You sigh. Looks like you won't be getting any response.

Celebi cleans off your dripping body with a paw, before flying back down to her shrine, sitting down next to a sleeping Mew.

She pecks your cheek.
"Can... can't we just sleep?" you ask, trying to get rid of the pink shade on your face. Celebi laughs silently, not wanting to wake Mew, before looking down at you.
'First, could you be a sweetie and do something for me?' she asks.
'Why should I? You swallowed me!' you mentally shout.

At this point, Celebi makes her saddest face, her lips shaking, tears welling in her eyes.
'Please?' she asks. Damned puppy eyes!
"Urgh... What?" you say, annoyed. The giantess' face instantly brightens up.
'Well~' she says, her eyes glowing of an azure light, that soon surrounds you.
You float in midair as Celebi rolls on her belly. You are lowered on her back, right in between her big, fairy-like wings.

'Could you rub them for a bit? It's been ages since I got some attention there. Those girls feel kinda lonely.' she says, faking a sad tone.

"Uh, sure?" you say.
'Be careful, my wings are very sensible. I might move too much and you could fall off. Or...' Celebi tries to warn you, but you stop her.
'I got it!' you think, trying to shake off the images of your body turned to paste on the ground. Or worse...

You begin rubbing one of her wings - which is twice your height - slowly, immediately getting a blissful sigh from the mythical pokemon.
'That's great! Don't stop!' she encourages you with a delighted voice.

It's not a easy task, as Celebi's wings are mostly out of your reach - so you have to limit yourself to rub the lower area - but the major problem here is another: if the two massive objects start flapping by any chance, you would probably be sent flying like a piece of paper. The only difference would be your landing, which would be much more painful.

You rub both wings - very often, getting sighs and moans of pure happiness from the time traveler - until your arms hurt, in which point you stop petting.
'Hey, why did you stop? It was lovely! Keep going, please!' Celebi whines.
"My arms hurt, and I need to sleep." you say bluntly. The grass type beneath you gives a disappointed screech in response.
'Fine.' she says.

You are yet again lifted by a psychic force as Celebi rolls on her back. Then, the invisible grasp holding you disappears, and you fall down, right in her paws.
'You were wonderful! I loved it!' she chirps with glee. You smile a little.
'I didn't feel like that in ages. And I know how to reward you nicely.' she continues.

Without waiting for an answer, she lies you on the landscape of her belly, right where both shades of green meet. Her paws close around your form, pushing you further into the grassy flesh, leaving just your feet out of of her hug.

And then, the grass type starts humming quietly, a soothing sound that makes you... more drowsy than you already are.

Just when your brain is about to drift off, you decide to forgive the time traveler.
You use your remaining energy to talk.
"Please... Promise me you won't do that anymore... promise me you won't swallow me again..." you beg the grass type.

Celebi smiles, lifting you up and bringing you to her face.
'Don't worry, my dear little one, I won't.' she plants a peck on your forehead, before placing you back on her belly, covering your body with her paws again while resuming her humming.

Within a few minutes, you are asleep on the 'bed' made out of the giantess' belly, a peaceful look on your face.

Noticing you asleep, Celebi smiles brightly as she looks around. Mew fell asleep long ago, she couldn't possibly have heard or seen anything of what the time traveler did.

With a smile on her face, Celebi relaxes back, her eyes disappearing behind her black eyelids. Her breath slows down. The small time traveler cuddles to her little human and slowly falls asleep, joining both her lifetime friend and her tiny boy in the world of dreams.
1352112121112122112111221122112112121121.title: ... I don't remember...'

choices: The Furret starts moving, carrying you away!
1352112121112122112111221122112112121121.content:
Almost about to fall asleep, a noise catches your ear. Almost like someone pretended to cough. Turning your head, you scan through the thick darkness, eventually spotting two crimson eyes staring at you, seeming to be floating in mid air.

"What the..." you mutter as the creature comes closer. Moonlight reveals a certain black pokemon with a red mane. Six razor sharp claws shine along the pale light of the moon.

"Weavile?" you call out as she stops, right before the two sleeping pokemon.
"Yes, it's me. You didn't come, so I thought I'd come and check on you." she explains.
"How did you know where to find me?" you ask.
"You mentioned Celebi yesterday, so I assumed you were here. And if it isn't enough for an explanation, isn't that the same Mew who wanted to 'kill you' yesterday?" she replies.
"But you seem quite... busy right now though...".

Slowly, you slide out of Celebi's hug and get up. Extremely careful to not awake Celebi or Mew, Weavile moved one of her clawed paws in front of you. You hop on as the dark pokemon quickly flees into the forest at full speed.

Panting, Weavile lets herself fall on her behind, and places you on top of her belly.
Several minutes pass as she catches her breath, before speaking.
"So... how are things going?" she asks.
"Ehm... fine? Anything too exciting, I mean." you quickly correct yourself, hiding your nervousness, still not completely used to chat with talking pokemon.

Weavile nods. Then, her stomach growls, shaking your whole world, while threatening to make you deaf.
Weavile snickers.
"Whoops! Looks like I'm hungry." she apologizes as your hands rocket to your head, trying to stop it from shaking.
"I noticed..." you say in a whisper, intensifying the sneakers coming from upwards.

"Hey human." Weavile then says, stopping her snickering.
"What?".
"I just got an idea. I have to hunt, I can't possibly stay without food again, can I? But I really can't leave you alone while I do so... I think it would be nice if you... wanted to come with me?" she asks.

Her request shocks you. But the barely audible 'okay' that quickly escapes your mouth shocks you even more. The dark pokemon smiles as she gets up and sets you on her shoulder, dashing deep into the forest.

"Weavile? Where exactly are we heading?" you ask, trying to hang on the best you can. If you though hanging on Celebi's head as she flew at supersonic speed while you were riding on her head, riding on Weavile's shoulder as she dashes at light speed is many times worse. You have to hold on to the short strands of black fur, a not simple task to perform.

You get no reply. Instead, when you are about to throw up, Weavile stops.
"Urgh... what now?" you ask, but the black pokemon whispers you to shut up as she points to a fluffy, long creature that you recognize as a Furret wandering around, unaware of your presence. You sigh, understanding Weavile just found dinner.

Carefully holding you, Weavile quickly climbs up on a tree and waits for the Furret to turn around, before darting downwards without making any noise.

But then, the cream colored pokemon turns around, just to leap back scared at the sight of Weavile, who quickly, charges it, waving her claws.

The two pokemon start fighting. It's pretty clear that Weavile is stronger, as she almost immediately manages to overpower her opponent with her unbeatable speed.

But then, the Furret, with a lucky shot, uses tackle, hitting Weavile in the stomach, sending her flying into a tree, while sending you flying from.her shoulder as well. Luckily, you land on a soft surface, between two large ears: the Furret's head.

The normal type lets you down of its head and sniffs your tiny body for a while, long minute, before suddenly it lowers its mouth. You can't even scream as its jaws close around you...
1352112121112122112111221122112112121121.title: Hunting with Weavile.

choices: ... Placing you down by her crotch!
1352112121112122112111221122112112121121.content:
You decide that waking Weavile would be risky. After all, she thinks you're a dream and she would probably freak out if you reveal yourself now, in the middle of the night, after waking her from her slumber... you're pretty sure that if you do, you're not going to like the consequences.

Shaking the horrible images of what Weavile could do to you if you wake her off, you turn around and start leaving the cave, deciding to return later on.

The forest is completely dark and quiet. That and your current size only work to your advantage, since you can easily sneak through the forest completely unnoticed. You just hope you don't suddenly collapse to the ground from drowsiness.

Finally, after walking around for almost an hour, you manage to find the way to the shrine of Ilex Forest. You stop to rub your eyes for a second. Opening them again, you notice Mew is still sleeping quietly under the wooden shrine... but Celebi is instead awake and looking around, most probably for you.

You sigh. Mentally preparing the first excuse you can think of, you come out of the bush you were in. Celebi seems to feel your presence, since she turns her head in your direction.

A smile spreads on her face as she spots you. And, before you can act, you're suddenly enveloped in a blue aura. You're raised from the ground and start floating towards Celebi. You recognize this move as psychic.

You stop right in Celebi's open paws, which she closes, hugging you. She then pulls off and looks at you.
"Bi le bi?" she asks.

You sigh.
"Still can't understand poke-speech." this makes Celebi sigh as well. She points to you and then to the direction you came from.
"You want to know where was I?" you ask. The green giantess nods.
"Um, you know, just needed some water..." you lie.

The answer seems to please Celebi, you can tell by the little peck she gives you right after.

Celebi closes your little body in a hug. You relax as she thinks.

The little time traveler looks at Mew; she's fast asleep. And no one is around here to try and steal you from her. Celebi could really take the moment and have finally some quality, private time with you. This chance is not going to return, and she knows it. So she decides that if she wants to have her fun, she has to do it now.

You are quietly napping, relaxed from Celebi's soft skin and the warm embrace she has you closed in. But then, you are awakened by the feeling of yourself moving.

Looking up, you see Celebi rising you from her belly. The green giantess smiles briefly seeing you awake, before...
1352112121112122112111221122112112121121.title: Leave, you have nothing more to do

choices: Your body is digested, and your mind merge with Weavile's mind
Your body is digested, and your mind merged with shrunken Weavile's mind

1352112121112122112111221122112112121122.content:
You were losing conciousness as the stomach acid began dissolving your entire body. Strangely enough, you did not feel pain. Infact, you did not feel anything aside from numbness. Before you know it, everything became black.
After a few moments you opened your eyes. You were dizzy and everything felt off. You realize that you were no longer inside weavile’s stomach. You look around but weavile was nowhere to be seen. You ponder for a while about what happened to her. As you did so, you noticed something off about your body, it was covered in dark gray and red fur, and long sharp claws are protruding from your hands. In a flurry of panic you clumsily stumbled to a nearby pond to see your reflection. “I-“ you stuttered, touching your face, moving and flailing your arms, and making strange faces to make sure that that js your reflection “I’m weavile!?” You panicked and fell into the shallow pond.
“How did this happen?” You thought to yourself as you got yourself out of the cold water, all wet. You began to examine your, weavile’s body. “This is so weird.” You whispered to yourself as you stretched her arms and legs. Suddenly,
1352112121112122112111221122112112121122.title: Your body is digested, and your mind merge

choices: It manages to catch and eat you.
Weavile makes it in time and stops it.
13521121211121221121112211221121121212.content:
Using all of your strength, you finally manage to push the berry into the cave.
"Weavile? Are you here?" you call out, unable to see further due the darkness.

No answer. No figure of someone getting up. No noise of a stomach growling loudly. This cave is completely empty aside from you and the berry. Weavile must have found some energy to get up and go hunting. You sigh. You had to work hard to push the berry here, and now you find it was useless.

Sitting down, you decide to wait until Weavile returns. Hopefully, with her hunger satisfied.

Moments pass. Minutes. Almost an hour. And Weavile still doesn't return. You yawn drowsily and rub your eyes. Boredom mixes with drowsiness as you wait for a familiar pokemon with sharp claws to return the cave. Asking yourself what made you leave your soft, warm 'bed' for a hard, cold rocky floor, you close your eyes. You don't want to sleep, just to rest your eyes.

Just to re...

Unknown to you, Weavile is up in the trees, jumping from branch to branch. Her movements are slowed down by the hunger, so she hasn't gone very far. She has to find food. Preferably asleep, so she can eat without hearing those annoying screams of death. But if she skips another meal, she'll be the one dead, granted.

Much later, she still didn't found a prey. Her belly growls again, making a few Rattatas flee. Damn!
'Good way to let preys flee. Thank you stomach.' she thinks sarcastically.

Back at you, you are suddenly awakened by something sneaking in the cave. You open your eyes.
"Weavile?" you call out.
No answer.
Instead, two golden eyes shine in the darkness, you hardly notice a black figure standing there.

To your misfortune, it's not Weavile. It's a Cacturne! The grass type is staring at you with hunger in its eyes.
"Well, looks like I finally found dinner. A little bug and a berry as big as a fist. Lucky me." it says, raising its barbed hand.

Scared to death, you scream as you avoid being captured by rolling away.
"Hey, come here you little bug, I'm hungry!" the Cacturne exclaims, giving chase.


Weavile looks up. She's sure to have heard someone screaming behind her. Her hearing is very good, so she's sure that was a scream. Though it seemed like a faint squeak. Looking back at the cave, she sees a tall figure standing at its entrance. It looks like a Cacturne. This makes her think. That voice seemed like... the little human from earlier. But that can't be possible right? It was just a mere hallucination caused by the hunger, right? Another scream comes from the cave. Apparently, the little guy from before - and her so-real only friend - fled earlier and came back, maybe to check on her.

But, if he is real, then it means that he's in danger! Another scream is heard.
"Coming little guy, hold on!" Weavile says, while jumping down and dashing to the cave.

You run, trying to escape from the Cacturne, but you end up backed up against the wall. The Cacturne smirks triumphantly.
"Looks like I got you little bug. Finally I can eat!" it snickers, as it lowers its hand to get you...
13521121211121221121112211221121121212.title: She's not here, maybe hunting... might as w...

choices: Spend the night here. What could go wrong?
You don't want any trouble with Celebi, have Weavile bring you back.
135211212111212211211122112211211212122.content:
You cower in fear, with Cacturne's barbed paw reaching out for you. You wait to either be impaled by the sharp barbs that cover its long arm, or be picked up and and thrown into its mouth to be eaten.

But none of that happens.

Instead, the barbed paw stops, the Cacturne lets out a low groan of pain.

In a second, the Cacturne falls down face first. Three big slash marks are on its back, dripping blood.

You look up to see a rather short (yet huge) to you pokemon. Even with the darkness, you recognize it.
"Weavile?" you ask with excitement and fear, though more scared than excited.
"Yeah, it's me. Are you alright?" she asks.

You can only nod as she picks you.

She holds you in her grasp for a few minutes. Nope, you're definitely not a hallucination. Weavile pinches herself.
"Ouch!" she exclaims. Nope, you're not a dream either.

So, there is really a little human in her grasp. And it's really the same human from before, no more doubts about it.

"Hey little guy. Where have you gone earlier?" she casually asks upon stating you're really here.
"Um, I was trying to get some food to bring it here. I thought it would have helped you a bit," you partially lie.
"But I see you managed to get something to eat."

Weavile's belly growls at the word 'food'.
"Are you kidding me? Have you ever tried eating a Cacturne without hurting yourself? And then, they taste horrible. In fact..." she roughly pushes the fainted pokemon outside, before turning back to you "Back at us. Please tell me you did it. Please tell me you got food. Please tell me there is food in this cave right now." she says, groaning. Clearly, she hasn't eaten yet.

You smile a little. This time you are prepared.
"Actually, I managed to bring here a berry. Not to tell you how hard it was." you reply.
"A berry? Where?!" Weavile asks.

You can't even reply. She already spotted the berry herself and rushes to it. Dropping you gently on the ground once she lowers herself, she roughly grabs the berry and throws it into her mouth. Without even chewing, she devours the berry in one big gulp.

"Man, that was good. Where did you even find that?" Weavile asks after giving a satisfied sigh.
"Uh, you know, I found it laying around..." you lie. You're sure that telling her that berry was created by a certain green pokemon, who appears to be the deity that guards this forest, would be pretty weird.
"Well, that was satisfying anyway."

Not long passes before you let out a yawn.
"Uh, are you tired little guy?" Weavile asks.
"Yeah. Better I get back 'home'. Bye Weavile." you say, making your way to the exit of the cave. Right before a clawed paw drops in front of you, blocking your path.

You look up to Weavile confused.
"I'm sorry I can't let you go," she states.
"What? Why?" you ask.
"You see, I'm not the only nocturnal predator around here. The only difference is that I'm a lot nicer than the others. Not any predator would have been like me," she explains.
"You tried to eat me!"
"But I didn't, did I? Now, for your own sake, it's better if you spend the night here. Or at least you could have me get you back. But you seem pretty tired, and I don't know which way to go. What are you going to do?" she asks, before yawning.
"I could use some sleep too," she admits.


Even with your mind clouded by your drowsiness, you try to think. If you spend the night, you will surely have to do a lot of explaining with Celebi. The whole thing might end with you in a lot of trouble for sneaking away in the middle of the night and/or worse, in Celebi's stomach once again.

But, Weavile is right. You're tired, you could collapse in any moment. And then again, what guarantees that one of the other nocturnal predators Weavile talked about won't try and attack the both of you? Weavile would have to fight in disadvantage since she would be carrying you.
And maybe, Celebi could be still asleep when you got back in the morning. In which case you would be extremely lucky.

You yawn again. You need to sleep. So you hurry up and take a decision...
135211212111212211211122112211211212122.title: Saved by the dark.

choices: Take the opportunity and leave, go back to Celebi.
What's the hurry? Maybe, just five more minutes...
1352112121112122112111221122112112121221.content:
In the end, you decide you're too tired to go back. So you decide to spend the night here, just to return back to Celebi and Mew in the morning.

"So? What are you going to do?" Weavile inquires once again.
"I think I'm going to *yawn* stay here for tonight. But now... I need to... sleep..." you reply, laying down on the rocky floor.

"I understand. But I don't think it's a wise thing for someone your size to sleep on the ground. It's going to be a cold night," Weavile says, laying down as well. You open an eye.
"Wait, what's that supposed to mean?" you ask, fearing where she wants to bring you.
"Well, we could... you know... sleep together?" she asks, a small blush appearing on her black face.

Even though you're barely awake, a deep blush spreads all over your face. Right what you feared.
"What?! If Celebi finds out, she's going to kill me!" you exclaim.
"She won't, unless you are stupid enough to talk. But I know you aren't, so that's just fine," Weavile replies.
"But... Aren't you an ice type?" you say.


Weavile smirks.
"Doesn't mean I'm necessarily cold, does it?" she says.
"And what says that you won't accidentally slash me to pieces in your sleep?" you try to argue one more time.
"I'm a sound sleeper. Anymore questions?".

You shake your head. This pokemon has a solid logic, a logic that you can't fight. So you just decide to agree (mostly to get some sleep as soon as possible.)

"Good." Weavile snickers, while gently picking you. She then lies you down on her belly.

You can't believe it. Weavile wasn't kidding about being warm. Her fur is just as warm and soft as Mew's, just... darker. An ice type pokemon being this warm, it couldn't be possible. But now you are quite used to impossible things to be the exact opposite.

"Night little guy. Try to not move too much." Weavile says, crossing her claws on her chest. You sigh in relief. At least those six sharp claws aren't anywhere near you.

Still feeling a little sheepish, you yawn again and try to get asleep quickly. Sleep would erase your embarrassment. These are your last thoughts, before you slowly drift off...


You are awakened by the sound of an early Pidgey chirping. You slowly open your eyes, trying to recollect the memories of last night. Last thing you remember is falling asleep on Weavile's belly after agreeing to spend the night with her. You look down. You're still on the massive furry belly, apparently still intact. Weavile is in the same position she was last night. She wasn't kidding about being a sound sleeper.

You lie there without moving. You should get back to Celebi, try to make it before she wakes up to avoid any trouble. Yet, something to be pushing you down. You try to get up, but your body won't listen. Clearly, you're still tired, it's still too early to go anywhere. Weavile is still asleep, and she probably will be for a while, so you can easily sneak away.

But then again, what's the harm if you stay a bit longer? You can easily return later and tell Celebi you needed a drink. But what if she somehow finds out where have you been? That would be bad. She would most certainly punish you. You don't even want to know what she would do to you.

Still laying down on the belly, you sigh and take a decision...
1352112121112122112111221122112112121221.title: A dark night

1352112121112122112111221122112112121221.content:
You wait for another few minutes, you finally decide to get up. Yawning, you slide down on the ground.

You look at Weavile, to make sure she's still asleep, before you head outside.

It's still early, but sun is already shining through the forest. Stirring a bit, you start to walk.

You silently sneak through the forest, careful to not catch attention of any pokemon. Though a lot of pokemon resident of this forest seek for food nighttime, there are still quite few pokemon that could be a threat if you aren't careful.

Much to your relief, you manage to make your way to the shrine without getting any attention at all.

As you come out of a bush, you notice a familiar, mythical green pokemon looking around with a somewhat concerned expression; next to her, another familiar pokemon, this one covered by subtle, pink fur and a long tail wrapped around her body, sleeping beside her.

Celebi has just woken up, but she had a feeling that something was wrong. Weird. Maybe she had a nightmare? Nope, her sleep was sound and cozy. Maybe she's hungry? Nope, that feeling isn't of hunger. It's more like something is off... like something isn't where it should be. She shrugged, moving to wake her little guy up. But, reaching for him, she realized what that weird feeling was.

Noticing Celebi's expression going from a concerned one to a worried one, you come out, producing a rustling sound, and getting Celebi's attention.

She looks in your direction. And a warm smile lits up her face. Judging by her finger pointing at to to you, then to the ground right next to her, you assume she is calling you.

You walk to Celebi and sit down before. She stares at you with a curious smile.
"Bi le bi?" she asks. As usual, her speaking is incomprehensible to you, but you assume she's asking 'where have you been?'.
"Um, you know, I was thirsty, so I went to search for some water." you lie.

Seeming pleased by your answer, Celebi returns her gaze to the forest. You stare at her. You can't help but wonder what she's thinking. Probably something nice, judging by her smile.

Everything goes quiet for a while. The only sound heard is Mew's soft snoring. Then, Celebi suddenly turns your attention to you and gently picks you.

Unknown to you, her smile was caused by her thinking of some nice things she could do with you. And now Mew is asleep, she can easily try some of them.

You notice Celebi staring at you with something between a grin and a warm smile. Unaware of her intentions, you just wait for something to happen...

You wake up in a sexy place in her

Giving an ease of smile, she uses hypnosis on you as you fall asleep on her paw. With the need to develop a more secure way to protect him, she considers doing something that she is not often a fan of doing. Heading towards one of the Nanab Berry trees near her shrine, she plucks one with her left paw an sits on the ground. hen she head back to her shrine getting ready to sleep

choices: She wakes up, having felt you.
She relaxes and returns to sleep.
1352112121112122112111221122112112121222.content:
"I *yawn* I don't think it would be a good idea. If Celebi finds out I'm not there in the morning, she's probably going to 'punish' me when I get back." you say.
"Could you bring me back?".

Weavile nods.
"If that's what you want." she scoops you up.
Then, she heads outside.
"Where are we going?" she asks you.
"Do you know that shrine that is located not too far from here?"
"The shrine dedicated to the legendary Celebi? Yes?"
"Can you take me there?".

Even though Weavile is still reluctant to believe the part of the story when Celebi wanted to keep you for herself, she decides to agree anyway.

Moonlight is the only source of light that can be found in Ilex Forest at night, and it makes it hard for you to see where Weavile is going. All you know is that she's dashing through the forest with great speed and careful to not make any sound - like anyone of her species - that could wake the worst predator up.

You have to mentally struggle to not fall asleep. At least, not until Weavile manages to bring you back.

It takes her a while to finally reach the shrine. Celebi and Mew are asleep on the ground. Weavile blushes. So you were telling the truth about them and about you being with Celebi.

"So... Here we are..." she says.
"Yes." you say.
"Soooo... I'll be seeing you again?"
"Perhaps tomorrow night, at the cave?"
"Deal.".

With that, Weavile gently puts you on the ground. She smirks briefly at you, before dashing off in the woods.

You yawn again as you get in between Celebi and Mew. You have no intention of sleeping on Celebi's body. It was her idea in the first place.

But a cold gust of wind makes you change your mind. Sighing, you are about to climb on her chest again, when you think of something.

Looking back at Mew, you notice she's sleeping on her side, her tail wrapped around her belly. Her pink fur seems so inviting right now. Memories of the warmth and softness it carried when she hugged you earlier cross your mind.

Sneaking around Mew, you start climbing under her tail. It takes you a bit, but you finally manage to get pinned in between her tail and her belly. You were right. Her fur is a much comfier bed than the cold hard ground.

But Mew starts to move in her sleep, maybe having noticed the foreign presence on her body. Or maybe she's having bad dreams.
"Mew! Mew!" she says, waving her short paws, before she...
1352112121112122112111221122112112121222.title: You don't want any trouble with Celebi, hav...

choices: A pokemon shows up while you're asleep.
1352112121112122112111221122112112121222.content:
After struggling in her sleep for a while, Mew slowly opens her big, sapphire eyes. She looks around drowsily before finally realizing the foreign presence on her body.

Looking at her belly, she spots you laying on her belly. A blush spreads on her cheeks as she slowly releases you. She gently picks you and lets you hop on the ground. You look back at her, blushing as well.

"L-Little guy?".
"Y-Yeah?" you ask sheepishly.
"W-Why w-were you on my belly, while I was asleep? I-I mean, not that I mind, but..." .
"Yeah, let me explain. I think that Celebi rolled in her sleep and I fell. I woke up and I felt cold, so I thought... your fur..." you lie. You're sure that mentioning where have you been and, most of all, with who have you been would be long to explain.

"Please forgive me!" you silently exclaim, careful to not wake Celebi up.
"Um... yeah, d-don't worry... you were cold, you had your reasons for doing that. It's not like you did anything bad." Mew replies, smiling. You return her smile.

Then, Mew sits down, looking at the sky. Thousands of stars lighten it up, helped by the bigger light of the moon.

You sit down next to her.
"Sky's really beautiful tonight, isn't it?" she asks.
"Yes, it is. You know, from this perspective, the sky seems even more beautiful. Shrinking has its advantages I guess," you say. Mew giggles.
"Maybe you're right. I can't exactly tell, you know," she says between giggles.

"Little guy?" she says after a few minutes of silence.
"Mh?".
"I'm glad we met."
"... Yeah, me too. It may have been the weirdest day of my life, but hey, at least I got a friend." you say.
"AND a girlfriend!" Mew says, now laughing.
"Yeah, Celebi. I still need to get used to that. But nonetheless, you two are amazing to be around." you say.

After this one last sentence, you are picked up and hugged as strong as possible.
"Hehehehe, no doubt of why Celebi says you're sweet!" Mew tells you, while squeezing you in her hug.
"Urgh... Mew... Can't... Breath..." you mutter from the lack of air.

The pink cat quickly releases you.
"Whoops! Sorry!" she giggles. But then she yawns.
"I need to sleep." she says.

Her statement makes you remember the reason of why she woke up in the first place. You yawn loudly as well.
"Me too. I'm worn out." you say.

Mew quickly gets on the ground. You walk over Celebi and start climbing her sleeping body, but Mew calls you.
"What?"
"Um... you know, if you still feel cold... you can..." she says, a faint blush appearing on her face again.
"R-really?" you ask.
She nods her head.

Embarrassed, you get back on the ground and walk over her. She carefully picks you in her paws and encloses your body in a hug. A much more gentle one.
"Thanks Mew...".
"No problem... Anything for friends. I'll have to... 'give you back' to Celebi tomorrow though," she replies, before yawning again.
"Good night little one." she says.
"Good night Mew...". With that, you close your eyes. Due the softness and the warmth, it's pretty easy for you to fall asleep.
1352112121112122112111221122112112121222.title: She wakes up, having felt you.

1352112121112122112111221122112112121222.content:
Sunlight filters through the tree branches and the leaves, officially bringing the morning in Ilex Forest.

Light gets in your eyes. Bothered by the sudden feeling, you give a yawn and slowly open them. You find yourself still closed in Mew's soft yet firm hug. The pink cat pokemon is still pretty much asleep, snoring softly.

You are really tempted to get back to sleep, but you know you have to get up.

Careful to not wake Mew up, you slowly slide out of her grip. Mew seems to notice your sudden absence, since she almost immediately rolls on her side.

Glad you weren't on the ground (and more specifically, crushed beneath Mew) right now, you make your way towards the sleeping body of Celebi.

She is asleep as well, one of her long arms is laying there on the ground. Stepping on her huge finger (that is almost twice your size), you start walking towards Celebi's chest.

You walk for a while on the immense, green land, before finally reaching your destination.

As soon you reach the spot where both shades of green meet- specifically, Celebi's chest, aka your new bed -you lie down.

As soon you lie down, Celebi instantly wraps her arms around your body; only your head and your legs are left out of her hug.

You don't move, you just stay still (not that you can move anyway), rising and falling along the land beneath you.

Celebi keeps snoring for a good while, before you feel her breath stopping. Your world shakes as the little time traveler pokemon releases and begins stirring.
"BIIIIIIIIII!" she gives a deep yawn, before opening her blue eyes.

Not quite remembering where you were last night, Celebi absentmindedly sits up.
"Woah!" you scream as you fall down. Right on her lap. Luckily, your little scream could be heard by the green pokemon.

Looking down at her own lap, Celebi smiles as she moves her arms to pick the little human that fell there.

Once secured in Celebi's solid grasp, you are brought up to her face.
"Good morning little guy~" she chirps.
"How was your sleep?".

Still not able to understand her like you won't be for a looooong time during your stay with Celebi, you sigh.
The green pokemon holding you gives a little sigh of her own, like you annoyed by the fact you can't understand her, nor she could speak the human language. So she limits herself in pecking both your cheeks.

You both stay silent for a while, you trying to get rid of the blush that has appeared on your face, Celebi trying to think of something interesting to do in private with you while Mew is asleep.

Then, Celebi has an idea. Since Mew is sleeping, the little time traveler could use her powers and do the same thing she often does when she's alone: travelling in time!

Deciding that it's indeed a good idea, Celebi looks at you smiling. Sure, she's sorry that she will have to leave Mew alone for a bit without telling here where the two of you are, but the chance of having some quality (and most of all, private!) time with you is too good to let it go.

Glowing green, Celebi flies up in the sky. You wonder what the heck she's doing, but you soon get your answer as both of you disappear in a flash of green light.
1352112121112122112111221122112112121222.title: The next morning.

choices: Try to convince Celebi to go back to the present.
You can't think of anything... Let Celebi find out the truth...
1352112121112122112111221122112112121222.content:
You can't understand what the heck is going on. One minute you are staring at Celebi, the next one you are enveloped in a green light. Blinded by it, you close your eyes.

Unknown to you, Celebi decided to travel back in time. She decided to go back of just a day, as going back to another era would be too much for your first time.

Opening your eyes, you find yourself... exactly where you were before, still grasped in Celebi's hug.
"Wha- what happened Celebi?" you ask.

Giggling, the green pokemon flies up on a tree. She then looks at you and points to its feet.

You stare confusedly at the empty spot Celebi is pointing at, when a bright light shines. You recognize it as the same light you were enveloped in just a few moments ago. Blinded once again, you close your eyes again.

When you open them, you find, to your utter shock, another Celebi. It can't be. Celebi is behind you, how can she be down there, sitting on the ground in the same time? You look back at Celebi, trying to find answers.

Celebi simply smiles at you and points to her counterpart again.
