Looking at her again, you notice the other Celebi holding something. Or rather someone. Taking a better look, you notice it's you! You gasp, but Celebi quickly covers your mouth with one of her paws. She knows that if you catch attention, the present will be changed.

She keeps you still for a few moments, before finally freeing you.

She then points at the two past counterparts of yourselves.
Looking down, you see the past Celebi setting your head on her belly exactly where you woke up yesterday morning after your death.

Then it hits you. You remember about Celebi signature ability of travelling through time. She must have brought you back to yesterday. And the other Celebi and you are just the both of you returning from Celebi's 'trip', the one that was meant to bring you back to life.

You curiously watch the scene of past Celebi petting your sleeping body, occasionally picking you to nuzzle you against her cheeks.
"We traveled through time Celebi?" you ask, getting a nod from her.
"And you took care of me while I was asleep? Thank you." You whisper with a small smile.
"Bi!" comes your reply as she hugs you

Then, Celebi glows once again and disappears again.
Just to reappear in the forest.

This time, Celebi wanted to verify a little thing of her own. Since she was asleep yesterday after fighting with Zoroark, she wants to see what her little guy and Mew did while alone.

Celebi flies for a bit, before spotting herself, Mew and her little guy. Her past counterpart is already sleeping.

You stay still as you are being carried by Celebi as she follows your past counterparts. The little green pokemon assists at the scene where you healed her (in which part both you and your past self get a kiss); then, Celebi watches you playing with Mew and running from her.

To Celebi, all of what is happening now is just a funny game between her friend and her lover. But to you is a lot more. You start to sweat as you remember something.

This is the moment when you run into Weavile!

In fact, as your past self runs towards the log Celebi was (and currently is) sleeping, a bush rustles. You exactly know what is about to happen. You can't let Celebi know about Weavile, you have to think of something - and fast!
1352112121112122112111221122112112121222.title: Time travelling with Celebi...

choices: You and Celebi return from your 'trip'.
1352112121112122112111221122112112121222.content:
Unaware of the actions of her friends due her sleeping, Mew continues her snoring for a good while after you and Celebi left.

Time passes, and Mew finally opens her eyes. Rubbing them drowsily, she finds herself in a forest. She's not at the Tree of Beginning anymore.

Looking confused for a few moments, Mew remembers about the events of yesterday.

The pink cat pokemon looks around for a bit, trying to spot her lifetime friend or her little guy. But, weirdly, she doesn't seem to find them anywhere.

'They couldn't have left me alone, could they?' Mew thinks, starting to worry. Her worry lasts for about two seconds, before a loud growl makes her blush. Her stomach has to be filled.

Snatching a berry from a bush, she proceeds to eat slowly. After eating it, Mew lies down, thinking.
'Where could they be?' Mew thinks again, quickly growing bored.

Mew lies there for a few minutes, waiting to either figure out where her two friends are or she thinks of something to do.

Then, she has an idea. Mew looks around. She's completely alone, nobody else is here apart from her.

A blush spreads on her face. Since she's alone- she thinks -she could do what she sometimes does, the same 'things' she talked about with you yesterday.

Deciding it's a good idea, Mew lies with her back against a tree. Then, she closes her eyes. She starts fantasizing, the furry area around her nether regions soon getting wet from her thoughts. Blushing even more, Mew starts slipping one of her stubby paws towards her sex...
1352112121112122112111221122112112121222.title: Meanwhile, with Mew...

choices: Mew wakes up. Her need to tell you won't let her sleep.
1352112121112122112111221122112112121222.content:
Mew starts rubbing her sex slowly. Her mind is fantasizing about her hugging a pokemon, a close friend of hers. When, suddenly, the pokemon fades away, leaving you at its place.

Mew opens her eyes, blushing furiously.
"What the heck was that?" she asks herself, an expression of both embarrassment and shock in her eyes. Shaking away her thoughts, she resumes rubbing her nether regions while imagining.

In this one fantasy, she's sitting on a hill under a magnificent nocturnal sky. A Jirachi is holding her paw, the two of them look at each other smiling. When suddenly the Jirachi fades away. You take its place in Mew's fantasy.

Once again, Mew shuts eyes open.
"This is not normal..." she whispers. She waits to calm down a bit before resuming her actions.

In this one image, she is snuggling up with an Azelf. Then, she puckers her lips to peck his cheek. She closes her eyes, enjoying the kiss. When she opens her eyes, the Azelf faded, and she is kissing YOUR cheek.

Mew opens her sapphire eyes once again.
"Why?! Why I'm having these thoughts?! And why can't I get rid of them?!" she yells, her embarrassment manifesting itself as a huge blush that covers her whole face.

Mew waits patiently to calm down, before starting again. She has many more fantasies that involve you. Then, she finally let's herself on the ground, a small puddle near her womanhood.
"It's official. I have a crush on the little guy." she says with a small smile.
"But Celebi is going to never talk to me again if she finds out! And how I'm going to tell him? He'll think I'm some kind of pink furry freak!" Mew panicks.

Mew spends the next hour trying to figure out a way to tell you about her feelings. She then decides she would just tell you later, in private.

Night comes to Ilex Forest, and a green portal appears out of nowhere. Out of it pop a small green figure holding a smaller figure. Mew smiles happily. Her friends are back!

You give a tired smile. Sure, you had fun in this little trip of yours, but time travelling is more tiring than it sounds. You spent the whole day with Celebi, who brought you in various timelines. She even brought you to two days ago, to let you see her eating you. Though, when her past self put you in her mouth, Celebi covered your eyes, not letting you see anything more. And, despite your protests and struggles, she would simply giggle and she won't let you see the scene of her pleasuring herself.

Before you or her can act, you are tackled to the ground by a pink ball of fur.
"Guys! Where have you been?" Mew asks joyfully.
"Just a little trip back in time... the usual stuff." Celebi remarks with giggle.

You are currently being squeezed between two walls, one of green skin, the other of pink fur. Your lungs are about to pop when the two pokemon finally move, letting you breath.

After a quick dinner, which Mew and Celebi spent talking -you guess about your various adventures of today - the two lie down at the feet of a big tree.

Celebi picks you, and she's about to lie you down on her chest again, when she notices the annoyed look on your face.

Understanding that you feel uncomfortable, Celebi smiles. She then stands up and, still holding you, snatches a leaf from a tree branch.

She then lies down again and puts you on the leaf, deciding to give you some 'freedom'. Though she sets the leaf very, VERY close to her.
"Night little guy. If you need warmth, you know what to do~" she chirps.

Even when you can't understand any of her words, you get that Celebi is letting you sleep on this leaf. You smile, as she is unknown advantaging you for your 'secret nocturnal trip'. Maybe you would do as she wishes and sleep with her once you've returned, but now you gotta do this, no matter what.

It doesn't take long for Mew and Celebi to fall asleep. You get up. It's time. You carefully sneak around the two pokemon, ready to leave...
1352112121112122112111221122112112121222.title: Mew starts off with her 'things'.

choices: "I'm no coward, let's do it!" you reply (agree).
"Maybe... Maybe some other time..." you reply (decline).
1352112121112122112111221122112112121222.content:
You carefully walk around Celebi. You stop to check if she's indeed asleep. Yes, she's snoring softly, her chest moving along her breath. She couldn't be more unconscious.

You repeat the same procedure for Mew, checking if she's asleep as well. She's asleep but, you notice, she has a faint blush painted on her cheeks.

Without giving it too much importance, you simply shrug and quietly walk away.

Aided by the moonlight, you make your way to the cave, where you would meet your secret friend.

Luckily, you don't run into any pokemon, and you finally arrive at your destination.

Yawning a little, you peek into the cave. A smile spreads on your lips.

Sitting there, in the darkness, the familiar figure of a pokemon. The one pokemon you are supposed to meet up with. Weavile. She's sitting there, her arms crossed. She seems to be meditating, due the fact she hasn't seen you yet.

Slowly, you start to enter the cave. You clear your throat, trying to get her attention.

No response.

"Weavile?" you call out. You are pretty sure you were loud enough for anyone to at least hear a faint squeak. But Weavile apparently didn't, and she continues her meditation.

You're shocked. How focused this pokemon is to don't even notice your presence here? You slowly make your way towards the giantess.

Now, anyone would have said that Weavile is meditating. But a closer inspection reveals that she's not at all... in fact, she's asleep!

You face palm.
"Weavile!" you shout. The dark type instantly shuts her eyes open, startled at the sudden voice calling out for her.

Frantically searching for whatever caused that scream, Weavile spots you on the ground. Her startled expression slowly fades to a grin.
"Hey there little guy." she greets you, while moving a claw in your direction for you to climb on.

Once you're on the sharp, metallic surface, you're brought face to face... Or, more accurate, face to body with Weavile.
"Glad to see you kept your promise. I was waiting for you, but I guess I got asleep." she says.
"Yes, you did." you remark

Quickly growing bored of the awkward silence that has formed after your last sentence, you decide to speak up.
"So, I'm here now... want to do something?" you ask.

Weavile smirks.
"Though you would never ask. Yes, indeed. I have some... 'games' we could do... if you're brave enough that is." she snickers.

Her words catch your attention.
"Go on." you tell her.
"Well, I already told. We could have some REAL fun... or we could just do something else... That's totally up to you." she says, her smirk not leaving her lips.

You stare at her for a few moments. You're curious about her ideas... but, on the other hand, you don't have any idea of what she's talking about, it could be dangerous.

You take your time to decide, but you then look at the dark giantess...
1352112121112122112111221122112112121222.title: Night visit

choices: Play her game. You can win!
There's no way you can win, run!
1352112121112122112111221122112112121222.content:
Surely, Weavile's concept of 'game' is far more contorted than Mew's, but then again, what could go wrong?

"What kind of fun are we talking about?" you ask, still unsure of the giant pokemon before you. In response, she gives a grin.
"I'm talking about a game. It's called Cat and Mouse. Do you know it?" she asks.

You nod.
"The one where the mouse had to escape the cat for a limited time?"
"Exactly. Whaddya say? Are you in?".
You give a determined smile.
"Of course! I'm no coward!" you proudly state.

Weavile starts to snicker.
"You seem pretty confident. Tell you what, how about we make this... extreme?".
"Extreme?"
"Yes. Listen up. You'll have to escape me until dawn. If you manage to win, you can ask me whatever you want, I'll do it." she says.
"And if you catch me?" you ask.
"Let's just say... kitty gets her mouse." she empathizes her words with a licking her lips.

These last words shock you.
"You gotta be kidding me! You said you wouldn't eat me!"
"In fact I won't... if you win that is. And now... game on!" she shouts, while turning around. You stand there. Weavile didn't even give you time for a second opinion. But it's just a second.

With most of your confidence gone, you start thinking. You could play her game. You have time until one hundred before she chases you. And she never said that you couldn't hide in the forest, right? So you have plenty of hiding places. That would give you a great advantage and, hopefully, it would led you to victory.

But, then again, Weavile is a predator. Weaviles are in fact known not only for their amazing speed- and their razor sharp claws -but also for their incredibly as well sharp senses. She could find you in a matter of seconds if you aren't careful. And if she finds you... you shiver at the thought.

Lost in your thoughts, you didn't notice Weavile reaching sixty.

Snapped back to reality by her voice, you hurry up and take a decision...
1352112121112122112111221122112112121222.title: "I'm no coward, let's do it!" y...

choices: The sun rises. It's dawn. You won!
1352112121112122112111221122112112121222.content:
Knowing that running would probably mean get on Weavile's bad side, you decide to play her game, hoping to resist until dawn without being caught by Weavile or eaten by some awake pokemon searching for dinner.

Without anymore thinking, you dash away, out of the cave and into the forest.

Ilex Forest is completely quiet aside from the inaudible sound of your footsteps. But, even though this size gives you the advantage to hide easily, it also slows you down, meaning that haven't gone far...

In fact, shortly after, you hear the familiar voice of Weavile coming from the cave.
"One hundred! Coming!" she shouts with excitement. This only makes you accelerate your running.

But Weavile is obviously faster than you - if not faster than any pokemon in the whole forest! - and quickly dashes out of the cave, searching for her prey.

You turn your head, Weavile is quickly coming your direction. With growing fear, you keep running, searching for any possible hiding place.

And you sigh in relief when you spot a small puddle of water.

Not caring about where it came from, you jump in it, producing a small *splash*. You hold your breath as much as you can, while Weavile stops to look for you.
"Where are you little guy? Come out wherever you are!" she calls out with a snicker.

You're about to drown in this puddle, but luckily for you, you feel the water vibrate. Knowing that the vibrations are caused by Weavile's booming footsteps, you merge. Coughing, you walk out of the puddle, soaked. Weavile is nowhere to be seen, so you assume she left.

But, as you are about to get going, a booming sound is heard behind you.
"Look who's there." a very familiar voice sends shivers down your back. You slowly turn around, praying that it was just your mind playing pranks to you.

Unluckily, Weavile is really standing in front of you now, her usual grin painted on her face. You put two and two together and you realize she tricked you! She pretended to leave, but she climbed on a tree to take you by surprise!

You stand there paralyzed with fear, while Weavile walks to you. She snatches you in her claws.
"What a shame, I thought you would last longer than that. Well, it appears I got you, so-" she doesn't get to finish her sentence.

Suddenly, a scream is heard, and a figure passes, startling Weavile, and you as well. The dark type looks to see that it was just a Wurmple, apparently scared by her.

Snapped back to your senses, you notice Weavile still wondering what the heck just happened, so you take chance and slip out of her loosen grip.

You land on her paw. Jumping off, you dash away once again. Still not having realized that you left, Weavile turns to you. And, to her surprise, you are gone.

When Weavile starts chasing you again, recovered from the surprise, you are already far.

You run through the quiet forest, sweating and panting. With your heart racing, your vision obscured and your breath running short, you have to stop to catch your breath.

Staggering, you reach a berry bush, trying to rest. Suddenly, you let out a yawn.
'No, it's not the right time to sleep. I need to stay awake. I need to st...' you think before falling asleep. Already tired from the day you had, the game just made you more drowsy, at the point you collapsed on the ground, asleep.

Time passes. Weavile searches for you in the forest, in a futile attempt to find you. But she didn't think of searching in that berry bush she passed a while ago.

Now, somewhat annoyed by your hiding skills, she tries to find you without results.

You wake up much later. Yawning, you get up and walk out of the bush, before remembering what were you doing. Immediately awake, you look around to see if Weavile is anywhere near.

Not finding her, you look up in the sky. Your heart seems to beat faster when you see the moon slowly disappearing to let the sun rise.

Your moment is short lived though. In fact, Weavile is walking back, thinking that maybe you aren't ahead of her, you are instead behind her. And her thoughts turn out to be right when she spots you on the ground.

Her smirk reappears on her lips.
"Finally! There you are! I was thinking you disappeared! But you're here, right you were for the whole time right?" she asks. You don't answer. Your fear shuts your mouth closed.

Weavile continues.
"Well, now you're here, in front of me. And you won't go anywhere." she snickers, slowly walking to you.

Your legs seems to melt. You can't move, you're paralyzed. Your only hope now is that the sun rises before she eats you. But you know that's highly improbable.

Sniffling, you close your eyes, awaiting your doom...
1352112121112122112111221122112112121222.title: A dangerous game.

choices: "Well... Maybe... Could I stay with you a little longer?" you ask.
"Could you bring me back? I'll tell you later." you say.
1352112121112122112111221122112112121222.content:
Snickering, Weavile gets closer and closer to you. Silent, pale, unable to move, you stand tall, waiting for your fate.

Weavile gets mere inches from you and lowers herself to get you. But it never happens. In fact, light suddenly lightens the forest. You look over the horizon, sun is rising! It's dawn!

Curious about the sudden smile that has formed on your still pale face, Weavile turns around.
"What?! B-But... it's not possible..." she mutters.
"But it is, I won!" you state, finding the courage to talk.

Weavile groans loudly.
"Looks like you did it little one." she then smiles.
"I admit, I had to deal with quite the mouse. You're pretty good at this." she congratulates with you. Clearly, she isn't showing any frustration to have lost against you.

Scooping you up to her face, Weavile looks at you with a sincere smile.
"And I have to admit, eating you would have been a shame. That's why I was joking about the whole thing."
"You were what?!" you ask, not sure of having heard good.
"Yeah, I was kidding. You really thought I would eat you after I said I don't like hunting nor killing? You silly little human." she snickers.

"So, what were you planning to do if I lost?"
"Well, maybe I would have licked you a bit to tease you... Or maybe I would have thrown you in my mouth and left you in there for a bit. Hey, maybe I can still do it." Weavile states.
"Please don't." you say, recalling the thing that Celebi did a couple of times.
"Just kidding. Oh, I forgot! You won! So... what do you want me to do? I mean, before I get you back to Celebi and Mew. You have to return to them before they wake up, right?" she asks.

You wonder about what to ask for a bit. You have to return to Celebi before she wakes up and finds out you're gone. Otherwise you are gonna be in deep trouble.

But, you could always stick with Weavile a little more. You know really little about her, so this could be your chance to get to know to her.

You wonder what to do for another moment, before speaking...
1352112121112122112111221122112112121222.title: The sun rises. It's dawn. You won!

choices: "Let's go to the Tree." you say.
1352112121112122112111221122112112121222.content:
"So little guy? What do I have to do for you?" Weavile asks again after a few minutes of your silence.
"Ehm... Mind if I... Stay with you a little longer?" you ask.
"What?"
"Yeah, could I stick with you a little more?".

Weavile seems to be taken aback by the question.
"But... Won't Mew and Celebi mind? I mean, Mew was trying almost killed us both..." Weavile states, shivering at the memory.

Even though the two pokemon back at the shrine are probably going to worry like a lot when they wake from their sleep, you still decide to stay a bit more.
"Uhm no, I'm sure they won't mind..." you reply.
Weavile shrugs.
"If that's what you want, then... I guess you can stay with me for a while..." she says, scooping you in her clawed paws. She lets you sit on her metallic claws before heading back to the cave that has been the place of your secret meetings for two nights now.

Sitting down on the rocky floor of the cave, Weavile stares at you intently, almost like she's trying to get you to talk. You stare right back at her, hoping she'll be the one to break this awkward silence. Which she does.
"Ehm... So..." she attempts to say something, before shutting up, realizing she has nothing interesting to say.

Another minute of complete silence passes, before Weavile decides to talk.
"Okay, that's ridiculous. Why did you want this?" she asks, somewhat pissed.
You sigh.
"You said I'm the only one that has ever talked to you, right?".
The dark type nods.
"Yes. The only pokemon I meet are usually too dead to make conversation... Except the occasional screams of pain or..."
"I don't want to know it. The point is, we are friends and we know very little about each other. So I thought we could try and get to know to each other." you admit.

"You already know I don't like hunting." she replies after thinking of a reply for a bit.
"Yeah, but what about what you like?" you ask.
"Well, I really like to play games, like the one of the cat and mouse we did earlier. What about you?" she asks.
"Oh, I would have loved to be a pokemon trainer... But then I ended up like this..." you say, getting a giggle from her.

And so the conversation goes on for hours, until you realize how late it is... and how deep the troubles you are in are...

After convincing Weavile you'll be fine going back alone and promising you would see her in the evening, you leave.
Judging by the position of the sun, it must be around 9 A.M.

It takes you a while, but finally you make it to the shrine, fortunately safe and sound. Celebi and Mew are standing (or rather floating) on the wooden structure, puzzled expressions on their faces.

You clear your throat, getting their attention. Immediately, Celebi flies at supersonic speed at you.

In a matter of seconds, you find yourself securely grasped in her paws while she nuzzles you lovingly.
"Bi! Bi!" she says in an excited squeal.

You still can't believe how fast things went. One second, you are in Celebi's paws, getting nuzzled, and the other you are on the ground, the two gigantic pokemon staring at you with puzzled expressions once again on their faces. They're absolutely colossal to you, as big as skyscrapers, empathized by the fact they're standing on their feet, leaving you obscured in their shadows.

"Little guy, where were you until now?" Mew asks in your mind after talking with Celebi in pokemon language.
"Ehm, I just went to explore around, that's it..." you lie.

Apparently, the excuse convinces Celebi, who nods her head.
"Exploring? It could have been dangerous," she says.
"Yeah, but he's here, perfectly fine. So, even in that size, he still has perfect survival instincts, wouldn't you agree?" Mew asks with a smile.
Celebi smiles back.
"You're right, little guy is smart. Though I would prefer if he sticks with me. But that's enough-" Celebi says scooping you in her paws.

"- You're here now, so we can finally have fun!".
Mew's eyes lit up at the word 'fun'.
"Fun! Fun!" she beams.
"We could time travel again! This time, we can go together, it'll be tons of fun!" Celebi suggests.
"Or, we could go to the Tree of Beginning, we could have fun there as well... especially with all the toys I brought there!" Mew says.

After trying to pick an idea for a while, the two pokemon decide to let you pick. Feeling cut out of the conversation, you are surprised to hear Mew suddenly talk in your mind.
Upon telling you the situation, you think of the ideas.

But the two pokemon quickly grow impatient. Before they pick for you, you make your choice....
1352112121112122112111221122112112121222.title: "Well... Maybe... Could I stay with you a l...

choices: It's not possible... It can't be... It's... It's... It's Zoroark!
1352112121112122112111221122112112121222.content:
"Let's time travel. I think it would be cool." you say. Mew nods, while Celebi gives a big smile and pecks your cheek, happy that her idea was chose.

Setting a blushing and confused you on her head, the little time traveler pokemon lets her pink friend get closer to her, before glowing green. Then, in a flash of light, you three are gone.

Naturally, you would be asking Celebi where... or when are you; but due the fact you can't understand a single word of hers (which bothers you a lot), you decide to ask Mew.
"Good question," she replies in your mind, before turning her attention to her green friend, who is leading the way.
"Celebi, where did you brought us?" the pink cat pokemon asks.

The green giantess, who is holding you in a gentle yet firm grasp, turns around to face Mew.
"Well, I think we are in Ilex Forest... just a few years ago." she replies. Mew nods. Both then shut up, thinking of something funny to do. Actually, Celebi has a few ideas of what to do with you... though Mew is around, so none of those can be realized... yet.

You are being carried in what appears to be the exact same place you were before. You are about to ask Mew again when your stomach growls.
'Right, didn't eat anything this morning.' you think.
"Aw, little is hungry? Well, let me-" Celebi is cut off by Mew.
"Wait, I'll get it," she says, before snatching a berry and handing it to Celebi.

The grass type sets the berry on the same paw she's holding you with.
"Thanks Mew." you thank the pink cat.
She waves a paw dismissively, while blushing.

The successive hours are pretty weird. You don't know why, but you feel like Mew is constantly watching you.
Though whenever you turn your head to look at her, she fixes her gaze elsewhere.

Now, you are currently sitting on Celebi's lap, while the two pokemon sit at the shade of a big tree. Celebi is currently busy caressing you head softly, while pecking you every once in a while; Mew, on the other hand, is trying to not look at you too much. Neither you or Celebi must know about her secret... yet...

Hours pass. You are quietly napping on Celebi's paw, drift off to sleep by the relax of her soft paw caressing your hair gently; The green giantess keeps petting you.
"You're so cute~" she whispers.

The only one that would have been able to understand her would have been Mew, but right now, she's sleeping as well.

But a loud roar is enough to jostle you and Mew awake. Startled, you look in the same direction Mew and Celebi are looking at. And what you see makes you freeze in horror...
1352112121112122112111221122112112121222.title: A trip back in time.

choices: There's no way you can help, go get Weavile!
Stay and find a way to help Celebi and Mew!
1352112121112122112111221122112112121222.content:
You shake with fear as a black fox like creature comes out. It has red claws and bright blue eyes. Eyes that are fixed on you. Celebi squeezes you in a protective hug. Zoroark smirks maniacally.
"Hi there. Long time no see." she says coldly.

Everything happens in a matter of seconds. Zoroark uses night daze, which Celebi and Mew avoid. Both then fire respectively energy ball and aura sphere.

Both spheres combine and hit the dark fox, who is sent flying back.
"You will pay for that." Zoroark mutters under her breath, while hardly standing up.

In response, Mew raises a stubby finger and starts wagging it. You realize she's using metronome.

You feel like you're freezing. You realize Mew is using blizzard.

The attack hits and Zoroark gets freezed.
"We got a few minutes, come on! Let's return to our time!" Mew exclaims.

Celebi nods while grabbing Mew's paw. Getting sure she has a good hold on you, she starts to glow.

Right then, when you thought you were safe, Zoroark manages to break through the ice. Then, in a second, she somehow manages to grab Mew. Before anything else can happen, Celebi uses time travel, letting the four of you disappear.

In a flash of green light, you are brought to what you assume is present Ilex Forest. Normally, the sight of the place that has been your home for days would have tranquilized you. But the figure of the dark fox is all but tranquilizing.

And so the battle goes on. At one point, Celebi deposited you on the ground, before joining Mew. You watch impotently as the three pokemon fight. You feel frustrated. You're powerless, you can't do nothing to help.

Then, an idea crosses your mind. Actually, you could do something to help... if SHE is awake, that's it. Yeah, Weavile could definitely give Zoroark a fight.

But, if you leave, you could run into some wild pokemon looking for lunch. And the sun is still shining, so darkness won't aid you. And Weavile could not be in the cave. Obviously, these are secondary fact; your main worry is about what happens if Celebi and Mew gets defeated. Even though both are legendaries, Zoroark is a really powerful pokemon.
And she can create illusions too.

Time passes, and none of the three pokemon gives any sign of wanting to give up. You have to take a decision - now!
1352112121112122112111221122112112121222.title: A dark blast from the past.

choices: Weavile is not here... Uh oh...
1352112121112122112111221122112112121222.content:
Deciding that you can't do much to help Celebi and Mew, you decide that your best choice is to get Weavile. She can totally help.

Just then, you dash away into the depths of the forest, directed to the cave. You run for what seems ages, and you still are at about a few meters from the fighting pokemon. And you're already all sweaty and panting.

Suddenly, a booming sound makes you freeze as a giant, furry paw steps in front of you. You slowly look up and you notice the body the paw is owned by. A Teddiursa.

The little bear pokemon looks around, seeming hungry. You make an impossible struggle to stand still instead of running away screaming.

Your heart is racing, your face is pale, your mind is screaming you to ABSOLUTELY don't move.

Finally, after a while, the Teddiursa leaves, leaving a still terrorized you standing. When finally your heart decides to slow down, you sprint again in direction of the cave.

It takes you a good while, but you finally manage to make it to the cave, scared, breathless and worried but, at least, alive.

Slowly, you peek into the cave to check if Weavile is here...
1352112121112122112111221122112112121222.title: There's no way you can help, go get Weavile!

choices: ...Wakes up fully and pulls you out of her mouth.
1352112121112122112111221122112112121222.content:
You peek into the cave. And, to your relief, Weavile is indeed here. But she's laying on the rocky floor, snoring, asleep.

Without losing anymore time, you rush to the sleeping pokemon.

As rapidly as you can, you climb on Weavile's claws. Careful to not get slashed to pieces, you climb on the immense black landscape of her arm.

Finally, you manage to get on her chest.
"Weavile! Wake up!" you yell.

No reply.

"Weavile, please, you have to wake up!" you try again. And again you get no reply at all.

Sighing, you walk on her face. Right on her mouth.
"Weavile! Please! I need your help!" you yell at top of your lungs. She still doesn't wake up, but something definitely happens.

In fact, Weavile suddenly opens her mouth to yawn. And you fall right in.

Trapped in pure darkness, you scream and struggle to wake Weavile from her slumber.
"WEAVILE! WAKE UP! PLEASE!!" you shout as loud as hell.

Weavile still doesn't wake up. Still asleep as any nocturnal predator would be at this time of the day, she's having a dreamless slumber. It's hard to have any dream when you're forced to kill to eat.

Then, suddenly, her ears hear something... a voice. And a familiar one too. The voice of the little human that appears to be her friend. And he's calling out for her, even though his voice is very muffled for some reason. Maybe she's just dreaming. Or maybe she's awake and her friend is in danger.

With most of her mind unable to decide if she's dreaming or not, Weavile...
1352112121112122112111221122112112121222.title: Weavile is here, sleeping.

choices: Mew notices you leaving and decides to follow you.
Mew sees nothing and gets back to sleep.
1352112121112122112111221122112112121222.content:
No, you decide, you can't abandon them now. So you'll have to find a way to help. You cannot fight alongside them, you would get crushed in a matter of seconds. So you'll have to think a strategy.

Time passes; big drops of sweat pour down you face as you try to think of something to do. You feel so weak right now. Celebi and Mew are fighting to protect you... and for their lives, and you are standing right there doing nothing!

'Come on, THINK! You are a pokemon trainer after all, think!' your mind screams.

Then, suddenly, you notice something. Celebi and Mew are fighting at top of their skills, but... their attacking without any strategy at all. They are indeed very powerful, but they lack of coordination! Thinking fast, you finally find a way to help them.

"Mew!" you shout. Mew turns around to look at you.
"I've got a plan!" you continue. The pink pokemon stares at you for a second, before her voice rings in your head.
"So? What do I have to do?" she asks.

"Use ice beam! Aim to Zoroark's paws!" you tell her. Mew nods, before her paws glow blue and a freezing ray is shot from them.

Like expected, the beam hits Zoroark's paws, freezing her. Unable to move her legs anymore, the dark fox roars.
"Celebi!" you shout again.

The green pokemon turns around.
"Celebi, use dazzling gleam!" you say.
Celebi tilts her head, not used to humans giving order to her.
"Please! Before Zoroark breaks the ice!" you plead her.

Celebi stares at you for a few more moments, before nodding. Her body glows bright as she uses dazzling gleam.

Unable to dodge, Zoroark gets hit by the super effective move
"Mew! Focus blast!".
A blue forms in Mew's paws. It grows to the size of a coconut before being thrown at the dark fox. The attack hits her, shattering the ice in the meantime.

Zoroark is sent flying to the ground. She growls weakly, before fainting. You won! Your very first pokemon battle, and you won it!

Your heart racing, your face covered in sweat, the feeling of adrenaline, Celebi and Mew cheering... Maybe it's the excitement the moment, but your vision suddenly becomes blurry. Before long, you faint as well.

When you wake up, you feel like a lot of time passed.
'Man, can't wait to tell Weavile about this heck of a day.' you think, before opening your eyes. And the first thing you notice is that it's nighttime.

Wondering about Zoroark's fate, you notice Celebi and Mew sleeping... and of course, you on the green pokemon's chest. Freeing yourself from her usual hug, you slide down to the ground and start walking in direction of the cave.
When suddenly, you trip and fall.

Groaning, you get up and start walking again, unaware that you tripped on Mew's tail. The cat pokemon yawns and wakes up. She opens her eyes just a bit. With her vision blurry from her drowsiness, Mew...
1352112121112122112111221122112112121222.title: Stay and find a way to help Celebi and Mew!

choices: Mew decides to get in and 'rescue'' you.
Mew decides to see how the thing evolves. Maybe it isn't what it looks like.
1352112121112122112111221122112112121222.content:
Even though the darkness and your small size, Mew still manages to see you walking away.
'Little guy is leaving? In the middle of the night? All alone?' Mew asks herself.

Getting up without making you notice, Mew starts floating behind you. She decided to follow you.

You walk through the dark forest, unaware of the pink pokemon following you.
You furtively make your way to the cave, careful to not catch unwanted attention.

Mew floats behind you, her eyes fixated on you. Too bad she doesn't notice the tree branch in front of her.

"Mew!"the sudden voice makes you turn around. You're sure you heard Mew's cry. But no one is here apart from you. Little you know is that Mew turned invisible just in time to avoid being seen.

You stand there for a bit, scanning forest somewhat startled.

When you finally manage to convince yourself that it was just your mind playing pranks to you, you resume walking.

Mew sighs in relief and starts following you again. Now she has gone too far to go back, she HAS to know whatever secret is making you walk through a forest in the middle of the night.

Finally, when Mew was about to think you were walking aimlessly, she notices you stopping momentarily, to check one last time if any pokemon followed you, before slipping into a cave.

"A cave," Mew whispers.
"I wonder why he came here."

Peeking into the cave, Mew's eyes widen.

Sitting there... the Weavile! Can really be the Weavile of a few days ago? Yes, she's sure of it.

"Oh, hi there little guy." Mew hears the dark type say, before hearing a squeak, which she recognizes as yours. If she was closer, she would've beard whatever you said.

Mew's mind is racing, you could be in big troubles!

But, just when Mew is about to throw an aura sphere at Weavile, another thought crosses her mind.
'Wait about if it isn't what it looks like?' she thinks.
'Maybe I'm just being paranoid, maybe it all is a big misunderstanding...' she thinks.
'...But, what if it isn't? If it isn't, little guy is danger! And if something happens to him, Celebi will kill me!'.

Mew peeks into the cave once again, she sees the Weavile holding you in its claws, grinning. She hears you say something.

With her mind racing, Mew decides...
1352112121112122112111221122112112121222.title: Mew notices you leaving and decides to follow you.

choices: "Little guy... the truth is... I... I k-kinda like you..." she admits.
"D-Dont wo-worry, I'm sure it's nothing... I'll b-be fine" she replies.
1352112121112122112111221122112112121222.content:
"Mind if I tell you later? I really think I should go back now." you say. Weavile nods.
"No problem, let me bring you back.".

Upon hearing your confirm, Weavile dashes into the forest, heading for the famous shrine dedicated to Celebi.

The morning forest is quiet, most likely because most pokemon are still asleep. You and Weavile are currently two of the few breathing beings awake in the whole forest!

Once arrived to your destination, Weavile carefully sets you down, next to Celebi.
"Well then... Same place, same time?" she asks, with a hint of hope in her voice.
"If everything goes smoothly, you'll be seeing me there." you reassure her.

With a nod, she smiles at you briefly, before get going. You follow her with your eyes until she is nowhere to be seen. You stand there for a minute, before yawning.
'It's still early. Sleeping a bit more isn't a bad idea.' you think, before turning to the leaf Celebi settled on the ground as a bed for you to sleep in instead of her chest... just to find it has been crushed by the same Celebi, who apparently rolled on her side in her sleep.

Silently groaning, you make your way to the huge, green, sleeping pokemon. You notice she's sleeping with her arms crossed on her chest. So you get over her belly and start pushing yourself under her arms.

In a minute, she's got you in her warm embrace. You close your eyes, enjoy the soothing heartbeat and the soft skin. In a few minutes, you drift off to sleep...

You wake up much later. Yawning, you try to get up, but you find yourself blocked. You remember where you are and quietly slip out of Celebi's hug, careful to not wake her up.

Sliding down, you land on the ground and look at the titanic face of the sleeping pokemon. Her black eyelids are closed, hiding her baby blue eyes. Her mouth is curled up in a smile. She must be doing sweet dreams.
You extend a arm to let her belly, getting a low moan from her.
'She is really pretty after all... I'm still wondering if I made the right choice though.' you think, before hearing a noise.

Turning around, you notice Mew sitting up and rubbing her eyes.
"Good morning Mew." you say with a small smile. The pink cat pokemon looks in your direction drowsily, before a blush appears on her face. She's still trying to find a way to tell you about her feelings.
"Oh... G-good morning little guy..." she says sheepishly.

You tilt your head confused.
"Mew?"
"Y-Yeah?" she asks back.
"Are you feeling fine?" you ask.
"O-of course. What makes you t-think I'm not f-fine?" she asks, her blush widening.
"Well, for starters, you're all red. And you're stammering too. Are you sick?" you inquire again.

Mew doesn't reply. She just stares at you with her sapphire eyes, trying to formulate an answer.
"Mew? Why are you acting like this? Is something wrong?" you ask, worriedly.

Mew sighs deeply, before answering...
1352112121112122112111221122112112121222.title: "Could you bring me back? I'll tell you...

choices: She shrinks but you still live and shrink even smaller with her
She does not and you die
13521121211121221121112211221121122.content: But when she does eat you does she shrink? And do you live or die? As a side effect of her shrinking?
13521121211121221121112211221121122.title: "... I'm sorry. It'll be painless, ...

choices: Weavile takes pity on you and decides to let you out.
Too late! The acids start to dissolve you!
135211212111212211211122112211211222.content:
"Little guy... I'm sorry... Even if I won't shrink, I need to eat..." these words pronounced by the gigantic Weavile are more than enough to make you tremble with fear. Suddenly, you find yourself wishing once again that you were with Celebi. Your chances with a pretty yet fearful legendary are much better than your chances with a hungry, delirious pokemon. But Celebi is maybe still asleep, unaware of your awaiting doom, while Mew is Arceus knows where. So you haven't many chances of survival right now.

And so, the inevitable happens. Giving you one last, although sorrowful look, Weavile starts pulling you closer to her mouth, opening it in the meantime. Your trembling increases as she moves you to her opened lips, shoves you inside, and closes them back up, sealing you in the dark, hot, slippery (and most of all, terrific!) confines of her mouth.

The dark type moves you around in her mouth, tasting you but, true to her word, you don't meet any of the sharp teeth present.
"Please!... No! I'll get you food, you don't have to do this!..." you tell at top of your lungs. Weavile stops for a short moment. Your heart freezes as the mouth opens briefly.
"Sorry." comes her booming voice, before the tongue beneath you starts moving yet again, this time dragging you to the edge of the abyss that is her throat. And then, with one gulp, the dark weasel sends you to a one way journey to her stomach.

Useless to say, you slide down the right and slippery tunnel of Weavile's esophagus and land into the fleshy interiors of her stomach, right in a sea of acid. This can't be happening again...

You look around frenetically, trying to find any possible from this fleshy hell. But the only thing that you can spot in the darkness of the stomach is a small spinchther that most probably leads to Weavile's intestinal tract... but, even if it's better than the alternative, you'll never willingly take that exit...

Outside, Weavile rubs her belly.
"Hey? Are you alright in there?" she asks to her own stomach. She carefully listens to your answer.
"Not for long!" you exclaim with fear.
"Come on, don't be like that. What's it like in there?" she asks, remembering of her curiosity about her own insides.
"It's dark, hot, and it smells awful. Oh, yeah, and I'm also going to die very soon!" you reply sarcastically.

"Come on, look on the bright side..." she says. Not the type of thing a dark type says usually.
"Why, is there any?!" comes the rhetorical question.
"We-" Weavile attempts to say, but you cut her off.
"Look, just stop and let me die." you say.

Feeling your anger, and respecting your true, last wish, Weavile just shuts up. Hunger settled, she decides to face her second problem and sleep for a bit. So she closes her eyes, attempting to get some sleep.

You, meanwhile, didn't give up in trying to find a way out of this. Since Weavile is laying on her back, you try to climb back to her throat. But, at your first try, you end up falling right back into the stomach. Darn... Where the heck is Mew?!

With horror, you realize that the fluid, that isn't burning yet, has risen up to your waist. The heat is also starting to become unbearable. And the smell surely isn't getting any better. What are you going to do?


Weavile had been trying to get some sleep, but she simply couldn't. She feels a weight in her chest, which undoubtedly is her own conscience, that is hammering her heart. And she perfectly knows the cause. Your words resound in her ears.
‘I-I'll be your friend!’. Those four words are repeated hundreds of times in her mind, making her feel even worse. She doomed her friend... her only friend, and she knows that.
"What... what have I done?" she asks herself with sadness.

Back in the stomach, your time is running out. The acids rose once again, this time to your torso. So, lacking ideas to get out, you simply decide to try and convince Weavile to let you out of here.
"Weavile!" you shout.
"Hey..." she replies after a few seconds.
"Come on Weavile, I beg you, let me out! I'll do anything! I'll be your friend, I'll be your slave, just let me out!" you say desperately.

Just as you say that, the acids rise up to your neck. You start to feel a tingling sensation. After the experience in Celebi's stomach, you fully know that it will soon start to burn, then you'll be slowly dissolved into nothing but food for Weavile.


Bubbles of acid start to form and pop around you, meaning that digestion has started. A small hope enters your heart as you, listening carefully, hear Weavile whispering to herself. Is she thinking to let you out?

Whatever the dark weasel decides, you hope she's quick - your date is incoming!
135211212111212211211122112211211222.title: Eaten by Weavile

choices: You both get to the shrine unharmed
1352112121112122112111221122112112221.content:
Outside of the dark, lethal chamber that is Weavile's stomach, the dark type pokemon lays there, eyes half lidded, arms and legs spread on the floor. She's drowsy, but unable to sleep again.

Why does that human she ate have such an effect on her? He's just food, like every other prey unluckily enough to end up in her stomach.

Weavile shakes her head. That isn't entirely true. She never ate a human before, and she's regretting doing so now. The tiny human wasn't just food, he was the very fist soul she ever talked to.

The very first living being she called a friend, even if it was for a really brief time.

The silence inside the cavern is suddenly broke by a what seems a mere whisper, coming from within her. And, as Weavile told the human before sending you on a trip in the inside of her stomach, she has very good hearing, so that the single word he said didn't escape her.
"Please..." his voice sounds weaker.

The ice-dark type figures out that it won't be long before the tiny human is digested. She imagines your situation.

Alone, in complete darkness, and surrounded by flesh while submerged in deadly liquid.

She shudders at the thought, quickly shaking the imagine off her head. It only made her feel worse.

Remorseful, Weavile makes a choice.

She'll spare the human.

So, without even thinking lucidly, she lifts her left arm in the air, her claws shining sinisterly.

Soon, the same claws glow with icy energy as she performs ice punch. Which she then slams into her own stomach with great strength.

With enough strength that her legs rise off the ground, her teeth grit and her eyes close in pain, while a thick layer of ice forms on her belly, only to shatter shortly after.

But her action also had a side effect on her stomach.

You were about to lose every hope and - for the second time - accept your horrible fate.

But your world suddenly shakes along Weavile's stomach as a violent impact ungracefully throws you upwards. A stream of gastric juice follows you, dragging you into the giantess' esophagus and, eventually, in her mouth, which she opens while tilting her head, making you slide out, into the light and onto the cold, hard floor of the cave.

Not caring about what you just went through, you fearfully turn to face the dark weasel, who just eyes you with a small smirk.
"Hello there" she snickers.

You don't respond, and take a few steps back instead. The smirk fades from Weavile's face.
"Do not leave, please. We need to talk, alright?" you don't answer, but you halt.
"I'm too tired to try anything anyway, so there's no need to fear me." she speaks, empathizing her words with a loud yawn.

"Why would I want to talk to you?" you ask frowning, while wiping some of her gastric juices off your body.
"... I let you out?"
"You also let me in, so we're even. And I don't have anything more to say." you reply coldly, starting to walk away again.
"You know, you're kinda walking to your grave," Weavile states, successfully getting your attention.
"What?" you ask.
"The sun set down, the forest's full of predators and I'm the only one who can keep you safe right know. It's not like you have a chance out there." she says with another yawn.

You say nothing, but lower your head. She's right. You would be nothing but a snack for the first pokemon you would meet.

So, sighing, you sit down, back turned to Weavile.
"And I thought you were cool." you remark. The giantess snickers behind you, showing she doesn't hold any hard feelings for your pissed behavior.

The ground quakes lightly beneath you as her clawed feet move towards you.

You remain still and, soon enough, a shining set of claws gently picks you up.
"Come on, are you going to pout forever?" Weavile laughs as she manipulates you so that you're facing her.
"What if say that I'm really sorry?" she asks, giving a sympathetic smile, while gently cleaning you from the foul substance that covers your body.

Just as you're about to respond, a loud cry resounds inside the cave.

"Found you!" both you and Weavile turn to see a pink pokemon, with a long tail and sapphire eyes hovering above the entrance of the cave.

You're the first to recover from your alarmed state.
"Mew?" you ask.

Seeing you (mostly) fine, Mew smiles briefly, before looking at Weavile venomously.
"You. Let him go. This instant!" she cries in poke-speech.

Weavile sweat drops.
"W-Wait, I can actually explain thi-" she abruptly stops upon seeing the stern glare Mew is giving her. She quickly realizes that she's isn't up to hear any story right now.

Weavile knows what she has to do.

And, without hesitation, she does it.

Taking Mew by surprise, she dashes towards her, roughly pushing her aside and running towards the exit.

But her plan goes poorly as Mew's tails suddenly coils around her leg, tripping her and making her fall down. You are released in the meantime.

Then, Mew hovers close to the dark type waves her paw, a cloud of thick, green smoke hitting Weavile, who suddenly falls down.
"Is she... dead?" you ask, unable to think that Mew Just poisoned a pokemon.

The legendary laughs as she lowers herself to pick you up.
‘Nope. She's just asleep. Thanks sleep powder!’ she telepathically chimes, gently caressing your hair, before turning around and floating out of the cave, leaving an asleep Weavile behind.

--

‘Hey,’ the telepathic assault startles you while Mew carries you most likely to Celebi's shrine. You briefly wonder about the grass type before answering:
"What?" you ask, hiding a hint of annoyance.
‘Sorry for not asking before, but... what happened in that cave? What did that Weavile do to you?’ Mew asks with concern.

You hesitate, thinking that if you say the truth, Mew might just rethink, go back and poison Weavile for real. You shake your head. Mew wouldn't be capable of doing that. She's far too sweet.

Mew takes your silence as horror. Slowly, you find her embracing you.
‘It's alright if you don't want to talk. But, if you need to say something, you can. Come on," she encourages you.

You take a moment, pondering your answer, before deciding to say nothing.
"Trust me, Mew, I'm fine." you say.

Mew nods her head, before hugging you tighter. You hug back, silently thanking her for caring.

If you didn't grow fond of Celebi, you would be lying if you told that at least you didn't grow fond of Mew. Even is she ate you, by now you're sure it was an accident. But you know that you like both legendaries' company, at least a little bit.

Maybe it won't be so hard to get used to this new life after all.

--

After a bit, Mew releases you, giggles and places you on her head, before silently venturing deeper into Ilex Forest, making her way to Celebi...
1352112121112122112111221122112112221.title: Free!

1352112121112122112111221122112112222.content: But does being digested kill, you, or does it cause you to become part of Weavile's body, still alive (and does Weavile, shrink like you said, since you don't know how you shrunk, and she's not a legendary that could resist shrinking themselves it is possible.)
1352112121112122112111221122112112222.title: Too late! The acids start to dissolve you!

choices: They believe her and calm down.
They don't believe anything of that. You have to act up
13521121211121221121112211221122.content:
You don't want to make Mew appear as a monster. And you don't want Weavile to be hurt either, she seems a nice pokemon. Most probably that Mew went to wake Celebi when she lost sight of Weavile, and if the two find her... you're sure that she will go and make Zoroark company back in the past.

"Hey, I asked you something" Weavile snaps you out of your train of thought "Oh yeah, you see, this is all a huge mistake. Can you bring me back to Mew?" you ask "What? That crazy pokemon that almost killed us both? No way" Weavile states "And what mistake you are talking about?"
"Well... you see..."

"So Mew wasn't chasing you, but she was chasing me to get you back? And you're saying that she was probably worried about you, because of all the bad things that happened with this Zoroark that claimed you as her slave? And now she and Celebi, who is your girlfriend, are for sure worried sick about you and very probably they are... coming to find you... and kill me? *GULP*" Weavile gulps hard at the last part "No, they won't kill you, I'm sure of it. But I think that you should try and explain yourself convincingly... or else you could wake up in the Prehistoric Era..." you say. Weavile nods slowly "Everything's so hard to believe... I mean, human and pokemon relationships are forbidden..."
"I want to let you know that I hadn't a choice in the matter. Celebi just brought me to Mew and Arceus; they both approved" you say. Weavile thinks for a few seconds "I believe you" she says "Thanks. Now, could you bring me back to Mew? I don't really want you to see you forced to pass through a portal that would bring you in another timeline. You seem nice" you say "Why thank you" Weavile replies with a sly smile "But I think you'll have to wait to get back"
"Why?"
"Because right now... I need to-" Weavile collapses to the ground, asleep. You stare at her for a second, before getting up.

You wander around for a small bit, before sitting down again. There's nothing to do. You can only wait for Weavile to wake up or for Mew and Celebi to find you. So you decide to try and recollect your thoughts.

"Hey! Wake up!". You open your eyes at the sudden voice. Weavile is standing before you. You must have fallen asleep "You fell asleep" Weavile confirms your thoughts "I noticed"
"Well, now you're awake, I'm bringing you back" she says, her sharp claws reaching down for you. With extreme caution, she picks you in her claws "Let's go".

The dark type pokemon moves fast between the trees; speed is the most important weapon that Weaviles have in nature. Apart the claws of course. With both, they can slash anything to pieces in a matter of seconds. You don't even want to think to what would have happened if this Weavile wasn't so nice to you.

After a while, Weavile dashes forward, but she bumps into a fellow pokemon that was passing. She falls back. Luckily you manage to hold onto her claw. Getting up, Weavile notices that it is actually two pokemon she bumped into. A pink cat and small, green humanoid. Both get up as well and see Weavile. More specifically, they see you grasped in Weavile's claws.

In a moment, Mew's paws lit with fire, while Celebi glows pink "You have one second to put the little guy down and leave" Mew says in a calm voice "Leave my little human on the ground and you won't wake up in another era" Celebi says as well calmly. But her voice is full of poison. Weavile sweat drops. Everything the human said was right! "W-wait! This is all a huge misunderstanding! I just found him on the ground; I was half asleep and didn't even notice is was holding him. Next thing I know is that Mew was blasting me with fire" Weavile explains. Celebi's gaze goes from angry to amused as she looks at Mew "I was trying to get our tiny friend back!"
"I would've given him back if you gave me the chance!" Weavile retorts "He's safe and sound! Look yourself!" she holds you out for the two pokemon. Celebi quickly snatches you and looks all over your tiny form. Her eyes widen at the sight of the cut on your arm, the one that Weavile accidentally did you earlier "If he's safe and sound, how do you explain this?!" Celebi picks your arm and shows it to Weavile. Clearly, she noticed the small wound on it "I would have been more careful if your friend there would've stopped attacking me. Back there I was a 'little' busy getting away from her!" Weavile explains. Celebi and Mew...
13521121211121221121112211221122.title: "It's all just a misunderstanding, can ...

choices: "Why don't you stay with us?" you ask
"Goodbye! And thanks for helping me!" you say
135211212111212211211122112211222.content:
"Should we believe you?! A little more deep and his arm would have been cut off! You clearly are lying!" Celebi exclaims, obviously furious "I'm not! Why would I have brought the little human back to you if if was lying?" Weavile asks enraged as well "You probably weren't bringing him to us! You were hunting, weren't you?" Mew states "I DON'T go hunting until night. And if I wasn't bringing him to you, why would I have given him back without a fight?" Weavile retorts "We're legendaries. Any pokemon would have" Celebi lies, remembering how Zoroark gave her quite the fight for the her little guy. Weavile finds nothing to counter this last sentence "As I thought" Celebi says again, glowing green, while Mew readies focus blast. Weavile has a terrified look on her face "Well little guy *Gulp* been a pleasure to meet you"


You notice that your two pokemon companions are about to attack the helpless Weavile. So far, she didn't hurt you. And she helped you by bringing you back, so you decide to return the favor "Stop!!!" you yell.

Mew and Celebi stop and look at you "What now?" Mew asks "Just a moment and this other meanie will be gone little guy, you don't have to worry anymore" Celebi says sweetly. Ignoring her, you continue "Don't attack her! She didn't do anything bad to me!! She helped me instead!" you shout, getting weird looks by the three pokemon. Even Weavile is shocked that you are actually defending her "B-but that cut..." Mew says "It's been an accident, Weavile never wanted to hurt me so far, she's been actually nice to me" you say.

Celebi's gaze shifts from you to the dark type pokemon "Is that true? You... you didn't hurt him on purpose?" she asks "Yes, everything he said is true!" Weavile shouts, fearing for her life. A moment passes, when Celebi stops glowing "If my little guy says so... I believe you" she says. The sphere in Mew's paws disappears as she looks at Weavile "Hey, sorry to have scared you. We were just worried, you know" she apologizes "It's okay. N-now, if you let me, I'll be on my way.." Weavile says, starting to walk away.

You look at the dark type pokemon leaving. Are you really letting her go, after she helped you, without even saying thanks?

"Weavile!" you shout. She turns around "Wait! Don't go! I have something to tell you!" you yell "What?" she asks
135211212111212211211122112211222.title: They don't believe anything of that. You ha...

choices: Mew has to return to the Tree
1352112121112122112111221122112221.content:
You feel like you should stick with this Weavile, you really don't want to get separated from her, not after she helped you "Wait! Why don't you stay here with us?" you ask.

This takes all three pokemon by surprise, all of their eyes widen. Celebi and Mew look at you with weird looks, Weavile looks at you with a shocked stare "But why?" she asks "Friends do stick together, right? Because... we're friends, right?" you ask "What? I barely know you" Weavile says "Yeah, but I don't consider someone who has been so nice to me a foe" you state, getting a nod from Weavile "Fine, I'll stay. At least until tonight, when I'll go hunting" she says, walking back.

You notice Celebi staring at you with a weird look "What?"
"Why do you want her to remain? You aren't trying something, are you?" the time traveler pokemon asks. You sigh "Mew?"
"You aren't trying anything weird with this Weavile, are you?" her voice rings in your head "What? No!" you shout out of embarrassment, a quick blush appearing on your face. Celebi nods "You better" she says, grasping you possessively.

After a while, Weavile breaks the silence "So... What now?"
"I was waiting for someone to say this. Let's play!" Mew giggles, happily floating in circles. The sight makes you chuckle, and it makes Celebi smile, while Weavile rolls her eyes, her arms crossed. Clearly, she is a serious pokemon. But she eventually follows you.

After hours of non stop playing, the sun sets down, the moon starting to rise in the sky. Weavile had proven herself a valid player, her speed make her win most of the games you played. You're sure that she enjoyed it, though she didn't show it.

After the moon fully rises in the sky, Weavile looks at it "I'm going to hunt" she says "Will we be seeing you again?" you ask hopeful
"If you stay here, in the morning maybe" she states. And with that, she dashes off. You look at her as she disappears through the forest, making her trail disappear as well "Now that I think of it, we have to get dinner as well" Mew says. Both you and Celebi nod, while three berries are snatched from a tree by psychic and float over you. An oran berry floats in front of you as the two pokemon dig in.

After eating the berry, both Mew and Celebi yawn "I think it's time to hit the hay little guy" Celebi says, laying down at the feet of a big tree. Mew follows her and lies down as well, while you are placed on Celebi's chest, that you assume is your new 'bed'. Sighing you snuggle comfortably to the green giantess, getting a giggle from her "That tickles!" she exclaims, petting you slowly. The relaxing feeling makes you feel drowsy, you close your eyes just for a moment... and you end up falling asleep.

Celebi smiles warmly "You really do love him, don't you Celebi?" comes the voice of a certain pink pokemon "Yeah. I'm really glad you and Arceus accepted my love. I'm even more glad that he agreed to be mine" Celebi says "No problem, really. I have to admit, I would have done the same thing if I found him. He's a cutie!"Mew giggles, sending her best friend into laughs as well.

The next morning, you wake up and open your eyes. You notice that you are still laying on Celebi's chest, her hands wrapped around you. She's asleep, and so is Mew next to her. Something else catches your eye. Weavile is there, sleeping. She kept her promise and came back, a visible lump in her belly. Whatever she ate, it was big enough to fill her.

Not long after you woke up, Celebi wakes up as well, followed by Mew "Good morning little guy" both pokemon greet you, Celebi pecking your cheek. You run the back of your head sheepishly. You silently stare at each other for a while, then...
1352112121112122112111221122112221.title: A new friend

choices: Not such luck for her. Weavile wakes up
13521121211121221121112211221122211.content:
Mew suddenly breaks the silence "Guys, there's something I should tell you." she says
"What is it?" Celebi asks, while you stare at the pink pokemon curiously.

"I... I actually have to leave." Mew tells, her usual smile dropping as she says it; your expression drops as well
"B-But why?" you ask
"I can't leave the Tree unguarded for too much time, you never know what might happen." she replies. You nod sadly, and so does Celebi
"But there's good news! I might return just in a day or two. If everything is alright back there, you will be seeing me tomorrow morning." Mew says, her former smile returning on her face. This makes you smile a little.

"Well, see you later guys!" Mew says, hugging Celebi
"Try to not do anything weird you two while I'm gone" Mew then whispers
"Mew!" Celebi shouts, a big blush on her cheeks. Mew simply giggles as she lowers herself to your height, patting your head with her tail
"See you later little guy. Take good care of her, remember she's my best friend. And your girlfriend." Mew says in your head, winking. Ignoring the last part, you smile a little
"See you later Mew. We'll miss you."
"Awwww! Aren't you just sweet?" she giggles as you are lifted towards her open paws. She closes you in a tight hug, a hug that almost crushes you. Nonetheless, you enjoy it. Her fur is soft and warm, her paws gently press you into it.

Celebi stares at the scene with a smile. It's good to see that you two are already so close friends, this makes her feel slightly happy. She joins in the hug, able to hug the both of you thanks to her long green arms.

You are being crushed between two walls, one of pink fur and the other of green skin. The two pokemon hug you for about a minute, before pulling off. Mew puts you back on the ground "See you soon guys" she says, before disappearing in a flash of pink light.

Celebi stares at the point where Mew was just a moment ago. She feels both sad and happy. Sad because her best friend left. Happy because she gets to spend some quality (And above all, private!) time with her little boyfriend. Turning to you, she picks you in a gentle grasp and hugs you softly for a moment, before pulling off. She stares sweetly at you...
13521121211121221121112211221122211.title: Mew has to return to the Tree

choices: Suddenly, a bird pokemon snatches you from her!
135211212111212211211122112211222111.content:
Celebi looks around, making sure that nothing can ruin her plans this time. Mew gone for at least a day? Checked. Weavile sleeping? Checked. Zoroark back in the past and the zone free from any dangers? Checked. Perfect. Flying up on a tree branch, Celebi sits down, sits you down and stares at you smiling, glad that she finally gets some alone time with you.

She wonders what to do with you for a bit; you can't help but wonder as well what she's going to do to you. Finally, Celebi stares back at you, a smile on her face.

Unknown to you, she has decided to do the same 'game' she did yesterday and the day before. And like back there, she feels the same feeling she felt the night she met you, she feels needy. So she snatches you from the wooden surface.

Your eyes widen in fear when you notice you're getting close to Celebi's mouth
"Celebi?" you ask with fear, but she ignores you and, without giving you time to react, she drops you in her mouth and closes her lips, trapping you in the same dark cave you've been twice. You immediately start struggling, while Celebi spreads her legs and, as usual, starts rubbing her crotch, moaning lightly.

The 'cave' drops with saliva, soaking and disgusting you. But these facts are not important right now, you are thinking about getting out without being eaten
"Let me out! Please!" you cry out. Something between a giggle and a moan echoes in the mouth as your reply.

Celebi is in ecstasy right now. Her beloved feeling of power is once again overwhelming the needy one, and all thanks to the small guy inside her mouth. Celebi giggles, loving the feeling of her tiny human struggling inside her mouth. Every struggle he makes causes her to moan as she rubs her sex with increasing speed.

Celebi still can't tell why in the world it feels so good, but it does, and she can't help but going on. The feeling of power, her racing heart, her pulsing sex, all the facts combine to form an immense pleasure that passes through her whole body like a shockwave. But again, she's going to let you out once she's done.

You keep on struggling and crying out for Celebi from the inside of her mouth
"Please! Let me out! I thought we were... I though we were in love!" you attempt to get out, hoping that the word 'love' would convince her to let you out.

Celebi stops. Has she heard right? The tiny human in her mouth just said that the two of you are in love? A big smile spreads at light speed on her face. Granted, he's gonna get a big one when he comes out of her mouth, no doubt about it. Smiling even more, Celebi keeps rubbing her crotch.

You stop struggling, tired. Your only hope now is that Celebi lets you out. Which she does. You feel her tilting her head and opening her mouth, letting you slide outwards, right into her open hands.

You are welcomed back to the outside world by comforting sunlight. You look up at the verdant giantess, fear in your eyes. But she does nothing, expect for quickly cleaning your face from her drool and laying a big, wet kiss on your face.

An intense blush covers your face as Celebi pulls off, almost pulling your face along her lips. Cleaning your face the best you can, you stare up at a blushing Celebi, who is giggling like a little girl.

Not much passes before Celebi returns to stare at you, the same sweet expression she had before. That expression can only mean she has other plans for you! You gulp hard.
135211212111212211211122112211222111.title: Celebi's plans

choices: Gyarados snatches both of you in its mouth and swallows!
Gyarados is hit by a fully awake Weavile
1352112121112122112111221122112221111.content:
Celebi is staring at you with the same sweet smile she had before. You notice she's moving you closer to her lips.

You fear that she wants to put you in her mouth again. Experiencing death thanks to that wet cave left you preferring to stay out of it. Even though you can't explain why every time you entered, everything began to shake.

But Celebi doesn't want you in her mouth again, this time she has other plans for you. Plans that you might actually enjoy. So she puckers her lips and starts smooching your face all over.

You would enjoy this experience more, if it wasn't for the lack of oxygen you are having. You are hardly able to breathe with Celebi's lips covering your face. Luckily for you, she gives you one last kiss, but it lasts longer, almost pulling off your face with her lips when she pulls off.

Panting to catch your breath, you stare at the green giantess with a curious expression. She stares back at you with a slight smile, happy that she finally managed to get her 'fun'. You find yourself being snatched up again, as Celebi nuzzles you against her cheek lovingly.

Shortly after, Celebi raises herself from the branch and picks you up. Flying down, you notice that Weavile is still dead asleep. Celebi carries you to a small lake nearby. Floating above mere inched from the water, you stare at your own reflection in the water; you notice you're all red from both the embarrassment and the 'mark' that Celebi's lips left on your face. Celebi dunks the tip of her left foot in. She shivers at the cool sensationensation. You notice that the water is getting closer as Celebi dunks her whole body but her head, and so you (who is still plucked in her grasp) as well, in the lake.

You have to admit, the refreshing feeling of the water is relaxing you, Celebi's submerged head towering over yours. She is still holding you in her solid grasp, careful to not let you go. In fact, even a Magikarp could be a threat to you, even though it's the weakest pokemon ever. She swims around for a bit, pressing you more into her skin "There! Isn't this relaxing little guy?" she asks.

But you have no time to realize what Celebi said because suddenly, you notice, the water starts to shake. Celebi notices as well. Looking down, she sees a shadow coming from underwater. Celebi has barely the time to lift herself and you from the water that a HUGE - and not just from your point of view- Gyarados comes out, roaring at the sight of the food before it. Celebi backs away, but the Gyarados strikes with ice fang. Celebi dodges just in time and strikes back with energy ball. Gyarados dodges and hides underwater. Celebi tries to fly away, but the Gyarados submerges and hits with headbutt. Celebi is sent flying and, before she can move, the fish pokemon fires hyper beam. Celebi dodges, but she is hit slightly on the shoulder.

The beam hits the tree Weavile is sleeping under, walking her up. But she is still tired and doesn't notice the Atrocious pokemon attacking the legendary pokemon and her tiny human.

Celebi hardly reaches the ground and lands, before collapsing, her grip on you weakening. The Gyarados approaches the ground, smirking evilly as he moves its mouth to the food...
1352112121112122112111221122112221111.title: Celebi's plans for you part 2

13521121211121221121112211221122211112.content:
Gyarados moves its huge mouth towards both you and Celebi, who can't move due the wound caused by hyper beam on her shoulder. Her grip on you weakened slightly, but you still can't slip away, as you are trapped beneath the mythical pokemon's belly.

The shadow of the enormous pokemon about to eat you covers Celebi's whole form. It is about to pick both of you in its mouth, when a sharp pain crosses him. Looking down, Gyarados spots a certain black and red pokemon with sharp claws through its scaled skin, blood pouring down her claws
"You disturbed my sleep, and you want to eat my friends, so you're going to pay," Weavile states.

You hear her talking, relieved the she considers you two friends (and even more that she wants to save you!). Though you're sure that it's more because the Gyarados disturbed her.

Moving at light speed, Weavile climbs on the giant fish pokemon's body, slashing it all over, causing him deep wounds. The Gyarados roars in pain as Weavile gets on its head, on its muzzle, and cuts off the whiskers on the sides of its mouth.

The Gyarados roars in pain as it falls to the ground, blood pouring down the spots where it's whiskers were. Weavile leaps off its muzzle, cleaning the blood from her claws, before assisting you. She helps Celebi to stand up
"Thanks Weavile. If it wasn't for you, me and my little guy would be in a stomach right now," Celebi thanks her
"No problem. That Gyarados disturbed me, and it was fair that he was punished," Weavile replies.

Looking at the Gyarados, you notice its whiskers cut off. The two blue whiskers are on the ground, dying it of a bloody red color, and making you clear that the Gyarados is a male (you learned that Gyarados with blue whiskers are males, while Gyarados with white whiskers are females)
"Did you kill him Weavile?" you ask
"Nope, just taught that beast a lesson. This ought teach him disturbing me," she replies. You roll your eyes as you notice the Gyarados moving. But he doesn't attack, he just retreats underwater.

"So, now that you're awake... What do we do?" you ask the two pokemon from Celebi's arms
"Don't know, why don't you decide?" Celebi says
"Still can't understand you," you state, getting a groan from the legendary pokemon. She has either to teach you poke-speak or learn human language
"I don't know either, you pick" Weavile says.

Nodding, you open your mouth to speak, but the sound of something rustling stops you. You notice a bush moving as out comes...
13521121211121221121112211221122211112.title: A vile rescue

choices: He barks alerted. He's still scared.
He barks happily and wags his tail, in a grateful manner.
135211212111212211211122112211222111121.content:
You and your companions stare at the bush as out of it comes a red, four legged pokemon. It has black stripes and cream belly, tail and mane. Fur of the same color on its chest, little paws, each with three claws. And it's barking agitated.

You recognize the pokemon as a Growlithe, a pokemon that is known for its friendliness. But this one is clearly scared from the way it is barking. You wonder why and you get your reply when a group of ten wild Poochyenas leaps out of the same bush, growling at the puppy.

While Growlithe is a friendly pokemon, Poochyena is not, at least to unknown people, and this group is clearly after the fire puppy. Probably they're hunting it down. Or it did something to them (and something big judging by the expressions on the Poochyenas's faces).

The Growlithe and the Poochyenas stare at each other for a bit, before one of the dark type pokemon uses shadow ball. Growlithe dodges and lets out a weak flame from its mouth, missing. All of the hyena pokemon use shadow ball at once. Growlithe manages to dodge a few, but it's hit by at least six of them.

The fire type collapses as the hyenas get closer to it. Feeling bad for the poor pokemon, you decide to assist him.
"Celebi! Weavile! Please, help that Growlithe!" you yell. Both pokemon nod.

In a moment, Weavile manages to slash all of the Poochyenas, all ten of them on the ground, visible wounds on each one. Smirking satisfied by her work, Weavile turns to Celebi.
"Your turn," she says. Celebi nods as she unleashes leaf storm, hitting all the Poochyenas and sending them flying.

You and your pokemon companions approach the puppy on the ground. You notice it's moving weakly.
"What gender is it Weavile?" you ask
"Male, I can tell," she replies. Suddenly, the Growlithe opens his eyes and looks at you three. He stands up and starts to...
135211212111212211211122112211222111121.title: Meeting the fire puppy

choices: The Growlithe trots off, having nothing more to do here.
The Growlithe decides to stick with the three of you.
1352112121112122112111221122112221111212.content:
The Growlithe stares at you curiously for a bit, before barking happily, his tail starting to wag. He starts running in circle around the two pokemon, showing his happiness. Celebi smiles; Weavile smirks.
