The fire type keeps running in circle for a while, before stopping, his eyes fix on you. He's maybe wondering what kind of bug could be so similar to a human... If it isn't a real shrunk one! Growlithe starts to bark again, this time out of amusement, before turning to Celebi.

"Hey, what kind of bug it is?" he asks. Celebi smiles at his naiveness
"This bug, my dear Growlithe, is a human," she explains
"A human? Aren't they bigger? This one is so tiny! Why?" Growlithe says
"I really don't know about his size, I'm sorry. But nonetheless, this human stays with me," Celebi states with a smile
"Can I lick him?" Growlithe asks
"What? Why?" Celebi asks, while tightening her grip on you
"To thank him! If it wasn't for him, I would have been killed by those Poochyenas" Growlithe explains.

Finding nothing bad in Growlithe's intentions, Celebi reclutantly puts you on the ground. Weavile, who was silent the whole time the two pokemon talked, begins to snicker.
"Celebi? Why did you-" you say, but Growlithe cuts you off by pushing you on the ground and starting licking you. Caught by surprise, you struggle under the red muscle that pushes you down, soaking you in thick saliva. Some of the liquid enters your mouth, and you have to regularly spit it out, disgusted.

Growlithe keeps licking you for a good while, before stopping. He stares at you wagging his tail, happily. You get up, covered in a thick coat of saliva. You spit more liquid from your mouth, almost throwing up doing so, and you turn to the Growlithe, smiling. He lowers his head. Getting the message, you start petting him on the head, getting small moans and happy barks from him.

The sight makes the two pokemon towering over you two smile.
"Awwww, aren't they so cute?" Celebi giggles.
"Yeah, sure, very precious," Weavile confirms, snickering

You keep petting and scratching the fire puppy for a bit, before he stands up. He gives you a last, long lick, before pulling off.
1352112121112122112111221122112221111212.title: He barks happily and wags his tail, in a gratef...

choices: A metallic creature with iron wings lands before you (Skarmory)
A pink, little creature lands before you (Mew is back early!)
1352112121112122112111221122112221111212.content:
Growlithe stares at you and your pokemon intently, before barking one last time.
"Well, it's time I leave. Thank you all!" he thanks one last time, giving you another lick.
"Don't even say that, it was a pleasure," Celebi says smiling, while you are brought in her long arms by psychic. Weavile remains silent.

"Goodbye you all!" Growlithe beams, though it's just an incomprehensible 'lithe!', before the puppy trots off, disappearing in the forest. Celebi smiles, while Weavile rolls her eyes.

Not long after Growlithe left, a loud noise is heard. More accurately, it comes from behind you, who are plucked against Celebi's belly, with the effect of almost breaking your eardrums.
"Oh yeah, with everything we did this morning, we actually forgot breakfast," Celebi says, giggling at you, who are holding your discomforted ears.
"Let me get it," Weavile says, her claws shining.

Just as she says this, she fastly climbs on a tree and snatches a lot of berries in a mere few seconds. She hops down, a literal mountain of berries falling behind her .
"Dig in," she says.

You eat just a berry - that is enough to fill you up - while the two pokemon eat almost all of them, sparing just a few. Celebi sighs satisfied, while you burp a little, covering your mouth just after.
"You're full, aren't little guy?" Weavile snickers.
"Yeah, I can't eat anymore," you state, making the green pokemon next to Weavile giggle.

Celebi gently pushes you on the ground and starts rubbing your belly softly.
"You're full little guy? You're so cute. And to my luck, you're mine," she giggles. You sigh annoyed. This relationship is going to be hard if you don't find the way to communicate with Celebi. You close your eyes, enjoying the softness of the grass and the soft hands rubbing your belly slowly.

But a sudden noise makes you look upwards. And so do your companions. The three of you notice something flying... And it's coming your way!
1352112121112122112111221122112221111212.title: The Growlithe trots off, having nothing more to do

choices: The Skarmory manages to get away
Celebi and Weavile regain sight and try to save you
1352112121112122112111221122112221111212.content:
Suddenly, a metallic creature with iron wings lands before you.

You recognize it as a Skarmory, its grey and red wings shining as it looks in your direction. It looks at Celebi, then at Weavile, then its eyes fix on you.

Celebi squeezes you in a protective manner, unaware of the intentions of the bird pokemon; Weavile just stares back at it with her arms crossed, waiting for it to do anything. Which it does.

In a moment, the Skarmory's wings glow white as it charges both your companions with steel wings. Taken by surprise, both barely manage to dodge the iron bird. Weavile shows off her claws as the Skarmory charges her. Surprisingly, Weavile manages to block steel wings with metal claw. She grasps its wings and throws it away.

But the Skarmory manages to regain its balance and uses brave bird. Weavile doesn't move as the iron bird hits... a green barrier? Weavile didn't even notice Celebi in front of her using protect. The Skarmory hits the ground. It hardly manages to stand up. Its red eyes stare at the three of you, before it uses flash.

You and your pokemon companions are blinded by the bright light, Celebi lets you go to rub her eyes. Luckily, you are pretty close to the ground, so you are fine except for two blinded eyes. Unable to see anything, you don't notice the Skarmory approaching you.

The Skarmory snatches you in its mouth by the back of your shirt and prepares to fly off...
1352112121112122112111221122112221111212.title: A metallic creature with iron wings lands befor...

1352112121112122112111221122112221111212.content:
Still blinded by the light, you are lifted by the Skarmory. Celebi and Weavile, still blinded as well, can't see that the iron bird pokemon snatched you in its beak. Then, without warning, you are carried off at supersonic speed.

When Celebi and Weavile finally manage to regain the sight, the Skarmory is no longer there. Celebi's first thought is about you. Last time she saw you, you slipped out of her grip as she rubbed her eyes. So she searches around for a bit.
"Little guy? Are you here?" she calls out for you. Not finding you anywhere, she realizes what must have happened. And a squeal of horror escapes her mouth.

Back at you, you manage to regain the sight, and you look around, just to see you're up in the sky, the Skarmory carrying you somewhere by the back of your shirt. You don't struggle to get free, as falling from a short height is already deadly for you, falling from this height would literally leave nothing of your body. So you quietly wait for this Skarmory to bring you wherever it's taking you.

After a while of flying, the Skarmory brings you to what seems a nest. But, instead of being made of old tree branches, it's made of pieces of steel, some of it rusty. The Skarmory lands in it and it puts you on the steel surface, careful to not cut you.

The iron bird stares at you with amusement for a while, before its gaze shifts from an amused one to a hungry one. And you know what the bird is gonna eat. Gulping, you try to back away, just to have ti stop at the edge of the nest. The Skarmory gets near you and opens its mouth, ready to pick you in.

You try to back away a little more, but you almost lose your balance and try to get back on the nest...
1352112121112122112111221122112221111212.title: The Skarmory manages to get away

1352112121112122112111221122112221111212.content:
Before the Skarmory can catch you in its beak, you lose your balance and fall off the nest.

The Skarmory groans. There goes its prey. It doesn't even try to catch the small snack that was so similar to a human. The iron bird never tried to eat one before, so this could have been a only chance. Too bad it's gone. Well, thinks the Skarmory, it would just have to find another meal.

You fall down, the only things you can see is the ground getting closer and closer. Some tears escape your eyes, it isn't fair. Why do you have to die at such young age? You have a whole life to live. Or more accurately, you had a whole life to live, because right now, you don't really have anything that would slow down your fall.

As you fall down, your life passes before your eyes. Your parents, your sister, the end of the school, the excitement of getting your first pokemon... Good memories fill your mind, comforting you in your last moments. Then, you remember something else. Celebi, Mew, Arceus, Weavile, those memories also fill your mind. You remember your death in Celebi's stomach, your return to the life. And now you're about to die again.

It's been quite a long fall, that nest must have been on a really high spot. But now, the ground is really close. You close your eyes, waiting for the impact...
1352112121112122112111221122112221111212.title: You fall off!

choices: "Okay, we can play for a bit" you say
"I'm sorry, but Celebi is probably worried sick. Can you bring me back?" you ask
1352112121112122112111221122112221111212.content:
You brace yourself for the impact. It never comes though. Instead, you hit a soft surface.

You slowly open your eyes, thanking whatever higher made you fall on this soft thing... whatever it is. You fully open your eyes, finding yourself surrounded by a pink forest. Whatever it is, it's soft and warm.

Wait.
"F-fur? Where is this coming from?" you ask yourself.
"Well, that's my fur," a voice rings in your head. And it seems pretty familiar. Wait. Pink fur... That voice...
"Mew?" you ask. You are grasped by a psychic force, and you are brought in front if the smiling face of Mew.
"Glad to see you again! Just a little bit and you would have been paste!" she exclaims, pulling you into a hug.

You gladly return it.
"Mew! You saved me! How can I ever repay you?"
"Don't even say it! The Tree was fine and, after a few hours, I was already bored. So I decided to come and check if you were fine," she explains.
"I came here a few minutes ago, and I found you falling, so I rushed to catch you. I'm glad I did it!" she exclaims, nuzzling you.

Smiling, you look into Mew's blue eyes.
"Well Mew, I will never thank you enough. But I think we should go back to Celebi. She's probably worried sick about me," you say. Mew stares at you with a pleading expression.
"Before we go..." she says "Can you do me a favor?".
"What?" you ask.

In a flash of light, you find yourself staring at a crystal building. The Tree of Beginning.
"M-Mew, why did you brought me here?" you ask.
"Before I bring you back to Celebi, would you like to play with me? I mean, just you and me?" she asks.
"Wh-what?" you ask.
"I want to play alone with you for a bit. Just for a bit, before I bring you back. What do you say?" Mew asks again.

You are about to reply, when you notice the pleading look in Mew's eyes. You suddenly remember that she's all alone here at the Tree. But you really don't want Celebi to be worried. Maybe she and Weavile are rocking the whole forest to find you. In the end, you make your choice...
1352112121112122112111221122112221111212.title: Saved by Mew

1352112121112122112111221122112221111212.content:
You don't want to upset Mew, since she's been so nice to you. Celebi can wait a little longer. Though you feel guilty for making her worry.

"I guess it won't hurt to play for a bit," you say. Mew squeals happily and nuzzles you.
"Thank you! Thank you!" she exclaims with glee. You smile at her excitement and pet her cheek.
"Just for a bit. Celebi is probably going to make us both pay when she discovers I was here all the time," you say, making Mew laugh.
"You're right, I don't want to make her worry too much. We'll play just for a bit," Mew says.
"Fine with me, what game do we start with?" you ask.
Mew giggles and puts you on the ground, giving you a light, though gentle push with her tail.
"Tag! You're it!" she beams, flying away from you.
Smirking, you rush behind her.

Meanwhile, back in Ilex Forest, Celebi is literally scanning every inch of the forest, trying to find her little lover.
"Little guy! Where are you?!" she exclaims, her worry rising as once again she gets no reply. Exhausted from almost an hour of searching you all over the forest, she collapses to the ground and starts crying. Weavile reaches her. Even with her natural speed, she couldn't catch up with the hysteric, sobbing legendary.
"Where could he be? We can't find him anywhere!" Celebi screams. Weavile helps her stands back up and gives a warm expression.
"Hey, no need to cry, we'll eventually find him. He must be somewhere around here, we just have to find that Skarmory," she says.

And idea pops in Celebi's mind. Of course! The Skarmory! It must have brought you to its nest. Grabbing Weavile, Celebi flies up in the sky searching for the nest.

"Gotcha!" you yell, finally having managed to grab Mew's tail. It took you a while, as Mew is able to fly and you are shrunk. Mew giggles.
"Again! Again!" she shouts excited.
"Mew, we've been doing this for quite a while, can we do another game?" you ask, panting.
"Of course! How about hide and seek?" she asks.
"Sounds good,"
"Then go hide! I count!" and with this, Mew turns around, starting to count. You make a run for it and hide behind a crystal.

Back in Ilex Forest, Celebi finally manages to spot a metallic nest. An iron bird like pokemon in it. Celebi's eyes twitch with rage as she fastens her flight. The Skarmory barely has the time to open its eyes that Celebi tackles it full force. Thanks to Weavile, who is an extra weight, the action results even more powerful.

Celebi pins the bird to the nest with her little yet surprisingly strong arms.
"Where is the little guy?!" she asks exasperated.
"W-what little guy?" the bird asks with terror. It then remembers about the small human it snatched from the legendary in front of it earlier.
"Oh, that little guy..." the Skarmory says.
"Yeah, WHERE IS HE?" Celebi asks again, louder this time.
"Believe me, I brought him here, but he fell off! I don't know what happened to him!" the Skarmory explains. Celebi eyes widen in horror, Weavile's as well. Celebi's innocent little guy fell from such height?

Celebi is about to start crying once again, but Weavile interrupts her.
"Wait. We don't know if he is still somehow alive. It's a fool hope, but may as well take it," she explains. Celebi looks at her and nods. Then she remembers when, yesterday, she felt her little guy's aura when he was kidnapped by Zoroark. So she closes her eyes and focuses yet again on your aura. She locates it far away, right next to an incredibly strong aura.
"Little guy! You're alive!" Celebi exclaims with a smile, before assuming a curious expression "And... with Mew? What does this mean?" she asks herself before opening her eyes.
"Let's go Weavile," Celebi says, grabbing the dark type by her arms.

"So? Did you find him?" Weavile asks.
"Yes. And he and Mew will have to do a lot of explaining when they come back," Celebi replies.
"Mew? What does Mew have to do with the whole thing?" Weavile asks again.
"That's what I want to find out," Celebi says.

Back at the Tree, you play with Mew for longer than you should have. In fact, you got carried away and it's now fully afternoon. You are resting, tired from having played many games with Mew, the pink cat resting next o to you, when suddenly you remember about Celebi.
"Mew! We got carried away! I need to return to Celebi!" you say, getting a nod from her.
"You're right. Hold on, I'll bring you to Ilex Forest," she says, picking you up and disappearing in a flash of light.

She appears just in front of Celebi's sanctuary. The time traveler pokemon is sitting on it, Weavile next to her. The grass type turn her attention to you, an upset glare. And a disappointed "Le bi," is all you need to gulp in fear.

"There you are," Celebi says, hopping off the sanctuary...
1352112121112122112111221122112221111212.title: Playtime with Mew

choices: ... still upset. This won't end good...
1352112121112122112111221122112221111212.content:
The upset glare painted on Celebi's face is all that's needed to send shivers down your and Mew's back.

Celebi slowly gets near you both, stopping just before Mew. The pink cat tries to talk, but no sound comes out of her mouth. Instead, Celebi is the one to talk.
"Mew. Hand him over," she says calmly, but with her voice full of disappointment.

Mew nods and reclutantly hands you over her. Celebi snatches you in her arms, glaring daggers at you.
"Little guy," she starts "Where the heck were you doing?! You had me worried sick! I'm so angry right now... I could... I don't even know what I could do!" Celebi screams.

You can understand anything, but the screams of the legendary are enough for you to get she's angry. You feel heavy under those light blue eyes that stare at you intently, waiting for an answer.
"C-celebi c-calm down, let me explain," Mew says, stepping in the conversation. Celebi stares at her silently, a sign that means 'go on'.

"I was bored back at the Tree, once checked it was fine. So I decided to come and check if you were alright. And I'm still glad I did, because the little guy was falling from a great height. Luckily I managed to catch him. Then I brought him at the Tree, and I asked him to play with me. O was the one who kept him for all this time. If you are angry, be angry with me, because it's my fault," Mew explains, trying to not put you in any trouble. They are friends, Celebi would probably forgive her later. Not sure about you thoug, even though you're much more than a friend to Celebi.

Celebi's expression goes from an angry one to a curious one.
"Is that true little guy?" she asks you.
"Uhhhh," you say. Celebi rolls her eyes.
"Mew," she says.
"She asked if everything I told her was true," Mew says to you. You look back to Celebi.
"Look Celebi, I don't know what Mew told you, but here's how things went. I was falling from that Skarmory's nest. Mew saved me and brought me to the Tree of Beginning. She asked me to play, and I agreed, at the condition she would have to bring me back here after a bit, because we didn't want to worry you. But we lost the track of time, and Mew brought me here again. And here we are," you explain.

Celebi's expression starts to twitch in rage again.
"So you are saying that, even though you knew I was worried sick, you decided to play instead of immediately coming back?!" she screams. She looks at Mew, who nods, a guilty expression on her face.

Celebi puts you on the ground and turns around, deciding what to do with you. After a while she turns around, her eyes welling up tears. She lets out a soft "Le bi le bi,". From the sound, you understand that Celebi is...
1352112121112122112111221122112221111212.title: Confronting Celebi

1352112121112122112111221122112221111212.content:
Celebi is still upset with you. So, she decides, a little punishment is needed. So she picks you up in her little (though gigantic to you) hands and stares at you for a bit, deciding how to punish you.

You stare into the two twin blue mirrors that are Celebi's eyes, wondering what she's gonna do to you. And your wonders are answered when she opens her mouth and moves you closer to it.

"C-Celebi? W-wait are you doing? Don't put-" you try to say, but she drops you in her mouth and closes her lips, trapping you in the now familiar cave you've been in three times.
"Hey! Let me out!" you yell, trying to remain calm. Aside from the first time, Celebi spat you out the other two times she put you in her mouth, so she will spit you out again. Right?

Celebi closes her eyes, savoring your 'time out'. Your taste is always pleasing, every time she puts you in her mouth. She feels your squirms and your pleads from inside her. Mew and Weavile stare at her in shock. She just put her little guy in her mouth?!
"Celebi, you aren't going to swallow, are you?" Mew asks.
"Of course not. I'm just teaching him to not worry me. Or else," Celebi replies, still sloshing you around in her mouth.

You are thrown back and forth in the cavernous mouth for a while, when you hit your head on of Celebi's teeth. Feeling dizzy, you try to stand up on the gigantic tongue, but you end slipping and falling face first on the red muscle. Dizzy, scared, soaked in saliva, you just give up and decide to wait what will happen.

Celebi feels the squirming in her mouth stopping. The tiny human either gave up or fainted. Celebi smiles, your punishment has lasted long enough, time to let you out. Celebi tastes your tiny form one last time...
1352112121112122112111221122112221111212.title: Time out!

choices: Celebi brings you back up just in time!
Too late! The acids start to dissolve you!
1352112121112122112111221122112221111212.content:
Celebi was going to let you out, she really was, but a sudden flip of her tongue sends you in the opposite direction of her lips, right in her throat.

You scream as you fall down in the dark, slippery abyss. Your eyes widen in fear, it's happening again. Celebi really ate you again? She was that angry to you? You don't have time to think to anything more.

You land in Celebi's stomach. Last time you 'visited' this place, you died in this place. You really don't want it happen again, so you start struggling and yelling.
"Celebi! Please! I'm sorry! Let me out!" you yell at top of your lungs.

Celebi squeals in horror.
"Oh!!" she screams.
"Celebi? What happened?" Mew asks worried.
"I- I swallowed!!" Celebi yells.
"What! How could you!?" Weavile says, visibly worried for you.
"It was an accident! I swear!" Celebi replies "What do we do now?!".

You struggle and scream for a while, trying to convince Celebi to get you out. Proved an unsuccessful technique, you decide to stop and think of a plan to get out of here. You know that trying to climb the walls of Celebi's stomach would be as useless as struggling, because of the slippery walls. And you don't want to take the 'natural way'. You sigh, not knowing what to do, but knowing very good that you have short time to think of something.

Outside the stomach, the three pokemon are frantically trying to find a way to get you out of Celebi's stomach.
"What do we do?" Weavile asks.
"Don't know! Last time this happened... I don't want to remember," Celebi says, shaking away the thought of you dying once again. Suddenly, an idea crosses her mind.
"Mew! How did you get him back yesterday, when you swallowed him?" Cele asks. Mew's eyes widen.
"Right, I forgot! I used psychic to get him back up!" Mew explains. Celebi nods.
"Then I have no choice but try. Here goes!" she exclaims, her eyes glowing. She focuses on the tiny human inside of her stomach, praying Arceus that it's not too late.

Back in the stomach, the acids are starting to burn. Scared to death, you try one last time to convince Celebi "Celebi! Please! I'm REALLY sorry! Please get me out of here!" you yell, hoping she hears you...
1352112121112122112111221122112221111212.title: Celebi accidentally swallows you!

choices: Taking a nap and waking up later.
Before you can fall asleep, a wild Altaria snatches you and flies away!
1352112121112122112111221122112221111212.content:
The acids burn your skin more and more. You scream, knowing that you'll soon be dead. You close your eyes, praying God to have mercy for your soul. Suddenly, the pain ends.

You open your eyes. Are you dead? No, that's impossible, you're still surrounded by flesh and acid. But weirdly, you're floating over it, a blue aura around your small form. Is this hell? You pinch yourself, you feel pain. You're not dead, you're still in Celebi's stomach!

You try to understand what's going on, when you are moved upwards. It hits you. Celebi must be using psychic to get you out of her stomach. So she decided to spare you! Thanking whatever deity made Celebi change her mind, you are moved up in the esophagus, in the throat, and lastly in the mouth.

Celebi opens her mouth and digs one of her hands in. Getting a hold of you, she brings you to the outside world.

You are greeted back to the world by comforting sunlight, and by the worried face of Mew and Weavile. Turning around, you see Celebi staring at you, tears of both joy and sorrow pouring down her cheeks.

Celebi doesn't speak and, not caring if you're covered by her stomach acid, she encloses you in a bone-crushing hug. Tired, startled, covered in saliva and gastric acid, you return the hug, just glad you're out of her stomach, alive. Mew and Weavile are at the scene silently, Mew with a huge smile, Weavile with a smirk, both relieved you are okay.

Celebi crushes your body in her hug for about five minutes, before releasing you. She smooches your cheek and cleans some acid off your body.

After Celebi proceeded to clean you up, you yawn, tired from all the struggles you did back in the stomach. Celebi smiles.
"Aww, is someone tired? Well, I can fix that," she says, flying over the sanctuary and putting you down on it. She then pecks your cheek and starts petting your head. You hear Mew giggle distantly and yawn drowsily, about to fall asleep...
1352112121112122112111221122112221111212.title: Celebi brings you back up just in time!

choices: Follow Mew, Weavile and Celebi finding a solution to the problem
1352112121112122112111221122112221111212.content:
You yawn drowsily, wanting really bad to fall asleep, but you know you can't. You don't want to let your guard down ever again after the dangerous events that have been happening to you lately, and your survival instinct is literally yelling you to fight to remain awake.

It's a really hard task as tired as you are, with Celebi petting your head, her soft and gentle touch in your hair. Plus, seeing how hard time you are having to fall asleep, Celebi starts humming lowly, something very similar to a lullaby making your eyes even harder to keep open.

Half of you is already asleep, your awake side fighting to remain so. Struggling to keep your eyes open, you notice Celebi giggling.

Celebi giggles. Mistaking your fear for difficulty sleeping, she picks you in her arms and presses you into her chest, hugging you. The soft and warm skin relaxes you even more. You have to struggle to keep your eyes open, but it's practically impossible. Then, with a final *smooch*, you close your eyes, falling in a deep sleep.

Noticing the you asleep, Celebi smiles. Setting you on the wooden surface of the sanctuary, she turns to face Mew and Weavile, who are staring at the her silently.
"You know you girls, I wanted to talk you about something," Celebi says with a serious expression.
"What?" Mew asks cheerfully, her usual smile printed on her face.
"I can't explain why do bigger pokemon keep on attacking us, and specifically my little guy," Celebi explains.
"Easy, he's a easy prey," Weavile says "Any pokemon sees in him the perfect snack before lunch,".
"Then why didn't you eat him?" Celebi asks.
"He's way too small for me to eat. I like my prey small, but big enough to fill me. I can't deny I wonder how he tastes though" Weavile says.
"Oh, he tastes awesome! Salty yet sweet and..." Mew says excitedly, stopping as she sees Celebi's glare "Sorry,".


Rolling her eyes, Celebi talks again.
"The point is another. What can we do to keep him safe?" she asks. Silence falls in the area as the three pokemon think, the only noises that are heard are the wind through the forest and your little snoring.
1352112121112122112111221122112221111212.title: Taking a nap and waking up later.

choices: You just adjust your position, keep dreaming.
1352112121112122112111221122112221111212.content:
You are soundly asleep, softly snoring. The three pokemon are talking to each other. But, unknown to everyone, Mew's mind is elsewhere...

You are surrounded by darkness. You look around. There's nothing but darkness here.
"Where am I?" you ask yourself, trying to figure out how did you end up here in the first place.

Suddenly, a small light shines distantly. You curiously walk over it, discovering a small orb of light floating there.

Hesitantly, you move your hand to touch it. The orb turns pink.
"What? What kind of prank is thi-"
"Surprise!" Mew, suddenly pops out from the orb like it was a bubble. You nearly faint from the suddenly scare, even though this is actually a dream. Mew, on the other hand, is laughing out loud.

You patiently wait to calm down before talking.
"Mew! Why the heck did you do that?!" you ask, pissed off.
"Hey, sometimes a good laugh is necessary," she innocently replies.
"Yeah, a good laugh, not a good heart attack! And... wait..." you just noticed that Mew is actually smaller than you... like you were normal sized.
"Mew? What happened? Why aren't you giant like before? Where are we? Why-"
"Listen, I know you have questions, but give me time to answer," she cuts you off, waving her paws.
"...Sorry." you apologize.
"No problem. Now, first of all, you uave nothing to worry about. Nothing happened. Second, I'm not giant, you're just really tiny. Third, we are in your mind, you're dreaming. And..."
"My mind? Dreaming? What are you taking about?" you ask.
"Oh, didn't I tell you? You are asleep. This is your dream. I decided to peek into your dreams. And speaking of, BORING!" Mew says, looking around.

Instantly, the darkness turns into a completely pink scenario.
"There! Isn't pink much better than black?" Mew cheers.
"I suppose..." you admit with a small smile.

Then, everything begins to shake.
"Hey, what's happening?" you ask.
"Relax, maybe you're just waking up" Mew states cheerfully.

On the real world, you are moving in your sleep. None of the three pokemon, except for Mew, seems to notice your struggles...
1352112121112122112111221122112221111212.title: Dreams

choices: you're kidnapped, no one notices, and you remain asleep talking/playing with Mew
1352112121112122112111221122112221111212.content: Is it really you adjusting to your positioning or is an unknown pokemon kidnapping you as you sleep without the others knowing and you remaining asleep? (note if you die while sleeping with Mew visiting then your mind will still be alive, just forcing you to live inside Mew's mind, which might or might not have an effect on you)
1352112121112122112111221122112221111212.title: You just adjust your position, keep dreaming.

choices: "Yeah, really." you reply. Maybe you can stick with this Zorua for a while.
1352112121112122112111221122112221111212.content:
The three pokemon are still discussing with each other; Mew is still in your mind though, telling you everything she and the other two pokemon are talking about.

Too bad that no one notices a bush quietly rustling. A small, black creature hops out of it. It has shiny, blue eyes and red paws, eyebrows and a small, red colored area on its head. A little tail is quietly wagging behind it. A Zorua.

Apparently here to satisfy its huger, this little Zorua hops on the shrine you're sleeping on.

Amused by the little creature laying on it, the little fox sniffs you. Finding you pretty... interesting, the little pokemon picks you by the back of your shirt with its mouth. You remain asleep for the whole time as the Zorua leaves, without any of the three pokemon noticing.

"So you are saying that you'll stick around to help Celebi keeping me safe?" you ask. Mew nods, smiling.
"Yes, you got it right," she replies.
"Mew, why are you doing this? I mean, haven't you got duties?"
"Hey, you're my best friend's boyfriend, we're buddies. My duty is to help my friends, no matter what." Mew says with a proud smile. Then, everything shakes, again.
"Seems you're waking up. Later, little guy." Mew says, fading away.

Mew, Celebi and Weavile are still talking, when Mew giggles.
"What are you laughing at?" Weavile asks.
"I think someone is just waking up," Mew points to the spot you were a few minutes ago. The three pokemon turn their attention to the now deserted sanctuary. Celebi sighs deeply. It couldn't have happened again, could it? Right?

You slowly open your eyes. And you find yourself staring at the black little pokemon that kidnapped you.

Scared, you jump on your feet. Surprised, the Zorua backs up. You stare at it confused. Then you realize what happened.

The Zorua slowly walks over you and sniffs you again.
"Uhhh, hi?" you say.
"What are you?" the Zorua suddenly speaks.
"Uhhh... I'm a human..." you say, now used to pokemon talking.
"A human? How can it be? Humans are big, and mean, and make you fight. I think you're lying."
"Not all humans are like that. And I'm not lying, I'm a human."
"Then how did you got so small?" the Zorua asks.

You are about to reply, but you remember your encounter with Weavile. You decide to use the same excuse you used with her.
"I ate a shrunken creature. It had a virus of some sort, and I shrunk down." you say, decided to avoid taking risks.

As expected, the Zorua's eyes widen in horror.
"And... is it contagious?".
"Another pokemon tried to eat me. It ended up smaller than a Joltick," you lie.
1352112121112122112111221122112221111212.title: Kidnapped

1352112121112122112111221122112221111212.content: Does Zorua believe you?
1352112121112122112111221122112221111212.title: "Yeah, really." you reply. Maybe you ca...

choices: Looks like it's the end for you... be digested and go back in time... again
You can still save the situation! Struggle for freedom!
1352112121112122112111221122112221111212.content:
"Seriously girls, it's just one day I'm with the little guy and he already had his life threatened a lot of times, and I'm already sick of it. What can I do to protect him?" Celebi asks.

The three pokemon stare at each other, trying to find a answer, when Mew smiles.
"Well, there would be one," she says. Celebi looks at her.
"What?" she asks.
"I'll just have to stick around and help you protect him," Mew explains.
"But what about the Tree of Beginning?" Celebi asks.
"It will be fine Celebi. If there's a threat, the Tree will probably just absorb it. It will be fine," Mew replies, getting an excited cheer from the green pokemon.
"Awesome! Now that's settled, I- what's wrong Weavile?" Celebi asks, noticing the uneasy stare on the dark pokemon's face.

"Girls, there something I should tell you," she says. A curious stare from both pokemon makes her sigh.
"I actually... I have to leave," she admits.

"What? Why?" Celebi asks, sadness in her voice.
"I'm a nocturnal predator, I sleep in the morning and I hunt in the night, I had great time with you this one day we stayed together, but I think I'm going back to my old life," Weavile says, small tears beginning to form in her eyes. Not wanting to admit it, she already cares for you, for Celebi and for Mew.

"But, we will be seeing each other again, right?" Mew asks hopefully, her usual smile fading.
"Of course. But, I can't leave with a bothering wonder," Weavile says.
"What wonder?" Celebi asks.
"Don't take it bad Celebi, but I'd like to taste your boyfriend," Weavile says. Silence follows the moment.

"What?!" Celebi shouts, pissed at Weavile's request. She's sick of pokemon tasting her little guy, he's been in enough stomachs for a day.
"Without swallowing of course, I just want to taste him. I promise I won't swallow," Weavile says calmly.

Celebi stares at her friend with a worried expression, before silently nodding, and mentally cursing her kindness.
Flying to you, she picks your sleeping form up and reclutantly hands you to Weavile, who carefully snatches you in her metallic claws.
"Be careful," Celebi says, getting a nod from the dark pokemon.

A blast of warm and somewhat smelly air wakes you up. You rub your eyes just to find you're dangling over Weavile's mouth. Terrorized by the sight, you scream.
"Relax, you'll be fine," she tells you, before dropping you in.

Weavile moves you in her mouth, savoring you all over.
"Please! Let me out!" you yell from inside her.
"Tasty!" Weavile says, her eyes closed, enjoying your taste.

Suddenly un involuntary flip of Weavile's tongue sends you in the back of her throat. You scream as you fall in the abyss.
"Uh oh," Weavile says, freezing.
"What?" Celebi asks, worry growing inside her.
"I... I swallowed...".

In an instant, Celebi lets out a frustrated scream.
"You gotta be kidding me!" she screams, reading an attack to use on Weavile, who backs away. Luckily for her, Mew flied in between the two pokemon.
"Celebi calm down, we'll use psychic again to bring him back!" she says.
"It's impossible, Weavile's a dark type, psychic doesn't affect her!" Celebi screams. Mew's eyes widen. What her friend said is true, it won't work this time.
"Then what do we do?" she asks.
"I'll try and spit him out," Weavile says, beginning to snort.

You land in Weavile's stomach, the very familiar sight of a pokemon's insides filling your view once again.
"Great, how do I get out now?" you ask yourself, punching the acid out of frustration. You hear a snorting sound, Weavile must be trying to get you out. You mentally pray God she manages to do so.

"I can't get him out, what do we do now?" Weavile asks worriedly.
"I don't know! My poor little guy is gonna die like... last time..." Celebi says, memories of two nights ago filling her mind. And when you died back there...
"I know! I'm gonna use Time Travel!" Celebi shouts.
"Oh right, I forgot you could do that!" Mew says.
"There's no time to lose!" Celebi says, grabbing both Mew and Weavile.
'Hang in there little guy... I'm coming to save you..." Celebi says, glowing green.

You've been here for quite a lot, and now the acid is starting to burn. You know that your end is near, so you close your eyes, waiting for the inevitable to happen...
1352112121112122112111221122112221111212.title: A solution and unexpected news

choices: Yes and you no longer have to fear stomachs.
No you stay dead, maybe a more indebt look at your digestion
1352112121112122112111221122112221111212.content:
Inside Weavile, you accepted your fate, and are digested.

Meanwhile, Celebi used her powers to go back in time with a green flash.

She appeared behind Weavile right after she closed her mouth, and yelled "STOP!!!"

Unfortunately for you this startled her so much that Weavile jumped into the air in fright and sent you back into the stomach anyways.

"Oh no!" Weavile shouted.

"What? Mew and both Celebi said worried.

"When you shouted, and I jumped the little guy, went down my throat!" Weavile said. "He's in my stomach!"

"No!!!" Both Celebi said., Future Celebi adding "I came back in time to stop you from accidentally swallowing him, now it is too late. And psychic won't work."

Weavile stopped trying to cough you up having realized that it wouldn't work. And said "Can't you go back farther?"

Future Celebi cried "No!!! Even with time travel I can't change something that happens during somewhen there are two of me. And there are already two of me here! Which means we can't save him." With that she left while crying.

Inside Weavile you felt the acids burning again, and let it overcome you having given up. And were digested.

"Wait!" Mew shouted getting an idea after a few minutes of all three crying. "Lord Arceus! He can bring him back. And make him immune to being eaten Incase this happens again!!"

Well let's go then! " Celebi said opening a portal to Arceus



Does he help?
1352112121112122112111221122112221111212.title: Looks like it's the end for you... be diges...

choices: You are awakened in the middle of night by a loud noise
1352112121112122112111221122112221111212.content:
In the Hall Of Origin, Arceus is resting quietly, when suddenly as bright light appears and Mew, Celebi and a Weavile come out of a portal. But something's wrong... There are two of each one!

As the six pokemon get closer to their god, immediately both past and present Weavile bow before him. Arceus notices that the two Celebi's and Mew's are crying.

A few minutes pass before Arceus speaks.
"Mew, Celebi and... Weavile... Why are you duplicated? Did you used Time Travel Celebi? And where is your little lover my girl?" Arceus asks. Present Celebi sniffles a couple of times, before speaking.

"So the little guy has been eaten by accident and you want me to bring him back? And maybe make him immune to digestion?" Arceus asks, still a bit shocked by the news. Still crying, Present Celebi nods, as well as her past counterpart.

Arceus is thinking. Bringing back someone from death is wrong, but seeing the six pokemon so sad about this little guy's loss, he takes pity on them.
"I will bring the little human back Celebi, and I will make him immune to digestion. But just promise me you'll be more careful this time, just a day and he's already dead," Arceus says, getting cheers from the six pokemon "I will! Thank you Arceus!" Celebi shouts out of joy.

Rolling his eyes, Arceus focuses as a bright light is seen while your reforms. An unconscious you floats over past Celebi, landing at her feet. She picks past you up and hugs him as tight as possible, tears of joy pouring down her cheeks. Crying as well, present Celebi cups her hands together. Having been revived your past counterpart, you should be revived as well. In fact, you reform as well unconscious in Celebi's hands, who immediately starts smooching your body all over, glad you are back with her.

"And now..." Arceus says, both your and your past self's bodies glowing green for an istant.
"There. Now he's immune to digestion. But he's immune just to digestion. If he ends up crushed, drowned or burned, I'm sorry to say, I won't bring him back again," Arceus explains.
"Thank you Arceus!" Mew and Celebi from both timelines cheer, getting a small smile from the Alpha pokemon.
"You can go now, and be careful with him Celebi," he says. Both of them nod, before disappearing thanks to Mew's teleport.

"Goodbye girls, thanks for everything!" present Celebi says, hugging her past counterpart.
"Goodbye!" Mew hugs her past self as well. After exchanging goodbyes, the three pokemon coming from present time grab Celebi as she flows green. In a flash, they're all gone.

"Goodbye girls, it's been a pleasure. If you ever need, come and search me, I'll help you," Weavile says, hugging Mew, then Celebi.
"By the way, sorry for everything that happened," she whispers.
"It's okay, the important thing is that the little guy is back with me. And he'll be with me forever. And again, without this experience, he wouldn't be now immune to digestion, right?" Celebi giggles, getting a chuckle from Weavile.
"You're right. Give him my greetings when he wakes up, okay?"
"Deal," the three pokemon hug each other one last time, before Weavile disappears in the forest.

Mew and Celebi sit on the wooden sanctuary, you grasped in Celebi's hug, who doesn't want to let go of you after this day's events. You are still sleeping heavily, recovering your energies after your second death. And unconscious as you are, you don't what's happening around you, you just sleep in a dreamless rest, one where you would wake up much later. The two pokemon spend the rest of the day playing, eating and having fun without you waking up.

As night takes place, Mew and Celebi prepare to go to sleep. Celebi waits for Mew to drift off to sleep and plucks you in her solid grasp. She pecks your cheek, glad to have her little guy back with her, before falling asleep as well.
1352112121112122112111221122112221111212.title: Returning to life

choices: The pink Butterfree you saw earlier approaches you two!
1352112121112122112111221122112221111212.content:
CRACK

A loud noise wakes you from your sleep. You painfully sit up, a sharp headache causing you pain. You notice that you were actually sleeping on Celebi's chest, again. Ehst happened? Last thing you remember is that Weavile ate you. You died again? Most probably yes, and Celebi must have brought you back with her Time Travel. Now you owe her.

CRACK

The sound is heard again, startling you. What the heck is this noise? You try telling yourself it's nothing, so you lay back down and try to get asleep again.

CRACK

You get up again, frightened, as the sound is heard again and again

CRACK
CRACK
CRACK


Scared, you turn around and tap Celebi lightly. She barely reacts to the touch. She must be doing good dreams, you can tell from the smile on her face. You tap her again.
"Celebi," you call out, getting no response but a small moan.
"Celebi," you repeat, a little louder this time, still getting no sign she's awake.
"Celebi!" you practically yell, this time managing to wake her. The green giantess opens her blue eyes and look in your direction.

Smiling, she picks you and brings you to her face.
"What's the matter little guy? Can't sleep?" she asks giggling. Ignoring the "Le bi" that comes out of her mouth, you speak up.
"Celebi, there's this weird noise, what it is?" you ask, fear filling your voice.

Frowning, Celebi gets up.
"Weird noise? What are you talking about?" she asks, before letting out a yawn.
"Biiiiii!". But then...

CRACK

The sound is heard again, scaring you.
"You heard? The noise! Could it be some angry - or worse hungry- pokemon?" you say. To your Surprise, Celebi giggles.
"You're scared by this silly? I'll show you what 'angry pokemon' is making it," she says, putting you on her head and flying off.

You didn't understand a word, but the fact that Celebi is flying right in the direction where the sound is coming from scares you.
"Celebi please! Bring me back! Bring me back!" you scream, while Celebi keeps giggling at your 'naiveness'. After a few minutes, you are lifted off her head and you are left staring at trees, many cocoons on them. Some start shaking and crack open, producing the sound that scares you so much.

CRACK

The cocoons glow while purple butterflies come out of them. One of them is pink. You are staring at the spectacle of Metapods evolving into Butterfrees, thousands of them flying around the forest.

Enchanted by the sight, you don't notice Celebi sitting down, setting you down on her lap. You are snapped back to reality when she pokes your side with a hand.
"Beautiful, isn't it little one?" she says, while laying a small peck on your cheek. Blushing, you rub her belly. Though you don't want to admit it, you are feeling more and more comfortable with being Celebi's special other. She moans softly, moving one of her long arms to pet your head.

"Yawn!"
"Biiiiiii!" both of you yawn loudly. It's still late in the night. You look to Celebi, who has a 'let's go back to sleep' look. She picks you up and prepares to fly off again...
1352112121112122112111221122112221111212.title: Night surprise

choices: Go back to life, you want to be back with Celebi
Stay dead... Eternal life in heaven awaits you...
1352112121112122112111221122112221111212.content:
Arceus is in the Hall of Origin, with his eyes closed, not sleeping, just resting, when a bright light shines through the hall.

The light reveals to be a portal. Out of it come two familiar pokemon and and an unknown one. A bit confused, Arceus speaks up.
"Celebi, Mew and... Weavile?" he says, while wondering the three are crying. He notices something.
"Celebi where is your little guy? Did something happen to him?" he asks. Celebi slowly nods.

"The little guy is dead? Eaten by accident by this Weavile? Poor guy, what a horrible fate," Arceus says. The three pokemon nod.
"That's why we're here. Could you bring him back? I'm heartbroken," Celebi sobs.
"Me too," Mew says.
"Me three," Weavile adds.

Much to the three pokemon sadness, Arceus shakes his head.
"I'm sorry my girls, but when someone is dead, it's wrong to call them back to life. The little guy is in heaven now, resting in peace," he says. But Celebi isn't going to let it go this easily.
"I know, but I want him back. He was my sweet, cute little boy, why did he had to die in such horrible way? Please Arceus, bring him back!" Celebi pleads crying desperately.
"I'm sorry, I could bring him back, but it would be wrong. Please forgive me Celebi," Arceus says.

Celebi drops on the marble floor and cries hard. Mew, seeing her friend so desperate, decides to act up.
"Arceus?" she says.
"What is it Mew?"
"Please, bring the little guy back. He was very important to us, and he was still young. He didn't deserve to die like this," she says.
"I'm sure he was a good person Mew, no wonder about it, but when someone dies, they stay dead. I'm sorry," Arceus says. Mew tries to not cry, but she fails in doing so and drops next to Celebi, who has her head in a small pond of tears.

Weavile, seeing her two new friends crying, speaks up.
"Arceus, my lord," she says.
"No need for formalities, just call me Arceus," he says.
"Arceus then... It was all my fault if the little guy died. So bring him back and take my soul instead, I deserve it," she says.
"You're really willing to sacrifice yourself for the little guy?" Arceus asks, shocked by Weavile's words.
"Yes, if it makes Celebi and Mew happy. I really liked him too," she explains, getting amazed looks from the two crying pokemon.

Arceus, shocked by Weavile's courage, speaks up.
"Listen, all of you. Celebi, your little boyfriend is enjoying the heaven right now, but he's having regrets about leaving all of you, he really liked you," Arceus says. Even though the situation, the three pokemon smile, as the Alpha pokemon continues.
"I can bring him back, but he's going to make a choice, whether he wants to ascend to heaven or come back with you," he says.

The three pokemon smile at the statement, as Arceus focuses himself...

You are suddenly staring at Celebi, Weavile and Mew. How can this be? One second you are in Weavile's stomach, the other you are in this wonderful, heavenly place, and now you're here, in between Arceus and your pokemon companions.

Istantly cheering at your sight, Celebi extends a arm to pick you, but her hand passes through your body.
"He's a soul now, you can't touch him," Arceus says. Upon hearing that, you realize you're dead, and the place you were before was heaven. You look at Celebi sadly, she looks back at you, as Arceus talks to you.
"Little guy, I called you from your eternal rest because these three pokemon want you back with them. I want you to make a choice. You can completely ascend to heaven or return to life, return with Celebi, risking death again," Arceus explains. You silently take in what he said. You have to make a choice, whether you want to return to life or stay dead.
"What is your choice little guy?" Arceus asks. You look at Mew, Celebi and Weavile, you see tears welling up in their eyes, they want you back with them, especially Celebi. But... heaven was truly wonderful, you could stay there forever... In the end you make a choice.
1352112121112122112111221122112221111212.title: The choice

choices: Going back in Ilex Forest, saying goodbye to Weavile.
1352112121112122112111221122112221111212.content:
You stare at the three pokemon, tears in their eyes. They want you back with them, badly. Especially Celebi. You look into those big, pleading eyes of hers, you see both sadness and hope in them.

In the end, you decide to return to life. Seriously, what insane guy would prefer death over life? Or, at least, you think it's the reason you're doing this, but you know that, deep inside yourself, you're doing this for Mew, for Weavile... but mostly for Celebi. She did and still does love you, and you really don't have the courage to shatter her heart.

"So, human, what is your choice?" Arceus asks after being silent for a bit. You take a last few seconds to decide yourself, deciding it's the right thing to do.
"Arceus, if I really can choose... I want to return to life... I want to go back with Celebi, Mew and Weavile," you say, walking over Celebi and standing next to her leg. Ironic, a pokemon that normally wouldn't reach your knee... and you can't reach HER knee.

The three pokemon istantly smile upon hearing your words, while Arceus nods.
"If that's your choice, the so be it," he says.

Istantly, a white light surrounds you. Your body is being reformed, you can feel your flesh again, your blood stream travelling into your veins. Even your clothes are back. When the light dies down, a completely alive you is in the place where your soul was less than a minute ago.

You have short time to cheer about being resuscitated, because, immediately, two strong, green hands close around your form and bring you to Celebi's face. Then, without any warning, she starts smooching all of your body.
"Cutie, you're alive! I promise I'll never let anything happen to you again!" Celebi says between her kisses. As always, you can't understand nothing, but you smile, petting Celebi's cheek.
"Yeah, yeah, I'm happy to be seeing you again too Celebi," you say.

Mew and Weavile try to hug you as well, but Celebi won't let them. Nothing's gonna ruin her moment, no matter what. Arceus stares at the scene with a neutral expression, hiding his surprise after stating how much love Celebi feels for this human.

"Hey Arceus?" Mew suddenly calls out.
"What?"
"Could you make the human immune to digestion? That would be a great help in keeping him alive," Mew says.
But Arceus shakes his head.
"I'm sorry, but I already did a lot by bringing him back, I can't modify the way of how things work. Just try to keep him out of stomachs," he says, getting an eager nod from Mew.

After crushing you in her hug for about five minutes, Celebi declares thst she wants to go back home to have fun with her little guy. After Mew accurately provided to translate for you, you can't help but wonder what Celebi means with 'fun'.

After thanking Arceus for the millionth time, Mew grabs both Celebi and Weavile and teleports away...
1352112121112122112111221122112221111212.title: The choice of life

choices: You notice a pile of leaves thst would make a great hiding spot
You notice a wall of yellow fur (a Pikachu) moving in front of you!
1352112121112122112111221122112221111212.content:
"Come on, let's go back home." Celebi says, while Mew grabs her, grabbing Weavile's as well. Celebi turns to face Arceus one last time.
"Thank you, Arceus. You saved my little guy," she thanks him. The Alpha pokemon nods before Mew teleports away.

In a flash of light, you are back in Ilex Forest. Mew lets her two friends go. Both stand in front of Weavile, their expression dropping.
"Goodbye guys. I had a great time." she says.
"Awwww!" both Mew and Celebi exclaim, hugging the dark type pokemon.
"Hey! What's happening?" you ask, being crushed between Weavile and Celebi.
"Right, you were asleep. Let me tell you..." Weavile says.

"I guess this is a goodbye then" you say, trying to not cry.
"Yeah. I'm sorry I couldn't stay longer, but I want to return to my old life. Though I won't forget the events of today that easily." Weavile laughs, sending you into laughs as well.
"Goodbye Weavile. I'll miss you." you say, holding out your small hand for her to shake.
"You're really risking me accidentally cutting your hand off?" she snickers.

Shivers are sent down your spine as Weavile lets you close your hand around one of her claws.
"Goodbye. And be careful little one," she says smiling, before dashing off in the depths of the forest.

You and the two pokemon behind you watch her leave. Celebi smiles sadly and nuzzles you.
"Well, night's still far, my best friend is here and my little cutie is in my hands. What do we do?" she asks Mew.
"Let's play!" Mew shouts with glee, sending Celebi into giggles.
"Mew? I have a very special game we can play with our little friend," she says.
"What special game? Do I know it?" Mew asks with excitement.
"You bet. Cat and mouse!" Celebi shouts as excited as Mew.

"Cat and mouse! Cat and mouse!" Mew shouts, while Celebi sets you on the ground.
"Little guy will be the mouse!" Celebi yells. You stare at her silently. Why did she put you on the ground? Granted, the excited "le bi!" you heard wasn't an explanation.

Mew, sensing your confusion, flies over you.
"We're going to play cat and mouse little one. Better go hide~" she says in your head, before flying next to Celebi. Both turn around.

From what you know of this game, you have time until one hundred to hide. You decide to play their game to avoid them getting upset (and to avoid being in a stomach again as punishment). You dash at your full speed in the forest, looking for a place to hide.

After a while of running, you look back. Celebi and Mew are now far. Looking forward, you notice...
1352112121112122112111221122112221111212.title: Returning home and saying goodbye

1352112121112122112111221122112221111212.content:
You notice at the very last second that a yellow wall is in front of you. Not managing to stop your dash, you end up bumping into the surprisingly soft wall, that knocks you back, on your butt.

Rubbing your sore behind from the impact with the hard ground, you look up to whatever caused your fall. You notice a gigantic creature looming over you. It has yellow fur, coal black eyes, two pointy ears with black tips on top of its head. It also has red cheeks, a yellow tail and a curious expression on its face. A Pikachu. And a female one, you judge from the heart shaped tip at the end of her tail.

Amused by the teeny tiny, weird looking bug that bumped into her leg, the Pikachu moves one of her paws to pick you up. She curiously stares at you.
"Uhhhh, hi? Look, I'm no bug and I'm not food, I'm a human," you tell, hoping the Pikachu would listen to you.
"Could you please put me down? My friends are probably searching for me.... And they're legendary pokemon!" you say, trying to convince the electric mouse to let you go.

Not used to bugs talking, the Pikachu gets that you're human, but ignores everything else you said. She starts smelling you. From the scent, Pikachu can tell you're a human. She wonders how humans can come in such size, but this one is adorably cute, maybe cute enough for her to eat. Or maybe she could keep him with her as a sort of pet.

After a bit of smelling you, Pikachu gives you a long, disgusting lick that soaks you in her saliva. Groaning, you notice her squealing, pleased by your taste. Wondering what to do with you, she decides...
1352112121112122112111221122112221111212.title: Enter Pikachu

choices: Stay here, try to heal Pikachu
Go search for Celebi and Mew, safe better than sorry
1352112121112122112111221122112221111212.content:
Deciding that the opportunity to keep a tiny human won't happen again, the Pikachu decides to spare you, and keep you with her.

The electric mouse nuzzles you. You try to keep your distance from her red cheeks, knowing that if you just touch it, it would release a powerful shock that would fry you to a crisp for sure. Pikachu nuzzles you for a good amount of time, before putting you in between her ears and letting out a squeak.

Unsure of Pikachu's intentions, you start scratching one of the twin, yellow and black pillars that are her ears. The mouse squeals delighted. Her tiny new friend is already pleasing her. Suddenly, she starts running through the forest. You have to hang on to her fur to avoid being turned into paste from the flight you would make if you let go.

The electric mouse run for a while, before stopping in front of a small cave, which you assume it's her home. And you're apparently right, since Pikachu gets inside. The yellow mouse sits down and leans with her back against a wall.
"Finally! Home sweet home!" she says. Any other person would have freaked out by hearing a pokemon talking in perfect human language but, having heard other pokemon talking, you are pretty used to it. Seriously, it seems every pokemon but Celebi can talk. Which bothers you, since you can't understand her intentions nor requests.

"Someone in there?" the voice of Pikachu snaps you out of your thoughts.
"What?" you ask .
"I asked you how did you got so small little guy." she ask.
"I really don't know. I just woke up here like this a few days ago," you reply.
"Really? How did something as small and cute as you survive for a few days? This forest is full of predators!" she exclaims.
"Don't tell me." you say, remembering all you've been through these days.

Pikachu suddenly remembers something else.
"Wait, you said something about some legendary pokemon that are your friends?" she asks
"Yeah, Celebi and Mew," you reply. Pikachu's eyes widen in shock.
"Celebi and Mew?! Those two pokemon barely show themselves to pokemon, why did they show up to a shrunken human?" she asks.

You are about to tell her about your adventures, but you decide against it.
"Celebi found me one night and brought me to Mew to see if she could return me to my normal size, but she couldn't. So both decided to protect me." you lie. Pikachu nods in understanding.
"It's very hard to believe little one, but I suppose you're telling the truth. But then? What happened?"
"We were playing when you found me and brought me here. Could you bring me back?" you ask, remembering what happened earlier, when you stayed with Mew at the Tree. You shake the thought off.

"Wait, could you stay a bit longer? I still have some questions for you." she says.
"Well...".

Unknown to you, a wild Umbreon is wandering outside the cave, searching for a fight, Not that it is hunting, it just wants to train by battling fellow pokemon. It spots Pikachu in the cave. Its eyes widen; perfect prey. And, thanks to the shades the sunset is providing, it sneaks in the cave. And, before you can answer to Pikachu's questions, it strikes.

It all happens in a moment. Pikachu is laying on the ground, badly bruised, blood pouring down an open and deep wound on her belly. Luckily, you managed to fall on your feet when Pikachu fell. Turning your head, you see the Moonlight pokemon Umbreon standing there. It spots you, but it doesn't show any interest for you, seeing in you a too weak opponent. Having nothing more to do, the Umbreon leaves.

You stand there astonished, when you remember about Pikachu and rush to her, trying to help her. What you can do? You could help her, but your only healing skills are the basic ones you learned back at school. You could also take this opportunity and go search for Celebi and Mew, they are probably worried, not having found you after all this time. And if you get them, you could convince them to help Pikachu (though you want to get them mostly to avoid a very probable punishment). But Pikachu's wound is pretty deep, if you leave she could die.
"What to do?" you ask with growing fear.
1352112121112122112111221122112221111212.title: With Pikachu

1352112121112122112111221122112221111212.content:
You decide that your medical skills aren't good enough to heal Pikachu, and you might worsen the situation. So you decide to get Mew and Celebi's help.

"Pikachu?" you call out, but she's fainted, and she's losing too much blood. You groan, you have to at least wake her up before leaving, so she can find a way to stop the bleeding. You look around, trying to find anything that could help you with the task, but there's nothing in here, just the rocky walls. You run outside, trying to find something.

You look around desperately, when a smell catches your nose. It's... mint. Looking in the direction where the smell is coming from, you spot a singular leaf on the ground. You walk over it and breath in. Yes, you're right! This is a mint leaf! You grab it and run back to the cave.

As soon you reach the fainted body of Pikachu, you hop on her paw and run to her face. You quickly shove the mint leaf in her nose. You wait for a few seconds, but finally Pikachu's nose twitches as she smells the mint. Slowly opening her eyes she looks at the leaf under her nose, then at you.
"L-little guy? What happened? Why I am in pain?" she asks weakly.
"You got attacked by an Umbreon! You're wounded and you're losing blood, try to stand up and stop the bleeding!" you quickly say. Pikachu's black eyes widen with fear as she picks you and painfully sits up, groaning for the sharp pain. She puts you on the ground and presses her paws in the wound, her fur turning from yellow to red.

"I need to go, I'm going to find Celebi and Mew, they can help you!" you say.
"Fine, but please, come back, I don't want to die!" she exclaims, tears starting to pour down her face.
"I promise." you say, running outside and quickly disappearing through the forest.

You run like crazy, panting to catch your breath and sweat dropping down your face. You have to hurry back to the shrine, Celebi and Mew are most certainly there, waiting for you to 'come out'.

After a while of your running, you close your eyes and wipe some sweat, but without stopping your run. In fact, you suddenly bump into a soft but firm surface that knocks you back. You open your eyes and look up, seeing that it's...
1352112121112122112111221122112221111212.title: Go search for Celebi and Mew, safe better than ...

choices: Follow you and Mew healing Pikachu.
1352112121112122112111221122112221111212.content:
You look up and see that is was Celebi the one you bumped into. The happy "Le bi le" you hear confirms you that it's her as two green hands come and pick you.

"Finally! I was beginning to think you run away from me little guy. But you wouldn't do that, would you? You wouldn't run from me, right little cutie?" Celebi giggles, kissing your face.

But as soon her lips touch you, she pulls them back, spitting out disgusted.
"Ewww you taste like... blood?" Celebi asks surprised; in fact, being a grass type, she hates the taste of the blood and her surprise turns into worry as her eyes spot the infamous red liquid in your hair and some of it in your face.

Apparently, when Pikachu woke up and moved, some of the blood falling from her wound fell on your head. You were so worried about her that you didn't even notice, while Celebi, happy to have found you, didn't look at your face, and she's, like you, noticing it just now.

But the time traveler pokemon, not knowing what happened earlier, immediately thinks that you somehow got hurt and starts to examine you for any possible wound you could have.
"Little guy, are you alright? How did you got hurt?!" Celebi asks worriedly.

You rub the back of your head, trying to understand what she said, when a bush starts moving. Out of it flies a pink, familiar feline figure.
"You finally found him? I was thinking he disappeared! You're quite the player little guy!" Mew giggles after spotting the both of you, before looking at your head.
"Did you got hurt little guy? Why are you bleeding?" Mew asks.
"That's not my blood, let me explain...".

"I was running to hide, when this Pikachu girl found me and decided to bring me to with her to her cave-"
"WHAT?!"Celebi practically yells at the thought of you alone with another girl.
"-But an Umbreon attacked her, and hurt her badly. She's still back at the cave, still bleeding, we gotta help her!" you complete your story.

Both pokemon stare at you with shocked expression.
"You're right we have to help that poor Pikachu!" Mew says.
"Right, no one dies in my forest!" Celebi confirms.
"Then let's go before it's too late!" you say.
Both Mew and Celebi nod.
"The cave is in that direction," you point out to the path you were coming from before Celebi found you.

Celebi puts you on her head. You hang on to one of her feelers as the two pokemon fly at supersonic speed in direction of the cave.
After a bit of flying, Celebi suddenly stops. Looking from behind her feeler, you notice it's because of a pokemon standing in front of her. Specifically, an Umbreon. Your eyes widen, it's the same Umbreon from before!

"That's the Umbreon that hurt Pikachu!" you shout.
The Moonlight pokemon gets in fighting pose, happy to have such opponents as such as legendaries to fight.
"What do we do?" you whisper to Celebi.

In response, she picks you up and hands you to Mew, who looks at her confused.
"Mew? You do know heal pulse, right?" Celebi asks.
"Yes?"
"Then, you and the little guy go help that Pikachu. I'll handle this. Just please... be careful with him..." Celebi says. Mew nods.
"Alright, good luck" she says, flying away with you closed in her paws.

Celebi looks at you and Mew leaving, before looking at the Umbreon and getting read to fight...
1352112121112122112111221122112221111212.title: ... it's Celebi!

1352112121112122112111221122112221111212.content:
Without any warning, the Umbreon immediately opens its mouth, forming a dark sphere. It fires the shadow ball, but Celebi dodges the attack that explodes into a tree, forming a visible mark. Without giving Celebi time to attack, the wild Umbreon charges her, using quick attack.

This time, Celebi is hit and she is sent back, while the Umbreon jumps away. But, before landing, it is hit by an energy ball that sends it crashing in a tree. The Moonlight Pokemon painfully lands on all fours and uses payback, just to crash into Celebi's protect, making the attack fail. As soon the barrier disappears, Celebi forms a bunch of colorful leaves and sends them and sends them attacking her dark opponent.

Being an infallible attack, the magical leaf hits the Umbreon, causing a small explosion. The dark Pokemon pants, trying to catch its breath, before glowing purple, using toxic. Celebi is hit and she gets poisoned by the attack. And, before she can do anything, the Umbreon charges with foul play.

Due the poison, Celebi is slower now, and she doesn't manage to dodge the super effective attack. She is sent crashing into a tree. Painfully getting up, she notices the Umbreon smirking triumpanthly. But its smirk fades when the sound of a bell is heard.

After healing herself from the poison with heal bell, Celebi uses ancient power. The rocks hit the Moonlight pokemon while Celebi strikes with U-turn. The Umbreon endures the attack and tries to use quick attack, but Celebi dodges and hits with dazzling gleam. Her dark opponent lands on all fours before collapsing to the ground, panting to catch its breath.

After resting for a minute, the Umbreon gets up and looks at Celebi smiling, glad to have found such thoug opponent. Getting ready for a final attack, the Umbreon forms a big shadow ball. Celebi forms an as well big energy ball. The two pokemon stare at each other for a second, before throwing their attacks. The two spheres collide, but energy ball bloes shadow ball away and hits Umbreon, that is sent flying in the depths of the forest.

Tired out, Celebi drops to the ground, when the two familiar figures of you and Mew come out to assist her after hearing the explosion...
1352112121112122112111221122112221111212.title: Celebi vs Umbreon

choices: She decides to remain with you, alone...
She decides to go with Mew, leaving you alone - and helpless...
1352112121112122112111221122112221111212.content:
You and Mew are busy healing Pikachu, who is now sitting on the ground.
"Thanks you guys, I was so scared!" she says with a smile.
"It's really not-" Mew tries to says, when a huge explosion is heard from outside, startling you three. You look at Mew.
"Let's go." she says in your mind, while picking you with her tail.

Mew flies out of the cave and into the forest, followed by a both curious and startled Pikachu.

You just hang on to Mew's tail while she flies through the forest, when she stops, upon seeing the figure of Celebi laying on the ground, bruised. Mew takes you in her small paws and assists her friend.

It's just a moment, before Celebi opens her eyes and hardly stands up. She looks at Mew, then to you and smiles a little, before flying up. She snatches a sitrus berry from a tree.

In two bites, Celebi finishes up her berry and returns to the two pokemon and the tiny human waiting for her.

Upon seeing Pikachu healed, Celebi smiles warmly, while picking you from Mew. After greeting the mouse pokemon, Pikachu starts asking you questions again.

But soon the sky got dark and Pikachu had to return to her cave. After saying goodbye to her, you're now alone with Mew and Celebi. You notice them discussing about something.

"Mew? Are you hungry?" Celebi asks.
"Yeah, I am. You?"
"Don't tell me. Hey, can you go get dinner?" Celebi asks again, thinking about the nice things she can do with you in private.
"I don't know. Last time I left you two alone, I returned with you hurt and the little guy gone. We could go together, and maybe leave him here!" Mew suggests.
"Are you kidding? What if pokemon try to hurt him... or worse...?" Celebi says.
"Well it's dark, pokemon will hardly notice him and believe he's a bug. And I'm sure the little one can handle being alone for a few minutes. Humans are smart, don't forget it, if we bring him along, there's a higher chance for us to be attacked." Mew replies.

Celebi repeats the words of her friend in her mind. Finding her logic valid, she decides to...
1352112121112122112111221122112221111212.title: Celebi heals up

choices: Vileplume noticed you, and bends to pick you.
Vileplume didn't notice you, and walks away.
1352112121112122112111221122112221111212.content:
After a moment of hesitation, Celebi decides to agree with Mew's decision, and leave you alone. She will have a private moment with you sooner or later anyway, she thinks.

"Mew, you're right, bringing him along is too dangerous, he'll be safe here," Celebi says, getting a nod from her friend.
"Trust me, he'll be for sure. He's a smart one," Mew replies, before turning to you.
"Little guy, we're going to get food. You'll stay here." she tells you, before heading away, Celebi slowly following, before turning to you.
"Be careful. And don't move. And..."
"...And good luck. Bye bye," Mew says, grabbing Celebi and literally dragging her away.

You blink a few times, trying to take in what just happened. Mew just dragged an obviously worried Celebi away to get food, leaving you alone in a forest -a dark forest- full of pokemon ready to eat you. Great. Just great.

Sighing, you sit with your back against Celebi's shrine, looking around to spot any possible danger. Meanwhile thoughts start to fill your mind. You're alone, and you could take the moment to run away from this forest, eventually returning home.

But... running away from Celebi and Mew... they've been nice to you the last few days. Have you really got the heart to abandon them? No, you don't. So you stick to your decision to stay with them. This is your home now.

While you silently think, a 'boom' snaps you back to reality. You look forward to see a dark blue, round object in front of you.
"What?" you ask, while slowly looking up. And what you see scares you off.

Even with the darkness around you, you notice the humongous form of a pokemon - specifically a Vileplume - standing in front of you. You attempt to stay as still as possible, trying to not get noticed.

The Vileplume looks around, looking for nothing in particular. You hope she doesn't notice you. Suddenly she looks in your direction. You cower, hoping she didn't see you...
1352112121112122112111221122112221111212.title: Alone in the dark forest

choices: Mew suddenly comes out, searching for you
1352112121112122112111221122112221111212.content:
Seeming to not have noticed you, the Vileplume walks away, her footsteps making the ground quake beneath you.

You stare at the point where the grass type pokemon was a second ago, thanking she didn't take notice of you. Wiping away some sweat, you relax back and listen to the sounds of the forest.

The night breeze through trees, the 'chanting' of the bug pokemon, all relaxing sounds that make you drowsy. You try hard to not fall asleep. Alone as you are, you would be an easier prey if you fall asleep, and you know it.

You yawn drowsily.
'Don't fall asleep, don't fall asleep, don't fall asleep,' you keep to repeat in your head, trying your best to stay awake.

Struggling to keep your eyelids open, the lulling sounds continue filling your ears. Until you can't take it anymore. You are already asleep even before collapsing to the ground. Just then, a bush rustles.

Luckily for you, two familiar pokemon come out. Both with their paws full of berries.
"Hey little guy, we're back!" Mew announces.
"Yeah, and we have a ton of..." Celebi is cut off by a small poke from her friend.

Looking at Mew, Celebi sees her smiling, while pointing to the ground. The small time traveler pokemon looks in the spot Mew is pointing out. And she sees a completely unconscious you laying on the ground.

Smiling sweetly, Celebi drops the berries and picks you gently. Or at least, as gently as she can without crushing you between her fingers.
"Aww, he does look so cute while he sleeps, doesn't he Mew?" Celebi giggles. Mew nods.
"Should we wake him for dinner?".
"Nope, let him sleep. Poor little guy, he had a rough day. He was almost eaten by a Gyarados, kidnapped by a Skarmory - and by a certain pink pokemon -" Mew rolls her eyes at this "- almost digested by me, killed by Weavile and brought back to life. All of this in a single day. He needs to rest." Celebi says, leaving out her 'morning fun'. Mew giggles.

You wake up, annoyed by sunlight in your eyes. Rubbing your eyes, you slide down Celebi's chest. Wondering how did you end up there - since you fell asleep on the ground - you feel your throat practically dry.

Making your way into the forest, you notice a small pond. You get near it and start drinking. Luckily, it's potable water, so you don't have to worry.

After drinking and splashing water in your face, you are about to go back to Celebi, when a noise is heard

You look around, not sure of its source, when suddenly a green and yellow creature jumps out of the forest. A Politoed.

Apparently, this Politoed came here to bathe in the pond. Then why its eyes are fixated on you? Curiously, the frog pokemon picks you in its paws and studies you.

Amused by the small creature in its paws, the Politoed decides to carry you back to its resting place, to find out what exactly are you.

Turning around, the frog prepares to jump away...
1352112121112122112111221122112221111212.title: Vileplume didn't notice you, and walks away.

choices: Yes no longer have to fear stomachs.
13521121211121221121112212.content: She can't get you out, but can she use her psychic powers so that being eaten cannot kill you? If so you might find yourself spending a lot of time in Celebi and Mew's stomach, using it as a bed or saferoom.
13521121211121221121112212.title: Mew can't get you out!

choices: Zoroark shows back up while you're asleep
1352112121112122112112.content:
Celebi and Mew have been flying for quite awhile now, when Celebi suddenly stops and goes hide behind a bush. Mew silently follows her. She notices Celebi peeking through the leaves "Why are we hiding? And what are you watching?" she asks "They're in there" Celebi replies, pointing to something out of the bush. Celebi moves to let Mew look; the pink pokemon sees a cave, a Zoroark and something resembling a tiny human in there. Found you! Mew retreats from her peeking spot "What are we waiting for? Let's get him!" she silently exclaims. Celebi shakes her head "We need a plan first. That damn fox managed to win thanks to its illusions" Celebi explains "Then what we do?" "Listen carefully".

You start rubbing the paw of your mistress, even though you barely reach her claws. Zoroark moans in pleasure " Oh yeah slave... mhhhhhm... if you keep doing a good job, I might just reward you " she moans. You ignore her, you never felt so humiliated in your whole, forced to rub the paws of a pokemon to have your life spared. You wish you were back with Celebi and Mew, at least they treated you well, Celebi loved you.
