Even if you are still a bit uncomfortable with being her other, you can't deny that you grew to like her, at least a bit. Though you are still scared of her. You are lost in your thoughts- and the Zoroark is lost in her pleasure- so you don't notice a thunderbolt coming her way. The Zoroark is shocked. You also get a shock, but you manage to pull off before you're fried alive. As soon the thunderbolt ends, Zoroark looks outside, enraged. Standing there, a Pichu sticks her tongue out and runs away. Zoroark roars angrily "Don't move slave!" she yells, before chasing the Pichu outside. Too bad she doesn't notice a familiar green pokemon coming out of a bush.

You try to recollect what just happened, when you feel something snatching you from the ground. You are brought face to face with Celebi "Celebi?" you yell, shocked, receiving a kiss on your face as an answer. She looks at you all over, checking if you are alright "Cutie! You're safe and sound! I was worried sick!" she says, nuzzling you lovingly. You can't understand a word, but you assume she's just happy to have you back with her "Don't you worry, you're safe now. Me and Mew will teach that meanie a lesson" she says, before flying out of the cave.

The Pichu, aka Mew, smirks. The plan worked, Celebi has surely rescued her boyfriend by now, so she stops running. The Zoroark stops a few meters from her and roars, clearly pissed off. Smirking again, Mew shifts back to herself. The Zoroark's jaw seems to drop. The legendary Mew is really standing in front of her? The human! He must have... "Hey you" a voice speaks behind her. She turns around, Celebi standing there. And, plucked to her chest... you?! Zoroark has to think carefully about her next move. She could fight a legendary, but two? That's impossible for everyone, humans and pokemon. So she turns around and looks at you "That was you, wasn't it? You also summoned Mew to help you?" she growls, angry "Summoned, what are you talking about?" Mew asks "Yeah, we came to rescue this human, because he's my lover" Celebi says. Zoroark sweat drops. So the human spoke the truth, Celebi really loves him. Zoroark can't fight right now. It's not the right time "This isn't the last you hear from me human" she says, disappearing. Another illusion. Celebi looks around, expecting for the fox to strike, but it never happens. Sighing in relief, Mew gets close to you "Are you alright?" she telepathically asks. You nod, Mew gives a smile "Then come on, let's go back to the sanctuary. I'm still hungry" Celebi says, flying off. Mew giggles as she follows.

After eating a full amount three berries- which to the two pokemon was a normal meal, to you was a whole feast- you spend the several next hours getting to know to Mew and Celebi. You get that, before Celebi moved to Ilex Forest, the two were best friends. Mew is the cheerful and playful pokemon, while Celebi is the as - well - cheerful but shy pokemon. Mew then asked you how did you two met. When you were about to explain that Celebi ate you, she gave you a pleading look. You got that she didn't want you to tell Mew about that one part, so you willingly skip it. After getting to know each other, Mew insisted to play, and Celebi gladly accepted. Not that you had a choice, so you had to play. After hours of hide and seek (Mew's favourite game), it's now nighttime. After a quick dinner made out of other berries, the two pokemon yawn. The two lay down at the feet of a tree. You get in between them, but Celebi gives you a weird look "What?" you ask. In all response, the grass type points to her chest. She wants you to sleep with her. You blush like crazy "N-no, isn't it a bit early for that?" you ask, backing up, just to end bumping into Mew "Nope, it's just fine" the cat pokemon says in your mind, pushing you to Celebi. The green pokemon reaches for you with both arms and stares at you with a sad expression. An expression that could melt your heart "Okay, fine I'll sleep with you" you say. Celebi smiles as she encloses you in a hug to her chest, while Mew giggles "Good night you two. Try to not do anything weird" she says, before closing her blue eyes. Celebi giggles, while you just blush more. So you quickly lay down on Celebi's skin, hoping to fall asleep soon, so you won't have to feel more embarrassed than you already are. It doesn't take long, thanks to both the softness of the skin and its warmth, for you to fall asleep.

Celebi notices her tiny human asleep and smiles. He looks cute when he sleeps. She then looks at Mew, she's already snoring softly. Giving the human a goodnight kiss, she relaxes back as well. Within minutes, she is asleep.
1352112121112122112112.title: Celebi and Mew to the rescue!

choices: Mew and Celebi catch up with Zoroark and stop her
13521121211121221121122.content:
On a high tree branch, two blue eyes stare directly at you, who are sleeping soundly plucked in the legendary Celebi's grasp. The two eyes stare now at Celebi, waiting for her to fall asleep as well. Fortunately, it doesn't take long, and the green pokemon is now snoring softly. It's time.

Zoroark rapidly climbs down to the ground and lands beside Celebi. Next to her, Mew is also sleeping soundly, her belly rising and falling along her breath. With a grin on her lips, Zoroark proceeds to remove the long, green arms from your small body, extremely careful to not wake Celebi up. Moving her arms to the side, Zoroark slowly picks you in her sharp fingers and lifts you up to her face "Welcome back slave" she whispers, starting to get away.

Celebi starts to move, as if she's going to wake up. She's still asleep, but she feels your absence and needs you back in her sleep. So she starts moving her arms, searching for you. Zoroark notices the legendary pokemon moving and sweat drops, afraid that, if she wakes up, she will have to be ready to run. Luckily, the grass type relaxes back and returns to her soft snoring. Sighing a small sigh of relief, Zoroark turns around and starts to leave again, with you securely grasped in her paw. *Snap!* a loud snapping sound is heard. Zoroark looks in horror downwards, seeing that she crushed a twig "Bi?" a voice comes from behind her. Turning around, she sees Celebi, wide awake, and looking around for you.

Celebi was sleeping so good, when a noise wakes her up. She moves to a sitting position, but notices something's wrong. Where the heck is her little guy? He didn't run away, did he? Looking around for the tiny human, Celebi notices something. Two blue eyes shining through the night. Even though all this darkness, Celebi manages to see a very small figure grasped between red claws. The Zoroark again?! "BIIIIII!" Celebi shouts angry. Without giving the fox time to react, she fires energy ball at her. The dark type pokemon is hit in the chest. Luckily, she manages to keep her hold on you, but both the scream and the explosion were pretty enough to wake both you and Mew up. You look around, scared, and you find yourself staring into two gigantic blue eyes. But they don't seem to belong to neither Celebi or Mew "Z-Zoroark?" you ask. The pokemon looks at you for a moment, before shifting her attention elsewhere. Following her gaze, you manage to see Celebi standing there, an half asleep Mew looking at Zoroark. The dark fox doesn't lose anymore time. She has to run away. So she moves you to her mouth. Before you even have the time to scream, she drops you on her tongue and closes her mouth.

The cave you are trapped in reminds you of Celebi's own mouth, but this one is much more hot, and Zoroark breath smells horrible "Let me out!!!" you scream. Zoroark completely ignores you and makes a run for it "Oh no you don't!" Celebi yells, chasing the fox along a now fully awakened Mew.

Zoroark runs like she never run before, she has to get rid of the two pesky pokemon chasing her. Luckily, it's still nighttime, so she will luckily get away at some point "Give him back!!" she hears the two legendaries screaming behind. Scared maybe for the first time in her life, Zoroark fastens her dash.
13521121211121221121122.title: Zoroark shows back up while you're asleep

choices: You wake up in the morning
135211212111212211211222.content:
Zoroark runs faster than she has never done before. The two legendary pokemon chasing her keep shouting and throwing attacks at her, trying to stop her. But the dark fox won't give you up without a fight. So she jumps and turns around, flames exiting her mouth as she uses flamethrower. Both Mew and Celebi manage to dodge; the pink pokemon uses aura sphere, while the green pokemon uses energy ball. Zoroark can do nothing but stare in horror as the two attacks combine together and collide with her, generating a huge explosion.

You are still trapped in the dark, wet confines of Zoroark's mouth. You don't know what is happening outside, but judging from the huge explosion you just heard, you can tell that something big is going on. You feel that Zoroark isn't moving anymore.

Celebi and Mew get closer to a now badly bruised Zoroark. Celebi lifts her face with her long arms "I'll ask just one time, before we get rough. WHERE IS HE?" Celebi asks, making sure to spell each word. Zoroark stares at her with out talking. A small groan escapes her closed mouth. Celebi understands where you are.

You wonder what is happening outside. You are completely covered in drool and dizzy from being thrown back and forth around Zoroark's mouth. You stare at her closed lips, when they suddenly open. You don't have time to react as three green fingers reach in the mouth. They land directly on you. Feeling your small form, they close around you and pull you out of the dark 'cave'. You are greeted by moonlight, and the smiling face of Celebi. You look around, you notice that Mew is holding Zoroark's lips. As soon you are pulled out, she lets them fall back in place and gets closer to you two "Are you okay little one?" she asks. You nod as both pokemon sigh in relief "Thanks Arceus. I can't imagine what I'd do if I lost you" Celebi says. Clearly, you can't understand her. The green pokemon groans. She has to learn how to communicate with you if this relationship has to go on.

Shortly after Celebi spoke, a small yawn escapes her mouth. It's still to early in the night to be awake. She looks at me "You're sleepy, right?" "Yeah. This isn't any time to be awake" Celebi replies, getting a nod from Mew "You're right. Now that you make me notice, I'm sleepy as well. Let's go back to sleep" she says, flying off. Celebi follows.

A short fly later, you are back to the sanctuary. The two pokemon yawn, meaning that they're sleepy. But you aren't. The events of tonight made you lose all your sleepiness, and you probably won't sleep for days. Judging by the position of the moon, it's about 2 AM. The two pokemon lay down on the wooden sanctuary. Celebi plucks you to her chest "Good night again Mew" she says "Good night" "And good night to you too my little cutie" Celebi kisses your cheek. You don't pay much attention to it and to her words. Seriously, to you is just a mix of 'Bi cele bi' that you can't understand. Maybe you can teach her to talk sometime, though that'll take a lot of time. Looking back, you notice both pokemon already asleep. They were sure tired. Yawning, you snuggle up to Celebi, hoping to manage to fall asleep as well. You thought you weren't tired, that you were not going to sleep, but you were wrong. You were just ad tired as Celebi and Mew, if not more. In fact, as soon you close your eyes, you fall into deep sleep.
135211212111212211211222.title: Mew and Celebi catch up with Zoroark and stop her

choices: Make one last attempt to convince her to keep you!
135211212111212211212.content:
You would have gladly accepted Zoroark's offer, if you were able to understand her. But, unfortunately, you aren't. And, for how many ideas you have to escape this giant fox, you cannot do anything but one thing.
"Please... let me go... don't eat me!" you scream, moving the parts of your body that aren't caught in Zoroark's grasp frenetically.

Zoroark stares at you as you desperately try to break free.
"Pick one already, human!" she growls, trying make herself understandable. But it has no effect; you simply keep struggling, not understanding her words. The giant fox closes her eyes for a moment, her mouth closing as well.
"Alright, I'm wasting my time." she says to herself, slowly reopening her lips, pulling you closer to them.

Your heart skips a beat at the Zoroark's actions.
"Please... Help!... Don't do it!... Help!" you scream incoherently. But Zoroark has made up her mind. Quickly, she nears you to her mouth, drops you in and closes her lips behind you, sealing your tomb.


Far away, near the famous shrine of Ilex Forest, a certain green pokemon is crying, face down on the ground, forming a literal lake of tears around her face, while her body is shaken by desperate sobs. Celebi cries so hard that she doesn't even hear the many thuds behind her and the alarmed cry of a familiar voice.

Mew was returning from her 'hunt' when, getting back to the shrine, she sees Celebi laying there on the grass, face down as she cries. Instantly, Mew drops all the berries she gathered and flies over her.
"Celebi, what happened?" she inquires, helping her friend sitting upright. Mew glances around.
"Hey, where's little..." a sniffle from Celebi is enough to tell Mew the reason of her friend's tears.
"Did I miss something?" she asks worriedly.

"That's terrible!" Mew exclaims after hearing Celebi's tale. Celebi, who calmed down a bit, bursts right back into tears. Mew stares at her silently, not finding anything to say to comfort her friend. Just when she is about to start crying herself, a thought crosses her mind.
"Celebi... you talked about a Zoroark, right?" Mew says.
"Y-Y-Yes..." Celebi stammers with broken voice.
"Then... what if it was just an illusion? Zoroarks can do that, remember? Maybe... Maybe it was a mere illusion... Maybe he's alive..." Mew tries to convince her friend as well herself.

Celebi sniffles a few times, before looking at Mew.
"Are you sure?" she asks, shedding some tears.
"It could be... let's go find that Zoroark, maybe she has little guy..." Mew says. Celebi silently nods, floating in midair as the two start flying into Ilex Forest, in search of the Zoroark.


"Come on, let me out!" you scream at top of your lungs. Big drops of saliva rain on you from your host's palate, while her tongue swishes you around tasting you.
"I'm not kidding! I'm really going to grow back to my size and I'll blow you up from inside!" you scream again. That does not serve anything but to get a mouthful of saliva.

You spit out said liquid while Zoroark keeps tasting you, enjoying your unique taste. Finding that excuses aren't so effective, you start using the more simple method of struggling. Which is as useless as using excuses to convince Zoroark to let you go.

Zoroark keeps tasting you for a few more minutes, before getting ready to eat her prey...
135211212111212211212.title: You scream incoherently, and Zoroark realizes s...

choices: It worked! Celebi coughs you up!
Too late! You fall into her stomach!
1352112122.content:
You slide down into Celebi's throat, entering a far more tight and dark space. Her esophagus. Then, with one gulp, the mythical pokemon sends you to a one way journey to her stomach, where you would surely meet your end.

Celebi sighs and lies down.
'That was tasty.' she quietly thinks to herself, while the little lump, which is the little human that she found earlier, travels down her throat. She can't deny she feels guilty for eating him, but, then again, she's going to reset all this, right?

With these thoughts, the green deity pokemon closes her baby blue eyes, ready to take a nice, long nap.

Back at you, you're still sliding to your final destination. You're living a nightmare. Not only you're going to die far from home, in the stomach of a pokemon, but you're also being crushed between two walls of slippery flesh. The entire process is of a terrorizing slowness, each inch you go down, a wave of saliva rains down on you.

It all is making you feel more scared than you already are. You can't quite guess how much longer you have to slide down to reach the pool of acid that is awaiting you, and you don't want to know it.

You close your eyes. You don't want to see yourself dying of such terrific and somewhat humiliating end. And then... you open your eyes, a newfound determination in them. You don't want to die like this. Shrunk and eaten by a pokemon, who's now napping like nothing happened.
"Not... going... to happen!" you groan.

With your survival instinct intensifying the activity of your brain, you starts to work wildly to find an idea to get you out of this situation.

And then, you finally find one. You mentally prepare yourself. If this works, you'll be out of here and, hopefully, far from your green predator; if it doesn't... well, you're going to die in Celebi's stomach, and nobody will ever know it.

Spreading your arms and legs, you press against the fleshy walls of Celebi's esophagus, stopping your descent.
"Now for the second part..." you mutter with hope.

Celebi suddenly wakes up from her sleep: something's wedged in her throat. Sitting upright, the green pokemon brings a paw to her neck and starts to cough, sending vibrations down her throat each time she does. You gulp. If you let go now, you'll die.
"Come on... Come on!" you almost shout. If the plan works, you'll be shot upwards, right to freedom. If it doesn't... you don't want to think about it.
1352112122.title: No! Don't let it end, you can still salvage...

choices: The Celebi was staring down at you with concern...
You were alone, lost somewhere in the forest...
13521121221.content:
Some people back in the outside world would be fascinated by the occasion of studying a legendary pokemon from the inside.

You, however, were not among those people, and wanted to get out of Celebi's throat as soon as possible. You kept your arms and legs spread, but you felt like you couldn't go on for much longer.

Each time Celebi coughed, the muscles of her throat collided, crushing you in the process. Not only that, but the fleshy surface was starting to grow slicker and slicker as the fairy swallowed saliva, desperately trying to gulp you down. Periodically, a tight ring beneath you opened and closed, revealing, in the few instants in which it was open, a steaming liquid.

You were pretty sure of what it was, and you didn't want to get any closer than this to it.

Celebi kept coughing.

You were choking her from the inside.

"LET ME OUT!" you screamed in determination - and a fair amount of terror too, though mostly determination.

Another cough was your response.

Outside, Celebi placed a paw on the lump in her neck and desperately tried to push it down. But it was useless - the human she swallowed was stubborn.

So, she only had one option left... this was going to spare her from having to travel through time.

Another cough - you slid down a bit, giving off a small cry of terror.

Another gulp - you were about to give up...

A last cough - you let go...

You fell down, the fleshy ring opening, Celebi's stomach ready to receive you...

Another, strong coughing fit of the fairy sent you rocketing upwards. At light speed, you were launched past Celebi's esophagus. For a moment, you dreaded the possibility that you could actually take a detour and end up in one of her lungs, but you flew straight back into her mouth.

Then, with another cough, you were sent straight out of the fairy's mouth and went flying, feeling the cold wind blowing past your saliva-covered body.

A new terror made you reconsider your choice - were you going to survive this fall? You looked down... wishing that you hadn't.

You were high up in the air... you were in reality flying a meter or so above the ground, but to you it was the equivalent of soaring the skies.

Screaming, you briefly looked back at the Celebi who just tried to make a snack out of you. You saw her still coughing, one eye open.

She was looking at you.

You gulped - if you survived this fall, you were going to be sa-

A sharp pain spread across your body, you felt a hard surface behind you. You must have hit a tree or something, you realize as you slowly slid down a hard surface while your mind slowly slid into darkness.

By the time you hit the ground, you were already unconscious.

--

Consciousness slowly started to rise from the depths of your mind.

Immediately, your whole body was assaulted by a searing pain, which seemed to linger in the back of your head the most.

You tried to move an arm, but you found that you couldn't feel it... your eyes shot open.

Were you dead?!

You looked down... discovering that you were laying on your left arm. It must have fallen asleep.

Slowly you sat upright, noticing... blurry figures dancing around you. You must have hit that tree harder than you thought, though you could already tell since you blacked out.

You grunted, your head was killing you. But this was better than the alternative, you guessed.

Slowly, you started to remember... the Celebi... your flight... you hitting the tree and passing out...

Again, you grunted. Each time you tried to recollect your thoughts, you were assaulted by an overwhelming wave of pain, which spread throughout your whole being.

Carefully, you brought a hand to the source of your pain...you gasped as you felt the back of your head wet and sticky. You brought your hand to your nose... blood. Blood that was probably coming from an open wound.

Struggling to catch your breath, you slowly looked up, inhaling and exhaling heavily.

At first, the only thing you noted was an indistinct mass of green.

But then, your vision started to clear, and you noticed...
13521121221.title: Shot away

choices: You quieted down as you decided to trust Celebi...
You resumed struggling in an attempt to get free, still mistrusting Celebi...
135211212211.content:
Large as you currently were, maybe even more, the blue eyes of the Celebi that attempted to eat you earlier were staring straight down at you. You remembered them - the green face of the forest's patron deity was one you learned to fear.

The green giantess was kneeling down, you noted, as she stared at you with... concern. You were probably in a pitiful state, covered in dried, smelly saliva, bleeding from an imprecise part of your body and looking in extreme pain.

Seeing you finally awake, Celebi's lips upturned in a smile.

After she shot your out of her mouth with enough force to send you flying, Celebi had recovered enough to search for you... it wasn't hard to find a shrunken human, laying unconscious at the foot of a tree.

You stared at the giant Celebi for a while as she stared back at you. You could feel your heart beating faster as you noted one of the large paws of the fairy reaching out for you. The memory of yourself being confined in her esophagus still fresh in your mind, you ignored the searing pain and dove out of her reach, landing roughly on a patch of grass.

You hastily got back to your feet - you had to get away from this giantess...

You attempted to run... but you found that your left leg was in pain. All you could do was try to wall away onto shaky legs.

Sadly, you didn't manage to take three full steps before the green patroness of Ilex Forest flew straight above you and scooped you up in her paws, which carelessly squeezed you in her grasp causing you an immense pain.

You expressed it with a loud scream, and Celebi's grasp suddenly softened as she stood in midair, pondering what to do... she wasn't going to eat the human again. She had done it once out of curiosity, intending to use her time-traveling powers to bring him back to life before it turned out there was no need to. Now, like the fairy had imposed herself earlier, she had to treat you nicely...

But, at this point, eating you would be a mercy, she thought.

You were certainly in pain after hitting that tree. Your left leg hurt a lot, although you could still move it, suggesting that it wasn't broken, but nonetheless badly injured; you still had an open wound in the back of your head.

Celebi noticed that as, attempting to comfort you during your suffering, she started rubbing your head... until her fingers ran into a wet spot on its back. She lifted the up to her face, only to notice them stained red.

You weakly looked at the fairy.

For a moment, she looked horrified... and deep in thought.

She was going to keep you, there was no doubt about it - a shrunken human was a too good of a catch to let go - but she needed to heal you somehow...

For starters, your bleeding wound had to stop bleeding... then, she had to fix your leg, minor, less important injuries here and there across your body before convincing you that she was trying to be your friend... something told her that the last one was going to be harder than healing you... and she discovered that she couldn't blame you.

You watched at the grass-type fairy moved a paw to the back of your head... another wave of pain assaulted you as she applied pressure on your wound, trying to hold your blood in.

"Why?!" you screamed in pain.
"Why don't you just kill me?! Eat me, or whatever makes you happy!" you said in resignation, unable to bear the immense pain. Even worse, you were unaware of Celebi's intentions and simply assumed that the sadistic legendary wanted to make you suffer even more before sending you straight back done that abyss of death.

Though her face didn't show any hint of malice...

Suddenly, the giantess got up. She carefully held you in one paw, while the other remained glued to your wound.

Then, all of a sudden, your green captor started glowing bright green, the light engulfing your whole body as you felt a pleasant feeling spreading throughout your body... before another horrible, immense wave of pain replaced it as your wound sealed itself, your injured leg snapped back in place and a few of the ribs that were broken when you hit the tree were fixed.

You let out a loud scream of pain while the green light finally died down. If it wasn't for the fact that the sharp pain was keeping you awake, you would have fainted.

The giant Celebi in front of you contemplated her work with a smile, before sitting down on the ground.

You barely had to glance at her before the paw you were laying onto moved forward, the fairy hugging you to her chest. You blushed - personal space must be a foreign thing to pokemon, even to legendaries who were supposed to be way more clever than regular pokemon.

Recalling that Celebi was the cause of your suffering, you started struggling in an attempt to get free from her paws, but they held you in place. Though your efforts got Celebi to look down at you,

"Bi?" she inquired, wondering why you were still struggling... maybe the tiny human didn't like hugs, she naively thought.

"Let me go..." you meekly complained as you considered calling for help... before deciding against it. It could enrage Celebi... and who was going to help you anyway? Who could be dumb enough to take on a legendary? Despite her size and innocent looks, Celebi retained a great power - a single glance could blow away many normal-sized people at once.

You gulped as our figured what she could do to you...

For a moment, you stopped struggling to look at the green fairy, who smiled reassuringly.

"Y-You... You don't want to hurt me...?" you stuttered. Celebi shook her head.

"... Why?" you questioned, recalling how quickly she threw you in her mouth and swallowed, sending you to a one-way trip into her esophagus... it was dumb luck if you got out of there alive, you were sure.

In response to your question, Celebi smiled brightly, her embrace grew tighter around you.

You felt confused - a pokemon that earlier ate you now was sitting there, hugging you and telling that she didn't want to hurt you? What sense did that even make?

You looked at the giantess, she seemed sincere enough... but could you risk entrusting your life in her paws again, like you did earlier?
135211212211.title: To trust or not to trust

choices: The poke-ball was on your bed where you left it...
The poke-ball was on the bed... broken...
1352112122111.content:
You kept squirming weakly in the grip Celebi had on you. Could you trust she wasn't going to hurt you? It seemed like it, she had healed your wounds after all... but maybe, you realized, she only wanted you to last some more, play a few wicked games before she gulped you down again... even that wouldn't be the end. Celebi could travel back in time, no? How many times were you going to suffer even after your demise?

In fear, you looked back at the giantess... she was smiling at you. Not grinning, not snickering like you expected, but smiling warmly, soothingly. Maybe she was sincere...?

Before you even knew it, you found your struggles ceasing as you looked at the giantess without moving.

Trusting Celebi seemed a bit odd given what she attempted before... but, the protection of a legendary, one of the most powerful beings in the world? You couldn't give up that...

"... Please..." you whispered pleadingly, Celebi smiling even more. Finally, you decided to trust her.

Happily, the fairy got up, still hugging you, and fluttered over a few trees, laying down at the foot of a tree. It wasn't hard to see what she was doing - it was still the middle of the night, she clearly wanted to catch a few more hours of sleep.

In the process, she didn't let go of you, leaving you trapped between her chest and paws.

"Bi." she said cheerfully, before yawning and closing her eyes.

You sighed - how did you even end up in this situation?

Figuring that you should sleep for a while before the unpredictable Celebi woke up, you closed your eyes.

Darkness soon claimed your mind and you slid into a dreamless sleep.

--

In the next few days, you started to get used to your new life in Ilex Forest, under the protection of its patroness.

Because it became clear, Celebi really didn't want to hurt you... not anymore at least. It was the exact opposite, Celebi didn't let you out of her eyesight one minute and she fed you - though your mouth was starting to get tired of the taste of berries, which were the only food in the forest since the fairy didn't actually hunt.

During your stay, you also took notice of other pokemon, the inhabitants of the forest. None of those ever attempted anything though, too afraid of approaching your green guardian. It was better like this, you figured, they couldn't try to eat you.

Plus, you were starting to enjoy the company of the cheerful legendary. You were afraid of her for the first few days, and it was quite awkward to try to get to know a pokemon that couldn't speak your language... even though she clearly understood you. Every time you expressed your hunger or thirst, she'd provide you with a different berry or she'd bring you over a small lake so you could drink.

So, basically, things were going swimmingly now.

Even though your situation, you were safe and fed... but you couldn't stop thinking about your shrinking.

For some reason, you seemed to have forgotten how it did actually happened. You only remember you got home, ready to greet your first pokemon... and then?

"Bi?" Celebi asked you one time, seeing you deep in thought and wanting to know about your thoughts.

You sighed.

"You wanna know what's making me think?" you asked. As usual, like whenever you guessed her words right, she nodded.

"... It's... It's me Celebi. How I shrunk... I can't remember how..." you explained.

The fairy simply smiled and patted your head with a finger cheerfully.

You spent a few other days thinking about it, while your first week as a shrunken human lazily passed.

That was now the only thought that occupied your head, it was your only source of entertainment.

Then, one day, while you were eating with your giant green protector, you finally remembered.

"Oh!" you exclaimed, letting go of the Sitrus Berry you were eating, startling the fairy whose lap you were sitting on.

"Bi?" she quickly asked, concerned.

You spent a few moments looking in front of you.

The poke-ball... the one that was supposed to contain your first pokemon...

"Le bi?" Celebi inquired again, picking you up and staring at you questioningly.

"... I remember..." you whispered, your heart beating faster,
"I remember!" Celebi tilted her head in confusion, wondering why her human companion was acting like that.

"The poke-ball Celebi! That was what shrunk me!" you hastily exclaimed.

The beam, your body paralyzed... then darkness. And you woke up like this.

Celebi stared at you.

"Poke-ball Celebi! Y'know, that tool we humans use to-" you abruptly stopped, you had to pick your words carefully. But Celebi had already understood, you could tell by the frown that appeared on her face.

"Uh..." you awkwardly said, before shaking your head.
"Celebi, you've got to help me... I need to go back home... that poke-ball might be the key to grow me back to my original size!" you stated. Celebi looked skeptical.
"Bi..." she said, mistrusting you. She couldn't help it.

Things were going swimmingly between the two of you, why did you want to catch her now?... Maybe, you were telling the truth...?

--

Celebi didn't talk to you for the rest of the day... or the night when she, as usual, cuddled you to her chest for the dark hours.

And, the day after, she was quite silent, looking deep in thought.

At some point, she finally spoke again.
"Bi." she said, looking at you while pointing to you. Then, she pointed to herself and at the forest.

You sighed.
"Uh... you want to show me something?" you tried.

Celebi shook her head no.

"You... are thirsty?" you asked, struggling to remember if the direction her finger was pointed at was the one that led to the lake where she usually brought you to.

Again, Celebi shook her head.

".... You want to go to the shrine...?" you asked. She had brought you to a wooden shrine a few times during your stay.

Celebi sighed, while you groaned.

"I dunno..." you said resignedly. Celebi looked at you, before grabbing a hold of you and lifting you up. A blinding light shone, forcing you to close your eyes.

When you re-opened them, you were staring at... yourself and Celebi, ‘talking’ in distance. You looked back at Celebi - did she just-

"Celebi you've got to help me... I need to go back home... That poke-ball might be the key to grow me back to my original size!" you from the past told.

And the Celebi from your timeline nodded as he spoke those words.

You felt a lump in your throat.

"Y-You... want to help me...?" you asked, before that bright light shone again.

Celebi returned to your timeline, and sat down, looking at you and smiling.

All of a sudden, you felt blissful,
"THANK YOU CELEBI!" you shouted, a few bird pokemon fleeing from the nearby trees. The green fairy hugged you happily. You returned the hug.
"We need to go to my house Celebi..." you said.

The giantess smiled as she fluttered in the air.

"Bi?" she asked, ‘Which way?’.

--

When Celebi offered you her help, it was around midday.

Now, the sun was setting, and Celebi was still flying with you restrained in a hug, following your indications to get to your house.

And, finally, the green giantess reached a house that you recognized as yours. You pointed to one of the windows, and Celebi flew over it.

You peered inside... there wasn't anybody inside, it seemed.

Your mother, father and sister, even the pokemon, they weren't inside.

Maybe... they were gone somewhere?

"The front door Celebi," you said, pointing to the door. The fairy moved in front of it, and you started knocking with all your strength, but without producing any audible sound. If there was someone inside, you doubted they'd hear your knocking.

Luckily - and very, very unluckily - Celebi decided to act for you; the door was suddenly hit by a psychic blast which seemed to shake the whole house.

You trembled upon witnessing a taste of the power this legendary had.

But nobody else was there, you noted by the lack of startled screaming and crying of humans and pokemon. Celebi glanced at you with a look that asked ‘Now what?’.

In response, you put a hand on the door handle and tried to pull it downwards. You luckily, managed to move it, but the door remained close - it was locked.

You sighed - of course it was locked.

"Celebi..."

This was going to be hard to explain.

--

A loud noise echoed inside the deserted house as the door was psychically assaulted, falling down like a log. Celebi fluttered inside and looked around.

"Come on Celebi... let's look around, find a poke-ball." you instructed, hoping that it was still there.

The legendary nodded as she started moving through the various rooms... nothing in the kitchen, living room, bathroom, your parents' room or your sister's room... although you did get to have a good laugh when Celebi mistook your sister's dolls for other shrunken humans. It took you a while to explain the difference between an actual shrunken human and a lifeless object.

Now, there was only one room left, yours.

Celebi quietly moved inside your room and started looking around, emulated by you.

And, after a few quick looks, you noticed...
1352112122111.title: Aided by a legend

choices: Go back to the forest with Celebi
13521121221112.content:
"Wonder why he left without this..." your sister mused as she gently threw the poke-ball up and down in her palm.
"... Maybe he didn't like his first pokemon and went to catch another on his own?" that didn't seem like a logical explanation - why would you have done that?

Lost in her thoughts, your sister didn't catch the poke-ball when she threw it in the air again.

She watched with horror as the red and white sphere fell on the floor, breaking in two.

A blue light came from it and took the shape of an Eevee, who materialized on the floor, startled.

"O-Oh... sorry little guy..." the human in front of it told as she gently picked the Eevee up.
"... Let's find you a new poke-ball, alright?" she asked gently, picking the broken ball up and gently placing the pieces on the bed.

"Vee..." the Eevee cried longingly - it knew your sister wasn't its trainer.

Before your sister left the room, it wondered where its actual trainer was.


--

You felt the air leaving your lungs as you saw it. Celebi gently put your down on the bed.
"Bi." she said as she stared at the objects that once we're a poke-ball.

Two pieces of a broken poke-ball, one red, the other white.

And the only poke-ball you had was the one that caused you to shrink so...

"No no no..." you whispered breathlessly.
"This is bad... bad bad bad..."

You walked up towards the red part of the sphere, which was roughly twice your size.

You looked back, Celebi was staring at the two pieces with a serious expression on her face. She evidently understood that the situation was serious.

But maybe... Celebi could help you!

"Celebi... help me, pick those two pieces up!" you instructed.

In response, the fairy flew back, reluctant to pick up a poke-ball, even if broken.

Your brain hastily found a solution to this issue.
"... Use psychic Celebi, I promise nothing will happen!"

Celebi looked reluctant for a few more moments, before deciding to trust you.

The red and white pieces flew in midair as Celebi telekinetically lifted them, before looking at you questioningly.

"Now, put them back together," you said, and the two pieces of the broken ball were reunited psychically.

"Now, let go..."

The ball fell on the bed... the two pieces fell apart again.

You sighed, defeated. You felt that your legs couldn't hold you anymore and fell onto the bed, pale, desperate.

"Bii..." Celebi said dejectedly - she hated seeing her tiny friend like that. She had seen him in such state in the first days he was with her, and it wasn't very hard to see why.

But calling him a friend...

Celebi shook her head, and picked the poke-ball up again, wanting to make a second attempt.

The pieces were put together again, only to fall apart once again.

Celebi tried a few other times, but it ended with the poke-ball ultimately falling on the bed in front of you, the red piece rolling away.

"Bi..." she said dejectedly as she gently picked you up, hugging you to her chest.

You leaned against her green body, seeking for some kind of comfort.

Were you doomed to live your life like this now? The size of a small doll? What did you even do to deserve this?

You looked up, Celebi was smiling at you dejectedly.

"... The bright side, huh? Is there any?" you asked.

Celebi raised her head with a bright smile.

You discovered that you were smiling as well,
"Yeah, I still got you..." you said sourly.

Celebi giggled and released you. You hovered in the air, held by a psychic force while Celebi put her paws together, indicating your small size, smile glued to her face.

Your smile faded.

"Y-You... you like me like this...?" you were probably guessing wrong, it couldn't b-

The fairy nodded. Once again, you felt the air leaving your lungs.

"... B-But... why did you try to grow me back then?" you simply had to ask. It didn't make any sense, if she liked you tiny, why did she try to help you?

You looked at Celebi... she blushed.

Recently, the fairy started to get a weird feeling whenever she was around you... and it was basically all day long. And, after nearly two weeks of protecting someone that tiny and cute, it wasn't hard to understand what the feeling was...

She pointed to you, then placed both her paws on her chest, where her heart was.

That simple gesture made you realize.

Silence fell into the room as you stared at the floating fairy, shocked.

Then, after a few minutes, you finally broke the silence,
"Y-You..." you went silent.

Celebi nodded, blushing furiously, as she gently picked you up, holding you in front of her face.

And, slowly, she pressed her lips against your cheek, confirming your theory.

Celebi, a legendary pokemon, was in love with you.

What did that even imply!?

You felt your body burning as the giantess kept her lips on you for half a minute, before pulling back, leaving you blushing furiously while blushing herself.

"I... uh..." you tried to speak, but the shock silenced your vocal chords.

How could you even respond to such thing? How would Celebi take a ‘no’ for an answer? Probably, she wasn't even going to take it... you weren't even sure about how your own feelings towards her...

Your train of thought was interrupted as you noticed the fairy moving, carrying you along.

Celebi made her way back to the front door, which was still laying flat on the floor. She flew outside, a breeze blowing past you.

"H-Hey... where are we going...?" you asked, before remembering where she actually lived.
"... Ilex Forest?"

She looked down at you and nodded a few times, before starting to move again, blushing. She was literally carrying you to what was going to be your new home... because, if Celebi loved you, you doubted she was going to let you go.

But... you had to remain here, you had to stay home, wait for someone to come so you could get help... but it was clear, you couldn't leave your green guardian... you didn't want to leave her.

She was the only one to protect you in this dire situation of yours, without her you'd be helpless...

But that only meant one thing: you only had two choices.
13521121221112.title: Celebi's awkward confession

13521122.content:
"Biiiiii" Celebi yawns, her breath blasting right in your face as she was holding you close to her mouth. Meanwhile, the legendary pokemon decides that, wether you're a dream or not, she would find out in the morning; she's too tired. So she lies down again and moves to put you back on the ground. But as you are inches from the ground, she stops as a thought crosses her mind: if this wasn't a dream, the tiny human would run away. An Celebi really wanted to know how did he got so small. Plus, if he runs away, even a Wurmple could be a threat to him, and Celebi can't have that. She knows has to keep you from escaping somehow. She could put you on a high branch on the tree, but what if you accidentally fall? Celebi shakes her head, that's out of the question. She could pin you to the ground with her hand until morning. No, you could be crushed. Celebi keeps thinking of a way to keep you safe while she sleeps; you stand still the whole time, just staring at her.

After a few moments of thinking, Celebi has an idea: she could hold you in her mouth! You couldn't possibly escape and, if she swallowed you by accident, she could always bring you back up! Celebi decides to do so. So she turns to you and moves you close.

After what seems an eternity, the legendary pokemon finally turns her attention to you with a small smile. You wonder why is that as she moves you closer to her face. She opens her mouth and moves you close to it. Unaware of her intentions, you start to fear "No, please, don't eat me!" you yell. Celebi just ignores and moves you closer "Please don't!" you yell again, trying to get free from her grasp. Celebi momentarily stops. This human is clearly agitated. That's not good, if he struggles in her mouth, she could swallow him. So Celebi decides to help you calm down a bit, before proceeding with her plan. She closes her mouth and moves her other hand to your face. You close your eyes, fearing the worst; instead, you feel her hand on rubbing your cheek. You slowly open your eyes, to find Celebi smiling at you while caressing your cheek. From this, you get that she doesn't want to hurt you. Or maybe she wants to make your last moments more comfortable. You strongly hope in the first as Celebi stops. She then yawns again and looks at you, tiredly. She then opens her mouth once again and quickly drops you on her tongue. You immediately turn around and try to jump out of her lips, but they close before you, sealing you in darkness. Celebi moves her tongue all over you: the tiny human is tasty! But she doesn't want to eat him... yet. So she eventually stops and slides her tongue on your body and relaxes: the human can't escape now. The legendary pokemon then lies with her head against the tree and closes her eyes. It takes just a few minutes for her to fall asleep. Meanwhile in her mouth, you try to struggle, but her tongue is too strong for you. You try to free yourself for a while, but you can't. So you eventually give up and relax, falling asleep almost immediately under her tongue.
13521122.title: Celebi yawns and decides to get back to sleep

choices: Yes, and you let her know where you are when she wakes up several hours later
No, and she digests you before she wakes up
135211221.content: Are you immune to digestion?
135211221.title: Celebi swallows you!

choices: Celebi is too hungry. She wants you as her breakfast
Your 'captress' takes pity on you and decides to spare you
135211222.content: Celebi is still asleep against the tree, with her tiny captive still in her mouth, under her tongue. Inside the cavernous mouth, you are still asleep as well, Celebi's tongue covering you like a blanket. You are completely soaked in her saliva. Eventually, sun's rays shine through the night, making it fade away. Light get in Celebi's eyes, making her wake up. She begins to stir as she opens be blue eyes. She yawns loudly loudly, her tongue sliding over you. Celebi feels that something is in her mouth, when she remembers about last night. So the tiny human she found wasn't a dream. The legendary pokemon inserts her three fingered hand in her mouth and gets you from under her tongue, showing a completely soaked you go the world. Light shines through your eyes as you breath stops. You open your eyes and find yourself staring to a green creature of some sort... wait! You remember the facts from last night, when Celebi found you and put you to sleep under her tongue. You stare at her silently as she looks at you curiously, maybe studying you. You're all dripping with drool, so Celebi uses her free hand to clean your face. She then looks in your eyes, seeing pure fear in them. Fear that she could end your life with a single movement. And even if she doesn't, something else would. Celebi, being the kind pokemon she is, is saddened by this. She the thinks she could protect you, she has the power to do it. But then, her stomach grumbles, asking for it's meal. Celebi looks at it, before looking at you. Sure, she could also use you as breakfast. Your fear grows as you see Celebi licking her lips. The grass type pokemon can't decide what to do with you: she could keep you with her and protect you. Or she could turn you into a delicious breakfast. Her mouth waters as she remembers your taste. After a second, Celebi looks at you with a smile...
135211222.title: The next morning

1352112222.content:
Celebi sets you on the ground, your heart still racing. You have no idea what’s going on behind her eyes.

“Cell.” She point to a spot between a couple roots. It seems comparatively hidden.

“You want me to go there?”

She nods.

You walk over, half-expecting something to happen. Nothing does.

“Bi.” She seems to be motioning for you to stay.

You nod, still not sure what she’s trying to say. At this point it means you’re not being eaten, which, as far as you’re concerned, is all that matters.

You open your mouth to ask a question, but she flies off before you have a chance.

You wait for a while between the roots, still not 100% sure what’s happening.

After a while...
1352112222.title: New friend?

choices: Go ahead and relax. Maybe Celebi will protect you
Don't take risks, try to break free and run
135212.content: Even if Celebi was supposed to be benevolent, you decide to not take risks. You quietly get on your feet and begin walking away. But as you are walking, Celebi extends one of her arms in her sleep, and it comes in your direction. It stops right in front of you. You gulp down hard, as you decide to walk around it. But as you are walking near her "hand, it closes around your leg. You desperately try to break free, but Celebi was too strong for you. She pulls her arm back and must have felt you in her sleep, because she pulls you in a hug in her chest. From here you can hear her heartbeat, a soothing sound that seems to invite you to relax and go to sleep; plus her grass skin is really soft and she snores quietly; these facts seem to mix together to form a lulling rythm. You try hard to not fall asleep, but in her sleep, Celebi even nuzzles you against her face. Of course you could give up and relax, but you are still hesitant. What do you decide to do?
135212.title: Run away quietly before it wakes up

choices: Celebi decides that your taste was too good. She eats you
Celebi decides that you are better for company than a dnack
1352121.content: You eventually decide to give up and relax. It takes you a few moments before falling asleep, craddled by the sweet mix of sounds and softness. Eventually dawn comes. You are sleeping heavily, when the sound of an early Pidgey wakes you up. You slowly open your eyes and find yourseld hugging Celebi's green skin. She is still hugging you and snoring. You break the hug, but Celebi must have felt the movement, because her snoring interrupt and she opens her eyes. She looks in your direction and sees she was hugging you. Celebi blushes a bit and breaks the hug. Then she looks at you with a 'Why were you there?' look. You begin telling her your story. She looks sad when you say you don't have any idead of how you shrunk or how to return home and she blushes when you say that she was hugging you last night. Finally you finish your story, and she rubs her chin deep in thought. Finally she picks you up and licks you. She smiles satisfied at your taste. Celebi looks at you, deciding if eat you or keep you. You hope in the second one.
1352121.title: Go ahead and relax. Maybe Celebi will protect you

13521211.content:
Celebi looks at you with a sad smile, with an almost sorrowful look. You wonder why is that, when she opens her mouth and drops you in. You land on her tongue. Now you know why she was sorry, she's going to eat you! Being a grass type, Celebi didn't like the taste of blood, so she limits herself in tasting you. She smiles satisfied at your taste - it is incredible. After sloshing you in her mouth for a bit, Celebi swallows, sending you in the dark abyss of her throat. After a disgusting trip, you land in her stomach. You are completely surrounded by darkness and acid. The liquid burns your skin.

Celebi is sorry that she ate her new little friend, but it was worth it. His taste was incredible. Maybe someday she will use her Time Travel to save him but for now she decided to keep him in her stomach.

Back at you, it's been a while you are in here. You close your eyes, waiting for your doom. Using your last strengths, you silently forgive Celebi. This is your last thought, before the acid ends your life.
13521211.title: Celebi decides that your taste was too good. Sh...

13521212.content: After what seems forever, finally Celebi smiles and picks you up. She pulls you in a hug. You return the hug and sigh in relief; at least she will let you live. Celebi then flies up to a tree and snatches two berries. She thought that she could always get food, but keep a tiny human was something she would not let go. She returns and sits down next to you. She sets an oran berry in front of you and she eats her meal. You bite the berry, it's juicy and tasty. So you dig in. Finally you both finish eating. She lets out a satisfied sigh and you let out a small burp and you quickly cover your mouth blushing. Celebi giggles at your blush. She then picks you up and stares at you lovingly. She then pulls you in another hug and flies in the air. She than lays you on her back and heads to her sanctuary. After a few minutes of flying with you riding her, she arrives to her destination, picks you from her back and lays down on her sanctuary. She looks at you in her hands and smiled. Celebi then gently sets you on her belly as...
13521212.title: Celebi decides that you are better for company ...

choices: With a warm and loving smile
135212122.content:
You are about to ask her what to do when a bush rustles. You fear, thinking it could be a predator. But instead a Pichu, with a spiky ear, comes out smiling. Celebi picks you from her belly and carefully lays you on the sanctuary. She then goes to greet her friend.

"Hi Celebi!" Pichu yells at her grass type friend "Hello Pichu!" Celebi yells as well. The two of them hug each other "What are you doing here?" 13521212211212112112.content:
Celebi lifts you from her back using psychic and floates you to her head. She sits you on it. You look up and see that you three are in front of a cave. Here the trees are much taller than the others. This must be a very secluded area, you think. The two pokemon carefully move towards the entrance of the cave, to find it empty. You stare curiously at the inside: nothing apart a bunch of burned branches and some burning marks on the walls. You wonder what those marks could mean when a bush behind you rustles. You turn around and so do your two companions. Out of the bush comes a majestic golden creature, with fiery red eyes. It has a dead Magikarp in its mouth. The creature, that you recognize as a Ninetales, looks at you three curiously, before it puts the fish pokemon on the ground. The fox looks at you in particular, maybe curious about seeing a human in a such small size. Suddenly, a female voice is heard in your head "Hello there" it says "Who is there?" you say aloud, causing Celebi and Pichu to look around as the voice continues "I'm Ninetales. I'm using telepathy. Are you a human?" she asks. You slowly nod, shocked about the fact this pokemon is talking to you. The Ninetales moves closer to you. Celebi flies back, maybe afraid that the fix pokemon wants to hurt you, while Pichu gets next to her, her cheeks sparkling with electricity. The Ninetales stares at them for a second "Nine tales nine" he says.
*Pokemon speaking*
"Relax, I don't want to hurt any of you. I just want to verify something" Ninetales says "How do we know you don't want to hurt him or worse?" Pichu says, stills sparkling "Yeah, that's right. How do we know that?" Celebi asks. The fix seems to smile "If I wanted to hurt him or you, I would have already attacked. And then again, I'm no stupid to attack a human protected by a legendary pokemon" she says. Pichu and Celebi calm down at this, finding nothing to fight her logic.
*Human speaking*
Ninetales gets closer you, who are still sitting on Celebi's head "May I take a look at your arm?" she asks. You nod and pull up your sleeve. A black colored flame - shaped mark is there. You, and your two companions gasp at the sight, while Ninetales looks at it with a sad expression "As I thought" she says "This is a curse from another Ninetales. And, I'm sorry to say, it's irreversible' she says. Your eyes widen in shock; are you going to remain like this forever!? You sadly lower your head. This couldn't be possible. You clench your fists, frustrated. Meanwhile, you hear Ninetales talking in her own language with Celebi and Pichu. She must be explaining them your situation. A second later, you are lifted from Celebi's head. You see the grass type smiling sadly at you. She pulls you in a tight hug, while Pichu simply jumps and wraps her short paws around Celebi's chest, hugging you as well "Ce le bi" "Chu" the two say.
*Pokemon speaking*
"We're sorry for you. But look at the bright side" Celebi says "You still have us. We'll be there for you" Pichu says. You sigh, before you manage to smile a little: at least you had two great friends to protect you. You look at Ninetales, but she's gone. And so is the Magikarp. Instinctively, you look in ghhe cave, and see her devouring the fish pokemon. She smiles briefly, before digging in again.

After a while, you and your two companions decide to leave. So you wave Ninetales goodbye and leave. After a few hours of riding Celebi, you three return to the sanctuary in the forest. Celebi goes sit down on it. She then picks you and sits you on her lap. 'This is funny' she thinks 'A human sitting on a pokemon's lap'. She giggles, while Pichu climbs on the sanctuary. Celebi then notices you're looking in the depths of the forest .
"I wonder if I'm ever going to return home" you whisper. Suddenyl, you feel a weight on your head. You look up and notice Celebi caressing your head with her hand, while Pichu stares at you with a small smile on her face "What are you thinking about little guy?" the grass type pokemon asks. Obviously, you can't understand her, but you still tell them that you miss home, when an idea crosses your mind. They could bring you back home! But... if they do, you'll have to split up, because Celebi has to guard this forest. And you really don't want to say goodbye to them, they've been so kind with you. After a bit, you decide to

And then I'll let you out" you quickly reassure them. The three pokemon sigh in relief. Then they cheer "Okay then! To Olivine City!" you yell "Chu!" Pichu exclaims "Ce le bi!" 13521212211212112121111.title: The Journey starts

choices: Pichu gets back up and uses volt tackle
135212122112121121211112.content: The four pokemon head out of the forest, each of them giving you sweet looks every now and then, when an incredibily loud roar breaks te silence of the forest. Pichu jumps as Sylveon picks you in her ribbons from Ninetales' head. She wraps all of her ribbons around your whole body as Pichu, Celebi and Ninetales get in front of her, ready to protect you. You look up terrorized as a huge Charizard lands in front of the four. He lets out a tremendous roar as he spots you wrapped in Sylveon's ribbons. He licks his lips as he prepares to attack. Charizard uses flamethrower, but Celebi gets in front of the group and uses protect. The attack fails as Pichu attacks with electro ball. It hits Charizard and he roars angrily as he uses another flamethrower, this time directed to Sylveon. Your pokemon dodges by jumping, with you still in her grasp, and uses moonblast. But Charizard dodges and he uses mega punch on Ninetales. The fox pokemon falls to the ground. The group gasps, as Charizard uses flamethrower on Celebi. She also falls down as Charizard uses mega punch again, this time on Pichu. She also falls to the ground. Only Sylveon, who holds you tightly, is still standing. She looks rather angry as she charges a final move. Hyper beam. The pink pokemon fires the powerful move at Charizard, but he dodges, and hits Sylveon with his own hyper beam. Sylveon is hit by the move and is literally sent flying in a tree. She loses her grasp on you and faints as Charizard walks slowly to you and grabs you in his strong (and much less gentle) grasp. He brings you to his mouth and dangles you over it.

You close your eyes, fearing that it's the end for you. But you don't notice that Pichu is getting up "Pic chu chu pi!" she exclaims angrily.

He looks in horror as Pichu hits him full force. Charizard is sent back and he loses his grip on you. You fall, but Pichu catches you in her tiny paws and clutches you to her chest. Meanwhile the other three pokemon begin to get up and get near Pichu, Ina protective way. Charizard gets back up "You'll pay for that!" he roars.

Charizard roars furious, making you shiver, but the four pokemon don't move an inch. Charizard uses fire blitz, aiming to Pichu, but Celebi uses protect, making the attack fail. The four pokemon now look really angry. Pichu puts you on the grouns before "Pichuuuuu!" she uses volt tackle "Cele biii" Celebi uses ancient power "Syll ve ooon" Sylveon fires hyper beam "Tales" Ninetales uses dark pulse. Charizard is hit by the four attacks. You close your eyes. A huge explosion thunder in the whole forest, making the smaller pokemon to flee and the bigger pokemon to wonder what was that. When you open your eyes, you see Charizard, fainted on the ground, with a big wound on his back. Sylveon, Ninetales, Celebi and Pichu cheer as they come to you. Celebi picks you up and hugs you, while the other three pokemon join her, squeezing you in the tightest hug you ever had. When they break it, they start nuzzling you lovingly "Please... Sto... stop... I... Love you all... Too..." you say running out of air. They stop nuzzling you and look at you sweetly "Come on now, we have a journey to continue!" you say smiling. The four pokemon cheer as Pichu picks you in a hug "Bi cele bi!" she beams.

"My turn now!" Pichu beams, beginning to walk "Hey!!!" Ninetales and Sylveon complain following her close, while Celebi simply giggles. Meanwhile, the Charizard gets back up and notices his wound. He roars angrily, breathing fire in the meantime. Then a smell hits his nose: it's the four pokemon and the tiny human that causes him this! He tries to fly and get them, but he is still weak. He then starts to walk away; but he promises himself that, when he'll be healed, he's going to hunt you and your group down

The five of your then run in the cave. Shortly after you all see the flock rushing past the cave, not knowing you are in there. Your small group lets out a long sigh of relief before...
