13521212211212112121111221111211.content:
Your group stays still for a few more moments, before Celebi gestures to remain still. She then flies to the cave entrace and looks around "Bi!" she then says with a smile, meaning that is safe to exit. Finally the four of you can head out of the cave. Once you are out, still plucked in Sylveon's grasp, you breath in the fresh morning air "Come on!" you then say grinning in determination "Olivine awaits us!". The four pokemon cheer as they start walking towards the city. They walk through the forest for a good amount of time, occasionally passing you to each other and nuzzling you.
~
After hours of walking through the forest, you finally manage to see the gym of Olivine City, as the four pokemon finally step in the city. You are currently in Pichu's grasp. Finally you see your objective: the pokemon market. "Can you put me down, Pichu?" you ask "Chu" the small pokemon says putting you down.You then look at Celebi "There" you say. Celebi smiles at you and nod, then she suddenly disappears. You smile as you feel a soft surface rubbing against you; Celebi must be nuzzling you before she pulls off and heads to the market. You look at the three pokemon
~
Inside the pokemon market, the clerk is bored out of his skill, when the door opens, but nobody comes in. He shudders and turns his attention elsewhere. What her doesn't notice that three pokeballs from the shelf behind him are lifted in the air. Then the door opens again "I'll have to repair that door" the clerk says to himself.
~
You and your group are waiting for Celebi to return for quite a while now, when you see three objects, white and red in color, that you recognize as pokeballs "It's you Celebi?" you ask "Bi!" Celebi's voice answers, as she shifts back visible "Good job!" you say happily. You then look at the other three pokemon smiling, and they smile back at you.
~
"Are you ready?" you ask handing each pokemon but Sylveon a pokeball, while just pushing one to Ninetales "Bi!" Celebi says smiling "Chu pi" Pichu says as well smiling "Yeah, I'm ready" Ninetales says in her telepathic voice.
*Pokemon speaking*
"I'm ready" Celebi says "I'm ready master" Pichu says smiling. Her expression then drops "But... You will release us from here, right?"
*Human speaking*
"Chu pi chu?" Pichu asks "Uh?" you say "She wants to know if you'll release us when we become your pokemon" Ninetales translates "Oh, sure, I promise" you say, making the three pokemon smile. They then reach for the button on the pokeballs...
13521212211212112121111221111211.title: Olivine at last!

choices: You live and either wait or explore
135212122112121122.content: Does she digest you or are you immune to her stomach acids and have to stay in her, and either explore or wait for her to let you out the back door?
135212122112121122.title: No, she can't spit you out!

1352121221121211222.title: You live and either wait or explore

choices: A wild nocturnal Pokemon, native to Ilex Forest (Oddish, Paras, Psyduck, etc.)
A caught Pokemon brought here by a trainer, and not native to Ilex Forest
1352122.content:
The soft and gentle embrace of Celebi is tempting, and you want to give in and allow her to have you. But even so, the size of the Pokemon, along with the power that you know she possesses, is enough to scare you and convince you to try to flee. It is said that Celebi is gentle, but you find it too risky to entrust your life to her, when you know so little about her.

And so you squirm and work your way upwards, getting your torso and then your legs out from under the sleeping giant Pokemon's arm. You move slowly and carefully, and manage to avoid waking her. She doesn't notice that you've slipped out of her grasp, and you waste no time in sliding off her and landing on the ground before running as fast as you can into the dark forest.

You glance back and see the giant Celebi still sleeping soundly, before she is concealed by plants and darkness as you continue to run away. She could have helped you survive the forest, but the potential of her turning aggressive and exercising the immense power she had over you was too big of a risk. Fleeing was the best option, you believed.

As you run through the forest, you hear sounds of birds and animals moving about, and know you're not alone. You duck into a bush to rest, keeping an eye out for wild Pokemon. You're defenseless at the moment, a combination of your small size and lack of weaponry preventing you from doing anything to anyone that wants to harass you. Hiding is your only option.

You remain in the bush for a bit before stepping out and continuing on your way. But you haven't gone far before you hear something approaching. You have no idea what it is, but it's enough to send you running back into the bush. You hear the cry of a Pokemon as you enter your hiding spot again, and you wince at the loud sound. You cower within the bush and peek out as you realize that whatever you heard must have spotted you, and made that sound as a result. Sure enough, you see a shadowy shape approach the bush, and as it gets closer, you can tell that it is...
1352122.title: Don't take risks, try to break free and run

choices: The Oddish drops you in its mouth and swallows!
13521221.content:
As the shadow approaches you, you clearly see that the pokemon in question has a roundish form, two bright red eyes, and grass coming out of its head. An Oddish. And it's easily twice your height.

For a moment, none of you moves, you simply paralyzed by fear, while the Oddish is staring at you with it's crimson eyes.

You learned back at school that Oddish becomes active at night, and that it can be a very nasty pokemon at times. Plus, the grass on its head has the unique ability to grab things.

The pokemon keeps staring down at you for a few minutes, before its mouth curls up in a smirk.
"Oddish!" it cries loudly, moving a step towards you, making the ground shake lightly beneath you.

Startled, you take a step back. You don't like one bit the look on the Oddish's face. It can't mean anything good... at least, not to you.

"Oddish!" it repeats, moving another step closer to you. You take yet another step back.

And that's when the pokemon finally becomes tired to play with its prey.

Suddenly, the Oddish bounces up, scaring the hell out of you. But fear only rises when you notice that the pokemon is going to land on you!

You try to move out of the way, but your legs won't move. And so, the Oddish pounces down on you, pushing you down to the ground, almost crushing you.

You feel the air leaving your lungs and an immense pain throughout your body as the Oddish keeps standing on your chest, threatening to crush your ribcage in a matter of seconds!

With your vision becoming blurry, you notice the Oddish, who didn't stop smirking the whole time, lowering its head towards you, the prehensile grass moving, ready to grab you.

As the grass wraps around your body, the Oddish leaps off you and lifts you in the air.

Unable to move, or even squirm, you can only look as the small pokemon opens its mouth wide.
"Oddish!" it cries for the third time, this time sounding happy.

Happy to have found a snack, you guess.

And then, it starts lowering you into it's open mouth.
"NO! PLEASE!" you shout out of fear.

But the Oddish doesn't pay attention to your begs as it keeps lowering you. You start to shout as loud as you can, trying to struggle. But the Oddish has a firm grip on you, and it seems to be willing to release you only once you are 'safely stored' in its mouth.

You start to shiver as you let out one last shout of fear.
"Oddish!" the pokemon cries again, moving you in front of its mouth.

It then opens wide, showing the pink insides that wills soon lead you to your grave.
"Please..." you whisper, closing your eyes, as the pokemon moves you towards its open mouth...
13521221.title: A wild nocturnal Pokemon, native to Ilex Forest...

choices: She intends to eat you herself!
She intends to keep you for herself!
135212212.content:
As the Oddish is about to place you in the dark, slippery insides of its cavernous mouth, it suddenly stops. A shocked expression paints itself on the pokemon's face. You wonder what's going on with it, when you notice a silent figure coming over. Or, more precisely, flying over.

Celebi was sleeping soundly, but your screams of fear, along with the cries of the Oddish, had successfully awoken the forest's patroness from her peaceful slumber.

Curious about the noises, Celebi started searching for their source.

And, following them, she was led to the most weird scene she's ever seen. An Oddish with what appears to be a tiny human trapped in the grass of its head, moving him towards its mouth, very probably ready to satisfy its hunger with its easy catch.

So, she used her psychic powers to momentarily incapacitate the Oddish.

Still shocked about the sudden apparition of the same time traveler legendary pokemon you left not even fifteen minutes ago, you watch as she floats over the Oddish, towering above it.

She moves her paws towards the grass trapping you, gently untangling the blades of grass from your tiny body, freeing you.

Then, getting a hold of you, Celebi lifts you up. Holding you in her three-fingered grasp, she gently pushes away the Oddish, who, free from her psychic grasp and, most likely, intimidated by the presence of the legendary, walks away, soon disappearing into the thick vegetation.

Trembling lightly, you gaze up into the baby blue eyes with dark eyelids of the giantess, who examines you with an amused look. After all, it's not every day a pokemon gets to hold a shrunken human.

Suddenly, the legendary grass and psychic type starts floating upwards, with you still held in her solid grasp.

Deciding to move to a safer location to take a better look at you, Celebi floats up on a tree, sitting on a branch, back against the trunk.

You notice the pokemon looking at you intently.
"Uhm... thanks for... you know... saving my life..." you mutter gratefully, but, not for this, less scared. After all, you fled from Celebi for a reason, but you ended up bumping right into her open paws. You just hope that she is gentle as she is powerful...

Celebi keeps studying her tiny 'catch'. It's indeed a human. He even spoke in human language. That was a confirm.


"Bi." Celebi lets out an excited cry as a smile takes place on her face. Fearing the worst, you look at the now wide awake pokemon you fled from before. And she looks lots of times much more intimidating than the Oddish.

As the legendary moves you closer, you quickly understand the reason of why she saved you...
135212212.title: Meeting the forest's guardian.

choices: She's still sleepy, she wants to get back to sleep
She's eager to time travel with you
1352122122.content:
Celebi excitedly examines the small human in her paws. Even in the darkness of the forest, the legendary grass type can see you just fine. Vice versa, you can see the giantess just fine as she currently occupies all of your view, giving you a clear idea of how small you are compared to her. And to think that she's one of the smallest legendaries only makes you feel even worse right now...

You and the giantess silently stare at each other in silence for a while. You can't really make out what Celebi is thinking, though. Something good, you judge from the smile painted on her face.

Unbeknownst to you, the grass type fairy is thinking of what should she do with you.

This little human she found is small enough to fit in her mouth; she could make a decent midnight snack out of it...

The legendary fairy shakes her head. She's too kind for that. Even if a shrunken human is something new, he ended up in her forest. The patroness of Ilex Forest usually cares about each and every creature within it, flora and fauna.

And this little guy will be no different, she decides. She'll treat you just as she treats every other inhabitant of Ilex Forest.

The fairy's smile shifts into a grin. That doesn't mean, though, that she can't have some harmless fun with this new 'inhabitant'.

You watch as the legendary's smile turns into a grin, her mouth opening slightly, giving you a clear sight of her pearly teeth, which seem to shine, eager to receive their 'guest'- you!

With unnerving slowness, the fairy's lips part, giving you another sight to dread: a dark, pink and wet cave, full of white stalactites and stalagmites, and a dark abyss at the end of it. A dark abyss that would lead to a slow, painful death inside of the Celebi's belly if you ever get too near to it...

The sight of Celebi gets eclipsed as her tongue darts out of her mouth and slams in your face, forcing you to close your eyes while covering your face in a thick layer of saliva.

The giant, red muscle shifts position, from your face to your upper body, then your lower as it completely bathes you with saliva.

And then, it retreats back into the shadows of the fairy's mouth, while she closes her mouth, grinning down at you.

Disgusted, you spit out saliva, before looking into Celebi's eyes.
"Do not eat me please." you beg.

The giantess starts giggling. You just gave her another idea.

Again, the two giant lips split up, revealing the insides of her mouth again. Before you can even think of begging, you're shoved right inside, the lips closing up again, sealing you in darkness.

--

As soon as you're entrapped in the Celebi's mouth, you give out one loud cry.
"HEY, LET ME OUT!" you shout, fearing what's coming next.

In response, the giant tongue beneath you starts wiggling, licking you all over as Celebi tastes your body. You gulp. When she's done, you will be meeting her stomach up close...

Unknown to you, the fairy isn't planning to swallow. She's just having some fun with her new tiny friend.

Celebi leans back, her back against the trunk of the tree as she thinks. What to do with this human when she was done playing? She couldn't let him go.

Someone so small would get eaten alive by the first Weedle he met, and the guardian didn't want that. So, the only way to keep this human safe... is to keep this human.

Celebi's eyes lit up. How didn't she think about it before? This human could be her companion. Time traveling is an useful power, and it's just as fun.

However, being able to share this experience with someone else would be something new. Usually, Celebi doesn't get too near to humans as they would be a threat to her.

But this one human is completely harmless... and he'll be the perfect candidate to be her companion during her time travels, she decides.

Celebi smiles as her mind returns to you, who are still trapped in the darkness of her mouth.

She can't explain why, but the human's flailing, his struggles, his screams are kind of... arousing.

Celebi quickly glances at her surroundings.

No one, she's alone. Well... that's not correct. She's alone with her tiny 'guest'.

Grinning, the grass type slowly spreads her legs wide, her sex revealed to the world. Celebi rolls her eyes as her long left paw finds its way in between her legs.

Blushing and smiling at once, the grass type starts rubbing as she pleasures herself...

--

You can't exactly tell how much time passed since you entered the hot darkness of this slippery 'cave'. A lot for sure. But it's starting to get even worse as your surroundings are shaking for some reason, while your ears are assaulted from cries coming from below you.

What in the world is Celebi doing?

"LET. ME. OUT!" you scream for the... you lost count of how many times you've repeated this three words tonight.

The shaking comes to an end as you hear one last, yet very loud cry.

Suddenly, the unexpected happens: the two lips part again, allowing fresh air to enter the mouth. That, and a giant paw which gets a hold of your legs and pulls you out.

--

Roughly, your soaked body is brought to the legendary's face. She stares at you for a second, before bursting into laughter.

Did she just prank you? You were having a heart attack!

The fairy takes her time to stop laughing, before proceeding to clean your body from the sticky saliva.
"Bi." she happily says as she wipes the last drops away.

"So... you're not going to eat me, are you?" you question. Celebi smiles warmly, slightly reassuring you.

Then, the fairy's gaze shifts elsewhere. Gently, she lets you down on her belly, on the dark green side of her body. One paw pins you against the smooth, grass skin while the fairy thinks.

Relieved that you didn't became a snack for the legendary, you look up at her, wondering what she's up to...

135232.content:
An Ampharos wanders throughout the forest, it too being quite lost. This particular Ampharos learned to survive on its own after becoming lost from his flock as a Mareep. Weary and tired, he finds a nice spot to rest, right next to a log. Unbeknownst to him yet, you have already found this log. He lays down beside and closes his eyes to sleep.

It's not long before he senses another presence.

He pokes his head up and looks around. No Pokémon were in sight (and thankfully no trainers either). Still alert, but still very tired, he lays his head back down, ready for sleep. Just before he closes his eyes, he sees something. This thing appeared to be a human, but was smaller than a leaf! And that so happened to be you.

He reached his arm toward you, but hesitated for a brief moment. Was this alright? Is this a smart thing to do? Thinking carefully, he realizes traversing this large forest must be very difficult with your tiny size. Carefully, he reached his arms toward you and slowly scoops you up. He brought you towards himself and examines you. He didn't know why, but he had the feeling he should take you to safety. Begrudgingly, he slowly stood back up and continued walking forward.

Nearly an hour later, the entrance to his cave comes into view. His slow steps eventually lead him inside. He approaches his bed, made entirely of leaves and sticks, which was covered in bundles up Mareep wool. He plops down, exhausted, and forgets about you for a moment. Thankfully, he rolls at the last minute and you land safely.

That doesn't keep you from staying asleep, however. The jostling if the wall wakes you up, and you take in your unfamiliar surroundings. You were in a cave, clearly, and could see several things scattered about. A makeshift table-like structure sat in the center, complete with a wooden stool. A pile of berries sat in a corner, with the majority of them being Oran berries and Iapapa berries. A pile of scorched twigs and sticks sits nearby, presumably for heat or cooking food. You look down and see you are on a pile of wool. You guessed this was from Mareeps or Flaaffys, seeing as every now and then you felt a little shock. As you begun thinking of how you got there, you heard soft breathing from behind you. You cautiously turned around and saw the behemoth that was a giant Ampharos. You stood in shock at your predicament. Or was it really a problem...?

135312.content:
It really hadn't noticed you. You weren't surprised, at your size. If anything, the Oddish probably thought you were a berry in the grass. Luckily, you were a little bit sturdier than a berry, though.

As you got to your feet, something suddenly struck your legs. It felt cold and strange, at first, until you looked down and realized what it really was. A thick string-like material had wrapped itself around your legs.

Fear suddenly returned as you saw a Caterpie approaching you from not too far away. It shot more string at you, smacking you in the head and sending you back to the ground.

You quickly got back up, but found out quickly that your legs were tied together and hard to move. The Caterpie knew was it was after, and you soon knew as well.

With the Caterpie only seven to ten feet away, you had to make a plan for yourself in order to survive. The large trunk of a tree nearby offered room for you to squeeze into, that is, if you can make it their before the Caterpie gets to you. Or, you could stay still and try to rip the string off of your legs in order to make escaping easier.

Which should you do?

1353122.content:
You decided that you had a little time to spare in order to free yourself. You sat down and reached down to the string around your legs. Normally, such thin string would break apart easily. But, that would be if you had normal human strength. At your size, you found it difficult to rip through the fibrous material. You struggled, losing valuable time as Caterpie came ever closer.

Then, you realized your mistake.

The Caterpie slammed you with another String Shot, this time around your arms and midsection. You were completely tied up now. You had assumed that Caterpie wouldn't shoot even more string at you while you remained stationary. Oh, how wrong that had been.

As you laid down in the grass, you struggled to free yourself. You saw the Caterpie inch its way closer, until it was finally standing over you, and finally realized your fate. You weren't escaping this situation. No, for as much as you thought you would do in your life, it was about to be all over. The Caterpie knelt down beside your imprisoned body and opened its mouth near your legs. You saw it slurp your feet into its mouth, pulling your legs in behind and slightly lifting you off of the ground. You, the future Pokemon League Champion, were being devoured by a hungry Caterpie tonight. Unfortunately, things appeared not to be headed for change. As your entire lower half became submerged inside the Caterpie's mouth, initiating the swallowing of your feet, you accepted that you had only had pipe dreams. Nobody was here to save you. This Caterpie was just like you, wishing only to see the next rising of the sun.

Your arms and body entered Caterpie's mouth. You could already feel the tugging as Caterpie tried to ingest you as quickly as it could manage to. It was choking on you, slightly, having a bit of trouble taking in a person your size. However, you were just small enough that once it could close its mouth around your head, you were nothing but a goner. The rest of the process became easy, at least for the Caterpie. You were downed into its throat, allowing a breath of relief from the Caterpie as you squirmed your way down into its stomach. Unfortunately, the string that tied your body prevented you from making a fight until the finish. As the Caterpie settled down and got some well-needed rest for the night, you became an easy midnight snack for its empty stomach. By morning, nothing would be left of you but your bones in its gut.

14232.content:
When you turned around the next corner, you could tell without a doubt who's home you were in. It was none other than the home of one of the world's most famous Pokemon Trainers, Ash Ketchum, who was on top of his bed. You had only heard about him through the many media outlets which talked about all the times he helped save the world from such disasters as the Orange Islands incident involving the three legendary bird Pokemon of Kanto, and another one from Johto. Then there was the time he saved a little girl from a wild Entei in a mansion that was slowly turning into crystal, and even stopped said crystal from enveloping the land around the mansion, and possibly even the rest of the world.

152.content:
The only things you have been able to sense for the past few hours has been the annoying scent of cardboard. And the occasional voices of a few unevolved pokemon...but those seem to be distant and muffled. Oh yes ,you can feel various materials against you, as well ,but you cannot move them out of place, nor can you even move beyond a small fidget or two. You can only theorize that you have awoken to find yourself in the aftermath of a landslide. This sensory depravation is interrupted by a litany of thumps and scratching noises,along with the shaking of the world around you. a Light finally emerges into the world around you for a brief moment only for the brightness to be squelched out by a large shadow that looms overhead. Your instincts tell you to move, but you cannot. You can only lie and watch as you hear a booming voice. "Oh, it always cheers me to think that so many people are willing to donate so many things!" Loud though it may be, the voice comes with the warmth of one genuinely devoted to caring for other people and the modesty that aging brings.

You at last make out the source of the shadow as it lunges down to your right, just narrowly avoiding you.A hand. A gigantic, human hand. Loud noises assail your ears as you are pushed about, and when the affair is all over ,you can see the hand ascending into the air,a pacifier that's nearly as big as you are pinched between its fingers. You can see,now,and you find yourself staring at the familiar face of the woman in charge of the local pokemon daycare, but she seems to pay you no heed .Is this a dream? You can feel pressure around you,certainly...and you can even speak,though your voice is soon drowned out by hers ."A pacifier? Well, that always help calm the pichu down..."

It finally dawns on you ,just where you are.You're in the donation box at the pokemon daycare. You haven't merely shrunken. You've been shrunken and ,during the time that you had were asleep, picked up,deemed to be a toy, and donated to a daycare. You have nary a chance to ponder the lowliness of your misfortunate state. The hand is descending once more ,this time upon you! A pair of fingers pinch around your head relentlessly,and you are roughly throttled upward, getting knocked against the plastic toys along the way. The fingers hoist you up into the air, sliding downwards until they grip against your chest. You find yourself several stories off of the ground, face to face with the massive woman. Her eyes are fixated on your tiny form. From the looks of it, she is assessing you. Genuinely curious about the nature of this particular donation. Surely she will recognize that you are a human. Surely.

"Oh ,what a wonderful doll this is! And it even moves! The little pokemon will just love this!

You make a legitimate attempt at pitching in, but it doesn't help your situation at all. You feel a rush all around you as you are lowered down,and you wind up once more in darkness. She has deposited you into her apron pocket. Before you can mount an escape attempt. Congratulations. You are now the property of a pokemon daycare. A mere plaything for the youngest of pokemon

Soon enough ,you are finally taken out of her apron pocket. You recall the daycare having an indoor area that was designed to accommodate for the more human-like pokemon, as well as an outdoor area ,one that was more suitable for the more animalistic ones. Even if you were sent outdoors, you doubt that you could realistically escape. Most daycares are equipped with special fences that prevent even the smallest of pokemon-yes ,even the incorporeal ones- from wandering off. Struggling to get some idea of what is going on ,you look around frantically and find that you are in...
152.title: Donated to a daycare

choices: Your owner shows you to one of the three Pokemon
Your owner takes you to the toybox
The doorbell jingles. The boy from earlier has come to the daycare.
1521.content:
Lying in the apron pocket, you hear the sound of a door creak open, and you are suddenly met with the cacophonous noise of toddler-aged titans running rampant through the room, a terrifying and even physically painful reminder of just where you are. Your owner's fingertips mash around you with brutal force,and you are hoisted out of the soft confines of her apron pocket, flung into the world The first thing you see, as your owner's fingers come to a halt, is an pair of enormous windows, each practically spanning the height of the room. You look out through them, at the idyllic outside world. A paved road, a whitewashed fence perched upon by a wild Spearow...a ten year old boy biking down the path, swiftly zipping from one end of your vision to the other. This ironic glimpse of the simplicity of life in the normal sized world makes your predicament all the more painful.

You then turn your attention to the interior of the daycare, which will likely be your world for the time being. A table supporting a set of colorful arts and crafts supplies lies just beneath the humongous windows. Bright green wallpaper lines the walls, a cartoony alphabet banner hanging just beneath the white plaster ceiling. Craning your neck to the right, you see a low-height mesh walled crib, another positioned just beside it. To your left, you see an enormous diaper-changing table, complete with multiple shelves and a nearby diaper pail. Throughout the room, various cute decals are positioned on the walls,and some paper ornaments even hang from the ceiling!

Your inspection of the room is interrupted by the shifting of the daycare worker's fingers. You're briefly flipped around, your body staring at a flowery dress before her fingers clasp up into a fist, trapping you in the darkness. The air smells of sweat and salad dressing. The shouting and pounding of the Pokemon children seems louder than ever,and your body is overwhelmed with the force of the gripping hand and the vertigo induced by its motions. About a minute later, the woman's fingers part oh so slightly, just enough to give you a chance to glimpse the outside world. You see what appears to be a tan carpet floor,a Ken doll with a head chewed up beyond recognition lying upon it. It appears to be wearing a pink Barbie dress, an ominous brown smear besmirches its right arm-the only arm it has left- and its chest is scorched black. As you examine it, you hear the sound of the BOOMing footsteps of one of the Pokemon drawing closer to you. You see a fuzzy yellow paw come down right for it, gripping it and swiftly yanking it out of your view. Your owner chuckles warmly. "Oh Pichu. You all can be so rough on your toys, but I wouldn't have it any other way!

Moments later, the woman sets you down atop an enormous set of cubbies. She looks at you briefly,smiling, examining your motions.Attempting to communicate with her, you earn nothing more than a dismissive response. "Oh. The little ones are going to love you SO much. You sigh and turn towards the daycare, to see the opposition.

Three pokemon appear to be playing. The Pichu from before is running about,smashing the Ken doll's messed up face against the edge of the arts and crafts table. A streak of drool trails down from his mouth and onto his pudgy , fuzzy belly, cutting off just above the waistband of his diaper. His diaper appears to depict a grinning cartoon car. Seeing the cartoon car, you grimly wonder if Pichu will wind up running you over, mashing you into 'roadkill' beneath his paws.

A Clefairy sits nearby, quite close to the cubbies. This Pokemon, clearly the oldest at the daycare, but still not old enough to be potty trained, appears to be playing with a pink dollhouse,using a massive hairbrush to come over the hair of a doll roughly twice your height. She occasionally rips out a few of the doll's hairs, for what purpose you cannot imagine. She's wearing a pink diaper featuring a cartoon princess in a flowing dress, though, curiously, her owner seems to have thought it would be appropriate to strap little butterflies along the waistband...still alive, their wings weakly wavering. Curiously, a 2-foot wide translucent plastic dome sits beside the dollhouse, a doll lying beneath it,coated in a thick sheet of ice.

Finally, an Axew is playing around on a playmat in the corner of the room. It appears to be a model town. Toy cars and very simplistic looking model humans are scattered about atop the playset. Axew smashes his paw down on one of the little cars, cackling gleefully. Its tusks are a frightful sight to behold. They are massive, sturdy, and sharp. Worse, however, is the fact that a model human toy has been impaled onto each of its tusks. Their plastic faces remain static, stuck in a smile...but you know well that you'd be screaming for your life if you were in that situation. It becomes evident that no matter who you are handed off to, you will likely find yourself in a life-or-death game,at the mercy of a deadly pokemon cub.

Before you can look about any further, you feel your owner's hand grip around you. She has finally made her decision.
1521.title: A colorful room, complete with a changing table...

15211.content: You were afraid before, but now that the your fears are mere moments away from becoming a reality,you break into an outright panic. You struggle. You thrash. You bite. You scream. You plead. do everything you can to tear your way out of this woman's hand...but it's to no avail. Your bites and scratches produce nothing more than a mildly pleasant tingling sensation. You feel yourself being lowered down slowly, and your owner shifts her fingers until you are held between her thumb and her pointer finger. She begins to introduce you to...

152111.content:
Your owner's booming footsteps join with the cacophony of the daycare, but nothing will beat the sporadic, incomprehensible shrieks of the Clefairy, or the brutal but triumphant roars of the Axew. After a few seconds of stomping, the woman lets out a deep sigh,clearly unable to keep up with the electrically fast baby Pokemon, and calls out to the child. "PICHU! PICHU! MOMMY'S GOT SOMETHING SPECIAL FOR YOU! The frantic sounds of Pichu's paws smashing rapidfire against the carpet slows to a halt, a sloppy yet spine chilling giggle sounding out.You hear one last thwack, presumably a result of the Pichu smashing the doll against the table again for good measure, before the creature approaches you.You can hear the sounds of its footsteps growing louder and louder, until they finally stop. Instead,you can hear him breathe...though it's hard to make out over the breaths of your owner and the sounds of the other two Pokemon playing.

The woman speaks up once more, speaking to the Pokemon in a doting, maternal voice. Her fingers mash against and shift around your body, her fingernails digging carelessly into your flesh a few times as she adjusts her hold on you. When her fingers finally secure themselves around your head, you find yourself at belly-level with the enormous pokemon cub, a sheet of downy yellow fur covering his pudgy yellow belly. You look up towards his face, getting an unusual glance of it from underneath. He's looking up at the caretaker, not having noticed you yet, so you can't see much beyond his chin and his cheeks, though you CAN see that one of his enormous paws is stuffed right into his suckling mouth. You turn your head to the side, turning your attention to your surroundings. Pichu's body is framed by the familiar sights of the daycare,the same mesh walled crib and arts and crafts table from before, the enormous window to the outside world still visible, and a white door looming to the side of the cribs. Looking down, you see the waistband of the creature's diaper, the garment alone happening to be the size of an army tank relative to your body. More ominously, you can see the barbie-fied ken doll dangling from his pudgy handpaw by its one arm.

You're suddenly shaken by a loud THUD from beneath,and you realize that the Pokemon has started to move. You immediately look up to his face, realizing its fixated upon you. He stomps towards you in a haphazard path, such that you have to turn your head to follow him, carelessly flopping his doll about, but keeping his eyes fixated on you. He eventually stops right in front of you, sniffing at you with his relatively tiny (relative to his face, of course) nostrils. "Oh. I can just tell you're going to love it"the caretaker says,smiling warmly. You hear a rustling noise as Pichu scratches against the drool-soaked portion of his belly with the side of his arm, pushing the wet, matted fur about. After a brief pause, the caretaker continues "Your old toy looks a bit messy. Why don't you put it down so I can wash it,and then you can play with the new one?"She asks, in a tone meant to suggest that he really should hand her over the old toy.

Pichu lifts the old toy up in front of his face, looking at it with a hint of sentiment. He pulls his drool-soaked paw out of his mouth and shoves the old toy into his mouth, giving it a few good chomps before pulling it out, its head warped even further. He tosses it to the ground and slams his enormous paw onto it , rubbing his foot back and forth, a final display of dominance before its departure. He kicks it forward gently, and you hear a thud as the caretaker swiftly pins it beneath her slipper. She picks it up and dumps it into her apron pocket. THIS one's gonna need a good hot bath...she says to herself with surprising stoicism. She must have cleaned up toys that have been in FAR worse messes than before.

Pichu looks at you intently,tapping one of his paws against the ground, producing a series of light thuds in the process. He brings his hand over towards you hesitantly and decides to....
152111.title: Presented to Pichu

1521111.content:
You try to back away from the gigantic mouse, but before you know it, you're snatched into Pichu's yellow paw and brought to his gigantic face. You wonder what he's gonna do to you, fearing for your life.

Much to your surprise, the Pichu doesn't do anything... yet. Little you know is that he's actually studying you. This little toy in his paws seems different from the others he had before. In fact, this little toy has the unusual ability to move, Pichu could have a lot of fun playing some of his favourite games with it. Or he could simply resume the game he was playing just before the lady gave him this new toy.

You notice Pichu's ears moving with amusement, maybe he's wondering what to do with you. To him, you're just a mere doll, he can do anything he wants with you, and you know it. But then again, he's a baby, maybe you could convince him to let you go, right?
"Um... Hi there," you say "You know, I'm actually a human, can you let me go please?" .

Pichu's eyes widen excitedly. This toy can talk too! This tiny little doll is going to be one of his favourite, granted. With both the abilities to talk and speak, he's going to have the best fun he had in a while. Now just to decide what to play.

You notice Pichu staring at you with the expression of someone who's thinking. Then, he grins at you. You don't care about whatever he wants to do, you just hope he'll spare your life...
1521111.title: Snag you into his pudgy paw right away!

choices: The Clefairy, who's probably ready to comb your face off
The Axew who would just LOVE to play Godzilla with a real, live toy.
152112.content: Instead of revealing you to the Pichu, she reveals you to...
152112.title: Clefairy or Axew

choices: She decides to take you to the dollhouse
She decides to take you to the dome.
1521121.content:
As your owner carries you about, you begin to hear the sounds of the Clefairy's shrill grunts grow louder, the sound of the fibers of her brush scraping roughly down on her toy growing louder as well. The gigantic daycare worker's thumb pushes you upwards roughly,and her middle finger quickly coils around your chest, leaving you with your back against her palm. Looking forward, you get a brief glimpse of the contents of the cubbies, a single Pokeball in each, with most having some sort of hygienic supplies,snack food, and toys. Looking above the cubbies, you can see what appears to be a chart of sorts, a grid featuring the names of multiple pokemon and a list of dates going back from the start of the month.You spot the Clefairy's row on the chart, and are relieved to see nothing but smily faces. She must be one of the better-behaved Pokemon at the daycare. Before you can look much further into the list, however, you find yourself zooming down at a sickening pace, still trapped in the grip of the daycare worker.

When things come to a halt, you find yourself being held about two feet away from the towering back of the Clefairy you saw earlier. Her figure towers over you,even at a mere 2 feet in height (technically closer to 2'4, for she's a bit big for a Clefairy her age.) Clefairy squirms around slightly, playing god knows how roughly with her doll. Her arms move about. Her little folds of babyfat,small though they may be, jiggle, hidden beneath thick a thick sheet of pink fur. Her spiral shaped tail,which pokes out of a specially cut section at the rear of her garment, swishes to the left and right. As you watch the casual play-motions of the baby Pokemon, you pick up a new sense of fear of these gigantic creatures. Whatever unspeakable tortures Clefairy is afflicted upon the toy, she will be afflicting upon you momentarily. Clefairy is a Pokemon associated with girls..not just girls, but innocent and young ones. To the normal world, she might be a sweet, harmless little cuddle-creature that gradeschool girls can compare themselves to. To you, she is a predator who seeks not to devour your flesh, but to abuse you until she has had her fill.

While you observe her motions, you notice one of the butterfly 'ornaments' on the waistband of her diaper begin to flutter its wings frantically. Clefairy responds by bringing her paw down towards it and pinching around its wing with her sharp, white claws.She pokes a slight hole into the wing, and the butterfly's struggles cease. She brings her paw away, having subdued her decoration's little rebellion with ruthless efficiency. Your owner finally speaks up."Clefairy! I've got a special dolly for you!The caretaker booms, causing the Clefairy to cease her motions. You hear her make one final go with the brush before she sets down her doll with a thump. She twists her body very slightly...until you can see her face, making direct eye contact with you. Oh god no.


As her mouth opens wide in curiosity,you feel a terrible pit feeling of dread overtake you. Clefairy clumsily turns her body around, scooting about this way and that to get a better look at you. "Since you've been a good girl, I'll let you play with him first.'The caretaker says,immediately eliciting a delighted giggle from the Pokemon. Clefairy swiftly snags you up inbetween her enormous, fuzzy fingers and holds you right in front of her face, squinting to get a better look at you. She brings one of her claws right towards your stomach, threatening to skewer you just as she did the butterfly's wing. Her claw pokes against your belly gently,a few milimeters away from gutting you. You squirm just a tiny bit, but it's all you can do to avoid fighting back screaming, to avoid triggering her judgment. Clefairy lets out a curious "ooooooooh" as she sees your body's response to her aggression,and for a moment you wonder if this girly-girly pokemon is about to dig into you , if your attempts not to startle or anger her have been futile from the getgo You wince in pain as she drags the claw to the left and right,scratching at your skin, but not wounding it any further. She lifts her claw up, bringing it away from you at last.

The games have just begun, though. After a brief pause, you feel a surge of pain as she begins to press her fingers around you TIGHTLY, the pressure threatening to cause your body to explode. You shriek out in pain, a direct reaction to the torture, but the pain swiftly fades away as Clefairy looses her hold on you. She brings you brings you up before her enormous mouth and opens wide, an enormous pink tongue poking out of it,frothy drool bubbles clinging to it. She shoves your upper body against her tongue, dragging it up and down against your body painfully. The enormous tongue press into you, squishing around your body, practically burying you in the warm, damp surface as it slides back and forth. Her saliva soaks over you, making breathing all but impossible. What few breaths you manage to take are tainted by stray bits of saliva. Just when everything seems hopeless, Clefairy pulls you away from her tongue, your entire front half covered in slobber.
Clefairy's gaping mouth curls up into the dopiest smile you have ever seen. She is going to LOVE playing with her new toy.

Having satisfied her initial bout of curiosity, Clefairy moves on to an actual game. She glances over at the dollhouse, then over to the enormous bubble-like dome beside it. Her fingers pinch tightly around you as she contemplates whether to play dolls with you, or take you to the dome, for what purpose you cannot yet fathom.
1521121.title: Clefairy's new dolly.

choices: Fight like your life depends on it.
Remain calm...you don't want to anger her.
15211211.content:
The Clefairy's grubby, fuzzy fingertips tighten around your body as she begins to move, one of her fingers forcing its way against your head and giving you a face-full of pink fur in the process. Her hand tightens around you as the finger thoroughly rubs around your face, not only blocking out your view of the world, but also nearly smothering you in the process. In the tightness of her grip, you begin feel a sickening sensation as she starts to move about the room,deep booming THUDs sounding out beneath her paws as she makes her way across the carpet. You can feel the Clefairy swing her arms to and fro as she walks, flinging your body about with her every move. After several more steps, the frightening THUDS and breathtaking swings at last come to a halt. The Clefairy remains stationary, perhaps frozen in thought. Her handpaw begins to sporadically clench around you with unrelenting force, again and again, as she contemplates what to do with you. An idle gesture to her, but a series of agonizing squeezes to you.

After several more squeezes, the gigantic Pokemon baby slams her padded bottom onto the carpet with another, louder THUD and pauses in place for a moment as she gropes at your body with her fingertips once more. Eventually her fingers come to a stop around your legs, pushing around them with near-bone-crushing force. With your upper body freed, you're at last able to see again. You find yourself staring out at the mostly pink,wooden dollhouse from before. It clocks in at about 3 feet in height, bigger than the Clefairy, but still not too big for her to manage. The front end of the dollhouse is secured by a brass latching mechanism, with no functioning door. Instead, its door is little more than a brown rectangle painted onto the facade. The front-end of the dollhouse does have two pairs of windows, but they're thick and immovable plastic sheets, likely far too sturdy for you to break. You feel a cold chill pass down your spine as you realize that she could easily lock you in, affording you no means of escape. The entire building smells of soap,and has likely been given a good scrubbing recently. The Clefairy briefly lowers you down towards her hip, mashing you against the waistband of her diaper as she fumbles with the latch, finally opening the dollhouse up.

She lifts her arm up just a bit and brings it forward, holding you out in front of the opened building as if to show off its contents. The interior consists of five rooms,none of them accessible from the other. A kitchen, a living room, a bedroom,and a bathroom comprise the bulk of the dollhouse. Above the others rests another bedroom, grander than the other, making up the entirety of the attic. Toys lie scattered about the interior,mostly other Pokemon, but a few human-shaped dolls are mixed in with the rest. The furniture inside of the rooms is somewhat scattered. While the kitchen's interior is relatively orderly, the bathroom's tub is overturned and entirely too many toys are laid against one another in the attic bedroom.

Your observations are halted by a sudden shake from the gigantic Pokemon. She lifts you up in front of her face,staring at you eye to eye, shifting her body noisily about as she holds you relatively stable. She suddenly brings you towards her mouth once more and mashes a pair of teeth around your head, softly humming to herself as if lost in thought. She pulls you out moments later and slaps you down against the carpet, brutally rubbing you against it to dry you off, wanting her doll to at least be dry before she plays with it. Evidently she doesn't care much about that, however, as she quickly lifts you back up in front of her head, your body still rather damp , but with the added issue of a few clinging carpet fibers. The Clefairy eyes you curiously before silently lowering a pair of fingers right down towards your head, likely wanting to give you a bit of a touch up. This can't end well. You can either resist her advances with all your might, or comply and hope that she doesn't treat you too brutally
15211211.title: Clefairy introduces you to her dollhouse

choices: Brush at your hair with your spare hand.
152112111.content:
The Clefairy silently glances down at you as her grubby fingertips plunge for your head, ready to seize it between them like a grape from a fruit bowl. To her, you're just a dolly in need of a little touch up. To you, she's like a predator swooping for the kill. Seized by an instinctive terror, you lift your arms overhead,ready to take on her humongous fingers. The Clefairy lets out a deep "Ooooooh" as she eyes your arms. You look around hesitantly, first looking up at her curious expression, then over towards her enormous, chubby pink-furred belly, which you are at eye level with. Are you really going to be able to face off against a giant who could fit dozens of you in her belly?

The Clefairy hesitates for a moment before sending her fingers forward, both of your hands taking on one mighty finger each. You struggle with all your might to fight back against her, but your arms are swiftly and painfully sent reeling back. As the Clefairy repositions her fingers to better grip around your face, you lift your arms and begin to swing them against her fingertips,thrashing your body about all the while. The Clefairy looks down at your furious struggle and her focused expression shifts into an irritated pout. She can't groom her dolly with its body spazzing out and its arms smacking against her fingers! For all she knows, it might even bite her! Not only is the dolly getting in the way of her playtime, it's disrespecting her as well...and she can't have either of those from her darling little toy. She comes to a perfectly rational decision. She'll shake the fight out of you.

The little Pokemon brings her spare arm back and lifts you up a tad,your body slowly nearing her face. You're sent forward at gut-wrenching speeds, the world fading into a blur as the Clefairy flicks her hand forward. Your nerves reel from the near-whiplash-inducing swing, and you're left to reflect on your actions as she holds you in place, your body facing towards the dollhouse. If she gets her way, and if you somehow survive long enough to even get a chance, that's where you'll be, doing whatever it is a living doll is expected to do. She brings her other hand back down towards you, a devilish smile on her face. Not willing to give up, you lift your arms once more. She pauses and hesitates before swinging you once more, this time harder.

You're dazed even worse than before,but things just get worse from there. Her fingertips tighten firmly around your body. In fact, her grip is so tight that you can barely breathe. Without any provocation, she sends you reeling, up and down, left and right, as if you were on some sort of roller coaster with constantly changing tracks. It's starting to get to you. Your motions become disoriented. The carpet floor, the cubbies at the far corner of the room, the little Pokemon's chubby belly, and the dollhouse all zip by you in a chaotic fashion. Your arms begin to tire from all that flopping. The Clefairy, however, is still as eager to play as ever. Shaking the fight out of her dolly is fun! She adjusts her hand's position until you're left hanging upside down,then brings you back rightside up for yet another fling. She brings you up to the side of the dollhouse and presses you against the side of the roof,pinning you there with one fingertip firmly against your beck. With just a bit more effort, she could crush your back. But, mercifully, she instead releases you and allows you to fall back down to the carpet. with a thump. You land between her pudgy legs, at eye level with her enormous diaper. You attempt to flee into the dollhouse, but before you can get very far her handpaw slaps back onto you and her fingers quickly wrap back around you, this time by your leg.

She brings your body back up to eye level with her belly and looks down at you with a simple-minded smile on her face. Just getting her dolly to calm down has been quite an adventure for her. She swings your body around by your leg, causing you to flop even more than before. By this point, the will to resist is just about gone. She slides her fingers around your body until she has them firmly around your chest, this time around managing to pin one of your arms to your side. Once more, her spare hand descends for you,ready to wipe that little head of yours clean.
152112111.title: Clefairy tries to shake some sense into her dolly.

15211212.content:
Clefairy continues to hold you between her fuzzy and cushiony but crushing fingertips, her shimmering black eyes fixated upon you, her newest and most intriguing little dolly. The Clefairy remains relatively quiet as she examines you, in stark contrast to the Pichu, who is stomping about and raising hell with his high-pitched voice. Your 'adorable' captor's fingers smell strongly of slobber and sweat, but at the same time an overwhelmingly fruity scent clings to the air. Looking up at the underside of one of her claws, you indeed see a loose scrape of mashed up Bluk Berry, though you hardly have any time to appreciate such fine details of your surroundings. Clefairy suddenly hoists you high overhead, the world shifting into a blur. The Clefairy's arm clumsily flails about over her head,and loud THOOMing stomps soon follow. The world is a hellish mess of terrifying sensations...the thunderous stomping and piercing shrieking of three unrestrained titanic baby Pokemon, the blurred images of the ceiling and the alphabet-banner lining the top of the wall beneath it, the mighty fingers mashing around you,and, worst of all, the terrifying knowledge that a baby holds your fate in her grubby hands. Suddenly, you feel a tumbling sensation. The clefairy jerks her arm downward before halting, holding you against her hip, one of the butterflies stuck to her diaper fluttering its wings weakly against you. Turning around to see what she's doing, you realize that she is lifting up the dome from before. Before you can respond, she flicks you onto the carpet and slams the dome around you, an explosion of sound reverberating from around you.

You stare out into the translucent edge of the dome, the daycare around you reduced to a blur...a mostly clear one, but a blur all the same. You are suddenly shaken by the clefairy's footsteps, and you find that you're eye level with her tank-sized paws, a pair of pink stompers, grubby and cute,each equipped to mash you into a bloodstain. Turning your head up, you see the enormous Clefairy looming tall over you, gazing at you with a smile, a trick of drool coming out of her mouth. She reaches forward and,somehow, manages to poke her finger through the dome, the material parting around her finger as if it were a pool of water. She mashes her finger against you, knocking you onto your back,and giggles. You hesitate a little as the Clefairy draws her fingers back...you have a feeling this is about to turn bad.In fact, it almost immediately does. Once Clefairy is settled in, she begins to do a familiar dance...the metronome dance. Watching as the baby titan's paws rhythmically smash one after the other against the carpet, you are left with no choice but to flee for your life. The fibers of the carpet are thick and tall,coming up all the way to your knees, impairing your sprint, as if the constant quakes from her footfalls weren't enough. You manage to reach the edge of the bubble, but smack right into it. Apparently, the bubble is meant to allow things to -enter- freely...but keep things from getting out. As Clefairy begins humming the finishing lines of her tune, you struggle to crawl underneath the edge of the dome, to no success.You struggle with all your might to lift it up, but try as you might, you cannot.

Suddenly, a deafening burst of sound blasts throughout the bubble, pushing your body against its edge ,the sheer force of the burst causing your body to bounce back into the air, a painful ringing in your ears. You crash onto your back, your entire body sore and beaten back by the force of the blast, the Sonic Boom having done a serious number on you. You struggle to get up, but feel a searing pain in your right arm as you attempt to push off of the carpet. Something must have broken from the impact. As your hearing recoveries, you hear Clefairy's terrifying giggle pushing its way into your ears over the painful ringing noise. It's a noise that you have by now been conditioned to fear. The booming thuds of her footsteps soon resume as she goes for round two. She means to play with you until you break. You tremble, capable only of muttering to yourself weakly. "No...no...no." You're not a meal to get eaten or a bug to get stomped upon...you're a toy to be dealt with in whatever way its owner wishes. As you tremble fearfully, you hear another set of footsteps headed this way. The yellow paws of the Pichu stomp towards the dome before stopping just outside of it. He scratches at an itch on his right leg, then towards the Clefairy to get a better look at her dance. His face soon turns towards you,and he plops his butt down onto the carpet. He lets out a yawn,gazing at you idly,eager to see what move she uses next. He soon gets his answer.

Suddenly, the interior of the dome grows deathly cold,and a white haze of powdery snow swirls about overhead. The powder quickly swirls around you, the cold sensation so intense that it nearly burns. The Powder Snow clumps around your body. You manage to fight it at first, but it quickly accumulates to a point that you cannot overcome. Soon, your body is almost completely encased in ice, frozen, stuck in the middle of the Clefairy's target-practice toy. Painful though your position may be, it is a miracle that you are alive. Were she anything more than a baby Pokemon, you would be dead now. The Pichu claps his hands together, squealing out in applause, begging for an encore. Clefairy soon confirms your fears as her paws start back into motion. This could be the end. Right here, right now, you might just die at the hands of a baby wishing to show a cool trick to another, a victim of an innocent game you didn't even know about until four minutes ago. She's about to take another go at putting her toy to use.
15211212.title: Playtime with the sweet little Clefairy

152112121.content:
(Warning: this might get rather violent...)

The Clefairy's dancing motions begin to slow to a halt , the steady drumbeat of her paws slamming into the carpet ceasing after a few more thunderous stomps. You think,for a moment,that she has decided to spare you....or perhaps to leave you to die, trapped in your frozen shell. You lie motionless, able only to listen to the distant stomps of the Axew in the corner of the playroom. The Pichu lets out a loud, curious grunt, confused by the pause in the action. Clefairy's response is a simple giggle, an ominous sign. Whatever she's about to do, it won't be good. Never have you felt so vulnerable. The Clefairy takes a deep breath and stands up extra straight, stoking herself up for the next round of play. She brings her left leg forward, right towards the dome, almost as if she were a child taking a tentative first step into a swimming pool. Her leg phases through the side of the dome, just as her hand did before, and her paw crashes down into the carpet right near the edge,a massive THUD sounding out as her paw smashes down, trampling the fibers underneath. Frozen in place, you can't even move your head to see anything above her pudgy, fuzzy legs. Looking out at them, you spot her right paw in the distance, just outside of the dome. It appears to be...glowing.

Before you can put two and two together, the Clefairy lifts her right leg up and slowly moves it forward..right...towards...you. "CLE....FAIRY." She bellows, her girly voice echoing from overhead. A shadow casts itself over your tiny body, one that grows darker and darker. Moments later,the warm surface of clefairy's pawpad presses against your head, not actually crashing down onto you...just resting there. She's toying with you. Clefairy pushes her paw against your chest as gently as she can, knocking you onto your back. Her paw slams down right beside you with a deafening boom, sending your body away from her, just a bit. For a moment, though it's hard to be relieved with your body frozen and a painful ringing noise echoing in your head,you begin to think that the Pokemon chose to spare you. Then she lifts her paw up once more,and you realize that she just knocked you onto your back to make it easier for her to crush you. This time you can see what's coming next. An oval-shaped paw, squishy pink flesh surrounding a purplish-pink leathery pawpad,a single white claw extending from the front. A few carpet fibers cling to the underside of her pawpad,curled into twisted strands by her repeated footsteps, stuck in place by a thin layer of grim and sweat. Realizing that he's about to witness an amazing spectacle, the Pichu leans forward, eager to get a better view of your demise. He screeches out a terrifying cheer, begging the Clefairy to do the deed this time around.

She does so with glee. Her enormous paw smashes down onto your frozen body. For a brief, brief moment, your body is mashed down into the surface of the carpet, pinned beneath the pawpad, stuck in place as the force bearing down on your tiny body increases exponentially.You can hear the sound of the ice around you crunching,a single crack forming overhead before the inevitable happens one instant later. It takes just a mere second for the pressure applied to your body to finish you off. Your chest is crushed into a bloodstain beneath her little paw. The rest of your body breaks apart, shattering along with the ice, broken to bits.Death claims you in an instant,your last thoughts being nothing but raw fear. A fear for your life, a fear of dying at the hands...or feet...of a little baby Pokemon,the same one who laid claim to you moments ago, the same one who would ultimately kill you. A fear of a dingy little pawpad crashing down towards you. You spent the last moments of your life as nothing but a child's plaything,and the child that broke you relished doing so.

Clefairy looks down, her mouth agape. She's surprised her plaything broke so quickly...and that it wound up being so gooey. She pauses for a moment, having to spend a few seconds just to take it all in. Her surprised expression fades to a smile. She lifts her paw up and sets it down on the carpet, dutifully wiping off the gooey stain on her pawpad into the floor. The Pichu immediately crawls forward, sweeping the shattered toy's limbs up into a little pile. He sits down, leaving the pile between his outstretched legs. He picks one up and shoves one into his mouth, chewing on it curiously. In the meantime, the Clefairy manages to swipe away the toy's head, not wanting the Pichu to poach ALL of the remaining pieces. The Pichu hardly even notices. He picks up the other limbs that remain and heads off, eager to figure out some way to play with them. As he walks off, the Pichu occasionally dramatically smashes his paws against the carpet, wishing that he had a little toy-man of his own to smash and stomp upon. For her part, the Clefairy carries the toy's head away, back towards the dollhouse,wanting to see if the broken toy's head will fit on her favorite doll. She plops her butt down in front of the dollhouse and reaches for the toy,ready to find out.
152112121.title: The shattered toy

152112122.content:
The Clefairy's feet continue to pound against the carpet floor as she gets ready to launch another playful attack. Your body is still hopelessly frozen over, a sitting duck for whatever Clefairy is about to send your way. You begin to hear a crackling noise from overhead, soon joined by a deep, echoing "OOOOOH", the Clefairy clearly intrigued by her new power. Sparks of electricity tumble to the ground at her paws, giving you a clear and ominous indication as to what's about to happen. The Pichu lets out a loud sigh,awestruck by(and, perhaps, jealous of) the sight before him. You would let out a scream of shock if you could actually move your mouth. The Clefairy takes a single stomp forward, her paw smashing down into the carpet, right through the edge of the bubble. You can see her paw twist just a bit as the shadow of her arm approaches. As you watch the torch-sized sparks tumble to the ground, somehow dissipating against the carpet fibers, you realize that she's really going to do it. She's going to electrocute you.

An explosion of sound and light fills the dome, and pain instantly seizes you. A brilliant bolt of lightning crashes to your body, your little form vibrating in place as the deadly bolt overwhelms you. The lightningbolt is so intense that the ice around you begins to melt into a puddle,causing you to stumble forward onto your chest. "AH HA HA HA HEE HEEHEE" the Clefairy giggles, amused by the sight. You're flopping about against the newly damp carpet fibers as if you were a Magikarp, animated by the surge of electricity throughout your system. The current of electricity swiftly abates, but the shocking sensation doesn't go just yet. You can hear the stomping of footsteps, hopefully those of the daycare lady, coming to save you. Though you can hardly move given your circumstances, you just barely manage to roll over to your side, motivated by the slim chance that someone is coming to save you from this horrible game. However, what you see does nothing to comfort you. You see the pudgy, fuzzy paws of the Pichu,the source of the stomping noise from earlier, pounding over towards the Clefairy. He begins poking at her,hopping about giddily, pointing towards you. Before you can figure out what he's talking about, he turns around, facing you,looking at you eagerly. He clenches his fists as he glares down at you. Sparks begin to fly from his cheeks. He wants to show the Clefairy that he can shock things, too....and he probably wants her to know that he's better at it, too!

The Pichu lets out a terrifying "CHUUU" as he strikes you with a terrifying thunderclap of his own,sending you onto your back and causing you to writhe in agony once more. This time around, the Clefairy is the one able to sit back and freely to enjoy the spectacle. She eagerly watches, her mouth agape, as your body flops about, just as amused with your 'silly' motions as she was the last time. The thunderbolt is indeed mightier than the Clefairy's,and is enough to leave you completely paralyzed. Your body is hardly able to take the force of the attack,and when the numbness finally subsides, you are left with a dreadful sensation all throughout your body. You look worse for wear, to say the least though you don't even want to think about that. The baby Pokemon don't seem to care at all about your wounds, though the fact that you're not moving nearly as much as before is a sure sign that their toy is about ready to break.

The Clefairy begins hopping around in place, huge booming thuds sounding out as she prepares for her next turn. The Pichu runs around the dome, back to his initial position,and lies on his belly, just at the edge of your field of vision. His enormous face gazes at you, its chin resting against the carpet. You can feel the warmth of his breaths, if only barely...and you can definitely smell the scent. Yuck. The Pichu's ears perk up as the Clefairy begins the metronome dance again. You wish there was a way to convince them to stop, but they can't. This is actually the most fun Clefairy has had in a while, and for Pichu it's a wonderful chance to bond with the creative little girl. She's not so different from him after all. In fact, she knows how to have fun just as well as he does. Unfortunately for you, there's just no way that the little-writhing toy-thing the babies are so eagerly playing with will EVER be able to convince them to close up shop and move on to a gentler game. Clefairy's going to attack you until your little body can no longer take it,and maybe keep on going even after that. They're going to keep on using you as a simple toddler toy until you're a bloodstain on the carpet. Clefairy continues to stomp about,eager to impress her audience, and curious to see what torment she shall unleash upon her dolly next. Eventually, she finally makes her next move...
152112122.title: Like a living lightningrod

1521121221.content:
Lying on your back, virtually paralyzed from the two consecutive rounds of electric attacks, you can't do much beyond looking at the world overhead. The Clefairy looms over you as she resumes her curious variation of the metronome dance. You can see her lifting her arms up and slowly swinging them left and right, her claws beginning to emit a brilliant white light as they gather up energy. Her mouth is wide open, in a tremendous grin, a single trickle of drool trickling out,right down to the waistband of her diaper. You can hear her paws pounding against the ground in the same rhythm. Most Clefairy stand in place whenever they use Metronome...maybe this one is a bit more energetic than the others,or maybe she's just stomping about to frighten you. Whatever the case, the continuous THUD THUD THUD THUDs of her paws smashing against the ground are a horrifying reminder of what is to come. It won't be too many more stomps before she's ready to subject you to yet another potentially deadly attack. Gradually, her motions begin to slow down, until her fingers are pointed straight up. The glowing light begins to subside.

         "AHHH!?" The Clefairy yelps out, looking left and right at her fingers, shaking them as if trying to figure out what went wrong. You can feel your heart pounding as you wait in anticipation. Maybe she has run out of juice. Maybe they'll leave you alone. It's a slim, slim, one percent chance...but it's reason enough to give you hope. The Pichu scoots forward a bit , his handpaws slamming forward, his head head passing through the dome, and his fuzzy chin hovering over your tiny body. "CHUUU?" he coos, sending a chill down your back as you realize he'd probably snag you up and play with you himself if the Clefairy decides to abandon you. Either way, he's clearly just as curious as you are as to what's about to happen. The Clefairy quickly answers by taking a stomp forward, having decided what to do. The Pichu takes a glance at the Clefairy before quickly crawling back, looking at you eagerly. The Clefairy lifts her right paw up and brings her foot forward, bringing it towards you. She's going to attack you directly,and you soon find out how.

         The Clefairy's paw slams down right in front of you, the sound of her mighty footstep nearly deafening you. You can feel the carpet sink beneath the weight of her paw, the fibers bending to conform to her enormous foot. She pivots her left leg over your tiny body, but doesn't step on you. No, instead, she begins to turn her enormous body around. You can hear a happy laugh coming from Pichu as you look up at the sight overhead. The back end of the Clefairy's purplish-pink diaper hangs over your tiny body, her enormous pudgy legs poking out of its legholes, a loop running around the slim base of her curly tail, secured by a velco strap at the waistband. Blueish star-shaped decals are printed onto the surface. You don't like where this is headed. You summon all of your might and manage to wriggle back across the carpet in spite of your near total paralysis, fighting your way back as if you were a worm. You make little headway.The enormous, chubby Pokemon's butt still hangs over your head, eclipsing your view of the world overhead. Her back towers high over you, stretching as far as your eyes can see.Her arms rock back and forth, as does her rear. She's getting ready for a jump.

         After a few more motions, you hear the Clefairy speak up "Cleh...fair....", she booms, pausing at the end. A loud pounding noise booms out as the Clefairy kicks her feet into the carpet and bounces off of the ground, almost to the ceiling. "REEEE!" she screams as her enormous backside descends towards you, slowly for the first second or two, then quickly accelerating to a dreadful speed. You continue to crawl back pitifully,your life flashing before your eyes. The massive rear soon covers the entirety of your view, its shadow engulfing the floor around you...and its descent doesn't stop.

         Your body erupts into pain as the Clefairy's rear smashes down on you, accompanied by the sound of almost every bone in your body crunching, followed by a sickening squish as your body is pounded near into a pulp. The padding of the diaper pounds down onto your body, smashing you between her backside and the carpet, the garment briefly doing what it can to conform around your body before splattering you into a gooey mess. "YEEEE!" The Pichu shrieks noisily, clapping his handpaws together as the Clefairy softly giggles to herself. "HEE HEE HEE" . As it turns out, however, her work is not finished. In spite of the massive weight of the Clefairy,you managed to survive the initial blow, remaining trapped in the darkness beneath her backside. You can feel the creature's truly immense weight bearing down upon what is left of you. There's no fighting back at all, now. In fact, you can't even do anything beyond cry. After a few moments, the Pichu points this out to the Clefairy, who lets out an annoyed grunt. She'll handle this.

         You feel the weight on your body begin to let up as the Clefairy begins to lift her backside off of the carpet, carrying your crushed body along with it. Suddenly, she slams her butt down onto the carpet again, with a bit less force than before, but with enough force to pulverize you all the same, putting your body into an even worse state. "GUH. GUH. GUH" she grunts as she continues smashing her butt down onto you again and again. Now that your body is broken completely, you're of no use to her, and the only thing left to do is to wipe you out completely. She smashes her butt down again and again, shoving it extra hard into the carpet, the sound of your body squishing beneath her growing squishier each time. The Pichu hoots and hollers, stomping his feet to the rhythm of her bounces and cheering her on with a shrill but booming "CHU! CHU! CHU!." The Clefairy continues working your body down to a little red stain,bouncing off of what little remains of you again and again, for a full minute, until there's nothing left to bounce off of. After the fifteenth bounce, she stops putting any significant effort into her motions,and instead simply repeatedly hops in place, barely moving at all.

         She gives you one last bounce, drags her rear back and forth for good measure, then stands up, sighing in relief. Pichu steps behind her, checking to see if she got you. Seeing nothing but a red streak, he squeals, clapping his hands and stomping his paws about noisily, confirming her victory. This time around, the toy's gone for sure.The Clefairy rubs at the back of the garment, wiping the bloodstain up onto her paw. She licks at it before cringing, finding the flavor not sufficiently sweet for her liking. She slaps her handpaw onto the ground and wipes it dry,then hurries over to the Pichu, ready to play a game with him, the pleasant memory of her playtime with the little prey-plaything fresh on her mind.
1521121221.title: Splattered beneath Clefairy's rear.

15213.content:
The caretaker smiles and calls the enormous Pichu towards her. He idly bashes his toy against the wall one last time before turning towards the caretaker, letting out a curious squeal, and then thumping over towards you. Your heart skips a beat as the adorable 'little' yellow furred beast makes his way across the floor, his eyes already fixating upon you, his mouth hanging very slightly ajar, for once quiet. Your heartrate speeds up as he draws near, and you begin praying that this is all just a dream, despite the many clear signs that it isn't.

Just as the Pichu draws near, you hear the loud jingling of a bell, coming from another room. The woman hesitates, lifting you up and debating whether to toss you to the Pichu like a hushpuppy to a prized bloodhound, or to wait until after she handles the guest to let Pichu show you what it means to be a toy. .She sighs before shoving you back into her apron pocket, deciding that it would be a bad idea to leave her back turned after introducing Pichu to his new toy. The Pichu pounds his feet into the carpet ,letting out a shrill cry, forcing the caretaker to calm him down as best she can. She leaves the room, heading over to the front desk.

As she nears the desk, you hesitantly poke your head out above the top of her pocket. You see the young boy from before, standing at the doormat, busily wiping his sneakers against it, each stomp causing you to nearly lose your grip on the edge of the apron pocket. His sneakers are enormous, easily big enough to crush you like a roach, and are smirched with grass stains and flakes of dirt. He's wearing a pair of black pants, a blue jacket, and the most confident looking smile you've ever seen. Though he's young, boyishly cute, and kind of scrawny, he exudes an aura of authority that you can feel yourself practically bending to already. You're not sure if you want to get his attention.

"Hilbert, was it?"The caretaker says, your body getting knocked back into the depths of the pocket as she steps forward to greet him. Looks like he's a repeat customer. "Yeah. Nice to meet you again, mam." he replies politely. As he chats with the lady about a Pokemon he wishes to drop off there, you feel the woman's fingers seize around you. Looking to drop off a Pokemon? she asks, starting to play with the tiny toy-boy in her pocket. Her digits grope at your face, press at your arms, even move you about,casually toying with you as she addresses her guest, nearly spraining your right wrist in the process. "Yeah. Here you go. It's a Ponyta. Her name is FlameDash"He says, clearly proud of the arbitrary nickname he gave her. The caretaker suddenly lifts you out of her pocket, casually setting you down by an enormous journal. The boy hands her over a Great Ball, and signs his name on the journal, his enormous hand passing right beside you. He glances over towards you curiously as he finishes with his signature. The caretaker shakes his hand and bids him farewell, then turns to leave the room. The gigantic boy lifts his head upwards and zips his bag up. He will likely be leaving the daycare soon...this might be your only chance to get his attention. Alternatively, you COULD wait for him to leave the room...then you'd be able to attempt an escape all on your own, but you'd have to be quick,as the caretaker would likely return soon thereafter.
15213.title: Hilbert stops by the daycare.

choices: Hands you back to the daycare lady
152131.content:
"H..hey. Over here!"
